atk-s0101a0:4: Buddhopi buddhabhāvaṃ, bhāvetvā ceva sacchikatvā ca;
atk-s0101a0:5: Yaṃ upagato gatamalaṃ, vande tamanuttaraṃ dhammaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:13: Pañcahi yā saṅgītā, anusaṅgītā ca pacchāpi.
atk-s0101a0:28: Iti pana sabbaṃ yasmā, visuddhimagge mayā suparisuddhaṃ;
atk-s0101a0:29: Vuttaṃ tasmā bhiyyo, na taṃ idha vicārayissāmi.
atk-s0101a0:31: Ṭhatvā pakāsayissati, tattha yathā bhāsitaṃ atthaṃ”.
atk-s0101a0:32: Icceva kato tasmā, tampi gahetvāna saddhimetāya;
atk-s0101a0:35_0: Tattha dīghāgamo nāma sīlakkhandhavaggo, mahāvaggo, pāthikavaggoti vaggato tivaggo
atk-s0101a0:35_1: hoti; suttato catuttiṃsasuttasaṅgaho. Tassa vaggesu sīlakkhandhavaggo ādi, suttesu
atk-s0101a0:35_2: brahmajālaṃ. Brahmajālassāpi “evaṃ me suta”ntiādikaṃ āyasmatā ānandena paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vuttaṃ nidānamādi.
atk-s0101a0:37_0: Paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti nāma cesā kiñcāpi vinayapiṭake tantimārūḷhā, nidānakosallatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:37_1: pana idhāpi evaṃ veditabbā. Dhammacakkappavattanañhi ādiṃ katvā yāva subhaddaparibbājakavinayanā
atk-s0101a0:37_2: katabuddhakicce, kusinārāyaṃ upavattane mallānaṃ sālavane yamakasālānamantare visākhapuṇṇamadivase
atk-s0101a0:37_3: paccūsasamaye anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbute bhagavati lokanāthe, bhagavato
atk-s0101a0:37_4: dhātubhājanadivase sannipatitānaṃ sattannaṃ bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ saṅghatthero āyasmā
atk-s0101a0:37_5: mahākassapo sattāhaparinibbute bhagavati subhaddena vuḍḍhapabbajitena – “alaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0101a0:37_6: mā socittha, mā paridevittha, sumuttā mayaṃ tena mahāsamaṇena, upaddutā ca homa –
atk-s0101a0:37_7: ‘idaṃ vo kappati, idaṃ vo na kappatī’ti, idāni pana mayaṃ yaṃ icchissāma, taṃ karissāma,
atk-s0101a0:37_8: yaṃ na icchissāma na taṃ karissāmā”ti vuttavacanamanussaranto, īdisassa ca saṅghasannipātassa
atk-s0101a0:37_9: puna dullabhabhāvaṃ maññamāno, “ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ pāpabhikkhū ‘atītasatthukaṃ
atk-s0101a0:37_10: pāvacana’nti maññamānā pakkhaṃ labhitvā nacirasseva saddhammaṃ antaradhāpeyyuṃ, yāva
atk-s0101a0:37_11: ca dhammavinayo tiṭṭhati, tāva anatītasatthukameva pāvacanaṃ hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0101a0:38: ‘Yo vo, ānanda, mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto, so vo mamaccayena satthā’ti.
atk-s0101a0:39: ‘Yaṃnūnāhaṃ dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyaṃ, yathayidaṃ sāsanaṃ addhaniyaṃ assa ciraṭṭhitikaṃ’.
atk-s0101a0:41: ‘Dhāressasi pana me tvaṃ, kassapa, sāṇāni paṃsukūlāni nibbasanānī’ti vatvā cīvare sādhāraṇaparibhogena.
atk-s0101a0:42_0: ‘Ahaṃ, bhikkhave, yāvadeva ākaṅkhāmi vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi
atk-s0101a0:42_1: savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharāmi; kassapopi,
atk-s0101a0:42_2: bhikkhave, yāvadeva, ākaṅkhati vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ
atk-s0101a0:42_3: savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī’ti.
atk-s0101a0:43_1: samasamaṭṭhapanena ca anuggahito, tathā ākāse pāṇiṃ cāletvā alaggacittatāya ceva
atk-s0101a0:43_2: candopamapaṭipadāya ca pasaṃsito, tassa kimaññaṃ āṇaṇyaṃ bhavissati. Nanu maṃ bhagavā
atk-s0101a0:43_3: rājā viya sakakavacaissariyānuppadānena attano kulavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpakaṃ puttaṃ ‘saddhammavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpako
atk-s0101a0:43_4: me ayaṃ bhavissatī’ti, mantvā iminā asādhāraṇena anuggahena anuggahesi, imāya ca
atk-s0101a0:43_5: uḷārāya pasaṃsāya pasaṃsīti cintayanto dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhaṃ janesi. Yathāha –
atk-s0101a0:44_0: “Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo bhikkhū āmantesi – ‘ekamidāhaṃ, āvuso, samayaṃ pāvāya
atk-s0101a0:44_1: kusināraṃ addhānamaggappaṭipanno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehī”ti
atk-s0101a0:44_2: sabbaṃ subhaddakaṇḍaṃ vitthārato veditabbaṃ. Atthaṃ panassa mahāparinibbānāvasāne
atk-s0101a0:46_0: “Handa mayaṃ, āvuso, dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyāma, pure adhammo dippati, dhammo
atk-s0101a0:46_1: paṭibāhiyyati; pure avinayo dippati, vinayo paṭibāhiyyati; pure adhammavādino balavanto
atk-s0101a0:46_2: honti, dhammavādino dubbalā honti, pure avinayavādino balavanto honti, vinayavādino dubbalā hontī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:47_0: Bhikkhū āhaṃsu – “tena hi, bhante, thero bhikkhū uccinatū”ti. Thero pana sakalanavaṅgasatthusāsanapariyattidhare
atk-s0101a0:47_2: anekasahasse ca vajjetvā tipiṭakasabbapariyattippabhedadhare paṭisambhidāppatte mahānubhāve
atk-s0101a0:47_3: yebhuyyena bhagavato etadaggaṃ āropite tevijjādibhede khīṇāsavabhikkhūyeva ekūnapañcasate
atk-s0101a0:47_4: pariggahesi. Ye sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ – “atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo ekenūnāni pañca
atk-s0101a0:48_0: Kissa pana thero ekenūnamakāsīti? Āyasmato ānandattherassa okāsakaraṇatthaṃ. Tenahāyasmatā
atk-s0101a0:48_1: sahāpi, vināpi, na sakkā dhammasaṅgītiṃ kātuṃ. So hāyasmā sekkho sakaraṇīyo, tasmā
atk-s0101a0:48_2: sahāpi na sakkā. Yasmā panassa kiñci dasabaladesitaṃ suttageyyādikaṃ appaccakkhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:50: Caturāsīti sahassāni, ye me dhammā pavattino”ti. ;
atk-s0101a0:52_0: Yadi evaṃ sekkhopi samāno dhammasaṅgītiyā bahukārattā therena uccinitabbo assa, atha
atk-s0101a0:52_1: kasmā na uccinitoti? Parūpavādavivajjanato. Thero hi āyasmante ānande ativiya vissattho
atk-s0101a0:52_2: ahosi, tathā hi naṃ sirasmiṃ palitesu jātesupi ‘na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī’ti,
atk-s0101a0:52_3: kumārakavādena ovadati. Sakyakulappasuto cāyasmā tathāgatassa bhātā cūḷapituputto.
atk-s0101a0:52_4: Tattha keci bhikkhū chandāgamanaṃ viya maññamānā – “bahū asekkhapaṭisambhidāppatte
atk-s0101a0:52_5: bhikkhū ṭhapetvā ānandaṃ sekkhapaṭisambhidāppattaṃ thero uccinī”ti upavadeyyuṃ. Taṃ
atk-s0101a0:52_6: parūpavādaṃ parivajjento, ‘ānandaṃ vinā dhammasaṅgītiṃ na sakkā kātuṃ, bhikkhūnaṃyeva
atk-s0101a0:53: Atha sayameva bhikkhū ānandassatthāya theraṃ yāciṃsu. Yathāha –
atk-s0101a0:54_0: “Bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ mahākassapaṃ etadavocuṃ – ‘ayaṃ, bhante, āyasmā ānando kiñcāpi
atk-s0101a0:54_1: sekkho abhabbo chandā dosā mohā bhayā agatiṃ gantuṃ, bahu cānena bhagavato santike
atk-s0101a0:54_2: dhammo ca vinayo ca pariyatto, tena hi, bhante, thero āyasmantampi ānandaṃ uccinatū’ti.
atk-s0101a0:54_3: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantampi ānandaṃ uccinī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:55: Evaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anumatiyā uccinitena tenāyasmatā saddhiṃ pañcatherasatāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:56_0: Atha kho therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi – “kattha nu kho mayaṃ dhammañca vinayañca
atk-s0101a0:56_1: saṅgāyeyyāmā”ti? Atha kho therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi – “rājagahaṃ kho mahāgocaraṃ
atk-s0101a0:56_2: pahūtasenāsanaṃ, yaṃnūna mayaṃ rājagahe vassaṃ vasantā dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyāma,
atk-s0101a0:56_3: na aññe bhikkhū rājagahe vassaṃ upagaccheyyu”nti.
atk-s0101a0:57: Kasmā pana nesaṃ etadahosi? “Idaṃ pana amhākaṃ thāvarakammaṃ, koci visabhāgapuggalo saṅghamajjhaṃ pavisitvā ukkoṭeyyā”ti. Athāyasmā mahākassapo ñattidutiyena kammena sāvesi –
atk-s0101a0:58_0: “Suṇātu me, āvuso saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ saṅgho imāni pañca bhikkhusatāni
atk-s0101a0:58_1: sammanneyya rājagahe vassaṃ vasantāni dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyituṃ, na aññehi bhikkhūhi
atk-s0101a0:59_0: “Suṇātu me, āvuso saṅgho, saṅgho imāni pañcabhikkhusatāni sammanna”ti ‘rājagahe vassaṃ
atk-s0101a0:59_1: vasantāni dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyituṃ, na aññehi bhikkhūhi rājagahe vassaṃ vasitabbanti.
atk-s0101a0:59_2: Yassāyasmato khamati imesaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ sammuti’ rājagahe vassaṃ vasantānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:59_3: dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyituṃ, na aññehi bhikkhūhi rājagahe vassaṃ vasitabbanti,
atk-s0101a0:59_4: so tuṇhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
atk-s0101a0:60_0: “Sammatāni saṅghena imāni pañcabhikkhusatāni rājagahe vassaṃ vasantāni dhammañca
atk-s0101a0:60_1: vinayañca saṅgāyituṃ, na aññehi bhikkhūhi rājagahe vassaṃ vasitabbanti, khamati saṅghassa,
atk-s0101a0:61_0: Ayaṃ pana kammavācā tathāgatassa parinibbānato ekavīsatime divase katā. Bhagavā hi
atk-s0101a0:61_1: visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ paccūsasamaye parinibbuto, athassa sattāhaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ
atk-s0101a0:61_2: gandhamālādīhi pūjayiṃsu. Evaṃ sattāhaṃ sādhukīḷanadivasā nāma ahesuṃ. Tato sattāhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:61_3: citakāya agginā jhāyi, sattāhaṃ sattipañjaraṃ katvā sandhāgārasālāyaṃ dhātupūjaṃ
atk-s0101a0:61_4: kariṃsūti, ekavīsati divasā gatā. Jeṭṭhamūlasukkapakkhapañcamiyaṃyeva dhātuyo bhājayiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:61_5: Etasmiṃ dhātubhājanadivase sannipatitassa mahābhikkhusaṅghassa subhaddena vuḍḍhapabbajitena
atk-s0101a0:61_6: kataṃ anācāraṃ ārocetvā vuttanayeneva ca bhikkhū uccinitvā ayaṃ kammavācā katā.
atk-s0101a0:62_0: Imañca pana kammavācaṃ katvā thero bhikkhū āmantesi – “āvuso, idāni tumhākaṃ cattālīsa
atk-s0101a0:62_1: divasā okāso kato, tato paraṃ ‘ayaṃ nāma no palibodho atthī’ti, vattuṃ na labbhā,
atk-s0101a0:62_2: tasmā etthantare yassa rogapalibodho vā ācariyupajjhāyapalibodho vā mātāpitupalibodho
atk-s0101a0:62_3: vā atthi, pattaṃ vā pana pacitabbaṃ, cīvaraṃ vā kātabbaṃ, so taṃ palibodhaṃ chinditvā
atk-s0101a0:63_0: Evañca pana vatvā thero attano pañcasatāya parisāya parivuto rājagahaṃ gato. Aññepi
atk-s0101a0:63_1: mahātherā attano attano parivāre gahetvā sokasallasamappitaṃ mahājanaṃ assāsetukāmā
atk-s0101a0:63_2: taṃ taṃ disaṃ pakkantā. Puṇṇatthero pana sattasatabhikkhuparivāro ‘tathāgatassa parinibbānaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:64_0: Āyasmā ānando yathā pubbe aparinibbutassa, evaṃ parinibbutassāpi bhagavato sayameva
atk-s0101a0:64_1: pattacīvaramādāya pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
atk-s0101a0:64_2: Gacchato gacchato panassa parivārā bhikkhū gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā. Tenāyasmatā gatagataṭṭhāne
atk-s0101a0:64_3: mahāparidevo ahosi. Anupubbena pana sāvatthimanuppatte there sāvatthivāsino manussā
atk-s0101a0:64_4: “thero kira āgato”ti sutvā gandhamālādihatthā paccuggantvā – “bhante, ānanda, pubbe
atk-s0101a0:64_5: bhagavatā saddhiṃ āgacchatha, ajja kuhiṃ bhagavantaṃ ṭhapetvā āgatatthā”tiādīni vadamānā
atk-s0101a0:64_6: parodiṃsu. Buddhassa bhagavato parinibbānadivase viya mahāparidevo ahosi.
atk-s0101a0:65_0: Tatra sudaṃ āyasmā ānando aniccatādipaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammiyākathāya taṃ mahājanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:65_1: saññāpetvā jetavanaṃ pavisitvā dasabalena vasitagandhakuṭiṃ vanditvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā
atk-s0101a0:65_2: mañcapīṭhaṃ nīharitvā papphoṭetvā gandhakuṭiṃ sammajjitvā milātamālākacavaraṃ chaḍḍetvā
atk-s0101a0:65_3: mañcapīṭhaṃ atiharitvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā bhagavato ṭhitakāle karaṇīyaṃ vattaṃ
atk-s0101a0:65_5: vanditvā – “nanu bhagavā, ayaṃ tumhākaṃ nhānakālo, ayaṃ dhammadesanākālo, ayaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0101a0:65_6: ovādadānakālo, ayaṃ sīhaseyyakappanakālo, ayaṃ mukhadhovanakālo”tiādinā nayena paridevamānova
atk-s0101a0:65_7: akāsi, yathā taṃ bhagavato guṇagaṇāmatarasaññutāya patiṭṭhitapemo ceva akhīṇāsavo
atk-s0101a0:65_8: ca anekesu ca jātisatasahassesu aññamaññassūpakārasañjanitacittamaddavo. Tamenaṃ
atk-s0101a0:65_9: aññatarā devatā – “bhante, ānanda, tumhe evaṃ paridevamānā kathaṃ aññe assāsessathā”ti
atk-s0101a0:65_10: saṃvejesi. So tassā vacanena saṃviggahadayo santhambhitvā tathāgatassa parinibbānato
atk-s0101a0:65_11: pabhuti ṭhānanisajjabahulattā ussannadhātukaṃ kāyaṃ samassāsetuṃ dutiyadivase khīravirecanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:65_12: pivitvā vihāreyeva nisīdi. Yaṃ sandhāya subhena māṇavena pahitaṃ māṇavakaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0101a0:66: “Akālo, kho māṇavaka, atthi me ajja bhesajjamattā pītā, appeva nāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāmā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:67: Dutiyadivase cetakattherena pacchāsamaṇena gantvā subhena māṇavena puṭṭho imasmiṃ dīghanikāye subhasuttaṃ nāma dasamaṃ suttaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0101a0:68_0: Atha ānandatthero jetavanamahāvihāre khaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ kārāpetvā upakaṭṭhāya
atk-s0101a0:68_1: vassūpanāyikāya bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ohāya rājagahaṃ gato tathā aññepi dhammasaṅgāhakā
atk-s0101a0:68_2: bhikkhūti. Evañhi gate, te sandhāya ca idaṃ vuttaṃ – “atha kho therā bhikkhū rājagahaṃ
atk-s0101a0:68_3: agamaṃsu, dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyitu”nti. Te āsaḷhīpuṇṇamāyaṃ uposathaṃ katvā
atk-s0101a0:69_0: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahaṃ parivāretvā aṭṭhārasa mahāvihārā honti, te sabbepi
atk-s0101a0:69_1: chaḍḍitapatitauklāpā ahesuṃ. Bhagavato hi parinibbāne sabbepi bhikkhū attano attano
atk-s0101a0:69_2: pattacīvaramādāya vihāre ca pariveṇe ca chaḍḍetvā agamaṃsu. Tattha katikavattaṃ kurumānā
atk-s0101a0:69_4: khaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ karomā’ti cintesuṃ. Titthiyā hi evaṃ vadeyyuṃ – “samaṇassa
atk-s0101a0:69_5: gotamassa sāvakā satthari ṭhiteyeva vihāre paṭijaggiṃsu, parinibbute chaḍḍesuṃ, kulānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:69_6: mahādhanapariccāgo vinassatī”ti. Tesañca vādaparimocanatthaṃ cintesunti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:69_7: Evaṃ cintayitvā ca pana katikavattaṃ kariṃsu. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0101a0:70_0: “Atha kho therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi – bhagavatā, kho āvuso, khaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:70_1: vaṇṇitaṃ, handa mayaṃ, āvuso, paṭhamaṃ māsaṃ khaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ karoma,
atk-s0101a0:70_2: majjhimaṃ māsaṃ sannipatitvā dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyissāmā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:71_0: Te dutiyadivase gantvā rājadvāre aṭṭhaṃsu. Rājā āgantvā vanditvā – “kiṃ bhante, āgatatthā”ti
atk-s0101a0:71_1: attanā kattabbakiccaṃ pucchi. Therā aṭṭhārasa mahāvihārapaṭisaṅkharaṇatthāya hatthakammaṃ
atk-s0101a0:71_2: paṭivedesuṃ. Rājā hatthakammakārake manusse adāsi. Therā paṭhamaṃ māsaṃ sabbavihāre
atk-s0101a0:71_3: paṭisaṅkharāpetvā rañño ārocesuṃ – “niṭṭhitaṃ, mahārāja, vihārapaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ, idāni
atk-s0101a0:71_4: dhammavinayasaṅgahaṃ karomā”ti. “Sādhu bhante visaṭṭhā karotha, mayhaṃ āṇācakkaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:71_5: tumhākañca dhammacakkaṃ hotu, āṇāpetha, bhante, kiṃ karomī”ti. “Saṅgahaṃ karontānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:71_7: sattapaṇṇi guhādvāre kātuṃ yuttaṃ mahārājā”ti. “Sādhu, bhante”ti kho rājā ajātasattu
atk-s0101a0:71_9: abhibhavantamiva rājabhavanavibhūtiṃ, avahasantamiva devavimānasiriṃ, siriyā niketanamiva
atk-s0101a0:71_13: brahmavimānasadisaṃ alaṅkaritvā, tasmiṃ mahāmaṇḍape pañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anagghāni
atk-s0101a0:71_14: pañca kappiyapaccattharaṇasatāni paññapetvā, dakkhiṇabhāgaṃ nissāya uttarābhimukhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:71_15: therāsanaṃ, maṇḍapamajjhe puratthābhimukhaṃ buddhassa bhagavato āsanārahaṃ dhammāsanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:71_16: paññapetvā, dantakhacitaṃ bījaniñcettha ṭhapetvā, bhikkhusaṅghassa ārocāpesi – “niṭṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:72_0: Tasmiñca pana divase ekacce bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ sandhāya evamāhaṃsu – “imasmiṃ
atk-s0101a0:72_1: bhikkhusaṅghe eko bhikkhu vissagandhaṃ vāyanto vicaratī”ti. Thero taṃ sutvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0101a0:72_2: bhikkhusaṅghe añño vissagandhaṃ vāyanto vicaraṇakabhikkhu nāma natthi. Addhā ete
atk-s0101a0:72_3: maṃ sandhāya vadantīti saṃvegaṃ āpajji. Ekacce naṃ āhaṃsuyeva – “sve āvuso, ānanda,
atk-s0101a0:72_4: sannipāto, tvañca sekkho sakaraṇīyo, tena te na yuttaṃ sannipātaṃ gantuṃ, appamatto hohī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:73_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando – ‘sve sannipāto, na kho metaṃ patirūpaṃ yvāhaṃ sekkho samāno
atk-s0101a0:73_1: sannipātaṃ gaccheyya’nti, bahudeva rattiṃ kāyagatāya satiyā vītināmetvā rattiyā paccūsasamaye
atk-s0101a0:73_2: caṅkamā orohitvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā “nipajjissāmī”ti kāyaṃ āvajjesi, dve pādā bhūmito
atk-s0101a0:73_3: muttā, apattañca sīsaṃ bimbohanaṃ, etasmiṃ antare anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimucci.
atk-s0101a0:73_4: Ayañhi āyasmā caṅkamena bahi vītināmetvā visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto cintesi –
atk-s0101a0:73_5: “nanu maṃ bhagavā etadavoca – ‘katapuññosi tvaṃ, ānanda, padhānamanuyuñja, khippaṃ
atk-s0101a0:73_6: hohisi anāsavo’ti. Buddhānañca kathādoso nāma natthi, mama pana accāraddhaṃ vīriyaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:73_7: tena me cittaṃ uddhaccāya saṃvattati. Handāhaṃ vīriyasamataṃ yojemī”ti, caṅkamā orohitvā
atk-s0101a0:73_8: pādadhovanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā pāde dhovitvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā mañcake nisīditvā, “thokaṃ
atk-s0101a0:73_9: vissamissāmī”ti kāyaṃ mañcake apanāmesi. Dve pādā bhūmito muttā, sīsaṃ bimbohanamappattaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:73_10: etasmiṃ antare anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ, catuiriyāpathavirahitaṃ therassa
atk-s0101a0:73_11: arahattaṃ. Tena “imasmiṃ sāsane anipanno anisinno aṭṭhito acaṅkamanto ko bhikkhu
atk-s0101a0:74_0: Atha therā bhikkhū dutiyadivase pañcamiyaṃ kāḷapakkhassa katabhattakiccā pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0101a0:74_1: paṭisāmetvā dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatiṃsu. Atha kho āyasmā ānando arahā samāno sannipātaṃ
atk-s0101a0:74_2: agamāsi. Kathaṃ agamāsi? “Idānimhi sannipātamajjhaṃ pavisanāraho”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭhacitto
atk-s0101a0:74_3: ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā bandhanā muttatālapakkaṃ viya, paṇḍukambale nikkhittajātimaṇi
atk-s0101a0:74_5: padumaṃ viya ca, parisuddhena pariyodātena sappabhena sassirīkena ca mukhavarena
atk-s0101a0:74_6: attano arahattappattiṃ ārocayamāno viya agamāsi. Atha naṃ disvā āyasmato mahākassapassa
atk-s0101a0:74_7: etadahosi – “sobhati vata bho arahattappatto ānando, sace satthā dhareyya, addhā
atk-s0101a0:74_8: ajjānandassa sādhukāraṃ dadeyya, handa, dānissāhaṃ satthārā dātabbaṃ sādhukāraṃ dadāmī”ti,
atk-s0101a0:75_0: Majjhimabhāṇakā pana vadanti – “ānandatthero attano arahattappattiṃ ñāpetukāmo bhikkhūhi
atk-s0101a0:75_1: saddhiṃ nāgato, bhikkhū yathāvuḍḍhaṃ attano attano pattāsane nisīdantā ānandattherassa
atk-s0101a0:75_2: āsanaṃ ṭhapetvā nisinnā. Tattha keci evamāhaṃsu – ‘etaṃ āsanaṃ kassā’ti? ‘Ānandassā’ti.
atk-s0101a0:75_3: ‘Ānando pana kuhiṃ gato’ti? Tasmiṃ samaye thero cintesi – ‘idāni mayhaṃ gamanakālo’ti.
atk-s0101a0:75_4: Tato attano ānubhāvaṃ dassento pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā attano āsaneyeva attānaṃ dassesī”ti,
atk-s0101a0:75_5: ākāsena gantvā nisīdītipi eke. Yathā vā tathā vā hotu. Sabbathāpi taṃ disvā āyasmato
atk-s0101a0:76_0: Evaṃ āgate pana tasmiṃ āyasmante mahākassapatthero bhikkhū āmantesi – “āvuso, kiṃ
atk-s0101a0:76_1: paṭhamaṃ saṅgāyāma, dhammaṃ vā vinayaṃ vā”ti? Bhikkhū āhaṃsu – “bhante, mahākassapa,
atk-s0101a0:76_2: vinayo nāma buddhasāsanassa āyu. Vinaye ṭhite sāsanaṃ ṭhitaṃ nāma hoti. Tasmā paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0101a0:76_3: vinayaṃ saṅgāyāmā”ti. “Kaṃ dhuraṃ katvā”ti? “Āyasmantaṃ upāli”nti. “Kiṃ ānando nappahotī”ti?
atk-s0101a0:76_4: “No nappahoti”. Api ca kho pana sammāsambuddho dharamānoyeva vinayapariyattiṃ nissāya
atk-s0101a0:76_5: āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ etadagge ṭhapesi – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0101a0:76_6: vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ upālī”ti. ‘Tasmā upālittheraṃ pucchitvā vinayaṃ saṅgāyāmā’ti.
atk-s0101a0:77: Tato thero vinayaṃ pucchanatthāya attanāva attānaṃ sammanni. Upālittheropi vissajjanatthāya sammanni. Tatrāyaṃ pāḷi – atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo saṅghaṃ ñāpesi –
atk-s0101a0:78: “Suṇātu me, āvuso, saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:81: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:82: Ahaṃ āyasmatā mahākassapena vinayaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyya”nti. ;
atk-s0101a0:83_0: Evaṃ attānaṃ sammannitvā āyasmā upāli uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā there bhikkhū
atk-s0101a0:83_1: vanditvā dhammāsane nisīdi dantakhacitaṃ bījaniṃ gahetvā, tato mahākassapatthero
atk-s0101a0:83_2: therāsane nisīditvā āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ vinayaṃ pucchi. “Paṭhamaṃ āvuso, upāli, pārājikaṃ
atk-s0101a0:84_0: “Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ paṭhamassa pārājikassa vatthumpi pucchi,
atk-s0101a0:84_1: nidānampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchi, paññattimpi pucchi, anupaññattimpi pucchi, āpattimpi
atk-s0101a0:84_2: pucchi, anāpattimpi pucchi”. Puṭṭho puṭṭho āyasmā upāli vissajjesi.
atk-s0101a0:85_0: Kiṃ panettha paṭhamapārājike kiñci apanetabbaṃ vā pakkhipitabbaṃ vā atthi natthīti?
atk-s0101a0:85_1: Apanetabbaṃ natthi. Buddhassa hi bhagavato bhāsite apanetabbaṃ nāma natthi. Na hi
atk-s0101a0:85_2: tathāgatā ekabyañjanampi niratthakaṃ vadanti. Sāvakānaṃ pana devatānaṃ vā bhāsite
atk-s0101a0:85_3: apanetabbampi hoti, taṃ dhammasaṅgāhakattherā apanayiṃsu. Pakkhipitabbaṃ pana sabbatthāpi
atk-s0101a0:85_4: atthi, tasmā yaṃ yattha pakkhipituṃ yuttaṃ, taṃ pakkhipiṃsuyeva. Kiṃ pana tanti?
atk-s0101a0:85_5: ‘Tena samayenā’ti vā, ‘tena kho pana samayenā’ti vā, ‘atha khoti vā’, ‘evaṃ vutteti’
atk-s0101a0:85_6: vā, ‘etadavocā’ti vā, evamādikaṃ sambandhavacanamattaṃ. Evaṃ pakkhipitabbayuttaṃ
atk-s0101a0:85_7: pakkhipitvā pana – “idaṃ paṭhamapārājika”nti ṭhapesuṃ. Paṭhamapārājike saṅgahamārūḷhe
atk-s0101a0:85_8: pañca arahantasatāni saṅgahaṃ āropitanayeneva gaṇasajjhāyamakaṃsu – “tena samayena
atk-s0101a0:85_9: buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharatī”ti. Tesaṃ sajjhāyāraddhakāleyeva sādhukāraṃ dadamānā
atk-s0101a0:86_0: Eteneva nayena sesāni tīṇi pārājikāni saṅgahaṃ āropetvā “idaṃ pārājikakaṇḍa”nti ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:86_1: Terasa saṅghādisesāni “terasaka”nti ṭhapesuṃ. Dve sikkhāpadāni “aniyatānī”ti ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:86_2: Tiṃsa sikkhāpadāni “nissaggiyāni pācittiyānī”ti ṭhapesuṃ. Dvenavuti sikkhāpadāni
atk-s0101a0:86_5: Evaṃ sattavīsādhikāni dve sikkhāpadasatāni “mahāvibhaṅgo”ti kittetvā ṭhapesuṃ. Mahāvibhaṅgāvasānepi
atk-s0101a0:87_0: Tato bhikkhunīvibhaṅge aṭṭha sikkhāpadāni “pārājikakaṇḍaṃ nāma ida”nti ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:87_4: ṭhapesuṃ. Satta dhamme “adhikaraṇasamathā”ti ṭhapesuṃ. Evaṃ tīṇi sikkhāpadasatāni
atk-s0101a0:87_5: cattāri ca sikkhāpadāni “bhikkhunīvibhaṅgo”ti kittetvā – “ayaṃ ubhato vibhaṅgo nāma
atk-s0101a0:87_6: catusaṭṭhibhāṇavāro”ti ṭhapesuṃ. Ubhatovibhaṅgāvasānepi vuttanayeneva mahāpathavikampo ahosi.
atk-s0101a0:88_1: saṅgahaṃ āropetvā “idaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ nāmā”ti ṭhapesuṃ. Vinayapiṭakāvasānepi vuttanayeneva
atk-s0101a0:88_2: mahāpathavikampo ahosi. Taṃ āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ paṭicchāpesuṃ – “āvuso, imaṃ tuyhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:88_3: nissitake vācehī”ti. Vinayapiṭakasaṅgahāvasāne upālitthero dantakhacitaṃ bījaniṃ
atk-s0101a0:88_4: nikkhipitvā dhammāsanā orohitvā there bhikkhū vanditvā attano pattāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0101a0:89_0: Vinayaṃ saṅgāyitvā dhammaṃ saṅgāyitukāmo āyasmā mahākassapo bhikkhū pucchi – “dhammaṃ
atk-s0101a0:89_1: saṅgāyante hi kaṃ puggalaṃ dhuraṃ katvā dhammo saṅgāyitabbo”ti? Bhikkhū – “ānandattheraṃ
atk-s0101a0:90: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo saṅghaṃ ñāpesi –
atk-s0101a0:91: “Suṇātu me, āvuso, saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:93: Atha kho āyasmā ānando saṅghaṃ ñāpesi –
atk-s0101a0:94: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:95: Ahaṃ āyasmatā mahākassapena dhammaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyya”nti;
atk-s0101a0:96_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā there bhikkhū vanditvā dhammāsane
atk-s0101a0:96_1: nisīdi dantakhacitaṃ bījaniṃ gahetvā. Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo bhikkhū pucchi
atk-s0101a0:96_3: catasso saṅgītiyo, tāsu paṭhamaṃ kataraṃ saṅgīti”nti? “Dīghasaṅgītiṃ, bhante”ti.
atk-s0101a0:96_4: “Dīghasaṅgītiyaṃ catutiṃsa suttāni, tayo vaggā, tesu paṭhamaṃ kataraṃ vagga”nti?
atk-s0101a0:96_6: kataraṃ sutta”nti? “Brahmajālasuttaṃ nāma bhante, tividhasīlālaṅkataṃ, nānāvidhamicchājīvakuha
atk-s0101a0:97_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca, “brahmajālaṃ, āvuso ānanda,
atk-s0101a0:97_1: kattha bhāsita”nti? “Antarā ca, bhante, rājagahaṃ antarā ca nāḷandaṃ rājāgārake ambalaṭṭhikāya”nti.
atk-s0101a0:97_3: “Vaṇṇāvaṇṇe”ti. Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ brahmajālassa nidānampi
atk-s0101a0:97_4: pucchi, puggalampi pucchi, vatthumpi pucchi. Āyasmā ānando vissajjesi. Vissajjanāvasāne
atk-s0101a0:97_5: pañca arahantasatāni gaṇasajjhāyamakaṃsu. Vuttanayeneva ca pathavikampo ahosi.
atk-s0101a0:98_0: Evaṃ brahmajālaṃ saṅgāyitvā tato paraṃ “sāmaññaphalaṃ, panāvuso ānanda, kattha bhāsita”ntiādinā
atk-s0101a0:98_1: nayena pucchāvissajjanānukkamena saddhiṃ brahmajālena sabbepi terasa suttante saṅgāyitvā
atk-s0101a0:99_0: Tadanantaraṃ mahāvaggaṃ, tadanantaraṃ pāthikavagganti, evaṃ tivaggasaṅgahaṃ catutiṃsasuttapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0101a0:99_1: catusaṭṭhibhāṇavāraparimāṇaṃ tantiṃ saṅgāyitvā “ayaṃ dīghanikāyo nāmā”ti vatvā āyasmantaṃ
atk-s0101a0:99_2: ānandaṃ paṭicchāpesuṃ – “āvuso, imaṃ tuyhaṃ nissitake vācehī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:100: Tato anantaraṃ asītibhāṇavāraparimāṇaṃ majjhimanikāyaṃ saṅgāyitvā dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherassa nissitake paṭicchāpesuṃ – “imaṃ tumhe pariharathā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:101: Tato anantaraṃ satabhāṇavāraparimāṇaṃ saṃyuttanikāyaṃ saṅgāyitvā mahākassapattheraṃ paṭicchāpesuṃ – “bhante, imaṃ tumhākaṃ nissitake vācethā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:102: Tato anantaraṃ vīsatibhāṇavārasataparimāṇaṃ aṅguttaranikāyaṃ saṅgāyitvā anuruddhattheraṃ paṭicchāpesuṃ – “imaṃ tumhākaṃ nissitake vācethā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:103_1: abhidhammoti vuccati. Evaṃ saṃvaṇṇitaṃ sukhumañāṇagocaraṃ tantiṃ saṅgāyitvā – “idaṃ
atk-s0101a0:103_2: abhidhammapiṭakaṃ nāmā”ti vatvā pañca arahantasatāni sajjhāyamakaṃsu. Vuttanayeneva
atk-s0101a0:104_0: Tato paraṃ jātakaṃ, niddeso, paṭisambhidāmaggo, apadānaṃ, suttanipāto, khuddakapāṭho,
atk-s0101a0:104_1: dhammapadaṃ, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, vimānavatthu, petavatthu, theragāthā, therīgāthāti
atk-s0101a0:104_2: imaṃ tantiṃ saṅgāyitvā “khuddakagantho nāmāya”nti ca vatvā “abhidhammapiṭakasmiṃyeva
atk-s0101a0:104_3: saṅgahaṃ āropayiṃsū”ti dīghabhāṇakā vadanti. Majjhimabhāṇakā pana “cariyāpiṭakabuddhavaṃsehi
atk-s0101a0:104_4: saddhiṃ sabbampetaṃ khuddakaganthaṃ nāma suttantapiṭake pariyāpanna”nti vadanti.
atk-s0101a0:105_0: Evametaṃ sabbampi buddhavacanaṃ rasavasena ekavidhaṃ, dhammavinayavasena duvidhaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:105_1: paṭhamamajjhimapacchimavasena tividhaṃ. Tathā piṭakavasena. Nikāyavasena pañcavidhaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:106_0: Kathaṃ rasavasena ekavidhaṃ? Yañhi bhagavatā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhitvā
atk-s0101a0:106_1: yāva anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati, etthantare pañcacattālīsavassāni
atk-s0101a0:106_2: devamanussanāgayakkhādayo anusāsantena vā paccavekkhantena vā vuttaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ
atk-s0101a0:106_3: ekarasaṃ vimuttirasameva hoti. Evaṃ rasavasena ekavidhaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:107_0: Kathaṃ dhammavinayavasena duvidhaṃ? Sabbameva cetaṃ dhammo ceva vinayo cāti saṅkhyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:107_1: gacchati. Tattha vinayapiṭakaṃ vinayo, avasesaṃ buddhavacanaṃ dhammo. Tenevāha “yannūna
atk-s0101a0:107_2: mayaṃ dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyāmā”ti. “Ahaṃ upāliṃ vinayaṃ puccheyyaṃ, ānandaṃ
atk-s0101a0:107_3: dhammaṃ puccheyya”nti ca. Evaṃ dhammavinayavasena duvidhaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:108: Kathaṃ paṭhamamajjhimapacchimavasena tividhaṃ? Sabbameva hidaṃ paṭhamabuddhavacanaṃ, majjhimabuddhavacanaṃ, pacchimabuddhavacananti tippabhedaṃ hoti. Tattha –
atk-s0101a0:111: Gahakāraka diṭṭhosi, puna gehaṃ na kāhasi;
atk-s0101a0:112: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;
atk-s0101a0:114_0: Idaṃ paṭhamabuddhavacanaṃ. Keci “yadā have pātubhavanti dhammā”ti khandhake udānagāthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:114_1: vadanti. Esā pana pāṭipadadivase sabbaññubhāvappattassa somanassamayañāṇena paccayākāraṃ
atk-s0101a0:115_0: Yaṃ pana parinibbānakāle abhāsi – “handa dāni, bhikkhave, āmantayāmi vo, vayadhammā
atk-s0101a0:115_1: saṅkhārā, appamādena sampādethā”ti idaṃ pacchimabuddhavacanaṃ. Ubhinnamantare yaṃ
atk-s0101a0:115_2: vuttaṃ, etaṃ majjhimabuddhavacanaṃ nāma. Evaṃ paṭhamamajjhimapacchimabuddhavacanavasena tividhaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:116_0: Kathaṃ piṭakavasena tividhaṃ? Sabbampi cetaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ abhidhammapiṭakanti
atk-s0101a0:116_1: tippabhedameva hoti. Tattha paṭhamasaṅgītiyaṃ saṅgītañca asaṅgītañca sabbampi samodhānetvā
atk-s0101a0:116_2: ubhayāni pātimokkhāni, dve vibhaṅgā, dvāvīsati khandhakā, soḷasaparivārāti – idaṃ
atk-s0101a0:116_7: pannarasappabhedo khuddakanikāyoti idaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ nāma. Dhammasaṅgaho, vibhaṅgo,
atk-s0101a0:116_8: dhātukathā, puggalapaññatti, kathāvatthu, yamakaṃ, paṭṭhānanti – idaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ nāma. Tattha –
atk-s0101a0:119_0: Vividhā hi ettha pañcavidhapātimokkhuddesapārājikādi satta āpattikkhandhamātikā vibhaṅgādippabhedā
atk-s0101a0:119_1: nayā. Visesabhūtā ca daḷhīkammasithilakaraṇappayojanā anupaññattinayā. Kāyikavācasikaajjhācāranisedhanato
atk-s0101a0:119_2: cesa kāyaṃ vācañca vineti, tasmā vividhanayattā visesanayattā kāyavācānaṃ vinayanato
atk-s0101a0:119_3: ceva vinayoti akkhāto. Tenetametassa vacanatthakosallatthaṃ vuttaṃ –
atk-s0101a0:125_0: Tañhi attatthaparatthādibhede atthe sūceti. Suvuttā cettha atthā, veneyyajjhāsayānulomena
atk-s0101a0:125_1: vuttattā. Savati cetaṃ atthe sassamiva phalaṃ, pasavatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sūdati cetaṃ
atk-s0101a0:125_2: dhenu viya khīraṃ, paggharāpetīti vuttaṃ hoti. Suṭṭhu ca ne tāyati, rakkhatīti vuttaṃ
atk-s0101a0:125_3: hoti. Suttasabhāgañcetaṃ, yathā hi tacchakānaṃ suttaṃ pamāṇaṃ hoti, evametampi viññūnaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:125_4: Yathā ca suttena saṅgahitāni pupphāni na vikirīyanti, na viddhaṃsīyanti, evameva
atk-s0101a0:125_5: tena saṅgahitā atthā. Tenetametassa vacanatthakosallatthaṃ vuttaṃ –
atk-s0101a0:130: Vuttādhikā ca dhammā, abhidhammo tena akkhāto”.
atk-s0101a0:131_0: Ayañhi abhisaddo vuḍḍhilakkhaṇapūjitaparicchinnādhikesu dissati. Tathā hesa “bāḷhā
atk-s0101a0:131_1: me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamantī”tiādīsu vuḍḍhiyaṃ āgato. “Yā tā rattiyo
atk-s0101a0:131_4: dhamme ca vinaye cāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Abhikkantena vaṇṇenā”tiādīsu adhike.
atk-s0101a0:132_0: Ettha ca “rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti”, “mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā
atk-s0101a0:132_1: viharatī”tiādinā nayena vuḍḍhimantopi dhammā vuttā. “Rūpārammaṇaṃ vā saddārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:132_2: vā”tiādinā nayena ārammaṇādīhi lakkhaṇīyattā salakkhaṇāpi. “Sekkhā dhammā, asekkhā
atk-s0101a0:132_3: dhammā, lokuttarā dhammā”tiādinā nayena pūjitāpi, pūjārahāti adhippāyo. “Phasso hoti,
atk-s0101a0:132_4: vedanā hotī”tiādinā nayena sabhāvaparicchinnattā paricchinnāpi. “Mahaggatā dhammā,
atk-s0101a0:132_5: appamāṇā dhammā, anuttarā dhammā”tiādinā nayena adhikāpi dhammā vuttā. Tenetametassa
atk-s0101a0:134: Vuttādhikā ca dhammā, abhidhammo tena akkhāto”ti.
atk-s0101a0:138_0: Pariyattipi hi “mā piṭakasampadānenā”tiādīsu piṭakanti vuccati. “Atha puriso āgaccheyya
atk-s0101a0:138_1: kudālapiṭakamādāyā”tiādīsu yaṃ kiñci bhājanampi. Tasmā ‘piṭakaṃ piṭakatthavidū pariyattibhājanatthato āhu.
atk-s0101a0:139_0: Idāni ‘tena samodhānetvā tayopi vinayādayo ñeyyā’ti, tena evaṃ duvidhatthena piṭakasaddena
atk-s0101a0:139_1: saha samāsaṃ katvā vinayo ca so piṭakañca pariyattibhāvato, tassa tassa atthassa
atk-s0101a0:139_2: bhājanato cāti vinayapiṭakaṃ, yathāvutteneva nayena suttantañca taṃ piṭakañcāti suttantapiṭakaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:139_3: abhidhammo ca so piṭakañcāti abhidhammapiṭakanti. Evamete tayopi vinayādayo ñeyyā.
atk-s0101a0:140: Evaṃ ñatvā ca punapi tesuyeva piṭakesu nānappakārakosallatthaṃ –
atk-s0101a0:144: Pāpuṇāti yathā bhikkhu, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvaye”.
atk-s0101a0:145_0: Tatrāyaṃ paridīpanā vibhāvanā ca. Etāni hi tīṇi piṭakāni yathākkamaṃ āṇāvohāraparamatthadesanā,
atk-s0101a0:145_2: ca vuccanti. Ettha hi vinayapiṭakaṃ āṇārahena bhagavatā āṇābāhullato desitattā āṇādesanā,
atk-s0101a0:145_3: suttantapiṭakaṃ vohārakusalena bhagavatā vohārabāhullato desitattā vohāradesanā,
atk-s0101a0:145_4: abhidhammapiṭakaṃ paramatthakusalena bhagavatā paramatthabāhullato desitattā paramatthadesanāti vuccati.
atk-s0101a0:146_0: Tathā paṭhamaṃ – ‘ye te pacurāparādhā sattā, te yathāparādhaṃ ettha sāsitā’ti yathāparādhasāsanaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:146_2: yathānulomasāsanaṃ, tatiyaṃ – ‘dhammapuñjamatte “ahaṃ mamā”ti saññino sattā yathādhammaṃ
atk-s0101a0:147_0: Tathā paṭhamaṃ – ajjhācārapaṭipakkhabhūto saṃvarāsaṃvaro ettha kathitoti saṃvarāsaṃvarakathā.
atk-s0101a0:147_1: Saṃvarāsaṃvaroti khuddako ceva mahanto ca saṃvaro, kammākammaṃ viya, phalāphalaṃ
atk-s0101a0:147_2: viya ca, dutiyaṃ – “dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhipaṭipakkhabhūtā diṭṭhiviniveṭhanā ettha kathitā”ti
atk-s0101a0:148_0: Tīsupi cetesu tisso sikkhā, tīṇi pahānāni, catubbidho ca gambhīrabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:148_1: Tathā hi vinayapiṭake visesena adhisīlasikkhā vuttā, suttantapiṭake adhicittasikkhā,
atk-s0101a0:149_0: Vinayapiṭake ca vītikkamappahānaṃ, kilesānaṃ vītikkamapaṭipakkhattā sīlassa. Suttantapiṭake
atk-s0101a0:149_2: anusayapaṭipakkhattā paññāya. Paṭhame ca tadaṅgappahānaṃ, itaresu vikkhambhanasamucchedappahānāni.
atk-s0101a0:150_1: Tattha dhammoti tanti. Atthoti tassāyeva attho. Desanāti tassā manasā vavatthāpitāya
atk-s0101a0:150_2: tantiyā desanā. Paṭivedhoti tantiyā tantiatthassa ca yathābhūtāvabodho. Tīsupi cetesu
atk-s0101a0:150_3: ete dhammatthadesanāpaṭivedhā. Yasmā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāḷhā
atk-s0101a0:150_4: alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca, tasmā gambhīrā. Evaṃ ekamekasmiṃ ettha catubbidhopi gambhīrabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:151_0: Aparo nayo, dhammoti hetu. Vuttañhetaṃ – “hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti. Atthoti
atk-s0101a0:151_1: hetuphalaṃ, vuttañhetaṃ – “hetuphale ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”ti. Desanāti paññatti,
atk-s0101a0:151_3: vā kathanaṃ. Paṭivedhoti abhisamayo, so ca lokiyalokuttaro visayato asammohato ca,
atk-s0101a0:151_4: atthānurūpaṃ dhammesu, dhammānurūpaṃ atthesu, paññattipathānurūpaṃ paññattīsu avabodho.
atk-s0101a0:151_5: Tesaṃ tesaṃ vā tattha tattha vuttadhammānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo salakkhaṇasaṅkhāto aviparītasabhāvo.
atk-s0101a0:152_0: Idāni yasmā etesu piṭakesu yaṃ yaṃ dhammajātaṃ vā atthajātaṃ vā, yā cāyaṃ yathā yathā
atk-s0101a0:152_1: ñāpetabbo attho sotūnaṃ ñāṇassa abhimukho hoti, tathā tathā tadatthajotikā desanā,
atk-s0101a0:152_2: yo cettha aviparītāvabodhasaṅkhāto paṭivedho, tesaṃ tesaṃ vā dhammānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo
atk-s0101a0:152_4: sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo dukkhogāḷhaṃ alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhañca, tasmā gambhīraṃ.
atk-s0101a0:152_5: Evampi ekamekasmiṃ ettha catubbidhopi gambhīrabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:158: Pāpuṇāti yathā bhikkhu, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvaye”ti –
atk-s0101a0:159: Ettha pana tīsu piṭakesu tividho pariyattibhedo daṭṭhabbo. Tisso hi pariyattiyo – alagaddūpamā, nissaraṇatthā, bhaṇḍāgārikapariyattīti.
atk-s0101a0:160_0: Tattha yā duggahitā, upārambhādihetu pariyāpuṭā, ayaṃ alagaddūpamā. Yaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0101a0:160_1: vuttaṃ “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso alagaddatthiko alagaddagavesī alagaddapariyesanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:160_2: caramāno, so passeyya mahantaṃ alagaddaṃ, tamenaṃ bhoge vā naṅguṭṭhe vā gaṇheyya,
atk-s0101a0:160_3: tassa so alagaddo paṭiparivattitvā hatthe vā bāhāyaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ vā aṅgapaccaṅge
atk-s0101a0:160_4: ḍaṃseyya, so tato nidānaṃ maraṇaṃ vā nigaccheyya, maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ. Taṃ kissa
atk-s0101a0:160_5: hetu? Duggahitattā, bhikkhave, alagaddassa. Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacce moghapurisā
atk-s0101a0:160_6: dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti, suttaṃ…pe… vedallaṃ, te taṃ dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:160_7: paññāya atthaṃ na upaparikkhanti, tesaṃ te dhammā paññāya atthaṃ anupaparikkhataṃ
atk-s0101a0:160_8: na nijjhānaṃ khamanti, te upārambhānisaṃsā ceva dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti, itivādappamokkhānisaṃsā
atk-s0101a0:160_9: ca, yassa catthāya dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti, tañcassa atthaṃ nānubhonti, tesaṃ te dhammā
atk-s0101a0:160_10: duggahitā dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti. Taṃ kissa hetu? Duggahitattā,
atk-s0101a0:161_0: Yā pana suggahitā sīlakkhandhādipāripūriṃyeva ākaṅkhamānena pariyāpuṭā, na upārambhādihetu,
atk-s0101a0:161_1: ayaṃ nissaraṇatthā. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “tesaṃ te dhammā suggahitā dīgharattaṃ
atk-s0101a0:161_2: hitāya sukhāya saṃvattanti. Taṃ kissa hetu? Suggahitattā, bhikkhave, dhammāna”nti.
atk-s0101a0:162_0: Yaṃ pana pariññātakkhandho pahīnakileso bhāvitamaggo paṭividdhākuppo sacchikatanirodho
atk-s0101a0:162_1: khīṇāsavo kevalaṃ paveṇīpālanatthāya vaṃsānurakkhaṇatthāya pariyāpuṇāti, ayaṃ bhaṇḍāgārikapariyattīti.
atk-s0101a0:163_0: Vinaye pana suppaṭipanno bhikkhu sīlasampadaṃ nissāya tisso vijjā pāpuṇāti, tāsaṃyeva
atk-s0101a0:163_1: ca tattha pabhedavacanato. Sutte suppaṭipanno samādhisampadaṃ nissāya cha abhiññā
atk-s0101a0:163_2: pāpuṇāti, tāsaṃyeva ca tattha pabhedavacanato. Abhidhamme suppaṭipanno paññāsampadaṃ
atk-s0101a0:163_3: nissāya catasso paṭisambhidā pāpuṇāti, tāsañca tattheva pabhedavacanato, evametesu
atk-s0101a0:164_1: paṭikkhittesu upādinnakaphassādīsu anavajjasaññī hoti. Vuttampi hetaṃ – “tathāhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:164_2: bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā ye me antarāyikā dhammā antarāyikā vuttā
atk-s0101a0:164_3: bhagavatā, te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti. Tato dussīlabhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti. Sutte
atk-s0101a0:164_4: duppaṭipanno – “cattāro me, bhikkhave, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā”tiādīsu adhippāyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:164_5: ajānanto duggahitaṃ gaṇhāti, yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “attanā duggahitena amhe ceva
atk-s0101a0:164_6: abbhācikkhati, attānañca khaṇati, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavatī”ti. Tato micchādiṭṭhitaṃ
atk-s0101a0:164_7: pāpuṇāti. Abhidhamme duppaṭipanno dhammacintaṃ atidhāvanto acinteyyānipi cinteti.
atk-s0101a0:164_8: Tato cittakkhepaṃ pāpuṇāti, vuttañhetaṃ – “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, acinteyyāni, na
atk-s0101a0:164_9: cintetabbāni, yāni cintento ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti. Evametesu duppaṭipanno
atk-s0101a0:164_10: yathākkamena imaṃ dussīlabhāva micchādiṭṭhitā cittakkhepabhedaṃ vipattiṃ pāpuṇātī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:167: Pāpuṇāti yathā bhikkhu, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvaye”ti –
atk-s0101a0:168: Ayampi gāthā vuttatthāva hoti. Evaṃ nānappakārato piṭakāni ñatvā tesaṃ vasenetaṃ buddhavacanaṃ tividhanti ñātabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:169_0: Kathaṃ nikāyavasena pañcavidhaṃ? Sabbameva cetaṃ dīghanikāyo, majjhimanikāyo, saṃyuttanikāyo,
atk-s0101a0:169_1: aṅguttaranikāyo, khuddakanikāyoti pañcappabhedaṃ hoti. Tattha katamo dīghanikāyo?
atk-s0101a0:172_0: Kasmā panesa dīghanikāyoti vuccati? Dīghappamāṇānaṃ suttānaṃ samūhato nivāsato ca.
atk-s0101a0:172_1: Samūhanivāsā hi nikāyoti vuccanti. “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekanikāyampi samanupassāmi
atk-s0101a0:172_2: evaṃ cittaṃ, yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, tiracchānagatā pāṇā”. Poṇikanikāyo cikkhallikanikāyoti
atk-s0101a0:172_3: evamādīni cettha sādhakāni sāsanato lokato ca. Evaṃ sesānampi nikāyabhāve vacanattho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:173: Katamo majjhimanikāyo? Majjhimappamāṇāni pañcadasavaggasaṅgahāni mūlapariyāyasuttādīni diyaḍḍhasataṃ dve ca suttāni.
atk-s0101a0:176: Katamo saṃyuttanikāyo? Devatāsaṃyuttādivasena kathitāni oghataraṇādīni satta suttasahassāni satta ca suttasatāni dvāsaṭṭhi ca suttāni.
atk-s0101a0:179: Katamo aṅguttaranikāyo? Ekekaaṅgātirekavasena kathitāni cittapariyādānādīni nava suttasahassāni pañca suttasatāni sattapaññāsañca suttāni.
atk-s0101a0:182: Katamo khuddakanikāyo? Sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ, abhidhammapiṭakaṃ, khuddakapāṭhādayo ca pubbe dassitā pañcadasappabhedā, ṭhapetvā cattāro nikāye avasesaṃ buddhavacanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:186_0: Kathaṃ aṅgavasena navavidhaṃ? Sabbameva hidaṃ suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthā,
atk-s0101a0:186_1: udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallanti navappabhedaṃ hoti. Tattha
atk-s0101a0:186_3: ca aññampi ca suttanāmakaṃ tathāgatavacanaṃ suttanti veditabbaṃ. Sabbampi sagāthakaṃ
atk-s0101a0:186_4: suttaṃ geyyanti veditabbaṃ. Visesena saṃyuttake sakalopi sagāthavaggo, sakalampi
atk-s0101a0:186_5: abhidhammapiṭakaṃ, niggāthakaṃ suttaṃ, yañca aññampi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi asaṅgahitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:186_6: taṃ veyyākaraṇanti veditabbaṃ. Dhammapadaṃ, theragāthā, therīgāthā, suttanipāte nosuttanāmikā
atk-s0101a0:186_7: suddhikagāthā ca gāthāti veditabbā. Somanassaññāṇamayikagāthā paṭisaṃyuttā dveasīti
atk-s0101a0:186_10: veditabbaṃ. “Cattārome, bhikkhave, acchariyā abbhutā dhammā ānande”tiādinayappavattā
atk-s0101a0:186_12: sabbepi vedañca tuṭṭhiñca laddhā laddhā pucchitasuttantā vedallanti veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:187: Kathaṃ dhammakkhandhavasena caturāsītisahassavidhaṃ? Sabbameva cetaṃ buddhavacanaṃ –
atk-s0101a0:189: Caturāsīti sahassāni, ye me dhammā pavattino”ti.
atk-s0101a0:190_0: Evaṃ paridīpitadhammakkhandhavasena caturāsītisahassappabhedaṃ hoti. Tattha ekānusandhikaṃ
atk-s0101a0:190_1: suttaṃ eko dhammakkhandho. Yaṃ anekānusandhikaṃ, tattha anusandhivasena dhammakkhandhagaṇanā.
atk-s0101a0:190_2: Gāthābandhesu pañhāpucchanaṃ eko dhammakkhandho, vissajjanaṃ eko. Abhidhamme ekamekaṃ
atk-s0101a0:190_3: tikadukabhājanaṃ, ekamekañca cittavārabhājanaṃ, ekameko dhammakkhandho. Vinaye atthi
atk-s0101a0:190_4: vatthu, atthi mātikā, atthi padabhājanīyaṃ, atthi antarāpatti, atthi āpatti, atthi
atk-s0101a0:190_5: anāpatti, atthi tikacchedo. Tattha ekameko koṭṭhāso ekameko dhammakkhandhoti veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:191_0: Evametaṃ abhedato rasavasena ekavidhaṃ, bhedato dhammavinayādivasena duvidhādibhedaṃ
atk-s0101a0:191_1: buddhavacanaṃ saṅgāyantena mahākassapappamukhena vasīgaṇena “ayaṃ dhammo, ayaṃ vinayo,
atk-s0101a0:191_2: idaṃ paṭhamabuddhavacanaṃ, idaṃ majjhimabuddhavacanaṃ, idaṃ pacchimabuddhavacanaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:191_3: idaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ, idaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ, idaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ, ayaṃ dīghanikāyo…pe…
atk-s0101a0:191_4: ayaṃ khuddakanikāyo, imāni suttādīni navaṅgāni, imāni caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassānī”ti,
atk-s0101a0:191_5: imaṃ pabhedaṃ vavatthapetvāva saṅgītaṃ. Na kevalañca imameva, aññampi uddānasaṅgaha-vaggasaṅgaha-peyyālasaṅgaha-ekakanipāta-dukanipātādinipātasaṅgaha-saṃyuttasaṅgaha-paṇṇāsasaṅgahādi-anekavidhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:191_6: tīsu piṭakesu sandissamānaṃ saṅgahappabhedaṃ vavatthapetvā eva sattahi māsehi saṅgītaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:192_0: Saṅgītipariyosāne cassa – “idaṃ mahākassapattherena dasabalassa sāsanaṃ pañcavassasahassaparimāṇakālaṃ
atk-s0101a0:192_1: pavattanasamatthaṃ kata”nti sañjātappamodā sādhukāraṃ viya dadamānā ayaṃ mahāpathavī
atk-s0101a0:192_2: udakapariyantaṃ katvā anekappakāraṃ kampi saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi, anekāni
atk-s0101a0:192_3: ca acchariyāni pāturahesunti, ayaṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti nāma. Yā loke –
atk-s0101a0:196_0: Imissā paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyā vattamānāya vinayasaṅgahāvasāne suttantapiṭake ādinikāyassa
atk-s0101a0:196_1: ādisuttaṃ brahmajālaṃ pucchantena āyasmatā mahākassapena – “brahmajālaṃ, āvuso ānanda,
atk-s0101a0:196_2: kattha bhāsita”nti, evamādivuttavacanapariyosāne yattha ca bhāsitaṃ, yañcārabbha
atk-s0101a0:196_3: bhāsitaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ pakāsento āyasmā ānando evaṃ me sutantiādimāha. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0101a0:196_4: “brahmajālassāpi evaṃ me sutantiādikaṃ āyasmatā ānandena paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vuttaṃ nidānamādī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:197: 1. Tattha evanti nipātapadaṃ. Metiādīni nāmapadāni. Paṭipanno hotīti ettha paṭīti upasaggapadaṃ, hotīti ākhyātapadanti. Iminā tāva nayena padavibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:198_1: Tathāhesa – “evaṃ jātena maccena, kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ bahu”nti evamādīsu upamāyaṃ āgato.
atk-s0101a0:198_2: “Evaṃ te abhikkamitabbaṃ, evaṃ te paṭikkamitabba”ntiādīsu upadese. “Evametaṃ bhagavā,
atk-s0101a0:198_3: evametaṃ sugatā”tiādīsu sampahaṃsane. “Evamevaṃ panāyaṃ vasalī yasmiṃ vā tasmiṃ vā
atk-s0101a0:198_4: tassa muṇḍakassa samaṇakassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī”tiādīsu garahaṇe. “Evaṃ, bhanteti kho
atk-s0101a0:198_5: te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosu”ntiādīsu vacanasampaṭiggahe. “Evaṃ byā kho ahaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:198_6: bhante, bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmī”tiādīsu ākāre. “Ehi tvaṃ, māṇavaka, yena
atk-s0101a0:198_7: samaṇo ānando tenupasaṅkama, upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena samaṇaṃ ānandaṃ appābādhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:198_8: appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ puccha. “Subho māṇavo todeyyaputto bhavantaṃ
atk-s0101a0:198_9: ānandaṃ appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ pucchatī”ti. “Evañca
atk-s0101a0:198_10: vadehi, sādhu kira bhavaṃ ānando yena subhassa māṇavassa todeyyaputtassa nivesanaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:198_11: tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā”tiādīsu nidassane. “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, kālāmā, ime
atk-s0101a0:198_12: dhammā kusalā vā akusalā vāti? Akusalā, bhante. Sāvajjā vā anavajjā vāti? Sāvajjā,
atk-s0101a0:198_13: bhante. Viññugarahitā vā viññuppasatthā vāti? Viññugarahitā, bhante. Samattā samādinnā
atk-s0101a0:198_14: ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti no vā, kathaṃ vo ettha hotīti? Samattā, bhante, samādinnā
atk-s0101a0:198_15: ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti, evaṃ no ettha hotī”tiādīsu avadhāraṇe. Svāyamidha ākāranidassanāvadhāraṇesu daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0101a0:199_0: Tattha ākāratthena evaṃ-saddena etamatthaṃ dīpeti, nānānayanipuṇamanekajjhāsayasamuṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:199_2: sakasakabhāsānurūpato sotapathamāgacchantaṃ tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ sabbappakārena
atk-s0101a0:199_3: ko samattho viññātuṃ, sabbathāmena pana sotukāmataṃ janetvāpi ‘evaṃ me sutaṃ’ mayāpi
atk-s0101a0:200: Nidassanatthena – “nāhaṃ sayambhū, na mayā idaṃ sacchikata”nti attānaṃ parimocento – ‘evaṃ me sutaṃ’, ‘mayāpi evaṃ suta’nti idāni vattabbaṃ sakalaṃ suttaṃ nidasseti.
atk-s0101a0:201_0: Avadhāraṇatthena – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:201_1: yadidaṃ ānando, gatimantānaṃ, satimantānaṃ, dhitimantānaṃ, upaṭṭhākānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando”ti.
atk-s0101a0:201_2: Evaṃ bhagavatā – “āyasmā ānando atthakusalo, dhammakusalo, byañjanakusalo, niruttikusalo,
atk-s0101a0:201_3: pubbāparakusalo”ti. Evaṃ dhammasenāpatinā ca pasatthabhāvānurūpaṃ attano dhāraṇabalaṃ
atk-s0101a0:201_4: dassento sattānaṃ sotukāmataṃ janeti – ‘evaṃ me sutaṃ’, tañca kho atthato vā byañjanato
atk-s0101a0:201_5: vā anūnamanadhikaṃ, evameva na aññathā daṭṭhabba”nti.
atk-s0101a0:202_0: Me-saddo tīsu atthesu dissati. Tathā hissa – “gāthābhigītaṃ me abhojaneyya”ntiādīsu
atk-s0101a0:202_1: mayāti attho. “Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”tiādīsu mayhanti
atk-s0101a0:202_2: attho. “Dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavathā”tiādīsu mamāti attho. Idha pana mayā
atk-s0101a0:202_3: sutanti ca, mama sutanti ca atthadvaye yujjati.
atk-s0101a0:203_0: Sutanti ayaṃ suta-saddo saupasaggo ca anupasaggo ca – gamanavissutakilinna-upacitānuyoga-sotaviññeyya-sotadvārānusāra-viññātādianekatthappabhedo,
atk-s0101a0:203_1: tathā hissa “senāya pasuto”tiādīsu gacchantoti attho. “Sutadhammassa passato”tiādīsu
atk-s0101a0:203_3: “Tumhehi puññaṃ pasutaṃ anappaka”ntiādīsu upacitanti attho. “Ye jhānapasutā dhīrā”tiādīsu
atk-s0101a0:203_4: jhānānuyuttāti attho. ‘Diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ muta’ntiādīsu sotaviññeyyanti attho. “Sutadharo
atk-s0101a0:203_5: sutasannicayo”tiādīsu sotadvārānusāraviññātadharoti attho. Idha panassa sotadvārānusārena
atk-s0101a0:203_6: upadhāritanti vā upadhāraṇanti vāti attho. ‘Me’ saddassa hi ‘mayā’ti atthe sati ‘evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:203_7: mayā sutaṃ’ sotadvārānusārena upadhāritanti yujjati. ‘Mamā’ti atthe sati evaṃ mama
atk-s0101a0:204_0: Evametesu tīsu padesu evanti sotaviññāṇādiviññāṇakiccanidassanaṃ. Meti vuttaviññāṇasamaṅgipuggalanidassanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:204_2: tassā sotadvārānusārena pavattāya viññāṇavīthiyā nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattibhāvappakāsanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:204_3: Meti attappakāsanaṃ. Sutanti dhammappakāsanaṃ. Ayañhettha saṅkhepo – “nānappakārena
atk-s0101a0:204_4: ārammaṇe pavattāya viññāṇavīthiyā mayā na aññaṃ kataṃ, idaṃ pana kataṃ, ayaṃ dhammo suto”ti.
atk-s0101a0:205: Tathā evanti niddisitabbadhammappakāsanaṃ. Meti puggalappakāsanaṃ. Sutanti puggalakiccappakāsanaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti. “Yaṃ suttaṃ niddisissāmi, taṃ mayā evaṃ suta”nti.
atk-s0101a0:206_0: Tathā evanti yassa cittasantānassa nānākārappavattiyā nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0101a0:206_1: tassa nānākāraniddeso. Evanti hi ayamākārapaññatti. Meti kattuniddeso. Sutanti visayaniddeso.
atk-s0101a0:206_2: Ettāvatā nānākārappavattena cittasantānena taṃ samaṅgino kattu visayaggahaṇasanniṭṭhānaṃ kataṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:207_0: Athavā evanti puggalakiccaniddeso. Sutanti viññāṇakiccaniddeso. Meti ubhayakiccayuttapuggalaniddeso.
atk-s0101a0:207_1: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepo, “mayā savanakiccaviññāṇasamaṅginā puggalena viññāṇavasena
atk-s0101a0:208_0: Tattha evanti ca meti ca saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena avijjamānapaññatti. Kiñhettha
atk-s0101a0:208_1: taṃ paramatthato atthi, yaṃ evanti vā meti vā niddesaṃ labhetha? Sutanti vijjamānapaññatti.
atk-s0101a0:208_2: Yañhi taṃ ettha sotena upaladdhaṃ, taṃ paramatthato vijjamānanti. Tathā ‘eva’nti
atk-s0101a0:208_3: ca, meti ca, taṃ taṃ upādāya vattabbato upādāpaññatti. ‘Suta’nti diṭṭhādīni upanidhāya
atk-s0101a0:208_4: vattabbato upanidhāpaññatti. Ettha ca evanti vacanena asammohaṃ dīpeti. Na hi sammūḷho
atk-s0101a0:208_5: nānappakārapaṭivedhasamattho hoti. ‘Suta’nti vacanena sutassa asammosaṃ dīpeti. Yassa
atk-s0101a0:208_6: hi sutaṃ sammuṭṭhaṃ hoti, na so kālantarena mayā sutanti paṭijānāti. Iccassa asammohena
atk-s0101a0:208_7: paññāsiddhi, asammosena pana satisiddhi. Tattha paññāpubbaṅgamāya satiyā byañjanāvadhāraṇasamatthatā,
atk-s0101a0:209_0: Aparo nayo, evanti vacanena yoniso manasikāraṃ dīpeti. Ayoniso manasikaroto hi nānappakārapaṭivedhābhāvato.
atk-s0101a0:209_1: Sutanti vacanena avikkhepaṃ dīpeti, vikkhittacittassa savanābhāvato. Tathā hi vikkhittacitto
atk-s0101a0:209_2: puggalo sabbasampattiyā vuccamānopi “na mayā sutaṃ, puna bhaṇathā”ti bhaṇati. Yoniso
atk-s0101a0:209_3: manasikārena cettha attasammāpaṇidhiṃ pubbe ca katapuññataṃ sādheti, sammā appaṇihitattassa
atk-s0101a0:209_4: pubbe akatapuññassa vā tadabhāvato. Avikkhepena saddhammassavanaṃ sappurisūpanissayañca
atk-s0101a0:209_5: sādheti. Na hi vikkhittacitto sotuṃ sakkoti, na ca sappurise anupassayamānassa savanaṃ atthīti.
atk-s0101a0:210_0: Aparo nayo, yasmā evanti yassa cittasantānassa nānākārappavattiyā nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:210_1: hoti, tassa nānākāraniddesoti vuttaṃ, so ca evaṃ bhaddako ākāro na sammāappaṇihitattano
atk-s0101a0:210_2: pubbe akatapuññassa vā hoti, tasmā evanti iminā bhaddakenākārena pacchimacakkadvayasampattimattano
atk-s0101a0:210_3: dīpeti. Sutanti savanayogena purimacakkadvayasampattiṃ. Na hi appatirūpadese vasato
atk-s0101a0:210_4: sappurisūpanissayavirahitassa vā savanaṃ atthi. Iccassa pacchimacakkadvayasiddhiyā
atk-s0101a0:210_5: āsayasuddhisiddhā hoti, purimacakkadvayasiddhiyā payogasuddhi, tāya ca āsayasuddhiyā
atk-s0101a0:210_6: adhigamabyattisiddhi, payogasuddhiyā āgamabyattisiddhi. Iti payogāsayasuddhassa āgamādhigamasampannassa
atk-s0101a0:210_7: vacanaṃ aruṇuggaṃ viya sūriyassa udayato yoniso manasikāro viya ca kusalakammassa
atk-s0101a0:210_8: arahati bhagavato vacanassa pubbaṅgamaṃ bhavitunti ṭhāne nidānaṃ ṭhapento – “evaṃ me suta”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:211_0: Aparo nayo, ‘eva’nti iminā nānappakārapaṭivedhadīpakena vacanena attano atthapaṭibhānapaṭisambhidāsampattisabbhāvaṃ
atk-s0101a0:211_2: ‘Eva’nti ca idaṃ yoniso manasikāradīpakaṃ vacanaṃ bhāsamāno – “ete mayā dhammā manasānupekkhitā,
atk-s0101a0:211_3: diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā”ti dīpeti. ‘Suta’nti idaṃ savanayogadīpakaṃ vacanaṃ bhāsamāno
atk-s0101a0:211_4: – “bahū mayā dhammā sutā dhātā vacasā paricitā”ti dīpeti. Tadubhayenāpi atthabyañjanapāripūriṃ
atk-s0101a0:211_5: dīpento savane ādaraṃ janeti. Atthabyañjanaparipuṇṇañhi dhammaṃ ādarena assuṇanto
atk-s0101a0:211_6: mahatā hitā paribāhiro hotīti, tasmā ādaraṃ janetvā sakkaccaṃ ayaṃ dhammo sotabboti.
atk-s0101a0:212_0: “Evaṃ me suta”nti iminā pana sakalena vacanena āyasmā ānando tathāgatappaveditaṃ
atk-s0101a0:212_1: dhammaṃ attano adahanto asappurisabhūmiṃ atikkamati. Sāvakattaṃ paṭijānanto sappurisabhūmiṃ
atk-s0101a0:212_2: okkamati. Tathā asaddhammā cittaṃ vuṭṭhāpeti, saddhamme cittaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti. “Kevalaṃ
atk-s0101a0:212_3: sutamevetaṃ mayā, tasseva bhagavato vacana”nti dīpento attānaṃ parimoceti, satthāraṃ
atk-s0101a0:213_0: Apica “evaṃ me suta”nti attanā uppāditabhāvaṃ appaṭijānanto purimavacanaṃ vivaranto
atk-s0101a0:213_1: – “sammukhā paṭiggahitamidaṃ mayā tassa bhagavato catuvesārajjavisāradassa dasabaladharassa
atk-s0101a0:213_4: vacanaṃ, na ettha atthe vā dhamme vā pade vā byañjane vā kaṅkhā vā vimati vā kātabbā”ti
atk-s0101a0:213_5: sabbesaṃ devamanussānaṃ imasmiṃ dhamme assaddhiyaṃ vināseti, saddhāsampadaṃ uppādeti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0101a0:216: Ekanti gaṇanaparicchedaniddeso. Samayanti paricchinnaniddeso. Ekaṃ samayanti aniyamitaparidīpanaṃ. Tattha samayasaddo –
atk-s0101a0:218: Paṭilābhe pahāne ca, paṭivedhe ca dissati”.
atk-s0101a0:219_0: Tathā hissa – “appevanāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāma kālañca samayañca upādāyā”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0101a0:219_1: samavāyo attho. “Ekova kho bhikkhave, khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”tiādīsu
atk-s0101a0:219_3: “Samayopi kho te, bhaddāli, appaṭividdho ahosi, bhagavā kho sāvatthiyaṃ viharati,
atk-s0101a0:219_4: bhagavāpi maṃ jānissati, bhaddāli nāma bhikkhu satthusāsane sikkhāya aparipūrakārī’ti.
atk-s0101a0:219_5: Ayampi kho, te bhaddāli, samayo appaṭividdho ahosī”tiādīsu hetu. “Tena kho pana samayena
atk-s0101a0:219_6: uggahamāno paribbājako samaṇamuṇḍikāputto samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake mallikāya
atk-s0101a0:220: “Diṭṭhe dhamme ca yo attho, yo cattho samparāyiko;
atk-s0101a0:222_0: Ādīsu paṭilābho. “Sammā mānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassā”tiādīsu pahānaṃ. “Dukkhassa
atk-s0101a0:222_1: pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho abhisamayaṭṭho”tiādīsu paṭivedho.
atk-s0101a0:223_0: Tattha kiñcāpi etesu saṃvaccharādīsu samayesu yaṃ yaṃ suttaṃ yasmiṃ yasmiṃ saṃvacchare
atk-s0101a0:223_1: utumhi māse pakkhe rattibhāge vā divasabhāge vā vuttaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ therassa suviditaṃ
atk-s0101a0:223_2: suvavatthāpitaṃ paññāya. Yasmā pana – “evaṃ me sutaṃ” asukasaṃvacchare asukautumhi
atk-s0101a0:223_3: asukamāse asukapakkhe asukarattibhāge asukadivasabhāge vāti evaṃ vutte na sakkā sukhena
atk-s0101a0:223_4: dhāretuṃ vā uddisituṃ vā uddisāpetuṃ vā, bahu ca vattabbaṃ hoti, tasmā ekeneva padena
atk-s0101a0:223_5: tamatthaṃ samodhānetvā “ekaṃ samaya”nti āha. Ye vā ime gabbhokkantisamayo, jātisamayo,
atk-s0101a0:223_8: devamanussesu ativiya pakāsā anekakālappabhedā eva samayā. Tesu samayesu desanāsamayasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0101a0:223_9: ekaṃ samayanti dīpeti. Yo cāyaṃ ñāṇakaruṇākiccasamayesu karuṇākiccasamayo, attahitaparahitapaṭipattisamayesu
atk-s0101a0:223_11: desanāsamayo, tesupi samayesu aññataraṃ samayaṃ sandhāya “ekaṃ samaya”nti āha.
atk-s0101a0:224_0: Kasmā panettha yathā abhidhamme “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacara”nti ca, ito aññesu ca suttapadesu
atk-s0101a0:224_1: – “yasmiṃ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehī”ti ca bhummavacananiddeso kato,
atk-s0101a0:224_2: vinaye ca – “tena samayena buddho bhagavā”ti karaṇavacanena, tathā akatvā “ekaṃ samaya”nti
atk-s0101a0:224_3: upayogavacananiddeso katoti? Tattha tathā idha ca aññathā atthasambhavato. Tattha
atk-s0101a0:224_4: hi abhidhamme ito aññesu suttapadesu ca adhikaraṇattho bhāvena bhāvalakkhaṇattho
atk-s0101a0:224_5: ca sambhavati. Adhikaraṇañhi kālattho, samūhattho ca samayo, tattha tattha vuttānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:224_6: phassādidhammānaṃ khaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātassa ca samayassa bhāvena tesaṃ bhāvo lakkhīyati,
atk-s0101a0:225_0: Vinaye ca hetuattho karaṇattho ca sambhavati. Yo hi so sikkhāpadapaññattisamayo sāriputtādīhipi
atk-s0101a0:225_1: dubbiññeyyo, tena samayena hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtena ca sikkhāpadāni paññāpayanto
atk-s0101a0:225_2: sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca apekkhamāno bhagavā tattha tattha vihāsi, tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:226_0: Idha pana aññasmiñca evaṃ jātike accantasaṃyogattho sambhavati. Yañhi samayaṃ bhagavā
atk-s0101a0:226_1: imaṃ aññaṃ vā suttantaṃ desesi, accantameva taṃ samayaṃ karuṇāvihārena vihāsi, tasmā
atk-s0101a0:229: Aññatra samayo vutto, upayogena so idhā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:230_0: Porāṇā pana vaṇṇayanti – “tasmiṃ samaye”ti vā, “tena samayenā”ti vā, “ekaṃ samaya”nti
atk-s0101a0:230_1: vā, abhilāpamattabhedo esa, sabbattha bhummamevatthoti. Tasmā “ekaṃ samaya”nti vuttepi
atk-s0101a0:231: Bhagavāti garu. Garuñhi loke bhagavāti vadanti. Ayañca sabbaguṇavisiṭṭhatāya sabbasattānaṃ garu, tasmā bhagavāti veditabbo. Porāṇehipi vuttaṃ –
atk-s0101a0:233: Garu gāravayutto so, bhagavā tena vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:237: Imissā gāthāya vasenassa padassa vitthāraattho veditabbo. So ca visuddhimagge buddhānussatiniddese vuttoyeva.
atk-s0101a0:238_0: Ettāvatā cettha evaṃ me sutanti vacanena yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ dassento bhagavato dhammakāyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:238_1: paccakkhaṃ karoti. Tena “nayidaṃ atikkantasatthukaṃ pāvacanaṃ, ayaṃ vo satthā”ti
atk-s0101a0:239_0: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavāti vacanena tasmiṃ samaye bhagavato avijjamānabhāvaṃ dassento
atk-s0101a0:239_1: rūpakāyaparinibbānaṃ sādheti. Tena “evaṃvidhassa nāma ariyadhammassa desako dasabaladharo
atk-s0101a0:239_2: vajirasaṅghāta samānakāyo sopi bhagavā parinibbuto, kena aññena jīvite āsā janetabbā”ti
atk-s0101a0:239_3: jīvitamadamattaṃ janaṃ saṃvejeti, saddhamme cassa ussāhaṃ janeti.
atk-s0101a0:240: Evanti ca bhaṇanto desanāsampattiṃ niddisati. Me sutanti sāvakasampattiṃ. Ekaṃ samayanti kālasampattiṃ. Bhagavāti desakasampattiṃ.
atk-s0101a0:241_0: Antarā ca rājagahaṃ antarā ca nāḷandanti antarā-saddo kāraṇakhaṇacittavemajjhavivarādīsu
atk-s0101a0:241_1: dissati. “Tadantaraṃ ko jāneyya aññatra tathāgatā”ti ca, “janā saṅgamma mantenti
atk-s0101a0:241_2: mañca tañca kimantara”nti ca ādīsu hi kāraṇe antarā-saddo. “Addasa maṃ, bhante, aññatarā
atk-s0101a0:241_3: itthī vijjantarikāya bhājanaṃ dhovantī”tiādīsu khaṇe. “Yassantarato na santi kopā”tiādīsu
atk-s0101a0:241_4: citte. “Antarā vosānamāpādī”tiādīsu vemajjhe. “Api cāyaṃ, bhikkhave, tapodā dvinnaṃ
atk-s0101a0:241_5: mahānirayānaṃ antarikāya āgacchatī”tiādīsu vivare. Svāyamidha vivare vattati, tasmā
atk-s0101a0:241_6: rājagahassa ca nāḷandāya ca vivareti evametthattho veditabbo. Antarā-saddena pana
atk-s0101a0:241_7: yuttattā upayogavacanaṃ kataṃ. Īdisesu ca ṭhānesu akkharacintakā “antarā gāmañca
atk-s0101a0:241_8: nadiñca yātī”ti evaṃ ekameva antarāsaddaṃ payujjanti, so dutiyapadenapi yojetabbo
atk-s0101a0:241_9: hoti, ayojiyamāne upayogavacanaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Idha pana yojetvāyeva vuttoti.
atk-s0101a0:242_0: Addhānamaggappaṭipanno hotīti addhānasaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ paṭipanno hoti, “dīghamagga”nti
atk-s0101a0:242_1: attho. Addhānagamanasamayassa hi vibhaṅge “aḍḍhayojanaṃ gacchissāmīti bhuñjitabba”ntiādivacanato
atk-s0101a0:242_2: aḍḍhayojanampi addhānamaggo hoti. Rājagahato pana nāḷandā yojanameva.
atk-s0101a0:243_0: Mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhinti ‘mahatā’ti guṇamahattenapi mahatā, saṅkhyāmahattenapi
atk-s0101a0:243_1: mahatā. So hi bhikkhusaṅgho guṇehipi mahā ahosi, appicchatādiguṇasamannāgatattā.
atk-s0101a0:243_2: Saṅkhyāyapi mahā, pañcasatasaṅkhyattā. Bhikkhūnaṃ saṅgho ‘bhikkhusaṅgho’, tena bhikkhusaṅghena.
atk-s0101a0:244_0: Pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehīti pañcamattā etesanti pañcamattāni. Mattāti pamāṇaṃ vuccati,
atk-s0101a0:244_1: tasmā yathā “bhojane mattaññū”ti vutte “bhojane mattaṃ jānāti, pamāṇaṃ jānātī”ti
atk-s0101a0:244_2: attho hoti, evamidhāpi – “tesaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ pañcamattā pañcapamāṇa”nti evamattho
atk-s0101a0:244_3: daṭṭhabbo. Bhikkhūnaṃ satāni bhikkhusatāni, tehi pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi.
atk-s0101a0:245_0: Suppiyopi kho paribbājakoti suppiyoti tassa nāmaṃ. Pi-kāro maggappaṭipannasabhāgatāya
atk-s0101a0:245_1: puggalasampiṇḍanattho. Kho-kāro padasandhikaro, byañjanasiliṭṭhatāvasena vutto. Paribbājakoti
atk-s0101a0:245_2: sañjayassa antevāsī channaparibbājako. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “yadā bhagavā taṃ addhānamaggaṃ
atk-s0101a0:245_3: paṭipanno, tadā suppiyopi paribbājako paṭipanno ahosī”ti. Atītakālattho hettha hoti-saddo.
atk-s0101a0:246_0: Saddhiṃ antevāsinā brahmadattena māṇavenāti – ettha ante vasatīti antevāsī. Samīpacāro
atk-s0101a0:246_1: santikāvacaro sissoti attho. Brahmadattoti tassa nāmaṃ. Māṇavoti sattopi coropi taruṇopi vuccati.
atk-s0101a0:249_0: Ādīsu hi satto māṇavoti vutto. “Māṇavehipi samāgacchanti katakammehipi akatakammehipī”tiādīsu
atk-s0101a0:249_1: coro. “Ambaṭṭho māṇavo, aṅgako māṇavo”tiādīsu taruṇo ‘māṇavo’ti vutto. Idhāpi ayamevattho.
atk-s0101a0:249_2: Idañhi vuttaṃ hoti – brahmadattena nāma taruṇantevāsinā saddhinti.
atk-s0101a0:250_0: Tatrāti tasmiṃ addhānamagge, tesu vā dvīsu janesu. Sudanti nipātamattaṃ. Anekapariyāyenāti
atk-s0101a0:250_1: pariyāya-saddo tāva vāradesanākāraṇesu vattati. “Kassa nu kho, ānanda, ajja pariyāyo
atk-s0101a0:250_2: bhikkhuniyo ovaditu”ntiādīsu hi vāre pariyāyasaddo vattati. “Madhupiṇḍikapariyāyotveva
atk-s0101a0:250_3: naṃ dhārehī”tiādīsu desanāyaṃ. “Imināpi kho, te rājañña, pariyāyena evaṃ hotū”tiādīsu
atk-s0101a0:250_4: kāraṇe. Svāyamidhāpi kāraṇe vattati, tasmā ayamettha attho – “anekavidhena kāraṇenā”ti,
atk-s0101a0:251_0: Buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti avaṇṇavirahitassa aparimāṇavaṇṇasamannāgatassāpi buddhassa
atk-s0101a0:251_2: vuccati, taṃ samaṇassa gotamassa natthi tasmā arasarūpo samaṇo gotamo, nibbhogo,
atk-s0101a0:251_3: akiriyavādo, ucchedavādo, jegucchī, venayiko, tapassī, apagabbho. Natthi samaṇassa
atk-s0101a0:251_5: gotamo dhammaṃ deseti, vīmaṃsānucaritaṃ, sayaṃpaṭibhānaṃ. Samaṇo gotamo na sabbaññū,
atk-s0101a0:251_6: na lokavidū, na anuttaro, na aggapuggalo”ti. Evaṃ taṃ taṃ akāraṇameva kāraṇanti vatvā
atk-s0101a0:251_7: tathā tathā avaṇṇaṃ dosaṃ nindaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0101a0:252_0: Yathā ca buddhassa, evaṃ dhammassāpi taṃ taṃ akāraṇameva kāraṇato vatvā – “samaṇassa
atk-s0101a0:252_1: gotamassa dhammo durakkhāto, duppaṭivedito, aniyyāniko, anupasamasaṃvattaniko”ti
atk-s0101a0:253_0: Yathā ca dhammassa, evaṃ saṅghassāpi yaṃ vā taṃ vā akāraṇameva kāraṇato vatvā – “micchāpaṭipanno
atk-s0101a0:253_1: samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakasaṅgho, kuṭilapaṭipanno, paccanīkapaṭipadaṃ ananulomapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0101a0:253_2: adhammānulomapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno”ti tathā tathā avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0101a0:254_0: Antevāsī panassa – “amhākaṃ ācariyo aparāmasitabbaṃ parāmasati, anakkamitabbaṃ akkamati,
atk-s0101a0:254_1: svāyaṃ aggiṃ gilanto viya, hatthena asidhāraṃ parāmasanto viya, muṭṭhinā sineruṃ
atk-s0101a0:254_2: padāletukāmo viya, kakacadantapantiyaṃ kīḷamāno viya, pabhinnamadaṃ caṇḍahatthiṃ
atk-s0101a0:254_3: hatthena gaṇhanto viya ca vaṇṇārahasseva ratanattayassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsamāno anayabyasanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:254_4: pāpuṇissati. Ācariye kho pana gūthaṃ vā aggiṃ vā kaṇṭakaṃ vā kaṇhasappaṃ vā akkamante,
atk-s0101a0:254_5: sūlaṃ vā abhirūhante, halāhalaṃ vā visaṃ khādante, khārodakaṃ vā pakkhalante, narakapapātaṃ
atk-s0101a0:254_6: vā papatante, na antevāsinā taṃ sabbamanukātabbaṃ hoti. Kammassakā hi sattā attano
atk-s0101a0:254_7: kammānurūpameva gatiṃ gacchanti. Neva pitā puttassa kammena gacchati, na putto pitu
atk-s0101a0:254_8: kammena, na mātā puttassa, na putto mātuyā, na bhātā bhaginiyā, na bhaginī bhātu,
atk-s0101a0:254_9: na ācariyo antevāsino, na antevāsī ācariyassa kammena gacchati. Mayhañca ācariyo
atk-s0101a0:254_10: tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, mahāsāvajjo kho panāriyūpavādoti. Evaṃ yoniso ummujjitvā
atk-s0101a0:254_11: ācariyavādaṃ maddamāno sammākāraṇameva kāraṇato apadisanto anekapariyāyena tiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:254_12: ratanānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitumāraddho, yathā taṃ paṇḍitajātiko kulaputto”. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0101a0:254_13: – “suppiyassa pana paribbājakassa antevāsī brahmadatto māṇavo anekapariyāyena buddhassa
atk-s0101a0:254_14: vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, dhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, saṅghassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:255_1: dissati. Tattha “mahantaṃ sapparājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā”tiādīsu saṇṭhānaṃ vuccati.
atk-s0101a0:255_2: “Brāhmaṇova seṭṭho vaṇṇo, hīno añño vaṇṇo”tiādīsu jāti. “Paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya
atk-s0101a0:256: “Na harāmi na bhañjāmi, ārā siṅghāmi vārijaṃ;
atk-s0101a0:257: Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, gandhatthenoti vuccatī”ti. –
atk-s0101a0:258_0: Ādīsu kāraṇaṃ. “Tayo pattassa vaṇṇā”tiādīsu pamāṇaṃ. “Kadā saññūḷhā pana, te gahapati,
atk-s0101a0:258_1: ime samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇā”tiādīsu guṇo. “Vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī”tiādīsu
atk-s0101a0:258_2: pasaṃsā. Idha guṇopi pasaṃsāpi. Ayaṃ kira taṃ taṃ bhūtameva kāraṇaṃ apadisanto anekapariyāyena
atk-s0101a0:258_3: ratanattayassa guṇūpasañhitaṃ pasaṃsaṃ abhāsi. Tattha – “itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ
atk-s0101a0:258_4: sammāsambuddho”tiādinā nayena, “ye bhikkhave, buddhe pasannā agge te pasannā”tiādinā
atk-s0101a0:258_5: “ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati…pe… asamo asamasamo”tiādinā ca
atk-s0101a0:258_6: nayena buddhassa vaṇṇo veditabbo. “Svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo”ti ca “ālayasamugghāto
atk-s0101a0:258_7: vaṭṭupacchedo”ti ca, “ye bhikkhave, ariye aṭṭhaṅgike magge pasannā, agge te pasannā”ti
atk-s0101a0:258_8: ca evamādīhi nayehi dhammassa vaṇṇo veditabbo. “Suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho”ti
atk-s0101a0:258_9: ca, “ye, bhikkhave, saṅghe pasannā, agge te pasannā”ti ca evamādīhi pana nayehi saṅghassa
atk-s0101a0:258_10: vaṇṇo veditabbo. Pahontena pana dhammakathikena pañcanikāye navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:258_11: caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassāni ogāhitvā buddhādīnaṃ vaṇṇo pakāsetabbo. Imasmiñhi
atk-s0101a0:258_12: ṭhāne buddhādīnaṃ guṇe pakāsento atitthena pakkhando dhammakathikoti na sakkā vattuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:258_13: Īdisesu hi ṭhānesu dhammakathikassa thāmo veditabbo. Brahmadatto pana māṇavo anussavādimattasambandhitena
atk-s0101a0:259_0: Itiha te ubho ācariyantevāsīti evaṃ te dve ācariyantevāsikā. Aññamaññassāti añño
atk-s0101a0:259_1: aññassa. Ujuvipaccanīkavādāti īsakampi apariharitvā ujumeva vividhapaccanīkavādā,
atk-s0101a0:259_2: anekavāraṃ viruddhavādā eva hutvāti attho. Ācariyena hi ratanattayassa avaṇṇe bhāsite
atk-s0101a0:259_3: antevāsī vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, puna itaro avaṇṇaṃ, itaro vaṇṇanti evaṃ ācariyo sāraphalake
atk-s0101a0:259_4: visarukkhaāṇiṃ ākoṭayamāno viya punappunaṃ ratanattayassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati. Antevāsī
atk-s0101a0:259_5: pana suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimayāya āṇiyā taṃ āṇiṃ paṭibāhayamāno viya punappunaṃ ratanattayassa
atk-s0101a0:260_0: Bhagavantaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhā honti bhikkhusaṅghañcāti bhagavantañca bhikkhusaṅghañca
atk-s0101a0:260_1: pacchato pacchato dassanaṃ avijahantā iriyāpathānubandhanena anubandhā honti, sīsānulokino
atk-s0101a0:261_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā taṃ addhānaṃ paṭipanno? Kasmā ca suppiyo anubandho? Kasmā ca so
atk-s0101a0:261_1: ratanattayassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti? Bhagavā tāva tasmiṃ kāle rājagahaparivattakesu
atk-s0101a0:261_2: aṭṭhārasasu mahāvihāresu aññatarasmiṃ vasitvā pātova sarīrappaṭijagganaṃ katvā bhikkhācāravelāyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:261_3: bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto rājagahe piṇḍāya carati. So taṃ divasaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa sulabhapiṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0101a0:261_4: katvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gāhāpetvā – “nāḷandaṃ
atk-s0101a0:261_5: gamissāmī”ti, rājagahato nikkhamitvā taṃ addhānaṃ paṭipanno. Suppiyopi kho tasmiṃ
atk-s0101a0:261_6: kāle rājagahaparivattake aññatarasmiṃ paribbājakārāme vasitvā paribbājakaparivuto
atk-s0101a0:261_7: rājagahe bhikkhāya carati. Sopi taṃ divasaṃ paribbājakaparisāya sulabhabhikkhaṃ katvā
atk-s0101a0:261_8: bhuttapātarāso paribbājake paribbājakaparikkhāraṃ gāhāpetvā – nāḷandaṃ gamissāmicceva
atk-s0101a0:261_9: bhagavato taṃ maggaṃ paṭipannabhāvaṃ ajānantova anubandho. Sace pana jāneyya nānubandheyya.
atk-s0101a0:261_10: So ajānitvāva gacchanto gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā olokayamāno bhagavantaṃ addasa buddhasiriyā
atk-s0101a0:262_0: Tasmiṃ kira samaye dasabalassa sarīrato nikkhamitvā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo samantā asītihatthappamāṇe
atk-s0101a0:263_0: Asīti anubyañjanānurañjitañca pana bhagavato sarīraṃ vikasitakamaluppalamiva, saraṃ
atk-s0101a0:263_1: sabbapāliphullamiva pāricchattakaṃ, tārāmarīcivikasitamiva, gaganatalaṃ siriyā avahasantamiva,
atk-s0101a0:263_4: siriṃ siriyā abhibhavantimiva. Tañca pana bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitā bhikkhū sabbeva
atk-s0101a0:263_5: appicchā santuṭṭhā pavivittā asaṃsaṭṭhā codakā pāpagarahino vattāro vacanakkhamā
atk-s0101a0:263_8: suvaṇṇanāvā, pavāḷavedikāparikkhitto viya aggikkhandho, tārāgaṇaparivārito viya puṇṇacando
atk-s0101a0:263_9: migapakkhīnampi cakkhūni pīṇayati, pageva devamanussānaṃ. Tasmiñca pana divase yebhuyyena
atk-s0101a0:263_10: asītimahātherā meghavaṇṇaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ ekaṃsaṃ karitvā kattaradaṇḍaṃ ādāya suvammavammitā
atk-s0101a0:263_11: viya gandhahatthino vigatadosā vantadosā bhinnakilesā vijaṭitajaṭā chinnabandhanā
atk-s0101a0:263_12: bhagavantaṃ parivārayiṃsu. So sayaṃ vītarāgo vītarāgehi, sayaṃ vītadoso vītadosehi,
atk-s0101a0:263_13: sayaṃ vītamoho vītamohehi, sayaṃ vītataṇho vītataṇhehi, sayaṃ nikkileso nikkilesehi,
atk-s0101a0:263_14: sayaṃ buddho anubuddhehi parivārito; pattaparivāritaṃ viya kesaraṃ, kesaraparivāritā
atk-s0101a0:263_15: viya kaṇṇikā, aṭṭhanāgasahassaparivārito viya chaddanto nāgarājā, navutihaṃsasahassaparivārito
atk-s0101a0:263_16: viya dhataraṭṭho haṃsarājā, senaṅgaparivārito viya cakkavattirājā, devagaṇaparivārito
atk-s0101a0:263_17: viya sakko devarājā, brahmagaṇaparivārito viya hārito mahābrahmā, aparimitakālasañcitapuññabalanibbattāya
atk-s0101a0:263_18: acinteyyāya anopamāya buddhalīlāya cando viya gaganatalaṃ taṃ maggaṃ paṭipanno hoti.
atk-s0101a0:264_0: Athevaṃ bhagavantaṃ anopamāya buddhalīlāya gacchantaṃ bhikkhū ca okkhittacakkhū santindriye
atk-s0101a0:264_1: santamānase uparinabhe ṭhitaṃ puṇṇacandaṃ viya bhagavantaṃyeva namassamāne disvāva
atk-s0101a0:264_2: paribbājako attano parisaṃ avalokesi. Sā hoti kājadaṇḍake olambetvā gahitoluggaviluggapiṭṭhakatidaṇḍamorapiñchamattikāpattapasibbakakuṇḍikādianekaparikkhārabhārabharitā.
atk-s0101a0:264_3: “Asukassa hatthā sobhaṇā, asukassa pādā”ti evamādiniratthakavacanā mukharā vikiṇṇavācā
atk-s0101a0:264_4: adassanīyā apāsādikā. Tassa taṃ disvā vippaṭisāro udapādi.
atk-s0101a0:265_0: Idāni tena bhagavato vaṇṇo vattabbo bhaveyya. Yasmā panesa lābhasakkārahāniyā ceva
atk-s0101a0:265_1: pakkhahāniyā ca niccampi bhagavantaṃ usūyati. Aññatitthiyānañhi yāva buddho loke
atk-s0101a0:265_2: nuppajjati, tāvadeva lābhasakkārā nibbattanti, buddhuppādato pana paṭṭhāya parihīnalābhasakkārā
atk-s0101a0:265_3: honti, sūriyuggamane khajjopanakā viya nissirīkataṃ āpajjanti. Upatissakolitānañca
atk-s0101a0:265_4: sañjayassa santike pabbajitakāleyeva paribbājakā mahāparisā ahesuṃ, tesu pana pakkantesu
atk-s0101a0:265_5: sāpi tesaṃ parisā bhinnā. Iti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi ayaṃ paribbājako yasmā niccampi
atk-s0101a0:265_6: bhagavantaṃ usūyati, tasmā taṃ usūyavisuggāraṃ uggiranto ratanattayassa avaṇṇameva
atk-s0101a0:266_0: 2. Atha kho bhagavā ambalaṭṭhikāyaṃ rājāgārake ekarattivāsaṃ upagacchi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghenāti
atk-s0101a0:266_1: bhagavā tāya buddhalīlāya gacchamāno anupubbena ambalaṭṭhikādvāraṃ pāpuṇitvā sūriyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:266_2: oloketvā – “akālo dāni gantuṃ, atthasamīpaṃ gato sūriyo”ti ambalaṭṭhikāyaṃ rājāgārake
atk-s0101a0:267_0: Tattha ambalaṭṭhikāti rañño uyyānaṃ. Tassa kira dvārasamīpe taruṇaambarukkho atthi,
atk-s0101a0:267_1: taṃ “ambalaṭṭhikā”ti vadanti. Tassa avidūre bhavattā uyyānampi ambalaṭṭhikā tveva
atk-s0101a0:267_2: saṅkhyaṃ gataṃ. Taṃ chāyūdakasampannaṃ pākāraparikkhittaṃ suyojitadvāraṃ mañjusā
atk-s0101a0:267_3: viya suguttaṃ. Tattha rañño kīḷanatthaṃ paṭibhānacittavicittaṃ agāraṃ akaṃsu. Taṃ
atk-s0101a0:268_0: Suppiyopi khoti suppiyopi tasmiṃ ṭhāne sūriyaṃ oloketvā – “akālo dāni gantuṃ, bahū
atk-s0101a0:268_1: khuddakamahallakā paribbājakā, bahuparissayo ca ayaṃ maggo corehipi vāḷayakkhehipi
atk-s0101a0:268_2: vāḷamigehipi. Ayaṃ kho pana samaṇo gotamo uyyānaṃ paviṭṭho, samaṇassa ca gotamassa
atk-s0101a0:268_3: vasanaṭṭhāne devatā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhanti, handāhampi idha ekarattivāsaṃ upagantvā sveva
atk-s0101a0:268_4: gamissāmī”ti tadevuyyānaṃ pāvisi. Tato bhikkhusaṅgho bhagavato vattaṃ dassetvā attano
atk-s0101a0:268_5: attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhesi. Paribbājakopi uyyānassa ekapasse paribbājakaparikkhāre
atk-s0101a0:268_6: otāretvā vāsaṃ upagacchi saddhiṃ attano parisāya. Pāḷiyamārūḷhavaseneva pana – “saddhiṃ
atk-s0101a0:269_0: Evaṃ vāsaṃ upagato pana so paribbājako rattibhāge dasabalaṃ olokesi. Tasmiñca samaye
atk-s0101a0:269_1: samantā vippakiṇṇatārakā viya padīpā jalanti, majjhe bhagavā nisinno hoti, bhikkhusaṅgho
atk-s0101a0:269_2: ca bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā. Tattha ekabhikkhussapi hatthakukkuccaṃ vā pādakukkuccaṃ
atk-s0101a0:269_3: vā ukkāsitasaddo vā khipitasaddo vā natthi. Sā hi parisā attano ca sikkhitasikkhatāya
atk-s0101a0:269_4: satthari ca gāravenāti dvīhi kāraṇehi nivāte padīpasikhā viya niccalā sannisinnāva
atk-s0101a0:269_5: ahosi. Paribbājako taṃ vibhūtiṃ disvā attano parisaṃ olokesi. Tattha keci hatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:269_6: khipanti, keci pādaṃ, keci vippalapanti, keci nillālitajivhā paggharitakheḷā, dante
atk-s0101a0:269_7: khādantā kākacchamānā gharugharupassāsino sayanti. So ratanattayassa guṇavaṇṇe vattabbepi
atk-s0101a0:269_8: issāvasena puna avaṇṇameva ārabhi. Brahmadatto pana vuttanayeneva vaṇṇaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0101a0:269_9: – “tatrāpi sudaṃ suppiyo paribbājako”ti sabbaṃ vattabbaṃ. Tattha tatrāpīti tasmimpi,
atk-s0101a0:270_0: 3. Sambahulānanti bahukānaṃ. Tattha vinayapariyāyena tayo janā “sambahulā”ti vuccanti.
atk-s0101a0:270_1: Tato paraṃ saṅgho. Suttantapariyāyena pana tayo tayova tato paṭṭhāya sambahulā. Idha
atk-s0101a0:270_2: suttantapariyāyena “sambahulā”ti veditabbā. Maṇḍalamāḷeti katthaci dve kaṇṇikā gahetvā
atk-s0101a0:270_3: haṃsavaṭṭakacchannena katā kūṭāgārasālāpi “maṇḍalamāḷo”ti vuccati, katthaci ekaṃ
atk-s0101a0:270_4: kaṇṇikaṃ gahetvā thambhapantiṃ parikkhipitvā katā upaṭṭhānasālāpi “maṇḍalamāḷo”ti
atk-s0101a0:270_5: vuccati. Idha pana nisīdanasālā “maṇḍalamāḷo”ti veditabbo. Sannisinnānanti nisajjanavasena.
atk-s0101a0:270_6: Sannipatitānanti samodhānavasena. Ayaṃ saṅkhiyadhammoti saṅkhiyā vuccati kathā, kathādhammoti
atk-s0101a0:270_7: attho. Udapādīti uppanno. Katamo pana soti? Acchariyaṃ āvusoti evamādi. Tattha andhassa
atk-s0101a0:270_8: pabbatārohaṇaṃ viya niccaṃ na hotīti acchariyaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva saddanayo. Ayaṃ pana aṭṭhakathānayo
atk-s0101a0:270_9: – accharāyogganti acchariyaṃ. Accharaṃ paharituṃ yuttanti attho. Abhūtapubbaṃ bhūtanti
atk-s0101a0:270_10: abbhutaṃ. Ubhayaṃ petaṃ vimhayassevādhivacanaṃ. Yāvañcidanti yāva ca idaṃ tena suppaṭividitatāya
atk-s0101a0:271_0: Tena bhagavatā jānatā…pe… suppaṭividitāti etthāyaṃ saṅkhepattho. Yo so bhagavā samatiṃsa
atk-s0101a0:271_1: pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho, tena
atk-s0101a0:271_2: bhagavatā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ āsayānusayaṃ jānatā, hatthatale ṭhapitaṃ āmalakaṃ
atk-s0101a0:272_0: Api ca pubbenivāsādīhi jānatā, dibbena cakkhunā passatā. Tīhi vijjāhi chahi vā pana
atk-s0101a0:272_1: abhiññāhi jānatā, sabbattha appaṭihatena samantacakkhunā passatā. Sabbadhammajānanasamatthāya
atk-s0101a0:272_2: vā paññāya jānatā, sabbasattānaṃ cakkhuvisayātītāni tirokuṭṭādigatānipi rūpāni ativisuddhena
atk-s0101a0:272_3: maṃsacakkhunā passatā. Attahitasādhikāya vā samādhipadaṭṭhānāya paṭivedhapaññāya
atk-s0101a0:273_0: Arīnaṃ hatattā paccayādīnañca arahattā arahatā. Sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā
atk-s0101a0:273_1: sammāsambuddhena antarāyikadhamme vā jānatā, niyyānikadhamme passatā, kilesārīnaṃ
atk-s0101a0:273_2: hatattā arahatā. Sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddhenāti. Evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:273_3: catūvesārajjavasena catūhākārehi thomitena sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikatā nānajjhāsayatā
atk-s0101a0:274_0: Idānissa suppaṭividitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ayañhītiādimāha. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti yā ca ayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:274_1: bhagavatā “dhātuso, bhikkhave, sattā saṃsandanti samenti, hīnādhimuttikā hīnādhimuttikehi
atk-s0101a0:274_2: saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samenti, kalyāṇādhimuttikā kalyāṇādhimuttikehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti
atk-s0101a0:274_3: samenti. Atītampi kho, bhikkhave, addhānaṃ dhātusova sattā saṃsandiṃsu samiṃsu, hīnādhimuttikā
atk-s0101a0:274_4: hīnādhimuttikehi…pe… kalyāṇādhimuttikā kalyāṇādhimuttikehi saddhiṃ saṃsandiṃsu samiṃsu,
atk-s0101a0:274_5: anāgatampi kho, bhikkhave, addhānaṃ…pe… saṃsandissanti samessanti, etarahipi kho,
atk-s0101a0:274_6: bhikkhave, paccuppannaṃ addhānaṃ dhātusova sattā saṃsandanti samenti, hīnādhimuttikā
atk-s0101a0:274_7: hīnādhimuttikehi…pe… kalyāṇādhimuttikā kalyāṇādhimuttikehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samentī”ti
atk-s0101a0:274_8: evaṃ sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikatā, nānajjhāsayatā, nānādiṭṭhikatā, nānākhantitā, nānārucitā,
atk-s0101a0:274_9: nāḷiyā minantena viya tulāya tulayantena viya ca nānādhimuttikatāñāṇena sabbaññutaññāṇena
atk-s0101a0:274_10: viditā, sā yāva suppaṭividitā. Dvepi nāma sattā ekajjhāsayā dullabhā lokasmiṃ. Ekasmiṃ
atk-s0101a0:274_11: gantukāme eko ṭhātukāmo hoti, ekasmiṃ pivitukāme eko bhuñjitukāmo. Imesu cāpi dvīsu
atk-s0101a0:274_12: ācariyantevāsīsu ayañhi “suppiyo paribbājako…pe… bhagavantaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhā
atk-s0101a0:274_13: honti bhikkhusaṅghañcā”ti. Tattha itihameti itiha ime, evaṃ imeti attho. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0101a0:275_0: 4. Atha kho bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ imaṃ saṅkhiyadhammaṃ viditvāti ettha viditvāti
atk-s0101a0:275_1: sabbaññutaññāṇena jānitvā. Bhagavā hi katthaci maṃsacakkhunā disvā jānāti – “addasā
atk-s0101a0:275_2: kho bhagavā mahantaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ gaṅgāya nadiyā sotena vuyhamāna”ntiādīsu viya.
atk-s0101a0:275_3: Katthaci dibbacakkhunā disvā jānāti – “addasā kho bhagavā dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena
atk-s0101a0:275_4: atikkantamānusakena tā devatāyo sahassasseva pāṭaligāme vatthūni parigaṇhantiyo”tiādīsu
atk-s0101a0:275_5: viya. Katthaci pakatisotena sutvā jānāti – “assosi kho bhagavā āyasmato ānandassa
atk-s0101a0:275_6: subhaddena paribbājakena saddhiṃ imaṃ kathāsallāpa”ntiādīsu viya. Katthaci dibbasotena
atk-s0101a0:275_7: sutvā jānāti – “assosi kho bhagavā dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya
atk-s0101a0:275_8: sandhānassa gahapatissa nigrodhena paribbājakena saddhiṃ imaṃ kathāsallāpa”ntiādīsu
atk-s0101a0:275_9: viya. Idha pana sabbaññutaññāṇena sutvā aññāsi. Kiṃ karonto aññāsi? Pacchimayāmakiccaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:275_10: kiccañca nāmetaṃ sātthakaṃ, niratthakanti duvidhaṃ hoti. Tattha niratthakakiccaṃ
atk-s0101a0:275_11: bhagavatā bodhipallaṅkeyeva arahattamaggena samugghātaṃ kataṃ. Sātthakaṃyeva pana
atk-s0101a0:275_12: bhagavato kiccaṃ hoti. Taṃ pañcavidhaṃ – purebhattakiccaṃ, pacchābhattakiccaṃ, purimayāmakiccaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:277_0: Bhagavā hi pātova uṭṭhāya upaṭṭhākānuggahatthaṃ sarīraphāsukatthañca mukhadhovanādisarīraparikammaṃ
atk-s0101a0:277_1: katvā yāva bhikkhācāravelā tāva vivittāsane vītināmetvā, bhikkhācāravelāyaṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0101a0:277_2: kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattamādāya kadāci ekako, kadāci bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto,
atk-s0101a0:277_3: gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisati; kadāci pakatiyā, kadāci anekehi pāṭihāriyehi
atk-s0101a0:277_4: vattamānehi. Seyyathidaṃ, piṇḍāya pavisato lokanāthassa purato purato gantvā mudugatavātā
atk-s0101a0:277_5: pathaviṃ sodhenti, valāhakā udakaphusitāni muñcantā magge reṇuṃ vūpasametvā upari
atk-s0101a0:277_6: vitānaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhanti, apare vātā pupphāni upasaṃharitvā magge okiranti, unnatā
atk-s0101a0:277_7: bhūmippadesā onamanti, onatā unnamanti, pādanikkhepasamaye samāva bhūmi hoti, sukhasamphassāni
atk-s0101a0:277_8: padumapupphāni vā pāde sampaṭicchanti. Indakhīlassa anto ṭhapitamatte dakkhiṇapāde
atk-s0101a0:277_9: sarīrato chabbaṇṇarasmiyo nikkhamitvā suvaṇṇarasapiñjarāni viya citrapaṭaparikkhittāni
atk-s0101a0:277_10: viya ca pāsādakūṭāgārādīni alaṅkarontiyo ito cito ca dhāvanti, hatthiassavihaṅgādayo
atk-s0101a0:277_11: sakasakaṭṭhānesu ṭhitāyeva madhurenākārena saddaṃ karonti, tathā bherivīṇādīni tūriyāni
atk-s0101a0:277_12: manussānañca kāyūpagāni ābharaṇāni. Tena saññāṇena manussā jānanti – “ajja bhagavā
atk-s0101a0:277_13: idha piṇḍāya paviṭṭho”ti. Te sunivatthā supārutā gandhapupphādīni ādāya gharā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0101a0:277_14: antaravīthiṃ paṭipajjitvā bhagavantaṃ gandhapupphādīhi sakkaccaṃ pūjetvā vanditvā
atk-s0101a0:277_15: – “amhākaṃ, bhante, dasa bhikkhū, amhākaṃ vīsati, paññāsaṃ…pe… sataṃ dethā”ti yācitvā
atk-s0101a0:277_16: bhagavatopi pattaṃ gahetvā āsanaṃ paññapetvā sakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātena paṭimānenti. Bhagavā
atk-s0101a0:277_17: katabhattakicco tesaṃ sattānaṃ cittasantānāni oloketvā tathā dhammaṃ deseti, yathā
atk-s0101a0:277_18: keci saraṇagamanesu patiṭṭhahanti, keci pañcasu sīlesu, keci sotāpattisakadāgāmianāgāmiphalānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:277_19: aññatarasmiṃ; keci pabbajitvā aggaphale arahatteti. Evaṃ mahājanaṃ anuggahetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-s0101a0:277_20: vihāraṃ gacchati. Tattha gantvā maṇḍalamāḷe paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdati, bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0101a0:277_21: bhattakiccapariyosānaṃ āgamayamāno. Tato bhikkhūnaṃ bhattakiccapariyosāne upaṭṭhāko
atk-s0101a0:277_22: bhagavato nivedeti. Atha bhagavā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisati. Idaṃ tāva purebhattakiccaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:278_0: Atha bhagavā evaṃ katapurebhattakicco gandhakuṭiyā upaṭṭhāne nisīditvā pāde pakkhāletvā
atk-s0101a0:278_1: pādapīṭhe ṭhatvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ovadati – “bhikkhave, appamādena sampādetha, dullabho
atk-s0101a0:278_2: buddhuppādo lokasmiṃ, dullabho manussattapaṭilābho, dullabhā sampatti, dullabhā pabbajjā,
atk-s0101a0:278_3: dullabhaṃ saddhammassavana”nti. Tattha keci bhagavantaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ pucchanti. Bhagavāpi
atk-s0101a0:278_4: tesaṃ cariyānurūpaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ deti. Tato sabbepi bhagavantaṃ vanditvā attano attano
atk-s0101a0:278_5: rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni gacchanti. Keci araññaṃ, keci rukkhamūlaṃ, keci pabbatādīnaṃ
atk-s0101a0:278_6: aññataraṃ, keci cātumahārājikabhavanaṃ…pe… keci vasavattibhavananti. Tato bhagavā
atk-s0101a0:278_7: gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā sace ākaṅkhati, dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno muhuttaṃ
atk-s0101a0:278_8: sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti. Atha samassāsitakāyo vuṭṭhahitvā dutiyabhāge lokaṃ voloketi.
atk-s0101a0:278_9: Tatiyabhāge yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharati tattha mahājano purebhattaṃ
atk-s0101a0:278_10: dānaṃ datvā pacchābhattaṃ sunivattho supāruto gandhapupphādīni ādāya vihāre sannipatati.
atk-s0101a0:278_11: Tato bhagavā sampattaparisāya anurūpena pāṭihāriyena gantvā dhammasabhāyaṃ paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0101a0:278_12: nisajja dhammaṃ deseti kālayuttaṃ samayayuttaṃ, atha kālaṃ viditvā parisaṃ uyyojeti,
atk-s0101a0:278_13: manussā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā pakkamanti. Idaṃ pacchābhattakiccaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:279_0: So evaṃ niṭṭhitapacchābhattakicco sace gattāni osiñcitukāmo hoti, buddhāsanā vuṭṭhāya
