atk-s0101a0:279_1: nhānakoṭṭhakaṃ pavisitvā upaṭṭhākena paṭiyāditaudakena gattāni utuṃ gaṇhāpeti. Upaṭṭhākopi
atk-s0101a0:279_2: buddhāsanaṃ ānetvā gandhakuṭipariveṇe paññapeti. Bhagavā surattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0101a0:279_3: kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā uttarāsaṅgaṃ ekaṃsaṃ karitvā tattha gantvā nisīdati ekakova
atk-s0101a0:279_4: muhuttaṃ paṭisallīno, atha bhikkhū tato tato āgamma bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchanti.
atk-s0101a0:279_5: Tattha ekacce pañhaṃ pucchanti, ekacce kammaṭṭhānaṃ, ekacce dhammassavanaṃ yācanti.
atk-s0101a0:279_6: Bhagavā tesaṃ adhippāyaṃ sampādento purimayāmaṃ vītināmeti. Idaṃ purimayāmakiccaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:280_0: Purimayāmakiccapariyosāne pana bhikkhūsu bhagavantaṃ vanditvā pakkantesu sakaladasasahassilokadhātudevatāyo
atk-s0101a0:280_1: okāsaṃ labhamānā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchanti, yathābhisaṅkhataṃ antamaso
atk-s0101a0:280_2: caturakkharampi. Bhagavā tāsaṃ devatānaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjento majjhimayāmaṃ vītināmeti.
atk-s0101a0:281_0: Pacchimayāmaṃ pana tayo koṭṭhāse katvā purebhattato paṭṭhāya nisajjāya pīḷitassa
atk-s0101a0:281_1: sarīrassa kilāsubhāvamocanatthaṃ ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ caṅkamena vītināmeti. Dutiyakoṭṭhāse
atk-s0101a0:281_2: gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti. Tatiyakoṭṭhāse
atk-s0101a0:281_3: paccuṭṭhāya nisīditvā purimabuddhānaṃ santike dānasīlādivasena katādhikārapuggaladassanatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:282_0: Tasmiṃ pana divase bhagavā purebhattakiccaṃ rājagahe pariyosāpetvā pacchābhatte maggaṃ
atk-s0101a0:282_1: āgato, purimayāme bhikkhūnaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā, majjhimayāme devatānaṃ pañhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:282_2: vissajjetvā, pacchimayāme caṅkamaṃ āruyha caṅkamamāno pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0101a0:282_3: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ārabbha pavattaṃ kathaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇeneva sutvā aññāsīti. Tena
atk-s0101a0:283_0: Ñatvā ca panassa etadahosi – “ime bhikkhū mayhaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ārabbha guṇaṃ kathenti,
atk-s0101a0:283_1: etesañca sabbaññutaññāṇakiccaṃ na pākaṭaṃ, mayhameva pākaṭaṃ. Mayi pana gate ete
atk-s0101a0:283_2: attano kathaṃ nirantaraṃ ārocessanti, tato nesaṃ ahaṃ taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā tividhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:283_3: sīlaṃ vibhajanto, dvāsaṭṭhiyā ṭhānesu appaṭivattiyaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadanto, paccayākāraṃ
atk-s0101a0:283_4: samodhānetvā buddhaguṇe pākaṭe katvā, sineruṃ ukkhipento viya suvaṇṇakūṭena nabhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:283_5: paharanto viya ca dasasahassilokadhātukampanaṃ brahmajālasuttantaṃ arahattanikūṭena
atk-s0101a0:283_6: niṭṭhāpento desessāmi, sā me desanā parinibbutassāpi pañcavassasahassāni sattānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:283_7: amatamahānibbānaṃ sampāpikā bhavissatī”ti. Evaṃ cintetvā yena maṇḍalamāḷo tenupasaṅkamīti.
atk-s0101a0:283_8: Yenāti yena disābhāgena, so upasaṅkamitabbo. Bhummatthe vā etaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ, yasmiṃ
atk-s0101a0:283_9: padese so maṇḍalamāḷo, tattha gatoti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0101a0:284_0: Paññatte āsane nisīdīti buddhakāle kira yattha yattha ekopi bhikkhu viharati sabbattha
atk-s0101a0:284_1: buddhāsanaṃ paññattameva hoti. Kasmā? Bhagavā kira attano santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0101a0:284_2: phāsukaṭṭhāne viharante manasi karoti – “asuko mayhaṃ santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0101a0:284_3: gato, sakkhissati nu kho visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ no vā”ti. Atha naṃ passati kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:284_4: vissajjetvā akusalavitakkaṃ vitakkayamānaṃ, tato “kathañhi nāma mādisassa satthu
atk-s0101a0:284_5: santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā viharantaṃ imaṃ kulaputtaṃ akusalavitakkā abhibhavitvā
atk-s0101a0:284_6: anamatagge vaṭṭadukkhe saṃsāressantī”ti tassa anuggahatthaṃ tattheva attānaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0101a0:284_7: taṃ kulaputtaṃ ovaditvā ākāsaṃ uppatitvā puna attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gacchati. Athevaṃ
atk-s0101a0:284_8: ovadiyamānā te bhikkhū cintayiṃsu – “satthā amhākaṃ manaṃ jānitvā āgantvā amhākaṃ
atk-s0101a0:284_9: samīpe ṭhitaṃyeva attānaṃ dasseti”. Tasmiṃ khaṇe – “bhante, idha nisīdatha, idha
atk-s0101a0:284_10: nisīdathā”ti āsanapariyesanaṃ nāma bhāroti. Te āsanaṃ paññapetvāva viharanti. Yassa
atk-s0101a0:284_11: pīṭhaṃ atthi, so taṃ paññapeti. Yassa natthi, so mañcaṃ vā phalakaṃ vā kaṭṭhaṃ vā
atk-s0101a0:284_12: pāsāṇaṃ vā vālukapuñjaṃ vā paññapeti. Taṃ alabhamānā purāṇapaṇṇānipi saṅkaḍḍhitvā
atk-s0101a0:284_13: tattha paṃsukūlaṃ pattharitvā ṭhapenti. Idha pana rañño nisīdanāsanameva atthi, taṃ
atk-s0101a0:284_14: papphoṭetvā paññapetvā parivāretvā te bhikkhū bhagavato adhimuttikañāṇamārabbha guṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:284_15: thomayamānā nisīdiṃsu. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “paññatte āsane nisīdī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:285_0: Evaṃ nisinno pana jānantoyeva kathāsamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ bhikkhū pucchi. Te cassa sabbaṃ
atk-s0101a0:285_1: kathayiṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ – “nisajja kho bhagavā”tiādi. Tattha kāya nutthāti katamāya
atk-s0101a0:285_2: nu kathāya sannisinnā bhavathāti attho. Kāya netthātipi pāḷi, tassā katamāya nu etthāti
atk-s0101a0:285_3: attho kāya notthātipi pāḷi. Tassāpi purimoyeva attho.
atk-s0101a0:286_1: Vippakatāti, mama āgamanapaccayā apariniṭṭhitā sikhaṃ appattā. Tena kiṃ dasseti?
atk-s0101a0:286_2: “Nāhaṃ tumhākaṃ kathābhaṅgatthaṃ āgato, ahaṃ pana sabbaññutāya tumhākaṃ kathaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0101a0:286_3: matthakappattaṃ katvā dassāmīti āgato”ti nisajjeva sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavāreti. Ayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:286_4: kho no, bhante, antarākathā vippakatā, atha bhagavā anuppattoti etthāpi ayamadhippāyo.
atk-s0101a0:286_5: Ayaṃ bhante amhākaṃ bhagavato sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ārabbha guṇakathā vippakatā, na rājakathādikā
atk-s0101a0:286_6: tiracchānakathā, atha bhagavā anuppatto; taṃ no idāni niṭṭhāpetvā desethāti.
atk-s0101a0:287_0: Ettāvatā ca yaṃ āyasmatā ānandena kamalakuvalayujjalavimalasādhurasasalilāya pokkharaṇiyā
atk-s0101a0:287_6: mahādvāraṃ viya ca atthabyañjanasampannassa buddhaguṇānubhāvasaṃsūcakassa imassa
atk-s0101a0:288_0: 5. Idāni – “mamaṃ vā, bhikkhave, pare avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyu”ntiādinā nayena bhagavatā
atk-s0101a0:288_1: nikkhittassa suttassa vaṇṇanāya okāso anuppatto. Sā panesā suttavaṇṇanā. Yasmā suttanikkhepaṃ
atk-s0101a0:288_2: vicāretvā vuccamānā pākaṭā hoti, tasmā suttanikkhepaṃ tāva vicārayissāma. Cattāro
atk-s0101a0:288_3: hi suttanikkhepā – attajjhāsayo, parajjhāsayo, pucchāvasiko, aṭṭhuppattikoti.
atk-s0101a0:289_0: Tattha yāni suttāni bhagavā parehi anajjhiṭṭho kevalaṃ attano ajjhāsayeneva kathesi;
atk-s0101a0:290_0: Yāni pana “paripakkā kho rāhulassa vimuttiparipācaniyā dhammā; yaṃnūnāhaṃ rāhulaṃ
atk-s0101a0:290_1: uttariṃ āsavānaṃ khaye vineyya”nti; evaṃ paresaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ khantiṃ manaṃ abhinīhāraṃ
atk-s0101a0:290_2: bujjhanabhāvañca avekkhitvā parajjhāsayavasena kathitāni; seyyathidaṃ, cūḷarāhulovādasuttaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:291_0: Bhagavantaṃ pana upasaṅkamitvā catasso parisā, cattāro vaṇṇā, nāgā, supaṇṇā, gandhabbā,
atk-s0101a0:291_1: asurā, yakkhā, mahārājāno, tāvatiṃsādayo devā, mahābrahmāti evamādayo – “bojjhaṅgā
atk-s0101a0:291_2: bojjhaṅgā”ti, bhante, vuccanti. “Nīvaraṇā nīvaraṇā”ti, bhante, vuccanti; “ime nu
atk-s0101a0:291_3: kho, bhante, pañcupādānakkhandhā”. “Kiṃ sūdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭha”ntiādinā nayena
atk-s0101a0:291_4: pañhaṃ pucchanti. Evaṃ puṭṭhena bhagavatā yāni kathitāni bojjhaṅgasaṃyuttādīni, yāni
atk-s0101a0:292_0: Yāni pana tāni uppannaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca kathitāni, seyyathidaṃ – dhammadāyādaṃ, cūḷasīhanādaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:293_0: Evametesu catūsu nikkhepesu imassa suttassa aṭṭhuppattiko nikkhepo. Aṭṭhuppattiyā
atk-s0101a0:293_1: hi idaṃ bhagavatā nikkhittaṃ. Katarāya aṭṭhuppattiyā? Vaṇṇāvaṇṇe. Ācariyo ratanattayassa
atk-s0101a0:293_2: avaṇṇaṃ abhāsi, antevāsī vaṇṇaṃ. Iti imaṃ vaṇṇāvaṇṇaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā desanākusalo
atk-s0101a0:293_3: bhagavā – “mamaṃ vā, bhikkhave, pare avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyu”nti desanaṃ ārabhi. Tattha
atk-s0101a0:293_4: mamanti, sāmivacanaṃ, mamāti attho. Vāsaddo vikappanattho. Pareti, paṭiviruddhā sattā.
atk-s0101a0:294_0: Na āghātotiādīhi kiñcāpi tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āghātoyeva natthi, atha kho āyatiṃ kulaputtānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:294_1: īdisesupi ṭhānesu akusaluppattiṃ paṭisedhento dhammanettiṃ ṭhapeti. Tattha āhanati
atk-s0101a0:294_2: cittanti ‘āghāto’; kopassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Appatītā honti tena atuṭṭhā asomanassikāti
atk-s0101a0:294_3: appaccayo; domanassassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Neva attano na paresaṃ hitaṃ abhirādhayatīti
atk-s0101a0:294_4: anabhiraddhi; kopassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Evamettha dvīhi padehi saṅkhārakkhandho, ekena
atk-s0101a0:294_5: vedanākkhandhoti dve khandhā vuttā. Tesaṃ vasena sesānampi sampayuttadhammānaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭikkhittameva.
atk-s0101a0:295_0: Evaṃ paṭhamena nayena manopadosaṃ nivāretvā, dutiyena nayena tattha ādīnavaṃ dassento
atk-s0101a0:295_1: āha – “tatra ce tumhe assatha kupitā vā anattamanā vā, tumhaṃ yevassa tena antarāyo”ti.
atk-s0101a0:295_2: Tattha ‘tatra ce tumhe assathā’ti tesu avaṇṇabhāsakesu, tasmiṃ vā avaṇṇe tumhe bhaveyyātha
atk-s0101a0:295_3: ce; yadi bhaveyyāthāti attho. ‘Kupitā’ kopena, anattamanā domanassena. ‘Tumhaṃ yevassa
atk-s0101a0:295_4: tena antarāyo’ti tumhākaṃyeva tena kopena, tāya ca anattamanatāya paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ antarāyo bhaveyya.
atk-s0101a0:296_0: Evaṃ dutiyena nayena ādīnavaṃ dassetvā, tatiyena nayena vacanatthasallakkhaṇamattepi
atk-s0101a0:296_1: asamatthataṃ dassento – “api nu tumhe paresa”ntiādimāha. Tattha paresanti yesaṃ kesaṃ
atk-s0101a0:296_2: ci. Kupito hi neva buddhapaccekabuddhaariyasāvakānaṃ, na mātāpitūnaṃ, na paccatthikānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:297: “Kuddho atthaṃ na jānāti, kuddho dhammaṃ na passati;
atk-s0101a0:298: Andhaṃ tamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ kodho sahate naraṃ.
atk-s0101a0:301: Evaṃ sabbathāpi avaṇṇe manopadosaṃ nisedhetvā idāni paṭipajjitabbākāraṃ dassento – “tatra tumhehi abhūtaṃ abhūtato”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:302_0: Tattha tatra tumhehīti, tasmiṃ avaṇṇe tumhehi. Abhūtaṃ abhūtato nibbeṭhetabbanti
atk-s0101a0:302_1: yaṃ abhūtaṃ, taṃ abhūtabhāveneva apanetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Itipetaṃ abhūtantiādinā nayena.
atk-s0101a0:302_2: Tatrāyaṃ yojanā – “tumhākaṃ satthā na sabbaññū, dhammo durakkhāto, saṅgho duppaṭipanno”tiādīni
atk-s0101a0:302_3: sutvā na tuṇhī bhavitabbaṃ. Evaṃ pana vattabbaṃ – “iti petaṃ abhūtaṃ, yaṃ tumhehi
atk-s0101a0:302_4: vuttaṃ, taṃ imināpi kāraṇena abhūtaṃ, imināpi kāraṇena atacchaṃ, ‘natthi cetaṃ amhesu’,
atk-s0101a0:302_5: ‘na ca panetaṃ amhesu saṃvijjati’, sabbaññūyeva amhākaṃ satthā, svākkhāto dhammo,
atk-s0101a0:302_6: suppaṭipanno saṅgho, tatra idañcidañca kāraṇa”nti. Ettha ca dutiyaṃ padaṃ paṭhamassa,
atk-s0101a0:302_7: catutthañca tatiyassa vevacananti veditabbaṃ. Idañca avaṇṇeyeva nibbeṭhanaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:302_8: na sabbattha. Yadi hi “tvaṃ dussīlo, tavācariyo dussīlo, idañcidañca tayā kataṃ,
atk-s0101a0:302_9: tavācariyena kata”nti vutte tuṇhībhūto adhivāseti, āsaṅkanīyo hoti. Tasmā manopadosaṃ
atk-s0101a0:302_10: akatvā avaṇṇo nibbeṭhetabbo. “Oṭṭhosi, goṇosī”tiādinā pana nayena dasahi akkosavatthūhi
atk-s0101a0:302_11: akkosantaṃ puggalaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā adhivāsanakhantiyeva tattha kātabbā.
atk-s0101a0:303_0: 6. Evaṃ avaṇṇabhūmiyaṃ tādilakkhaṇaṃ dassetvā idāni vaṇṇabhūmiyaṃ dassetuṃ “mamaṃ
atk-s0101a0:303_1: vā, bhikkhave, pare vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyu”ntiādimāha. Tattha pareti ye keci pasannā devamanussā.
atk-s0101a0:303_2: Ānandanti etenāti ānando, pītiyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sumanassa bhāvo somanassaṃ, cetasikasukhassetaṃ
atk-s0101a0:303_3: adhivacanaṃ. Uppilāvino bhāvo uppilāvitattaṃ. Kassa uppilāvitattanti? Cetasoti. Uddhaccāvahāya
atk-s0101a0:303_4: uppilāpanapītiyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Idhāpi dvīhi padehi saṅkhārakkhandho, ekena vedanākkhandho vutto.
atk-s0101a0:304_0: Evaṃ paṭhamanayena uppilāvitattaṃ nivāretvā, dutiyena tattha ādīnavaṃ dassento –
atk-s0101a0:304_1: “tatra ce tumhe assathā”tiādimāha. Idhāpi tumhaṃ yevassa tena antarāyoti tena uppilāvitattena
atk-s0101a0:304_2: tumhākaṃyeva paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ antarāyo bhaveyyāti attho veditabbo. Kasmā panetaṃ
atk-s0101a0:306: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenāpi jambudīpassa.
atk-s0101a0:307: Dhammoti kittayantassa, kāye bhavati yā pīti;
atk-s0101a0:308: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenāpi jambudīpassa.
atk-s0101a0:309: Saṅghoti kittayantassa, kāye bhavati yā pīti;
atk-s0101a0:310: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenāpi jambudīpassā”ti ca.
atk-s0101a0:311_0: “Ye, bhikkhave, buddhe pasannā, agge te pasannā”ti ca evamādīhi anekasatehi suttehi
atk-s0101a0:311_1: ratanattaye pītisomanassameva vaṇṇitanti. Saccaṃ vaṇṇitaṃ, taṃ pana nekkhammanissitaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:311_2: Idha – “amhākaṃ buddho, amhākaṃ dhammo”tiādinā nayena āyasmato channassa uppannasadisaṃ
atk-s0101a0:311_3: gehassitaṃ pītisomanassaṃ adhippetaṃ. Idañhi jhānādipaṭilābhāya antarāyakaraṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:311_4: Tenevāyasmā channopi yāva buddho na parinibbāyi, tāva visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0101a0:311_5: parinibbānakāle paññattena pana brahmadaṇḍena tajjito taṃ pītisomanassaṃ pahāya visesaṃ
atk-s0101a0:311_6: nibbattesi. Tasmā antarāyakaraṃyeva sandhāya idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Ayañhi lobhasahagatā
atk-s0101a0:312: “Luddho atthaṃ na jānāti, luddho dhammaṃ na passati;
atk-s0101a0:313: Andhaṃ tamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ lobho sahate naraṃ.
atk-s0101a0:316: Tatiyavāro pana idha anāgatopi atthato āgato yevāti veditabbo. Yatheva hi kuddho, evaṃ luddhopi atthaṃ na jānātīti.
atk-s0101a0:317_0: Paṭipajjitabbākāradassanavāre panāyaṃ yojanā – “tumhākaṃ satthā sabbaññū arahaṃ sammāsambuddho,
atk-s0101a0:317_1: dhammo svākkhāto, saṅgho suppaṭipanno”tiādīni sutvā na tuṇhī bhavitabbaṃ. Evaṃ pana
atk-s0101a0:317_2: paṭijānitabbaṃ – “itipetaṃ bhūtaṃ, yaṃ tumhehi vuttaṃ, taṃ imināpi kāraṇena bhūtaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:317_3: imināpi kāraṇena tacchaṃ. So hi bhagavā itipi arahaṃ, itipi sammāsambuddho; dhammo
atk-s0101a0:317_4: itipi svākkhāto, itipi sandiṭṭhiko; saṅgho itipi suppaṭipanno, itipi ujuppaṭipanno”ti.
atk-s0101a0:317_6: paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī…pe… arahā”ti puṭṭhenāpi sabhāgānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃyeva paṭijānitabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:317_7: Evañhi pāpicchatā ceva parivajjitā hoti, sāsanassa ca amoghatā dīpitā hotīti. Sesaṃ
atk-s0101a0:319_0: 7. Appamattakaṃ kho panetaṃ, bhikkhaveti ko anusandhi? Idaṃ suttaṃ dvīhi padehi ābaddhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:319_1: vaṇṇena ca avaṇṇena ca. Tattha avaṇṇo – “iti petaṃ abhūtaṃ iti petaṃ ataccha”nti,
atk-s0101a0:319_2: ettheva udakantaṃ patvā aggiviya nivatto. Vaṇṇo pana bhūtaṃ bhūtato paṭijānitabbaṃ
atk-s0101a0:319_3: – “iti petaṃ bhūta”nti evaṃ anuvattatiyeva. So pana duvidho brahmadattena bhāsitavaṇṇo
atk-s0101a0:319_4: ca bhikkhusaṅghena acchariyaṃ āvusotiādinā nayena āraddhavaṇṇo ca. Tesu bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0101a0:319_5: vuttavaṇṇassa upari suññatāpakāsane anusandhiṃ dassessati. Idha pana brahmadattena
atk-s0101a0:319_6: vuttavaṇṇassa anusandhiṃ dassetuṃ “appamattakaṃ kho panetaṃ, bhikkhave”ti desanā āraddhā.
atk-s0101a0:320_0: Tattha appamattakanti parittassa nāmaṃ. Oramattakanti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Mattāti
atk-s0101a0:320_1: vuccati pamāṇaṃ. Appaṃ mattā etassāti appamattakaṃ. Oraṃ mattā etassāti oramattakaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:320_2: Sīlameva sīlamattakaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ‘appamattakaṃ kho, panetaṃ bhikkhave, oramattakaṃ
atk-s0101a0:320_3: sīlamattakaṃ’ nāma yena “tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadāmī”ti ussāhaṃ katvāpi vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno
atk-s0101a0:320_4: puthujjano vadeyyāti. Tattha siyā – nanu idaṃ sīlaṃ nāma yogino aggavibhūsanaṃ? Yathāhu porāṇā –
atk-s0101a0:323_0: Bhagavatāpi ca anekesu suttasatesu sīlaṃ mahantameva katvā kathitaṃ. Yathāha – “ākaṅkheyya
atk-s0101a0:323_1: ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo cassaṃ manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā’ti,
atk-s0101a0:332: Candanaṃ tagaraṃ vāpi, uppalaṃ atha vassikī;
atk-s0101a0:335: Yo ca sīlavataṃ gandho, vāti devesu uttamo.
atk-s0101a0:337: Sammadaññā vimuttānaṃ, māro maggaṃ na vindatī”ti ca. ;
atk-s0101a0:338: “Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ;
atk-s0101a0:339: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭa”nti ca. ;
atk-s0101a0:340_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci bījagāmabhūtagāmā vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjanti,
atk-s0101a0:340_1: sabbe te pathaviṃ nissāya, pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya; evamete bījagāmabhūtagāmā vuḍḍhiṃ
atk-s0101a0:340_2: virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjanti. Evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0101a0:340_3: sattabojjhaṅge bhāvento sattabojjhaṅge bahulīkaronto vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti
atk-s0101a0:340_4: dhammesū”ti ca. Evaṃ aññānipi anekāni suttāni daṭṭhabbāni. Evamanekesu suttasatesu
atk-s0101a0:340_5: sīlaṃ mahantameva katvā kathitaṃ. Taṃ “kasmā imasmiṃ ṭhāne appamattaka”nti āhāti?
atk-s0101a0:340_6: Upari guṇe upanidhāya. Sīlañhi samādhiṃ na pāpuṇāti, samādhi paññaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a0:340_7: tasmā uparimaṃ upanidhāya heṭṭhimaṃ oramattakaṃ nāma hoti. Kathaṃ sīlaṃ samādhiṃ
atk-s0101a0:340_8: na pāpuṇāti? Bhagavā hi abhisambodhito sattame saṃvacchare sāvatthinagara – dvāre
atk-s0101a0:340_9: kaṇḍambarukkhamūle dvādasayojane ratanamaṇḍape yojanappamāṇe ratanapallaṅke nisīditvā
atk-s0101a0:340_10: tiyojanike dibbasetacchatte dhāriyamāne dvādasayojanāya parisāya attādānaparidīpanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:340_12: pavattati…pe… ekekalomakūpato aggikkhandho pavattati, ekekalomakūpato udakadhārā
atk-s0101a0:340_13: pavattati, channaṃ vaṇṇāna”ntiādinayappavattaṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dasseti. Tassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇasarīrato
atk-s0101a0:340_14: suvaṇṇavaṇṇā rasmiyo uggantvā yāva bhavaggā gacchanti, sakaladasasahassacakkavāḷassa
atk-s0101a0:340_15: alaṅkaraṇakālo viya hoti, dutiyā dutiyā rasmiyo purimāya purimāya yamakayamakā viya
atk-s0101a0:341_0: Dvinnañca cittānaṃ ekakkhaṇe pavatti nāma natthi. Buddhānaṃ pana bhagavantānaṃ bhavaṅgaparivāsassa
atk-s0101a0:341_1: lahukatāya pañcahākārehi āciṇṇavasitāya ca, tā ekakkhaṇe viya pavattanti. Tassā tassā
atk-s0101a0:342_0: Nīlarasmiatthāya hi bhagavā nīlakasiṇaṃ samāpajjati, pītarasmiatthāya pītakasiṇaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:342_2: āpokasiṇaṃ samāpajjati. Satthā caṅkamati, nimmito tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:342_3: vā kappetīti sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Ettha ekampi sīlassa kiccaṃ natthi, sabbaṃ samādhikiccameva.
atk-s0101a0:343_0: Yaṃ pana bhagavā kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūretvā,
atk-s0101a0:343_1: ekūnatiṃsavassakāle cakkavattisirīnivāsabhūtā bhavanā nikkhamma anomānadītīre pabbajitvā,
atk-s0101a0:343_2: chabbassāni padhānayogaṃ katvā, visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ uruvelagāme sujātāya dinnaṃ pakkhittadibbojaṃ
atk-s0101a0:343_3: madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā, sāyanhasamaye dakkhiṇuttarena bodhimaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā assatthadumarājānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:343_4: tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā, pubbuttarabhāge ṭhito tiṇasanthāraṃ santharitvā, tisandhipallaṅkaṃ
atk-s0101a0:343_5: ābhujitvā, caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ mettākammaṭṭhānaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā, vīriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:343_6: adhiṭṭhāya, cuddasahatthapallaṅkavaragato suvaṇṇapīṭhe ṭhapitaṃ rajatakkhandhaṃ viya
atk-s0101a0:343_7: paññāsahatthaṃ bodhikkhandhaṃ piṭṭhito katvā, upari maṇichattena viya bodhisākhāya
atk-s0101a0:343_8: dhāriyamāno, suvaṇṇavaṇṇe cīvare pavāḷasadisesu bodhiaṅkuresu patamānesu, sūriye
atk-s0101a0:343_9: atthaṃ upagacchante mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā, paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā, majjhimayāme
atk-s0101a0:343_10: dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā, paccūsakāle sabbabuddhānamāciṇṇe paccayākāre ñāṇaṃ otāretvā,
atk-s0101a0:343_11: ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā, tadeva pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā, maggapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0101a0:343_12: adhigatena catutthamaggena sabbakilese khepetvā sabbabuddhaguṇe paṭivijjhi, idamassa
atk-s0101a0:343_13: paññākiccaṃ. Evaṃ samādhi paññaṃ na pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0101a0:344_0: Tattha yathā hatthe udakaṃ pātiyaṃ udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti, pātiyaṃ udakaṃ ghaṭe udakaṃ
atk-s0101a0:344_1: na pāpuṇāti, ghaṭe udakaṃ kolambe udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti, kolambe udakaṃ cāṭiyaṃ udakaṃ
atk-s0101a0:344_2: na pāpuṇāti, cāṭiyaṃ udakaṃ mahākumbhiyaṃ udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti, mahākumbhiyaṃ udakaṃ
atk-s0101a0:344_3: kusobbhe udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti, kusobbhe udakaṃ kandare udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti, kandare
atk-s0101a0:344_4: udakaṃ kunnadiyaṃ udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti, kunnadiyaṃ udakaṃ pañcamahānadiyaṃ udakaṃ na
atk-s0101a0:344_5: pāpuṇāti, pañcamahānadiyaṃ udakaṃ cakkavāḷamahāsamudde udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti, cakkavāḷamahāsamudde
atk-s0101a0:344_6: udakaṃ sinerupādake mahāsamudde udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Pātiyaṃ udakaṃ upanidhāya hatthe
atk-s0101a0:344_7: udakaṃ parittaṃ…pe… sinerupādakamahāsamudde udakaṃ upanidhāya cakkavāḷamahāsamudde
atk-s0101a0:344_8: udakaṃ parittaṃ. Iti uparūpari udakaṃ bahukaṃ upādāya heṭṭhā heṭṭhā udakaṃ parittaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:345: Evameva upari upari guṇe upādāya heṭṭhā heṭṭhā sīlaṃ appamattakaṃ oramattakanti veditabbaṃ. Tenāha – “appamattakaṃ kho panetaṃ, bhikkhave, oramattakaṃ sīlamattaka”nti.
atk-s0101a0:349: Tattha yassa khandhadhātuāyatanādīsu uggahaparipucchāsavanadhāraṇapaccavekkhaṇāni natthi, ayaṃ andhaputhujjano. Yassa tāni atthi, so kalyāṇaputhujjano. Duvidhopi panesa –
atk-s0101a0:352: So hi puthūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kilesādīnaṃ jananādīhi kāraṇehi puthujjano. Yathāha –
atk-s0101a0:353_0: “Puthu kilese janentīti puthujjanā, puthu avihatasakkāyadiṭṭhikāti puthujjanā, puthu
atk-s0101a0:353_1: satthārānaṃ mukhullokikāti puthujjanā, puthu sabbagatīhi avuṭṭhitāti puthujjanā,
atk-s0101a0:353_2: puthu nānābhisaṅkhāre abhisaṅkharontīti puthujjanā, puthu nānāoghehi vuyhanti, puthu
atk-s0101a0:353_3: santāpehi santappanti, puthu pariḷāhehi pariḍayhanti, puthu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu rattā
atk-s0101a0:353_4: giddhā gathitā mucchitā ajjhopannā laggā laggitā palibuddhāti puthujjanā, puthu pañcahi
atk-s0101a0:353_5: nīvaraṇehi āvutā nivutā ovutā pihitā paṭicchannā paṭikujjitāti puthujjanā”ti. Puthūnaṃ
atk-s0101a0:353_7: puthujjano, puthuvāyaṃ visuṃyeva saṅkhyaṃ gato visaṃsaṭṭho sīlasutādiguṇayuttehi
atk-s0101a0:354_0: Tathāgatassāti aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato. Tathā āgatoti tathāgato, tathā
atk-s0101a0:354_1: gatoti tathāgato, tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti tathāgato, tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti
atk-s0101a0:354_2: tathāgato, tathadassitāya tathāgato, tathavāditāya tathāgato, tathākāritāya tathāgato,
atk-s0101a0:355_0: Kathaṃ bhagavā tathā āgatoti tathāgato? Yathā sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannā purimakā
atk-s0101a0:355_1: sammāsambuddhā āgatā, yathā vipassī bhagavā āgato, yathā sikhī bhagavā, yathā vessabhū
atk-s0101a0:355_2: bhagavā, yathā kakusandho bhagavā, yathā koṇāgamano bhagavā, yathā kassapo bhagavā
atk-s0101a0:355_3: āgato. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yena abhinīhārena ete bhagavanto āgatā, teneva amhākampi
atk-s0101a0:355_4: bhagavā āgato. Atha vā yathā vipassī bhagavā…pe… yathā kassapo bhagavā dānapāramiṃ
atk-s0101a0:355_6: imā dasa pāramiyo, dasa upapāramiyo, dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samatiṃsapāramiyo
atk-s0101a0:355_7: pūretvā aṅgapariccāgaṃ, nayanadhanarajjaputtadārapariccāganti ime pañca mahāpariccāge
atk-s0101a0:355_9: koṭiṃ patvā āgato; tathā amhākampi bhagavā āgato. Atha vā yathā vipassī bhagavā…pe…
atk-s0101a0:355_10: kassapo bhagavā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne, cattāro sammappadhāne, cattāro iddhipāde, pañcindriyāni,
atk-s0101a0:355_11: pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅge, ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvetvā brūhetvā āgato,
atk-s0101a0:355_12: tathā amhākampi bhagavā āgato. Evaṃ tathā āgatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0101a0:361: Kathaṃ tathā gatoti tathāgato? Yathā sampatijāto vipassī bhagavā gato…pe… kassapo bhagavā gato.
atk-s0101a0:362_0: Kathañca so bhagavā gato? So hi sampati jātova samehi pādehi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0101a0:362_1: uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gato. Yathāha – “sampatijāto kho, ānanda, bodhisatto
atk-s0101a0:362_2: samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahitvā uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gacchati, setamhi
atk-s0101a0:362_3: chatte anudhāriyamāne sabbā ca disā anuviloketi, āsabhiṃ vācaṃ bhāsati – ‘aggohamasmi
atk-s0101a0:362_4: lokassa, jeṭṭhohamasmi lokassa, seṭṭhohamasmi lokassa, ayamantimā jāti, natthidāni punabbhavo’ti”.
atk-s0101a0:363_0: Tañcassa gamanaṃ tathaṃ ahosi? Avitathaṃ anekesaṃ visesādhigamānaṃ pubbanimittabhāvena.
atk-s0101a0:363_1: Yañhi so sampatijātova samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahi. Idamassa caturiddhipādapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:366: “Suvaṇṇadaṇḍā vītipatanti cāmarā”ti, ettha vuttacāmarukkhepo pana sabbatitthiyanimmaddanassa.
atk-s0101a0:370: Tathā ayaṃ bhagavāpi gato, tañcassa gamanaṃ tathaṃ ahosi, avitathaṃ, tesaṃyeva visesādhigamānaṃ pubbanimittabhāvena.
atk-s0101a0:381_0: Atha vā yathā vipassī bhagavā…pe… yathā kassapo bhagavā, ayampi bhagavā tatheva nekkhammena
atk-s0101a0:381_1: kāmacchandaṃ pahāya gato, abyāpādena byāpādaṃ, ālokasaññāya thinamiddhaṃ, avikkhepena
atk-s0101a0:381_2: uddhaccakukkuccaṃ, dhammavavatthānena vicikicchaṃ pahāya ñāṇena avijjaṃ padāletvā,
atk-s0101a0:381_3: pāmojjena aratiṃ vinodetvā, paṭhamajjhānena nīvaraṇakavāṭaṃ ugghāṭetvā, dutiyajjhānena
atk-s0101a0:381_4: vitakkavicāraṃ vūpasametvā, tatiyajjhānena pītiṃ virājetvā, catutthajjhānena sukhadukkhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:382_0: Aniccānupassanāya niccasaññaṃ pahāya, dukkhānupassanāya sukhasaññaṃ, anattānupassanāya
atk-s0101a0:382_1: attasaññaṃ, nibbidānupassanāya nandiṃ, virāgānupassanāya rāgaṃ, nirodhānupassanāya
atk-s0101a0:382_2: samudayaṃ, paṭinissaggānupassanāya ādānaṃ, khayānupassanāya ghanasaññaṃ, vayānupassanāya
atk-s0101a0:382_3: āyūhanaṃ, vipariṇāmānupassanāya dhuvasaññaṃ, animittānupassanāya nimittaṃ, appaṇihitānupassanāya
atk-s0101a0:382_7: kilese bhañjitvā, sakadāgāmimaggena oḷārike kilese pahāya, anāgāmimaggena aṇusahagate
atk-s0101a0:382_8: kilese samugghāṭetvā, arahattamaggena sabbakilese samucchinditvā gato. Evampi tathā gatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0101a0:383_0: Kathaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti tathāgato?Pathavīdhātuyā kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇaṃ tathaṃ
atk-s0101a0:383_1: avitathaṃ. Āpodhātuyā paggharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Tejodhātuyā uṇhattalakkhaṇaṃ. Vāyodhātuyā
atk-s0101a0:384: Rūpassa ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ. Vedanāya vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ. Saññāya sañjānanalakkhaṇaṃ. Saṅkhārānaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Viññāṇassa vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:385: Vitakkassa abhiniropanalakkhaṇaṃ. Vicārassa anumajjanalakkhaṇaṃ pītiyā pharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Sukhassa sātalakkhaṇaṃ. Cittekaggatāya avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ. Phassassa phusanalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:386: Saddhindriyassa adhimokkhalakkhaṇaṃ. Vīriyindriyassa paggahalakkhaṇaṃ. Satindriyassa upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ. Samādhindriyassa avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ. Paññindriyassa pajānanalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:387: Saddhābalassa assaddhiye akampiyalakkhaṇaṃ. Vīriyabalassa kosajje, satibalassa muṭṭhassacce. Samādhibalassa uddhacce, paññābalassa avijjāya akampiyalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:389_2: Sammāvāyāmassa paggahalakkhaṇaṃ. Sammāsatiyā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ. Sammāsamādhissa avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:390_0: Avijjāya aññāṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Saṅkhārānaṃ cetanālakkhaṇaṃ. Viññāṇassa vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:390_1: Nāmassa namanalakkhaṇaṃ. Rūpassa ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ. Saḷāyatanassa āyatanalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:390_2: Phassassa phusanalakkhaṇaṃ. Vedanāya vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ. Taṇhāya hetulakkhaṇaṃ. Upādānassa
atk-s0101a0:390_3: gahaṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Bhavassa āyūhanalakkhaṇaṃ. Jātiyā nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ. Jarāya jīraṇalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:391_0: Dhātūnaṃ suññatālakkhaṇaṃ. Āyatanānaṃ āyatanalakkhaṇaṃ. Satipaṭṭhānānaṃ upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:391_1: Sammappadhānānaṃ padahanalakkhaṇaṃ. Iddhipādānaṃ ijjhanalakkhaṇaṃ. Indriyānaṃ adhipatilakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:391_2: Balānaṃ akampiyalakkhaṇaṃ. Bojjhaṅgānaṃ niyyānalakkhaṇaṃ. Maggassa hetulakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:392: Saccānaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ. Samathassa avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ. Vipassanāya anupassanālakkhaṇaṃ. Samathavipassanānaṃ ekarasalakkhaṇaṃ. Yuganaddhānaṃ anativattanalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:393: Sīlavisuddhiyā saṃvaralakkhaṇaṃ. Cittavisuddhiyā avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ. Diṭṭhivisuddhiyā dassanalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:394: Khaye ñāṇassa samucchedanalakkhaṇaṃ. Anuppāde ñāṇassa passaddhilakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:395_0: Chandassa mūlalakkhaṇaṃ. Manasikārassa samuṭṭhāpanalakkhaṇaṃ. Phassassa samodhānalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:395_1: Vedanāya samosaraṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Samādhissa pamukhalakkhaṇaṃ. Satiyā ādhipateyyalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:395_2: Paññāya tatuttariyalakkhaṇaṃ. Vimuttiyā sāralakkhaṇaṃ… amatogadhassa nibbānassa pariyosānalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:395_3: tathaṃ avitathaṃ. Evaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ ñāṇagatiyā āgato avirajjhitvā patto anuppattoti
atk-s0101a0:396_0: Kathaṃ tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato? Tathadhammā nāma cattāri
atk-s0101a0:396_1: ariyasaccāni. Yathāha – “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni.
atk-s0101a0:396_2: Katamāni cattāri? ‘Idaṃ dukkha’nti bhikkhave, tathametaṃ avitathametaṃ anaññathameta”nti
atk-s0101a0:396_3: vitthāro. Tāni ca bhagavā abhisambuddho, tasmā tathānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhisambuddhattā
atk-s0101a0:397_0: Api ca jarāmaraṇassa jātipaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho…pe…,
atk-s0101a0:397_1: saṅkhārānaṃ avijjāpaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho…pe…, tathā
atk-s0101a0:397_2: avijjāya saṅkhārānaṃ paccayaṭṭho, saṅkhārānaṃ viññāṇassa paccayaṭṭho…pe…, jātiyā
atk-s0101a0:397_3: jarāmaraṇassa paccayaṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho. Taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavā abhisambuddho,
atk-s0101a0:397_4: tasmāpi tathānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgatoti vuccati. Evaṃ tathadhamme
atk-s0101a0:398_0: Kathaṃ tathadassitāya tathāgato? Bhagavā yaṃ sadevake loke…pe…, sadevamanussāya pajāya
atk-s0101a0:398_1: aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthamāgacchantaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:398_2: nāma atthi, taṃ sabbākārato jānāti passati. Evaṃ jānatā passatā ca, tena taṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādivasena
atk-s0101a0:398_3: vā diṭṭhasutamutaviññātesu labbhamānakapadavasena vā. “Katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ?
atk-s0101a0:398_4: Yaṃ rūpaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya vaṇṇanibhā sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ nīlaṃ
atk-s0101a0:398_5: pītaka”ntiādinā nayena anekehi nāmehi terasahi vārehi dvepaññāsāya nayehi vibhajjamānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:398_6: tathameva hoti, vitathaṃ natthi. Esa nayo sotadvārādīsupi āpāthaṃ āgacchantesu saddādīsu.
atk-s0101a0:398_7: Vuttañcetaṃ bhagavatā – “yaṃ bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa…pe… sadevamanussāya pajāya
atk-s0101a0:398_8: diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā, tamahaṃ jānāmi.
atk-s0101a0:398_9: Tamahaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ, taṃ tathāgatassa viditaṃ, taṃ tathāgato na upaṭṭhāsī”ti. Evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:398_10: tathadassitāya tathāgato. Tattha tathadassī atthe tathāgatoti padasambhavo veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:399_0: Kathaṃ tathavāditāya tathāgato? Yaṃ rattiṃ bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe aparājitapallaṅke nisinno
atk-s0101a0:399_1: tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho, yañca rattiṃ
atk-s0101a0:399_2: yamakasālānamantare anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi, etthantare pañcacattālīsavassaparimāṇe
atk-s0101a0:399_3: kāle paṭhamabodhiyāpi majjhimabodhiyāpi pacchimabodhiyāpi yaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ
atk-s0101a0:399_4: – suttaṃ, geyyaṃ…pe… vedallaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ atthato ca byañjanato ca anupavajjaṃ, anūnamanadhikaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:399_5: sabbākāraparipuṇṇaṃ, rāgamadanimmadanaṃ, dosamohamadanimmadanaṃ. Natthi tattha vālaggamattampi
atk-s0101a0:399_6: avakkhalitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ ekamuddikāya lañchitaṃ viya, ekanāḷiyā mitaṃ viya, ekatulāya
atk-s0101a0:399_7: tulitaṃ viya ca, tathameva hoti avitathaṃ anaññathaṃ. Tenāha – “yañca, cunda, rattiṃ
atk-s0101a0:399_8: tathāgato anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhati, yañca rattiṃ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
atk-s0101a0:399_9: parinibbāyati, yaṃ etasmiṃ antare bhāsati lapati niddisati, sabbaṃ taṃ tatheva hoti,
atk-s0101a0:399_10: no aññathā. Tasmā ‘tathāgato’ti vuccatī”ti. Gadattho hettha gatasaddo. Evaṃ tathavāditāya tathāgato.
atk-s0101a0:400: Api ca āgadanaṃ āgado, vacananti attho. Tayo aviparīto āgado assāti, da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti evametasmiṃ atthe padasiddhi veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:401_0: Kathaṃ tathākāritāya tathāgato? Bhagavato hi vācāya kāyo anulometi, kāyassapi vācā,
atk-s0101a0:401_1: tasmā yathāvādī tathākārī, yathākārī tathāvādī ca hoti. Evaṃbhūtassa cassa yathāvācā,
atk-s0101a0:401_2: kāyopi tathā gato pavattoti attho. Yathā ca kāyo, vācāpi tathā gatā pavattāti tathāgato.
atk-s0101a0:401_3: Tenevāha – “yathāvādī, bhikkhave, tathāgato tathākārī, yathākārī tathāvādī. Iti yathāvādī
atk-s0101a0:401_4: tathākārī yathākārī tathāvādī. Tasmā ‘tathāgato’ti vuccatī”ti. Evaṃ tathākāritāya tathāgato.
atk-s0101a0:402_0: Kathaṃ abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgato? Upari bhavaggaṃ heṭṭhā avīciṃ pariyantaṃ katvā
atk-s0101a0:402_1: tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu sabbasatte abhibhavati sīlenapi samādhināpi paññāyapi
atk-s0101a0:402_2: vimuttiyāpi, vimuttiñāṇadassanenapi na tassa tulā vā pamāṇaṃ vā atthi; atulo appameyyo
atk-s0101a0:402_3: anuttaro rājātirājā devadevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā. Tenāha – “sadevake,
atk-s0101a0:402_4: bhikkhave, loke…pe… sadevamanussāya pajāya tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso
atk-s0101a0:403_0: Tatrevaṃ padasiddhi veditabbā. Agado viya agado. Ko panesa? Desanāvilāsamayo ceva
atk-s0101a0:403_1: puññussayo ca. Tena hesa mahānubhāvo bhisakko dibbāgadena sappe viya sabbaparappavādino
atk-s0101a0:403_2: sadevakañca lokaṃ abhibhavati. Iti sabbālokābhibhavane tatho aviparīto desanāvilāsamayo
atk-s0101a0:403_3: ceva puññussayo ca agado assāti. Da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:404: Api ca tathāya gatotipi tathāgato, tathaṃ gatotipi tathāgato. Gatoti avagato, atīto patto paṭipannoti attho.
atk-s0101a0:405_0: Tattha sakalalokaṃ tīraṇapariññāya tathāya gato avagatoti tathāgato. Lokasamudayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:405_1: pahānapariññāya tathāya gato atītoti tathāgato. Lokanirodhaṃ sacchikiriyāya tathāya
atk-s0101a0:405_2: gato pattoti tathāgato. Lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ tathaṃ gato paṭipannoti tathāgato.
atk-s0101a0:406_0: “Loko, bhikkhave, tathāgatena abhisambuddho, lokasmā tathāgato visaṃyutto. Lokasamudayo,
atk-s0101a0:406_1: bhikkhave, tathāgatena abhisambuddho, lokasamudayo tathāgatassa pahīno. Lokanirodho,
atk-s0101a0:406_2: bhikkhave, tathāgatena abhisambuddho, lokanirodho tathāgatassa sacchikato. Lokanirodhagāminī
atk-s0101a0:406_3: paṭipadā, bhikkhave, tathāgatena abhisambuddhā, lokanirodhagāminī paṭipadā tathāgatassa
atk-s0101a0:406_4: bhāvitā. Yaṃ bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa…pe… sabbaṃ taṃ tathāgatena abhisambuddhaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:407: Tassapi evaṃ attho veditabbo. Idampi ca tathāgatassa tathāgatabhāvadīpane mukhamattameva. Sabbākārena pana tathāgatova tathāgatassa tathāgatabhāvaṃ vaṇṇeyya.
atk-s0101a0:408_0: Katamañca taṃ bhikkhaveti yena appamattakena oramattakena sīlamattakena puthujjano
atk-s0101a0:408_1: tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno vadeyya, taṃ katamanti pucchati? Tattha pucchā nāma
atk-s0101a0:408_2: adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā, diṭṭhasaṃsandanā pucchā, vimaticchedanā pucchā, anumatipucchā,
atk-s0101a0:409_0: Tattha katamā adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā? Pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ aññātaṃ hoti, adiṭṭhaṃ atulitaṃ
atk-s0101a0:409_1: atīritaṃ avibhūtaṃ avibhāvitaṃ, tassa ñāṇāya dassanāya tulanāya tīraṇāya vibhāvanāya
atk-s0101a0:410_0: Katamā diṭṭhasaṃsandanā pucchā? Pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ ñātaṃ hoti, diṭṭhaṃ tulitaṃ tīritaṃ
atk-s0101a0:410_1: vibhūtaṃ vibhāvitaṃ, tassa aññehi paṇḍitehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati,
atk-s0101a0:411_0: Katamā vimaticchedanā pucchā? Pakatiyā saṃsayapakkhando hoti, vimatipakkhando, dveḷhakajāto,
atk-s0101a0:411_1: “evaṃ nu kho, na nu kho, kinnu kho, kathaṃ nu kho”ti. So vimaticchedanatthāya pañhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:412_0: Katamā anumatipucchā? Bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ anumatiyā pañhaṃ pucchati – “taṃ kiṃ maññatha,
atk-s0101a0:412_1: bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti. Aniccaṃ, bhante. Yaṃ panāniccaṃ, dukkhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:412_2: vā taṃ sukhaṃ vāti? Dukkhaṃ bhanteti sabbaṃ vattabbaṃ, ayaṃ anumatipucchā.
atk-s0101a0:413_0: Katamā kathetukamyatā pucchā? Bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ kathetukamyatāya pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0101a0:413_1: Cattārome, bhikkhave, satipaṭṭhānā. Katame cattāro?…Pe… aṭṭhime bhikkhave maggaṅgā.
atk-s0101a0:414_0: Iti imāsu pañcasu pucchāsu adiṭṭhassa tāva kassaci dhammassa abhāvato tathāgatassa
atk-s0101a0:414_1: adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā natthi. “Idaṃ nāma aññehi paṇḍitehi samaṇabrāhmaṇehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0101a0:414_2: saṃsanditvā desessāmī”ti samannāhārasseva anuppajjanato diṭṭhasaṃsandanā pucchāpi
atk-s0101a0:414_3: natthi. Yasmā pana buddhānaṃ ekadhammepi āsappanā parisappanā natthi, bodhimaṇḍeyeva
atk-s0101a0:414_4: sabbā kaṅkhā chinnā; tasmā vimaticchedanā pucchāpi natthiyeva. Avasesā pana dve pucchā
atk-s0101a0:414_5: buddhānaṃ atthi, tāsu ayaṃ kathetukamyatā pucchā nāma.
atk-s0101a0:415: 8. Idāni taṃ kathetukamyatāya pucchāya pucchitamatthaṃ kathetuṃ “pāṇātipātaṃ pahāyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:416_0: Tattha pāṇassa atipāto pāṇātipāto, pāṇavadho, pāṇaghātoti vuttaṃ hoti. Pāṇoti cettha
atk-s0101a0:416_1: vohārato satto, paramatthato jīvitindriyaṃ, tasmiṃ pana pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā
atk-s0101a0:416_2: kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārappavattā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto. So guṇavirahitesu
atk-s0101a0:416_3: tiracchānagatādīsu pāṇesu khuddake pāṇe appasāvajjo, mahāsarīre mahāsāvajjo, kasmā?
atk-s0101a0:416_4: Payogamahantatāya. Payogasamattepi vatthumahantatāya. Guṇavantesu manussādīsu appaguṇe
atk-s0101a0:416_5: pāṇe appasāvajjo, mahāguṇe mahāsāvajjo. Sarīraguṇānaṃ pana samabhāve sati kilesānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:416_6: upakkamānañca mudutāya appasāvajjo, tibbatāya mahāsāvajjoti veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:417_0: Tassa pañca sambhārā honti – pāṇo, pāṇasaññitā, vadhakacittaṃ, upakkamo, tena maraṇanti.
atk-s0101a0:417_1: Cha payogā – sāhatthiko, āṇattiko, nissaggiyo, thāvaro, vijjāmayo, iddhimayoti. Imasmiṃ
atk-s0101a0:417_2: panatthe vitthāriyamāne ativiya papañco hoti, tasmā taṃ na vitthārayāma, aññañca
atk-s0101a0:417_3: evarūpaṃ. Atthikehi pana samantapāsādikaṃ vinayaṭṭhakathaṃ oloketvā gahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:418_0: Pahāyāti imaṃ pāṇātipātacetanāsaṅkhātaṃ dussīlyaṃ pajahitvā. Paṭiviratoti pahīnakālato
atk-s0101a0:418_1: paṭṭhāya tato dussīlyato orato viratova. Natthi tassa vītikkamissāmīti cakkhusotaviññeyyā
atk-s0101a0:418_2: dhammā pageva kāyikāti imināva nayena aññesupi evarūpesu padesu attho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:419_0: Samaṇoti bhagavā samitapāpatāya laddhavohāro. Gotamoti gottavasena. Na kevalañca
atk-s0101a0:419_1: bhagavāyeva pāṇātipātā paṭivirato, bhikkhusaṅghopi paṭivirato, desanā pana ādito
atk-s0101a0:419_2: paṭṭhāya evaṃ āgatā, atthaṃ pana dīpentena bhikkhusaṅghavasenāpi dīpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:420_0: Nihitadaṇḍo nihitasatthoti parūpaghātatthāya daṇḍaṃ vā satthaṃ vā ādāya avattanato
atk-s0101a0:420_1: nikkhittadaṇḍo ceva nikkhittasattho cāti attho. Ettha ca ṭhapetvā daṇḍaṃ sabbampi
atk-s0101a0:420_2: avasesaṃ upakaraṇaṃ sattānaṃ viheṭhanabhāvato satthanti veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ pana bhikkhū
atk-s0101a0:420_3: kattaradaṇḍaṃ vā dantakaṭṭhaṃ vā vāsiṃ pipphalikaṃ vā gahetvā vicaranti, na taṃ parūpaghātatthāya.
atk-s0101a0:420_4: Tasmā nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho tveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0101a0:421_0: Lajjīti pāpajigucchanalakkhaṇāya lajjāya samannāgato. Dayāpannoti dayaṃ mettacittataṃ
atk-s0101a0:421_1: āpanno. Sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampīti; sabbe pāṇabhūte hitena anukampako. Tāya dayāpannatāya
atk-s0101a0:421_2: sabbesaṃ pāṇabhūtānaṃ hitacittakoti attho. Viharatīti iriyati yapeti yāpeti pāleti.
atk-s0101a0:421_3: Iti vā hi, bhikkhaveti evaṃ vā bhikkhave. Vā saddo upari “adinnādānaṃ pahāyā”tiādīni
atk-s0101a0:421_4: apekkhitvā vikappattho vutto, evaṃ sabbattha purimaṃ vā pacchimaṃ vā apekkhitvā vikappabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:422_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepo – bhikkhave, puthujjano tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:422_1: vadeyya – “samaṇo gotamo pāṇaṃ na hanati, na ghāteti, na tattha samanuñño hoti, virato
atk-s0101a0:422_2: imasmā dussīlyā; aho, vata re buddhaguṇā mahantā”ti, iti mahantaṃ ussāhaṃ katvā vaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:422_3: vattukāmopi appamattakaṃ oramattakaṃ ācārasīlamattakameva vakkhati. Upari asādhāraṇabhāvaṃ
atk-s0101a0:422_4: nissāya vaṇṇaṃ vattuṃ na sakkhissati. Na kevalañca puthujjanova sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmiarahantopi
atk-s0101a0:422_5: paccekabuddhāpi na sakkontiyeva; tathāgatoyeva pana sakkoti, taṃ vo upari vakkhāmīti,
atk-s0101a0:422_6: ayamettha sādhippāyā atthavaṇṇanā. Ito paraṃ pana apubbapadameva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0101a0:423_0: Adinnādānaṃ pahāyāti ettha adinnassa ādānaṃ adinnādānaṃ, parasaṃharaṇaṃ, theyyaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:423_1: corikāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha adinnanti parapariggahitaṃ, yattha paro yathākāmakāritaṃ
atk-s0101a0:423_2: āpajjanto adaṇḍāraho anupavajjo ca hoti. Tasmiṃ parapariggahite parapariggahitasaññino,
atk-s0101a0:423_3: tadādāyakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā theyyacetanā adinnādānaṃ. Taṃ hīne parasantake appasāvajjaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:423_4: paṇīte mahāsāvajjaṃ, kasmā? Vatthupaṇītatāya. Vatthusamatte sati guṇādhikānaṃ santake
atk-s0101a0:423_5: vatthusmiṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ. Taṃ taṃ guṇādhikaṃ upādāya tato tato hīnaguṇassa santake
atk-s0101a0:424_0: Tassa pañca sambhārā honti – parapariggahitaṃ, parapariggahitasaññitā, theyyacittaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:424_1: upakkamo, tena haraṇanti. Cha payogā – sāhatthikādayova. Te ca kho yathānurūpaṃ theyyāvahāro,
atk-s0101a0:424_2: pasayhāvahāro, paṭicchannāvahāro, parikappāvahāro, kusāvahāroti imesaṃ avahārānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:424_3: vasena pavattā, ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ vutto.
atk-s0101a0:425_0: Dinnameva ādiyatīti dinnādāyī. Cittenapi dinnameva paṭikaṅkhatīti dinnapāṭikaṅkhī.
atk-s0101a0:425_1: Thenetīti theno. Na thenena athenena. Athenattāyeva sucibhūtena. Attanāti attabhāvena.
atk-s0101a0:425_2: Athenaṃ sucibhūtaṃ attānaṃ katvā viharatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sesaṃ paṭhamasikkhāpade
atk-s0101a0:425_3: vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ. Yathā ca idha, evaṃ sabbattha.
atk-s0101a0:426_0: Abrahmacariyanti aseṭṭhacariyaṃ. Brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ ācāraṃ caratīti brahmacārī. Ārācārīti
atk-s0101a0:426_1: abrahmacariyato dūracārī. Methunāti rāgapariyuṭṭhānavasena sadisattā methunakāti
atk-s0101a0:426_2: laddhavohārehi paṭisevitabbato methunāti saṅkhyaṃ gatā asaddhammā. Gāmadhammāti gāmavāsīnaṃ dhammā.
atk-s0101a0:427_0: 9. Musāvādaṃ pahāyāti ettha musāti visaṃvādanapurekkhārassa atthabhañjanako vacīpayogo
atk-s0101a0:427_1: kāyapayogo, vā visaṃvādanādhippāyena panassa paravisaṃvādakakāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo.
atk-s0101a0:428_0: Aparo nayo, ‘musā’ti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ vatthu. ‘Vādo’ti tassa bhūtato tacchato viññāpanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:428_1: Lakkhaṇato pana atathaṃ vatthuṃ tathato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathāviññattisamuṭṭhāpikā
atk-s0101a0:428_2: cetanā musāvādo. So yamatthaṃ bhañjati, tassa appatāya appasāvajjo, mahantatāya mahāsāvajjo.
atk-s0101a0:429_0: Api ca gahaṭṭhānaṃ attano santakaṃ adātukāmatāya natthītiādinayappavatto appasāvajjo,
atk-s0101a0:429_1: sakkhinā hutvā atthabhañjanatthaṃ vutto mahāsāvajjo, pabbajitānaṃ appakampi telaṃ
atk-s0101a0:429_2: vā sappiṃ vā labhitvā hasādhippāyena – “ajja gāme telaṃ nadī maññe sandatī”ti pūraṇakathānayena
atk-s0101a0:429_3: pavatto appasāvajjo, adiṭṭhaṃyeva pana diṭṭhantiādinā nayena vadantānaṃ mahāsāvajjo.
atk-s0101a0:430_0: Tassa cattāro sambhārā honti – atathaṃ vatthu, visaṃvādanacittaṃ, tajjo vāyāmo, parassa
atk-s0101a0:430_1: tadatthavijānananti. Eko payogo sāhatthikova. So kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā vācāya
atk-s0101a0:430_2: vā paravisaṃvādanakiriyākaraṇena daṭṭhabbo. Tāya ce kiriyāya paro tamatthaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0101a0:431_0: Yasmā pana yathā kāyakāyapaṭibaddhavācāhi paraṃ visaṃvādeti, tathā “idamassa bhaṇāhī”ti
atk-s0101a0:431_1: āṇāpentopi paṇṇaṃ likhitvā purato nissajjantopi, “ayamattho evaṃ daṭṭhabbo”ti kuḍḍādīsu
atk-s0101a0:431_2: likhitvā ṭhapentopi. Tasmā ettha āṇattikanissaggiyathāvarāpi payogā yujjanti, aṭṭhakathāsu
atk-s0101a0:432_0: Saccaṃ vadatīti saccavādī. Saccena saccaṃ sandahati ghaṭetīti saccasandho. Na antarantarā
atk-s0101a0:432_1: musā vadatīti attho. Yo hi puriso kadāci musā vadati, kadāci saccaṃ, tassa musāvādena
atk-s0101a0:432_2: antaritattā saccaṃ saccena na ghaṭīyati; tasmā so na saccasandho. Ayaṃ pana na tādiso,
atk-s0101a0:432_3: jīvitahetupi musā avatvā saccena saccaṃ sandahati yevāti saccasandho.
atk-s0101a0:433_0: Thetoti thiro thirakathoti attho. Eko hi puggalo haliddirāgo viya, thusarāsimhi nikhātakhāṇu
atk-s0101a0:433_1: viya, assapiṭṭhe ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍamiva ca na thirakatho hoti, eko pāsāṇalekhā viya,
atk-s0101a0:433_2: indakhīlo viya ca thirakatho hoti, asinā sīsaṃ chindantepi dve kathā na katheti, ayaṃ vuccati theto.
atk-s0101a0:434_0: Paccayikoti pattiyāyitabbako, saddhāyitabbakoti attho. Ekacco hi puggalo na paccayiko
atk-s0101a0:434_1: hoti, “idaṃ kena vuttaṃ, asukenā”ti vutte “mā tassa vacanaṃ saddahathā”ti vattabbataṃ
atk-s0101a0:434_2: āpajjati. Eko paccayiko hoti, “idaṃ kena vuttaṃ, asukenā”ti vutte “yadi tena vuttaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:434_3: idameva pamāṇaṃ, idāni upaparikkhitabbaṃ natthi, evameva ida”nti vattabbataṃ āpajjati,
atk-s0101a0:434_4: ayaṃ vuccati paccayiko. Avisaṃvādako lokassāti tāya saccavāditāya lokaṃ na visaṃvādetīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:435: Pisuṇaṃ vācaṃ pahāyātiādīsu yāya vācāya yassa taṃ vācaṃ bhāsati, tassa hadaye attano piyabhāvaṃ, parassa ca suññabhāvaṃ karoti, sā pisuṇā vācā.
atk-s0101a0:436: Yāya pana attānampi parampi pharusaṃ karoti, yā vācā sayampi pharusā, neva kaṇṇasukhā na hadayaṅgamā, ayaṃ pharusā vācā.
atk-s0101a0:437: Yena samphaṃ palapati niratthakaṃ, so samphappalāpo.
atk-s0101a0:438: Tesaṃ mūlabhūtā cetanāpi pisuṇavācādināmeva labhati, sā eva ca idhādhippetāti.
atk-s0101a0:439_0: Tattha saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa paresaṃ vā bhedāya attano piyakamyatāya vā kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā
atk-s0101a0:439_1: cetanā pisuṇavācā. Sā yassa bhedaṃ karoti, tassa appaguṇatāya appasāvajjā, mahāguṇatāya mahāsāvajjā.
atk-s0101a0:440_0: Tassā cattāro sambhārā – bhinditabbo paro, “iti ime nānā bhavissanti, vinā bhavissantī”ti
atk-s0101a0:440_1: bhedapurekkhāratā vā, “iti ahaṃ piyo bhavissāmi vissāsiko”ti piyakamyatā vā, tajjo
atk-s0101a0:440_2: vāyāmo, tassa tadatthavijānananti. Imesaṃ bhedāyāti, yesaṃ itoti vuttānaṃ santike
atk-s0101a0:441_0: Bhinnānaṃ vā sandhātāti dvinnaṃ mittānaṃ vā samānupajjhāyakādīnaṃ vā kenacideva kāraṇena
atk-s0101a0:441_1: bhinnānaṃ ekamekaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “tumhākaṃ īdise kule jātānaṃ evaṃ bahussutānaṃ idaṃ
atk-s0101a0:441_2: na yutta”ntiādīni vatvā sandhānaṃ kattā anukattā. Anuppadātāti sandhānānuppadātā.
atk-s0101a0:441_3: Dve jane samagge disvā – “tumhākaṃ evarūpe kule jātānaṃ evarūpehi guṇehi samannāgatānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:441_4: anucchavikameta”ntiādīni vatvā daḷhīkammaṃ kattāti attho. Samaggo ārāmo assāti samaggārāmo.
atk-s0101a0:441_5: Yattha samaggā natthi, tattha vasitumpi na icchatīti attho. Samaggarāmotipi pāḷi,
atk-s0101a0:441_6: ayamevettha attho. Samaggaratoti samaggesu rato, te pahāya aññattha gantumpi na icchatīti
atk-s0101a0:441_7: attho. Samagge disvāpi sutvāpi nandatīti samagganandī, samaggakaraṇiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāti
atk-s0101a0:441_8: yā vācā satte samaggeyeva karoti, taṃ sāmaggiguṇaparidīpikameva vācaṃ bhāsati, na itaranti.
atk-s0101a0:442_1: Tassā āvibhāvatthamidaṃ vatthu – eko kira dārako mātuvacanaṃ anādiyitvā araññaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0101a0:442_2: taṃ mātā nivattetumasakkontī – “caṇḍā taṃ mahiṃsī anubandhatū”ti akkosi. Athassa
atk-s0101a0:442_3: tatheva araññe mahiṃsī uṭṭhāsi. Dārako “yaṃ mama mātā mukhena kathesi, taṃ mā hotu,
atk-s0101a0:442_4: yaṃ cittena cintesi taṃ hotū”ti, saccakiriyamakāsi. Mahiṃsī tattheva baddhā viya
atk-s0101a0:442_5: aṭṭhāsi. Evaṃ mammacchedakopi payogo cittasaṇhatāya na pharusā vācā hoti. Mātāpitaro
atk-s0101a0:442_6: hi kadāci puttake evaṃ vadanti – “corā vo khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ karontū”ti, uppalapattampi
atk-s0101a0:442_7: ca nesaṃ upari patantaṃ na icchanti. Ācariyupajjhāyā ca kadāci nissitake evaṃ vadanti
atk-s0101a0:442_8: – “kiṃ ime ahirīkā anottappino caranti, niddhamatha ne”ti, atha ca nesaṃ āgamādhigamasampattiṃ
atk-s0101a0:442_9: icchanti. Yathā ca cittasaṇhatāya pharusā vācā na hoti, evaṃ vacanasaṇhatāya apharusā
atk-s0101a0:442_10: vācā na hoti. Na hi mārāpetukāmassa – “imaṃ sukhaṃ sayāpethā”ti vacanaṃ apharusā
atk-s0101a0:442_11: vācā hoti, cittapharusatāya panesā pharusā vācāva. Sā yaṃ sandhāya pavattitā, tassa
atk-s0101a0:442_12: appaguṇatāya appasāvajjā, mahāguṇatāya mahāsāvajjā. Tassā tayo sambhārā – akkositabbo
atk-s0101a0:443_0: Nelāti elaṃ vuccati doso, nāssā elanti nelā, niddosāti attho. “Nelaṅgo setapacchādo”ti,
atk-s0101a0:443_1: ettha vuttanelaṃ viya. Kaṇṇasukhāti byañjanamadhuratāya kaṇṇānaṃ sukhā, sūcivijjhanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:443_2: viya kaṇṇasūlaṃ na janeti. Atthamadhuratāya sakalasarīre kopaṃ ajanetvā pemaṃ janetīti
atk-s0101a0:443_3: pemanīyā. Hadayaṃ gacchati, appaṭihaññamānā sukhena cittaṃ pavisatīti hadayaṅgamā.
atk-s0101a0:443_4: Guṇaparipuṇṇatāya pure bhavāti porī pure saṃvaḍḍhanārī viya sukumārātipi porī. Purassa
atk-s0101a0:443_5: esātipi porī. Nagaravāsīnaṃ kathāti attho. Nagaravāsino hi yuttakathā honti. Pitimattaṃ
atk-s0101a0:443_6: pitāti vadanti, bhātimattaṃ bhātāti vadanti, mātimattaṃ mātāti vadanti. Evarūpī kathā
atk-s0101a0:443_7: bahuno janassa kantā hotīti bahujanakantā. Kantabhāveneva bahuno janassa manāpā cittavuḍḍhikarāti bahujanamanāpā.
atk-s0101a0:444_0: Anatthaviññāpikā kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā akusalacetanā samphappalāpo. So āsevanamandatāya
atk-s0101a0:444_1: appasāvajjo, āsevanamahantatāya mahāsāvajjo, tassa dve sambhārā – bhāratayuddhasītāharaṇādiniratthakakathāpurekkhāratā,
atk-s0101a0:445_0: Kālena vadatīti kālavādī vattabbayuttakālaṃ sallakkhetvā vadatīti attho. Bhūtaṃ tathaṃ
atk-s0101a0:445_2: katvā vadatīti atthavādī. Navalokuttaradhammasannissitaṃ katvā vadatīti dhammavādī
atk-s0101a0:446_0: Nidhānaṃ vuccati ṭhapanokāso, nidhānamassā atthīti nidhānavatī. Hadaye nidhātabbayuttakaṃ
atk-s0101a0:446_1: vācaṃ bhāsitāti attho. Kālenāti evarūpiṃ bhāsamānopi ca – “ahaṃ nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ
atk-s0101a0:446_2: bhāsissāmī”ti na akālena bhāsati, yuttakālaṃ pana apekkhitvāva bhāsatīti attho. Sāpadesanti
atk-s0101a0:446_3: saupamaṃ, sakāraṇanti attho. Pariyantavatinti paricchedaṃ dassetvā yathāssā paricchedo
atk-s0101a0:446_4: paññāyati, evaṃ bhāsatīti attho. Atthasaṃhitanti anekehipi nayehi vibhajantena pariyādātuṃ
atk-s0101a0:446_5: asakkuṇeyyatāya atthasampannaṃ bhāsati. Yaṃ vā so atthavādī atthaṃ vadati, tena atthena
atk-s0101a0:446_6: sahitattā atthasaṃhitaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati, na aññaṃ nikkhipitvā aññaṃ bhāsatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:447_0: 10. Bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhāti mūlabījaṃ khandhabījaṃ phaḷubījaṃ aggabījaṃ bījabījanti
atk-s0101a0:447_1: pañcavidhassa bījagāmassa ceva, yassa kassaci nīlatiṇarukkhādikassa bhūtagāmassa
atk-s0101a0:447_2: ca samārambhā, chedanabhedanapacanādibhāvena vikopanā paṭiviratoti attho.
atk-s0101a0:448_0: Ekabhattikoti pātarāsabhattaṃ sāyamāsabhattanti dve bhattāni, tesu pātarāsabhattaṃ
atk-s0101a0:448_1: antomajjhanhikena paricchinnaṃ, itaraṃ majjhanhikato uddhaṃ anto aruṇena. Tasmā antomajjhanhike
atk-s0101a0:448_2: dasakkhattuṃ bhuñjamānopi ekabhattikova hoti. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “ekabhattiko”ti.
atk-s0101a0:449_0: Rattiyā bhojanaṃ ratti, tato uparatoti rattūparato. Atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā
atk-s0101a0:449_1: bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ nāma. Tato viratattā virato vikālabhojanā. Kadā virato? Anomānadītīre
atk-s0101a0:450_0: Sāsanassa ananulomattā visūkaṃ paṭāṇībhūtaṃ dassananti visūkadassanaṃ. Attanā naccananaccāpanādivasena
atk-s0101a0:450_1: naccā ca gītā ca vāditā ca antamaso mayūranaccādivasenapi pavattānaṃ naccādīnaṃ visūkabhūtā
atk-s0101a0:450_2: dassanā cāti naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā. Naccādīni hi attanā payojetuṃ vā parehi
atk-s0101a0:450_3: payojāpetuṃ vā payuttāni passituṃ vā neva bhikkhūnaṃ na bhikkhunīnañca vaṭṭanti.
atk-s0101a0:451_0: Mālādīsu mālāti yaṃ kiñci pupphaṃ. Gandhanti yaṃ kiñci gandhajātaṃ. Vilepananti chavirāgakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:451_1: Tattha piḷandhanto dhāreti nāma, ūnaṭṭhānaṃ pūrento maṇḍeti nāma, gandhavasena chavirāgavasena
atk-s0101a0:451_2: ca sādiyanto vibhūseti nāma. Ṭhānaṃ vuccati kāraṇaṃ. Tasmā yāya dussīlyacetanāya
atk-s0101a0:451_3: tāni mālādhāraṇādīni mahājano karoti, tato paṭiviratoti attho.
atk-s0101a0:452: Uccāsayanaṃ vuccati pamāṇātikkantaṃ. Mahāsayananti akappiyapaccattharaṇaṃ. Tato viratoti attho.
atk-s0101a0:453_0: Jātarūpanti suvaṇṇaṃ. Rajatanti kahāpaṇo, lohamāsako, jatumāsako, dārumāsakoti ye
atk-s0101a0:453_1: vohāraṃ gacchanti. Tassa ubhayassāpi paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato, neva naṃ uggaṇhāti,
atk-s0101a0:453_2: na uggaṇhāpeti, na upanikkhittaṃ sādiyatīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:454_1: āmakadhaññassa paṭiggahaṇā. Na kevalañca etesaṃ paṭiggahaṇameva, āmasanampi bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0101a0:454_2: na vaṭṭatiyeva. Āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha aññatra odissa anuññātā āmakamaṃsamacchānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:454_3: paṭiggahaṇameva bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭati, no āmasanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:455: Itthikumārikapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha itthīti purisantaragatā, itarā kumārikā nāma, tāsaṃ paṭiggahaṇampi āmasanampi akappiyameva.
atk-s0101a0:456: Dāsidāsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha dāsidāsavaseneva tesaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati. “Kappiyakārakaṃ dammi, ārāmikaṃ dammī”ti evaṃ vutte pana vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:457_1: Tattha khettaṃ nāma yasmiṃ pubbaṇṇaṃ ruhati. Vatthu nāma yasmiṃ aparaṇṇaṃ ruhati.
atk-s0101a0:457_2: Yattha vā ubhayampi ruhati, taṃ khettaṃ. Tadatthāya akatabhūmibhāgo vatthu. Khettavatthusīsena
atk-s0101a0:458_0: Dūteyyaṃ vuccati dūtakammaṃ, gihīnaṃ pahitaṃ paṇṇaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā gahetvā tattha
atk-s0101a0:458_1: tattha gamanaṃ. Pahiṇagamanaṃ vuccati gharā gharaṃ pesitassa khuddakagamanaṃ. Anuyogo
atk-s0101a0:458_2: nāma tadubhayakaraṇaṃ. Tasmā dūteyyapahiṇagamanānaṃ anuyogāti. Evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:459_0: Kayavikkayāti kayā ca vikkayā ca. Tulākūṭādīsu kūṭanti vañcanaṃ. Tattha tulākūṭaṃ
atk-s0101a0:459_1: nāma rūpakūṭaṃ aṅgakūṭaṃ, gahaṇakūṭaṃ, paṭicchannakūṭanti catubbidhaṃ hoti. Tattha
atk-s0101a0:459_2: rūpakūṭaṃ nāma dve tulā samarūpā katvā gaṇhanto mahatiyā gaṇhāti, dadanto khuddikāya
atk-s0101a0:459_3: deti. Aṅgakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto pacchābhāge hatthena tulaṃ akkamati, dadanto pubbabhāge.
atk-s0101a0:459_4: Gahaṇakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto mūle rajjuṃ gaṇhāti, dadanto agge. Paṭicchannakūṭaṃ nāma
atk-s0101a0:459_5: tulaṃ susiraṃ katvā anto ayacuṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā gaṇhanto taṃ pacchābhāge karoti, dadanto aggabhāge.
atk-s0101a0:460_0: Kaṃso vuccati suvaṇṇapāti, tāya vañcanaṃ kaṃsakūṭaṃ. Kathaṃ? Ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ katvā
atk-s0101a0:460_1: aññā dve tisso lohapātiyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇe karoti, tato janapadaṃ gantvā kiñcideva aḍḍhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:460_2: kulaṃ pavisitvā – “suvaṇṇabhājanāni kiṇathā”ti vatvā agghe pucchite samagghataraṃ
atk-s0101a0:460_3: dātukāmā honti. Tato tehi – “kathaṃ imesaṃ suvaṇṇabhāvo jānitabbo”ti vutte, “vīmaṃsitvā
atk-s0101a0:460_4: gaṇhathā”ti suvaṇṇapātiṃ pāsāṇe ghaṃsitvā sabbā pātiyo datvā gacchati.
atk-s0101a0:461_0: Mānakūṭaṃ nāma hadayabhedasikhābhedarajjubhedavasena tividhaṃ hoti. Tattha hadayabhedo
atk-s0101a0:461_1: sappitelādiminanakāle labbhati. Tāni hi gaṇhanto heṭṭhāchiddena mānena – “saṇikaṃ
atk-s0101a0:461_2: āsiñcā”ti vatvā antobhājane bahuṃ paggharāpetvā gaṇhāti, dadanto chiddaṃ pidhāya
atk-s0101a0:462: Sikhābhedo tilataṇḍulādiminanakāle labbhati. Tāni hi gaṇhanto saṇikaṃ sikhaṃ ussāpetvā gaṇhāti, dadanto vegena pūretvā sikhaṃ chindanto deti.
atk-s0101a0:463: Rajjubhedo khettavatthuminanakāle labbhati. Lañjaṃ alabhantā hi khettaṃ amahantampi mahantaṃ katvā minanti.
atk-s0101a0:464_0: Ukkoṭanādīsu ukkoṭananti assāmike sāmike kātuṃ lañjaggahaṇaṃ. Vañcananti tehi tehi
atk-s0101a0:464_1: upāyehi paresaṃ vañcanaṃ. Tatridamekaṃ vatthu – eko kira luddako migañca migapotakañca
atk-s0101a0:464_2: gahetvā āgacchati, tameko dhutto – “kiṃ bho, migo agghati, kiṃ migapotako”ti āha.
atk-s0101a0:464_3: “Migo dve kahāpaṇe, migapotako eka”nti ca vutte ekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ datvā migapotakaṃ
atk-s0101a0:464_4: gahetvā thokaṃ gantvā nivatto – “na me bho, migapotakena attho, migaṃ me dehī”ti
atk-s0101a0:464_5: āha. Tena hi – dve kahāpaṇe dehīti. So āha – “nanu te bho, mayā paṭhamaṃ eko kahāpaṇo
atk-s0101a0:464_6: dinno”ti? “Āma, dinno”ti. “Idaṃ migapotakaṃ gaṇha, evaṃ so ca kahāpaṇo, ayañca kahāpaṇagghanako
atk-s0101a0:464_7: migapotakoti dve kahāpaṇā bhavissantī”ti. So “kāraṇaṃ vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā migapotakaṃ
atk-s0101a0:464_8: gahetvā migaṃ adāsīti. Nikatīti yogavasena vā māyāvasena vā apāmaṅgaṃ pāmaṅganti,
atk-s0101a0:464_9: amaṇiṃ maṇinti, asuvaṇṇaṃ suvaṇṇanti katvā patirūpakena vañcanaṃ. Sāciyogoti kuṭilayogo,
atk-s0101a0:464_10: etesaṃyeva ukkoṭanādīnametaṃ nāmaṃ. Tasmā – ukkoṭanasāciyogo, vañcanasāciyogo, nikatisāciyogoti,
atk-s0101a0:464_11: evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Keci aññaṃ dassetvā aññassa parivattanaṃ sāciyogoti vadanti.
atk-s0101a0:465_0: Chedanādīsu chedananti hatthacchedanādi. Vadhoti māraṇaṃ. Bandhoti rajjubandhanādīhi
atk-s0101a0:465_1: bandhanaṃ. Viparāmosoti himaviparāmoso, gumbaviparāmosoti duvidho. Yaṃ himapātasamaye
atk-s0101a0:465_2: himena paṭicchannā hutvā maggappaṭipannaṃ janaṃ musanti, ayaṃ himaviparāmoso. Yaṃ
atk-s0101a0:465_3: gumbādīhi paṭicchannā musanti, ayaṃ gumbaviparāmoso. Ālopo vuccati gāmanigamādīnaṃ
atk-s0101a0:465_4: vilopakaraṇaṃ. Sahasākāroti sāhasikakiriyā. Gehaṃ pavisitvā manussānaṃ ure satthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:465_5: ṭhapetvā icchitabhaṇḍānaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Evametasmā chedana…pe… sahasākārā paṭivirato samaṇo
atk-s0101a0:465_6: gotamoti. Iti vā hi, bhikkhave, puthujjano tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno vadeyyāti.
atk-s0101a0:468_0: 11. Idāni majjhimasīlaṃ vitthārento “yathā vā paneke bhonto”tiādimāha. Tatrāyaṃ anuttānapadavaṇṇanā.
atk-s0101a0:468_1: Saddhādeyyānīti kammañca phalañca idhalokañca paralokañca saddahitvā dinnāni. ‘Ayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:468_2: me ñātī’ti vā, ‘mitto’ti vā, idaṃ paṭikarissati, idaṃ vā tena katapubbanti vā, evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:468_3: na dinnānīti attho. Evaṃ dinnāni hi na saddhādeyyāni nāma honti. Bhojanānīti desanāsīsamattametaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:468_4: atthato pana saddhādeyyāni bhojanāni bhuñjitvā cīvarāni pārupitvā senāsanāni sevamānā
atk-s0101a0:469_0: Seyyathidanti nipāto. Tassattho katamo so bījagāmabhūtagāmo, yassa samārambhaṃ anuyuttā
atk-s0101a0:469_1: viharantīti. Tato taṃ dassento mūlabījantiādimāha. Tattha mūlabījaṃ nāma haliddi,
atk-s0101a0:469_2: siṅgiveraṃ, vacā, vacattaṃ, ativisā, kaṭukarohiṇī, usīraṃ, bhaddamuttakanti evamādi.
atk-s0101a0:469_3: Khandhabījaṃ nāma assattho, nigrodho, pilakkho, udumbaro, kacchako, kapitthanoti
atk-s0101a0:469_4: evamādi. Phaḷubījaṃ nāma ucchu, naḷo, veḷūti evamādi. Aggabījaṃ nāma ajjakaṃ, phaṇijjakaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:469_5: hiriveranti evamādi. Bījabījaṃ nāma pubbaṇṇaṃ aparaṇṇanti evamādi. Sabbañhetaṃ rukkhato
atk-s0101a0:469_6: viyojitaṃ viruhanasamatthameva “bījagāmo”ti vuccati. Rukkhato pana aviyojitaṃ asukkhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:470_0: 12. Sannidhikāraparibhoganti sannidhikatassa paribhogaṃ. Tattha duvidhā kathā, vinayavasena
atk-s0101a0:470_1: ca sallekhavasena ca. Vinayavasena tāva yaṃ kiñci annaṃ ajja paṭiggahitaṃ aparajju
atk-s0101a0:470_2: sannidhikārakaṃ hoti, tassa paribhoge pācittiyaṃ. Attanā laddhaṃ pana sāmaṇerānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:470_3: datvā, tehi laddhaṃ ṭhapāpetvā dutiyadivase bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, sallekho pana na hoti.
atk-s0101a0:471: Pānasannidhimhipi eseva nayo. Tattha pānaṃ nāma ambapānādīni aṭṭha pānāni, yāni ca tesaṃ anulomāni. Tesaṃ vinicchayo samantapāsādikāyaṃ vutto.
atk-s0101a0:472_0: Vatthasannidhimhi anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappitaṃ sannidhi ca hoti, sallekhañca kopeti,
atk-s0101a0:472_1: ayaṃ pariyāyakathā. Nippariyāyato pana ticīvarasantuṭṭhena bhavitabbaṃ, catutthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:472_2: labhitvā aññassa dātabbaṃ. Sace yassa kassaci dātuṃ na sakkoti, yassa pana dātukāmo
atk-s0101a0:472_3: hoti, so uddesatthāya vā paripucchatthāya vā gato, āgatamatte dātabbaṃ, adātuṃ na
atk-s0101a0:472_4: vaṭṭati. Cīvare pana appahonte satiyā paccāsāya anuññātakālaṃ ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sūcisuttacīvarakārakānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:472_5: alābhena tato parampi vinayakammaṃ katvā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. “Imasmiṃ jiṇṇe puna īdisaṃ
atk-s0101a0:472_6: kuto labhissāmī”ti pana ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati, sannidhi ca hoti, sallekhañca kopeti.
atk-s0101a0:473_0: Yānasannidhimhi yānaṃ nāma vayhaṃ, ratho, sakaṭaṃ, sandamānikā, sivikā, pāṭaṅkīti;
atk-s0101a0:473_1: netaṃ pabbajitassa yānaṃ. Upāhanā pana pabbajitassa yānaṃyeva. Ekabhikkhussa hi eko
atk-s0101a0:473_2: araññatthāya, eko dhotapādakatthāyāti, ukkaṃsato dve upāhanasaṅghāṭā vaṭṭanti. Tatiyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:473_3: labhitvā aññassa dātabbo. “Imasmiṃ jiṇṇe aññaṃ kuto labhissāmī”ti hi ṭhapetuṃ na
atk-s0101a0:473_4: vaṭṭati, sannidhi ca hoti, sallekhañca kopeti.
atk-s0101a0:474_0: Sayanasannidhimhi sayananti mañco. Ekassa bhikkhuno eko gabbhe, eko divāṭhāneti ukkaṃsato
atk-s0101a0:474_1: dve mañcā vaṭṭanti. Tato uttari labhitvā aññassa bhikkhuno vā gaṇassa vā dātabbo;
atk-s0101a0:474_2: adātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sannidhi ca hoti, sallekhañca kopeti.
atk-s0101a0:475_0: Gandhasannidhimhi bhikkhuno kaṇḍukacchuchavidosādiābādhe sati gandhā vaṭṭanti. Te
atk-s0101a0:475_1: gandhe āharāpetvā tasmiṃ roge vūpasante aññesaṃ vā ābādhikānaṃ dātabbā, dvāre pañcaṅguligharadhūpanādīsu
atk-s0101a0:475_2: vā upanetabbā. “Puna roge sati bhavissantī”ti pana ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati, sannidhi
atk-s0101a0:476_0: Āmisanti vuttāvasesaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ, idhekacco bhikkhu – “tathārūpe kāle
atk-s0101a0:476_2: āharāpetvā ṭhapeti. So vassakāle kālasseva sāmaṇerehi yāguṃ pacāpetvā paribhuñjitvā
atk-s0101a0:476_3: “sāmaṇera, udakakaddame dukkhaṃ gāmaṃ pavisituṃ, gaccha asukaṃ kulaṃ gantvā mayhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:476_4: vihāre nisinnabhāvaṃ ārocehi; asukakulato dadhiādīni āharā”ti peseti. Bhikkhūhi –
atk-s0101a0:476_5: “kiṃ, bhante, gāmaṃ pavisissathā”ti vuttepi, “duppaveso, āvuso, idāni gāmo”ti vadati.
atk-s0101a0:476_6: Te – “hotu, bhante, acchatha tumhe, mayaṃ bhikkhaṃ pariyesitvā āharissāmā”ti gacchanti.
atk-s0101a0:476_7: Atha sāmaṇeropi dadhiādīni āharitvā bhattañca byañjanañca sampādetvā upaneti, taṃ
atk-s0101a0:476_8: bhuñjantasseva upaṭṭhākā bhattaṃ pahiṇanti, tatopi manāpaṃ manāpaṃ bhuñjati. Atha
atk-s0101a0:476_9: bhikkhū piṇḍapātaṃ gahetvā āgacchanti, tatopi manāpaṃ manāpaṃ gīvāyāmakaṃ bhuñjatiyeva.
atk-s0101a0:476_10: Evaṃ catumāsampi vītināmeti. Ayaṃ vuccati – “bhikkhu muṇḍakuṭumbikajīvikaṃ jīvati,
atk-s0101a0:476_11: na samaṇajīvika”nti. Evarūpo āmisasannidhi nāma hoti.
atk-s0101a0:477_0: Bhikkhuno pana vasanaṭṭhāne ekā taṇḍulanāḷi, eko guḷapiṇḍo, catubhāgamattaṃ sappīti
atk-s0101a0:477_1: ettakaṃ nidhetuṃ vaṭṭati, akāle sampattacorānaṃ atthāya. Te hi ettakampi āmisapaṭisanthāraṃ
atk-s0101a0:477_2: alabhantā jīvitāpi voropeyyuṃ, tasmā sace ettakaṃ natthi, āharāpetvāpi ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:477_3: Aphāsukakāle ca yadettha kappiyaṃ, taṃ attanāpi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Kappiyakuṭiyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:477_4: pana bahuṃ ṭhapentassāpi sannidhi nāma natthi. Tathāgatassa pana taṇḍulanāḷiādīsu
atk-s0101a0:477_5: vā yaṃ kiñci caturatanamattaṃ vā pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ “idaṃ me ajja vā sve vā bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0101a0:478_0: 13. Visūkadassanesu naccaṃ nāma yaṃ kiñci naccaṃ, taṃ maggaṃ gacchantenāpi gīvaṃ
atk-s0101a0:478_1: pasāretvā daṭṭhuṃ na vaṭṭati. Vitthāravinicchayo panettha samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttanayeneva
atk-s0101a0:478_2: veditabbo. Yathā cettha, evaṃ sabbesu sikkhāpadapaṭisaṃyuttesu suttapadesu. Ito parañhi
atk-s0101a0:478_3: ettakampi avatvā tattha tattha payojanamattameva vaṇṇayissāmāti.
atk-s0101a0:479_0: Pekkhanti naṭasamajjaṃ. Akkhānanti bhāratayujjhanādikaṃ. Yasmiṃ ṭhāne kathīyati,
atk-s0101a0:479_1: tattha gantumpi na vaṭṭati. Pāṇissaranti kaṃsatāḷaṃ, pāṇitāḷantipi vadanti. Vetāḷanti
atk-s0101a0:479_2: ghanatāḷaṃ, mantena matasarīruṭṭhāpanantipi eke. Kumbhathūṇanti caturassaambaṇakatāḷaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:479_3: kumbhasaddantipi eke. Sobhanakanti naṭānaṃ abbhokkiraṇaṃ, sobhanakaraṃ vā, paṭibhānacittanti
atk-s0101a0:479_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Caṇḍālanti ayoguḷakīḷā, caṇḍālānaṃ sāṇadhovanakīḷātipi vadanti. Vaṃsanti
atk-s0101a0:480_0: Dhovananti aṭṭhidhovanaṃ, ekaccesu kira janapadesu kālaṅkate ñātake na jhāpenti,
atk-s0101a0:480_1: nikhaṇitvā ṭhapenti. Atha nesaṃ pūtibhūtaṃ kāyaṃ ñatvā nīharitvā aṭṭhīni dhovitvā
atk-s0101a0:480_2: gandhehi makkhetvā ṭhapenti. Te nakkhattakāle ekasmiṃ ṭhāne aṭṭhīni ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ
atk-s0101a0:480_3: ṭhāne surādīni ṭhapetvā rodantā paridevantā suraṃ pivanti. Vuttampi cetaṃ – “atthi,
atk-s0101a0:480_4: bhikkhave, dakkhiṇesu janapadesu aṭṭhidhovanaṃ nāma, tattha hoti annampi pānampi
atk-s0101a0:480_5: khajjampi bhojjampi leyyampi peyyampi naccampi gītampi vāditampi. Atthetaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0101a0:480_6: dhovanaṃ, netaṃ natthīti vadāmī”ti. Ekacce pana indajālena aṭṭhidhovanaṃ dhovanantipi vadanti.
atk-s0101a0:481_0: Hatthiyuddhādīsu bhikkhuno neva hatthiādīhi saddhiṃ yujjhituṃ, na te yujjhāpetuṃ,
atk-s0101a0:481_1: na yujjhante daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭati. Nibbuddhanti mallayuddhaṃ. Uyyodhikanti yattha sampahāro
atk-s0101a0:481_2: dissati. Balagganti balagaṇanaṭṭhānaṃ. Senābyūhanti senāniveso, sakaṭabyūhādivasena
atk-s0101a0:481_3: senāya nivesanaṃ. Anīkadassananti – “tayo hatthī pacchimaṃ hatthānīka”ntiādinā nayena
atk-s0101a0:482_0: 14. Pamādo ettha tiṭṭhatīti pamādaṭṭhānaṃ. Jūtañca taṃ pamādaṭṭhānañcāti jūtappamādaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:482_1: Ekekāya pantiyā aṭṭha aṭṭha padāni assāti aṭṭhapadaṃ dasapadepi eseva nayo. Ākāsanti
atk-s0101a0:482_2: aṭṭhapadadasapadesu viya ākāseyeva kīḷanaṃ. Parihārapathanti bhūmiyaṃ nānāpathamaṇḍalaṃ
atk-s0101a0:482_3: katvā tattha tattha pariharitabbaṃ, pathaṃ pariharantānaṃ kīḷanaṃ. Santikanti santikakīḷanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:482_4: Ekajjhaṃ ṭhapitā sāriyo vā sakkharāyo vā acālentā nakheneva apanenti ca upanenti
atk-s0101a0:482_5: ca, sace tattha kāci calati, parājayo hoti, evarūpāya kīḷāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Khalikanti
atk-s0101a0:482_6: jūtaphalake pāsakakīḷanaṃ. Ghaṭikā vuccati dīghadaṇḍakena rassadaṇḍakaṃ paharaṇakīḷanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:482_7: Salākahatthanti lākhāya vā mañjiṭṭhikāya vā piṭṭhodakena vā salākahatthaṃ temetvā
atk-s0101a0:482_8: – “kiṃ hotū”ti bhūmiyaṃ vā bhittiyaṃ vā taṃ paharitvā hatthiassādirūpadassanakīḷanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:482_9: Akkhanti guḷakīḷā. Paṅgacīraṃ vuccati paṇṇanāḷikaṃ, taṃ dhamantā kīḷanti. Vaṅkakanti
atk-s0101a0:482_10: gāmadārakānaṃ kīḷanakaṃ khuddakanaṅgalaṃ. Mokkhacikā vuccati samparivattanakīḷā,
atk-s0101a0:482_11: ākāse vā daṇḍakaṃ gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ vā sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā heṭṭhupariyabhāvena parivattanakīḷāti
atk-s0101a0:482_12: vuttaṃ hoti. Ciṅgulikaṃ vuccati tālapaṇṇādīhi kataṃ vātappahārena paribbhamanacakkaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:482_13: Pattāḷhakaṃ vuccati paṇṇanāḷikā. Tāya vālukādīni minantā kīḷanti. Rathakanti khuddakarathaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:482_14: Dhanukanti khuddakadhanumeva. Akkharikā vuccati ākāse vā piṭṭhiyaṃ vā akkharajānanakīḷā.
atk-s0101a0:482_15: Manesikā nāma manasā cintitajānanakīḷā. Yathāvajjaṃ nāma kāṇakuṇikhujjādīnaṃ yaṃ
atk-s0101a0:482_16: yaṃ vajjaṃ, taṃ taṃ payojetvā dassanakīḷā.
atk-s0101a0:483_0: 15. Āsandinti pamāṇātikkantāsanaṃ. Anuyuttā viharantīti idaṃ apekkhitvā pana sabbapadesu
atk-s0101a0:483_1: upayogavacanaṃ kataṃ. Pallaṅkoti pādesu vāḷarūpāni ṭhapetvā kato. Gonakoti dīghalomako
atk-s0101a0:483_2: mahākojavo, caturaṅgulādhikāni kira tassa lomāni. Cittakanti vānavicittaṃ uṇṇāmayattharaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:483_3: Paṭikāti uṇṇāmayo setattharaṇo. Paṭalikāti ghanapupphako uṇṇāmayattharaṇo. Yo āmalakapattotipi
atk-s0101a0:483_4: vuccati. Tūlikāti tiṇṇaṃ tūlānaṃ aññatarapuṇṇā tūlikā. Vikatikāti sīhabyagghādirūpavicitro
atk-s0101a0:483_9: vinaye vuttaṃ. Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “ṭhapetvā tūlikaṃ sabbāneva gonakādīni
atk-s0101a0:484_0: Kuttakanti soḷasannaṃ nāṭakitthīnaṃ ṭhatvā naccanayoggaṃ uṇṇāmayattharaṇaṃ. Hatthattharaṃ
atk-s0101a0:484_1: assattharanti hatthiassapiṭṭhīsu attharaṇaattharakāyeva. Rathattharepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0101a0:484_2: Ajinappaveṇīti ajinacammehi mañcappamāṇena sibbitvā katā paveṇī. Kadalīmigapavarapaccattharaṇanti
atk-s0101a0:484_3: kadalīmigacammaṃ nāma atthi, tena kataṃ pavarapaccattharaṇaṃ; uttamapaccattharaṇanti
atk-s0101a0:484_4: attho. Taṃ kira setavatthassa upari kadalīmigacammaṃ pattharitvā sibbetvā karonti.
atk-s0101a0:484_5: Sauttaracchadanti saha uttaracchadena, uparibaddhena rattavitānena saddhinti attho.
atk-s0101a0:484_6: Setavitānampi heṭṭhā akappiyapaccattharaṇe sati na vaṭṭati, asati pana vaṭṭati. Ubhatolohitakūpadhānanti
atk-s0101a0:484_7: sīsūpadhānañca pādūpadhānañcāti mañcassa ubhatolohitakaṃ upadhānaṃ, etaṃ na kappati.
atk-s0101a0:484_8: Yaṃ pana ekameva upadhānaṃ ubhosu passesu rattaṃ vā hoti padumavaṇṇaṃ vā vicitraṃ
atk-s0101a0:484_9: vā, sace pamāṇayuttaṃ, vaṭṭati. Mahāupadhānaṃ pana paṭikkhittaṃ. Alohitakāni dvepi
atk-s0101a0:484_10: vaṭṭantiyeva. Tato uttari labhitvā aññesaṃ dātabbāni. Dātuṃ asakkonto mañce tiriyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:484_11: attharitvā upari paccattharaṇaṃ datvā nipajjitumpi labhati. Āsandīādīsu pana vuttanayeneva
atk-s0101a0:484_12: paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, āsandiyā pāde chinditvā paribhuñjituṃ,
atk-s0101a0:484_13: pallaṅkassa vāḷe bhinditvā paribhuñjituṃ, tūlikaṃ vijaṭetvā bimbohanaṃ kātuṃ, avasesaṃ
atk-s0101a0:485_1: nassati, tesaṃ sarīraduggandhaharaṇatthāya gandhacuṇṇādīhi ucchādenti, evarūpaṃ ucchādanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:485_2: na vaṭṭati. Puññavante pana dārake ūrūsu nipajjāpetvā telena makkhetvā hatthapādaūrunābhiādīnaṃ
atk-s0101a0:485_3: saṇṭhānasampādanatthaṃ parimaddanti, evarūpaṃ parimaddanaṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:486_0: Nhāpananti tesaṃyeva dārakānaṃ gandhādīhi nhāpanaṃ. Sambāhananti mahāmallānaṃ viya
atk-s0101a0:486_1: hatthapāde muggarādīhi paharitvā bāhuvaḍḍhanaṃ. Ādāsanti yaṃ kiñci ādāsaṃ pariharituṃ
atk-s0101a0:486_2: na vaṭṭati. Añjananti alaṅkārañjanameva. Mālāti baddhamālā vā abaddhamālā vā. Vilepananti
atk-s0101a0:486_3: yaṃ kiñci chavirāgakaraṇaṃ. Mukhacuṇṇaṃ mukhalepananti mukhe kāḷapīḷakādīnaṃ haraṇatthāya
atk-s0101a0:486_4: mattikakakkaṃ denti, tena lohite calite sāsapakakkaṃ denti, tena dose khādite tilakakkaṃ
atk-s0101a0:486_5: denti, tena lohite sannisinne haliddikakkaṃ denti, tena chavivaṇṇe ārūḷhe mukhacuṇṇakena
atk-s0101a0:486_6: mukhaṃ cuṇṇenti, taṃ sabbaṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:487_0: Hatthabandhādīsu hatthe vicitrasaṅkhakapālādīni bandhitvā vicaranti, taṃ vā aññaṃ
atk-s0101a0:487_1: vā sabbampi hatthābharaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati, apare sikhaṃ bandhitvā vicaranti. Suvaṇṇacīrakamuttalatādīhi
atk-s0101a0:487_2: ca taṃ parikkhipanti; taṃ sabbaṃ na vaṭṭati. Apare catuhatthadaṇḍaṃ vā aññaṃ vā pana
atk-s0101a0:487_3: alaṅkatadaṇḍakaṃ gahetvā vicaranti, tathā itthipurisarūpādivicittaṃ bhesajjanāḷikaṃ
atk-s0101a0:487_4: suparikkhittaṃ vāmapasse olaggitaṃ; apare kaṇṇikaratanaparikkhittakosaṃ atitikhiṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:487_6: morapiñchādiparikkhittā upāhanā, keci ratanamattāyāmaṃ caturaṅgulavitthataṃ kesantaparicchedaṃ
atk-s0101a0:487_7: dassetvā meghamukhe vijjulataṃ viya nalāṭe uṇhīsapaṭṭaṃ bandhanti, cūḷāmaṇiṃ dhārenti,
atk-s0101a0:487_8: cāmaravālabījaniṃ dhārenti, taṃ sabbaṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:488_0: 17. Aniyyānikattā saggamokkhamaggānaṃ tiracchānabhūtā kathāti tiracchānakathā. Tattha
atk-s0101a0:488_1: rājānaṃ ārabbha mahāsammato mandhātā dhammāsoko evaṃ mahānubhāvotiādinā nayena pavattā
atk-s0101a0:488_2: kathā rājakathā. Esa nayo corakathādīsu. Tesu asuko rājā abhirūpo dassanīyotiādinā
atk-s0101a0:488_3: nayena gehassitakathāva tiracchānakathā hoti. Sopi nāma evaṃ mahānubhāvo khayaṃ gatoti
atk-s0101a0:488_4: evaṃ pavattā pana kammaṭṭhānabhāve tiṭṭhati. Coresu mūladevo evaṃ mahānubhāvo, meghamālo
atk-s0101a0:488_5: evaṃ mahānubhāvoti tesaṃ kammaṃ paṭicca aho sūrāti gehassitakathāva tiracchānakathā.
atk-s0101a0:488_6: Yuddhepi bhāratayuddhādīsu asukena asuko evaṃ mārito, evaṃ viddhoti kāmassādavaseneva
atk-s0101a0:488_7: kathā tiracchānakathā. Tepi nāma khayaṃ gatāti evaṃ pavattā pana sabbattha kammaṭṭhānameva
atk-s0101a0:488_8: hoti. Api ca annādīsu evaṃ vaṇṇavantaṃ gandhavantaṃ rasavantaṃ phassasampannaṃ khādimha
atk-s0101a0:488_9: bhuñjimhāti kāmassādavasena kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sātthakaṃ pana katvā pubbe evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:488_10: vaṇṇādisampannaṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ sayanaṃ mālaṃ gandhaṃ sīlavantānaṃ adamha, cetiye
atk-s0101a0:488_11: pūjaṃ karimhāti kathetuṃ vaṭṭati. Ñātikathādīsu pana “amhākaṃ ñātakā sūrā samatthā”ti
atk-s0101a0:488_12: vā “pubbe mayaṃ evaṃ vicitrehi yānehi vicarimhā”ti vā assādavasena vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:488_13: Sātthakaṃ pana katvā “tepi no ñātakā khayaṃ gatā”ti vā “pubbe mayaṃ evarūpā upāhanā
atk-s0101a0:488_14: saṅghassa adamhā”ti vā kathetuṃ vaṭṭati. Gāmakathāpi suniviṭṭhadunniviṭṭhasubhikkhadubbhikkhādivasena
atk-s0101a0:488_15: vā “asukagāmavāsino sūrā samatthā”ti vā evaṃ assādavasena na vaṭṭati. Sātthakaṃ pana
atk-s0101a0:488_16: katvā “saddhā pasannā”ti vā “khayavayaṃ gatā”ti vā vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Nigamanagarajanapadakathādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0101a0:489_0: Itthikathāpi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīni paṭicca assādavasena na vaṭṭati, saddhā pasannā khayavayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:489_1: gatāti evameva vaṭṭati. Sūrakathāpi ‘nandimitto nāma yodho sūro ahosī’ti assādavasena
atk-s0101a0:489_2: na vaṭṭati. Saddho ahosi khayaṃ gatoti evameva vaṭṭati. Visikhākathāpi “asukā visikhā
atk-s0101a0:489_3: suniviṭṭhā dunniviṭṭhā sūrā samatthā”ti assādavasena na vaṭṭati. Saddhā pasannā khayavayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:490_1: vā, sāpi “pāsādikā naccituṃ gāyituṃ chekā”ti assādavasena na vaṭṭati; saddhā pasannātiādinā
atk-s0101a0:490_2: nayeneva vaṭṭati. Pubbapetakathāti atītañātikathā. Tattha vattamānañātikathāsadiso vinicchayo.
atk-s0101a0:491_0: Nānattakathāti purimapacchimakathāhi vimuttā avasesā nānāsabhāvā niratthakakathā.
atk-s0101a0:491_1: Lokakkhāyikāti ayaṃ loko kena nimmito, asukena nāma nimmito. Kāko seto, aṭṭhīnaṃ
atk-s0101a0:491_2: setattā; balākā rattā. Lohitassa rattattāti evamādikā lokāyatavitaṇḍasallāpakathā.
atk-s0101a0:492_0: Samuddakkhāyikā nāma kasmā samuddo sāgaro? Sāgaradevena khato, tasmā sāgaro. Khato
atk-s0101a0:492_1: meti hatthamuddāya sayaṃ niveditattā “samuddo”ti evamādikā niratthakā samuddakkhāyanakathā.
atk-s0101a0:492_2: Bhavoti vuḍḍhi. Abhavoti hāni. Iti bhavo, iti abhavoti yaṃ vā taṃ vā niratthakakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:493_0: 18. Viggāhikakathāti viggahakathā, sārambhakathā. Tattha sahitaṃ meti mayhaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:493_1: sahitaṃ siliṭṭhaṃ atthayuttaṃ kāraṇayuttanti attho. Asahitaṃ teti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:493_2: asahitaṃ asiliṭṭhaṃ. Adhiciṇṇaṃ te viparāvattanti yaṃ tuyhaṃ dīgharattāciṇṇavasena
atk-s0101a0:493_3: suppaguṇaṃ, taṃ mayhaṃ ekavacaneneva viparāvattaṃ parivattitvā ṭhitaṃ, na kiñci jānāsīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:494_0: Āropito te vādoti mayā tava doso āropito. Cara vādappamokkhāyāti dosamocanatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:494_1: cara, vicara; tattha tattha gantvā sikkhāti attho. Nibbeṭhehi vā sace pahosīti atha
atk-s0101a0:495_0: 19. Dūteyyakathāyaṃ idha gacchāti ito asukaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ gaccha. Amutrāgacchāti tato
atk-s0101a0:495_1: asukaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ āgaccha. Idaṃ harāti ito idaṃ nāma hara. Amutra idaṃ āharāti asukaṭṭhānato
atk-s0101a0:495_2: idaṃ nāma idha āhara. Saṅkhepato pana idaṃ dūteyyaṃ nāma ṭhapetvā pañca sahadhammike
atk-s0101a0:495_3: ratanattayassa upakārapaṭisaṃyuttañca gihīsāsanaṃ aññesaṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:496_0: 20. Kuhakātiādīsu tividhena kuhanavatthunā lokaṃ kuhayanti, vimhāpayantīti kuhakā.
atk-s0101a0:496_1: Lābhasakkāratthikā hutvā lapantīti lapakā. Nimittaṃ sīlametesanti nemittikā. Nippeso
atk-s0101a0:496_2: sīlametesanti nippesikā. Lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanti magganti pariyesantīti lābhena
atk-s0101a0:496_3: lābhaṃ nijigīsitāro. Kuhanā, lapanā, nemittikatā, nippesikatā, lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanatāti
atk-s0101a0:496_4: etāhi samannāgatānaṃ puggalānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthārena
atk-s0101a0:496_5: panetā kuhanādikā visuddhimagge sīlaniddeseyeva pāḷiñca aṭṭhakathañca āharitvā pakāsitāti.
atk-s0101a0:499_0: 21. Ito paraṃ mahāsīlaṃ hoti. Aṅganti hatthapādādīsu yena kenaci evarūpena aṅgena
atk-s0101a0:499_1: samannāgato dīghāyu yasavā hotītiādinayappavattaṃ aṅgasatthaṃ. Nimittanti nimittasatthaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:499_2: Paṇḍurājā kira tisso muttāyo muṭṭhiyaṃ katvā nemittikaṃ pucchi – “kiṃ me hatthe”ti?
atk-s0101a0:499_3: So ito cito ca vilokesi, tasmiñca samaye gharagolikāya makkhikā gayhantī muttā, so
atk-s0101a0:499_4: “muttā”ti āha. Puna “katī”ti puṭṭho kukkuṭassa tikkhattuṃ ravantassa saddaṃ sutvā
atk-s0101a0:499_5: “tisso”ti āha. Evaṃ taṃ taṃ ādisitvā nimittamanuyuttā viharanti.
atk-s0101a0:500_0: Uppātanti asanipātādīnaṃ mahantānaṃ uppatitaṃ, tañhi disvā “idaṃ bhavissati, evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:500_1: bhavissatī”ti ādisanti. Supinanti yo pubbaṇhasamaye supinaṃ passati, evaṃ vipāko
atk-s0101a0:500_2: hoti; yo idaṃ nāma passati, tassa idaṃ nāma hotītiādinā nayena supinakaṃ anuyuttā
atk-s0101a0:500_3: viharanti. Lakkhaṇanti iminā lakkhaṇena samannāgato rājā hoti, iminā uparājātiādikaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:500_4: Mūsikacchinnanti undūrakhāyitaṃ. Tenāpi hi ahate vā vatthe anahate vā vatthe ito
atk-s0101a0:500_5: paṭṭhāya evaṃ chinne idaṃ nāma hotīti ādisanti. Aggihomanti evarūpena dārunā evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:500_6: hute idaṃ nāma hotīti aggijuhanaṃ. Dabbihomādīnipi aggihomāneva, evarūpāya dabbiyā
atk-s0101a0:500_7: īdisehi kaṇādīhi hute idaṃ nāma hotīti evaṃ pavattivasena pana visuṃ vuttāni.
atk-s0101a0:501_0: Tattha kaṇoti kuṇḍako. Taṇḍulāti sāliādīnañceva tiṇajātīnañca taṇḍulā. Sappīti gosappiādikaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:501_1: Telanti tilatelādikaṃ. Sāsapādīni pana mukhena gahetvā aggimhi pakkhipanaṃ, vijjaṃ
atk-s0101a0:501_2: parijappitvā juhanaṃ vā mukhahomaṃ. Dakkhiṇakkhakajaṇṇulohitādīhi juhanaṃ lohitahomaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:501_3: Aṅgavijjāti pubbe aṅgameva disvā byākaraṇavasena aṅgaṃ vuttaṃ, idha aṅgulaṭṭhiṃ disvā
atk-s0101a0:501_4: vijjaṃ parijappitvā ayaṃ kulaputto vā no vā, sirīsampanno vā no vātiādibyākaraṇavasena
atk-s0101a0:501_6: Mattikādivisesaṃ disvāpi hi vijjaṃ parijappitvā heṭṭhā pathaviyaṃ tiṃsaratanamatte,
atk-s0101a0:501_7: ākāse ca asītiratanamatte padese guṇadosaṃ passanti. Khattavijjāti abbheyyamāsurakkharājasatthādisatthaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:501_8: Sivavijjāti susāne pavisitvā santikaraṇavijjā, siṅgālarutavijjātipi vadanti. Bhūtavijjāti
atk-s0101a0:501_9: bhūtavejjamanto. Bhūrivijjāti bhūrighare vasantena uggahetabbamanto. Ahivijjāti sappadaṭṭhatikicchanavijjā
atk-s0101a0:501_10: ceva sappāvhāyanavijjā ca. Visavijjāti yāya, purāṇavisaṃ vā rakkhanti, navavisaṃ
atk-s0101a0:501_11: vā karonti visavantameva vā. Vicchikavijjāti vicchikadaṭṭhatikicchanavijjā. Mūsikavijjāyapi
atk-s0101a0:501_13: sakuṇañāṇaṃ. Vāyasavijjāti kākarutañāṇaṃ, taṃ visuññeva satthaṃ, tasmā visuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:502_0: Pakkajjhānanti paripākagatacintā. Idāni “ayaṃ ettakaṃ jīvissati, ayaṃ ettaka”nti
atk-s0101a0:502_1: evaṃ pavattaṃ ādiṭṭhañāṇanti attho. Saraparittāṇanti sararakkhaṇaṃ, yathā attano
atk-s0101a0:502_2: upari na āgacchati, evaṃ karaṇavijjā. Migacakkanti idaṃ sabbasaṅgāhikaṃ sabbasakuṇacatuppadānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:503_0: 22. Maṇilakkhaṇādīsu evarūpo maṇi pasattho, evarūpo apasattho, sāmino ārogyaissariyādīnaṃ
atk-s0101a0:503_1: hetu hoti, na hotīti, evaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena maṇiādīnaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ anuyuttā viharantīti
atk-s0101a0:503_2: attho. Tattha āvudhanti ṭhapetvā asiādīni avasesaṃ āvudhaṃ. Itthilakkhaṇādīnipi yamhi
atk-s0101a0:503_3: kule te itthipurisādayo vasanti, tassa vuḍḍhihānivaseneva veditabbāni. Ajalakkhaṇādīsu
atk-s0101a0:503_4: pana evarūpānaṃ ajādīnaṃ maṃsaṃ khāditabbaṃ, evarūpānaṃ na khāditabbanti ayaṃ viseso veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:504_0: Api cettha godhāya lakkhaṇe cittakammapiḷandhanādīsupi evarūpāya godhāya sati idaṃ
atk-s0101a0:504_1: nāma hotīti ayaṃ viseso veditabbo. Idañcettha vatthu – ekasmiṃ kira vihāre cittakamme
atk-s0101a0:504_2: godhaṃ aggiṃ dhamamānaṃ akaṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya bhikkhūnaṃ mahāvivādo jāto. Eko āgantukabhikkhu
atk-s0101a0:504_3: taṃ disvā makkhesi. Tato paṭṭhāya vivādo mandībhūto hoti. Kaṇṇikalakkhaṇaṃ piḷandhanakaṇṇikāyapi
atk-s0101a0:504_4: gehakaṇṇikāyapi vasena veditabbaṃ. Kacchapalakkhaṇaṃ godhālakkhaṇasadisameva. Migalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:505_0: 23. Raññaṃ niyyānaṃ bhavissatīti asukadivase asukanakkhattena asukassa nāma rañño
atk-s0101a0:505_1: niggamanaṃ bhavissatīti evaṃ rājūnaṃ pavāsagamanaṃ byākaroti. Esa nayo sabbattha.
atk-s0101a0:505_2: Kevalaṃ panettha aniyyānanti vippavutthānaṃ puna āgamanaṃ. Abbhantarānaṃ raññaṃ upayānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:505_3: bhavissati, bāhirānaṃ raññaṃ apayānanti antonagare amhākaṃ rājā paṭiviruddhaṃ bahirājānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:505_4: upasaṅkamissati, tato tassa paṭikkamanaṃ bhavissatīti evaṃ raññaṃ upayānāpayānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:505_5: byākaroti. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. Jayaparājayā pākaṭāyeva.
atk-s0101a0:506_0: 24. Candaggāhādayo asukadivase rāhu candaṃ gahessatīti byākaraṇavaseneva veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:506_1: Api ca nakkhattassa aṅgārakādigāhasamāyogopi nakkhattagāhoyeva. Ukkāpātoti ākāsato
atk-s0101a0:506_2: ukkānaṃ patanaṃ. Disāḍāhoti disākālusiyaṃ aggisikhadhūmasikhādīhi ākulabhāvo viya.
atk-s0101a0:506_3: Devadudrabhīti sukkhavalāhakagajjanaṃ. Uggamananti udayanaṃ. Okkamananti atthaṅgamanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:506_4: Saṃkilesanti avisuddhatā. Vodānanti visuddhatā. Evaṃ vipākoti lokassa evaṃ vividhasukhadukkhāvaho.
atk-s0101a0:507_0: 25. Suvuṭṭhikāti devassa sammādhārānuppavecchanaṃ. Dubbuṭṭhikāti avaggāho, vassavibandhoti
atk-s0101a0:507_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Muddāti hatthamuddā. Gaṇanā vuccati acchiddakagaṇanā. Saṅkhānanti saṅkalanasaṭuppādanādivasena
atk-s0101a0:507_2: piṇḍagaṇanā. Yassa sā paguṇā hoti, so rukkhampi disvā ettakāni ettha paṇṇānīti jānāti.
