atk-s0101a0:507_3: Kāveyyanti “cattārome, bhikkhave, kavī. Katame cattāro? Cintākavi, sutakavi, atthakavi,
atk-s0101a0:507_4: paṭibhānakavī”ti. Imesaṃ catunnaṃ kavīnaṃ attano cintāvasena vā; “vessantaro nāma
atk-s0101a0:507_5: rājā ahosī”tiādīni sutvā sutavasena vā; imassa ayaṃ attho, evaṃ taṃ yojessāmīti evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:507_6: atthavasena vā; kiñcideva disvā tappaṭibhāgaṃ kattabbaṃ karissāmīti evaṃ ṭhānuppattikapaṭibhānavasena
atk-s0101a0:508_0: 26. Āvāhanaṃ nāma imassa dārakassa asukakulato asukanakkhattena dārikaṃ ānethāti
atk-s0101a0:508_1: āvāhakaraṇaṃ. Vivāhananti imaṃ dārikaṃ asukassa nāma dārakassa asukanakkhattena detha,
atk-s0101a0:508_2: evamassā vuḍḍhi bhavissatīti vivāhakaraṇaṃ. Saṃvaraṇanti saṃvaraṇaṃ nāma ‘ajja nakkhattaṃ
atk-s0101a0:508_3: sundaraṃ, ajjeva samaggā hotha, iti vo viyogo na bhavissatī’ti evaṃ samaggakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:508_4: Vivaraṇaṃ nāma ‘sace viyujjitukāmattha, ajjeva viyujjatha, iti vo puna saṃyogo na
atk-s0101a0:508_5: bhavissatī’ti evaṃ visaṃyogakaraṇaṃ. Saṅkiraṇanti ‘uṭṭhānaṃ vā iṇaṃ vā dinnaṃ dhanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:508_6: ajja saṅkaḍḍhatha, ajja saṅkaḍḍhitañhi taṃ thāvaraṃ hotī’ti evaṃ dhanapiṇḍāpanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:508_7: Vikiraṇanti ‘sace payogauddhārādivasena dhanaṃ payojitukāmattha, ajja payojitaṃ diguṇacatugguṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:508_8: hotī’ti evaṃ dhanapayojāpanaṃ. Subhagakaraṇanti piyamanāpakaraṇaṃ vā sassirīkakaraṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:508_9: vā. Dubbhagakaraṇanti tabbiparītaṃ. Viruddhagabbhakaraṇanti viruddhassa vilīnassa
atk-s0101a0:508_10: aṭṭhitassa matassa gabbhassa karaṇaṃ. Puna avināsāya bhesajjadānanti attho. Gabbho
atk-s0101a0:508_11: hi vātena, pāṇakehi, kammunā cāti tīhi kāraṇehi vinassati. Tattha vātena vinassante
atk-s0101a0:508_12: nibbāpanīyaṃ sītalaṃ bhesajjaṃ deti, pāṇakehi vinassante pāṇakānaṃ paṭikammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0101a0:508_13: kammunā vinassante pana buddhāpi paṭibāhituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0101a0:509_0: Jivhānibandhananti mantena jivhāya bandhakaraṇaṃ. Hanusaṃhanananti mukhabandhamantena
atk-s0101a0:509_1: yathā hanukaṃ cāletuṃ na sakkonti, evaṃ bandhakaraṇaṃ. Hatthābhijappananti hatthānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:509_2: parivattanatthaṃ mantajappanaṃ. Tasmiṃ kira mante sattapadantare ṭhatvā jappite itaro
atk-s0101a0:509_3: hatthe parivattetvā khipati. Kaṇṇajappananti kaṇṇehi saddaṃ assavanatthāya vijjāya
atk-s0101a0:509_4: jappanaṃ. Taṃ kira jappitvā vinicchayaṭṭhāne yaṃ icchati, taṃ bhaṇati, paccatthiko
atk-s0101a0:509_5: taṃ na suṇāti, tato paṭivacanaṃ sampādetuṃ na sakkoti. Ādāsapañhanti ādāse devataṃ
atk-s0101a0:509_6: otāretvā pañhapucchanaṃ. Kumārikapañhanti kumārikāya sarīre devataṃ otāretvā pañhapucchanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:509_7: Devapañhanti dāsiyā sarīre devataṃ otāretvā pañhapucchanaṃ. Ādiccupaṭṭhānanti jīvikatthāya
atk-s0101a0:509_9: mantena mukhato aggijālānīharaṇaṃ. Sirivhāyananti “ehi siri, mayhaṃ sire patiṭṭhāhī”ti
atk-s0101a0:510_0: 27. Santikammanti devaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā sace me idaṃ nāma samijjhissati, tumhākaṃ iminā
atk-s0101a0:510_1: ca iminā ca upahāraṃ karissāmīti samiddhikāle kattabbaṃ santipaṭissavakammaṃ. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0101a0:510_2: pana samiddhe tassa karaṇaṃ paṇidhikammaṃ nāma. Bhūrikammanti bhūrighare vasitvā
atk-s0101a0:510_3: gahitamantassa payogakaraṇaṃ. Vassakammaṃ vossakammanti ettha vassoti puriso, vossoti
atk-s0101a0:510_4: paṇḍako. Iti vossassa vassakaraṇaṃ vassakammaṃ, vassassa vossakaraṇaṃ vossakammaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:510_5: Taṃ pana karonto acchandikabhāvamattaṃ pāpeti, na liṅgaṃ antaradhāpetuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0101a0:510_7: vatvā vatthubalikammakaraṇaṃ. Ācamananti udakena mukhasuddhikaraṇaṃ. Nhāpananti aññesaṃ
atk-s0101a0:510_8: nhāpanaṃ. Juhananti tesaṃ atthāya aggijuhanaṃ. Vamananti yogaṃ datvā vamanakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:510_9: Virecanepi eseva nayo. Uddhaṃvirecananti uddhaṃ dosānaṃ nīharaṇaṃ. Adhovirecananti
atk-s0101a0:510_10: adho dosānaṃ nīharaṇaṃ. Sīsavirecananti sirovirecanaṃ. Kaṇṇatelanti kaṇṇānaṃ bandhanatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:510_11: vā vaṇaharaṇatthaṃ vā bhesajjatelapacanaṃ. Nettatappananti akkhitappanatelaṃ. Natthukammanti
atk-s0101a0:510_12: telena yojetvā natthukaraṇaṃ. Añjananti dve vā tīṇi vā paṭalāni nīharaṇasamatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:510_13: khārañjanaṃ. Paccañjananti nibbāpanīyaṃ sītalabhesajjañjanaṃ. Sālākiyanti salākavejjakammaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:510_15: Mūlabhesajjānaṃ anuppādananti iminā kāyatikicchanaṃ dasseti. Osadhīnaṃ paṭimokkhoti
atk-s0101a0:510_16: khārādīni datvā tadanurūpe vaṇe gate tesaṃ apanayanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:513_0: 28. Evaṃ brahmadattena vuttavaṇṇassa anusandhivasena tividhaṃ sīlaṃ vitthāretvā idāni
atk-s0101a0:513_1: bhikkhusaṅghena vuttavaṇṇassa anusandhivasena – “atthi, bhikkhave, aññeva dhammā
atk-s0101a0:513_2: gambhīrā duddasā”tiādinā nayena suññatāpakāsanaṃ ārabhi. Tattha dhammāti guṇe, desanāyaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:514: “Na hi dhammo adhammo ca, ubho samavipākino;
atk-s0101a0:515: Adhammo nirayaṃ neti, dhammo pāpeti suggati”nti. ;
atk-s0101a0:516_0: Ādīsu hi guṇe dhammasaddo. “Dhammaṃ, vo bhikkhave, desessāmi ādikalyāṇa”ntiādīsu
atk-s0101a0:516_1: desanāyaṃ. “Idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti suttaṃ, geyya”ntiādīsu pariyattiyaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:516_2: “Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā honti, khandhā hontī”tiādīsu nissatte. Idha pana guṇe
atk-s0101a0:516_3: vattati. Tasmā atthi, bhikkhave, aññeva tathāgatassa guṇāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0101a0:517_0: Gambhīrāti mahāsamuddo viya makasatuṇḍasūciyā aññatra tathāgatā aññesaṃ ñāṇena alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā,
atk-s0101a0:517_1: gambhīrattāyeva duddasā. Duddasattāyeva duranubodhā. Nibbutasabbapariḷāhattā santā,
atk-s0101a0:517_2: santārammaṇesu pavattanatopi santā. Atittikaraṇaṭṭhena paṇītā, sādurasabhojanaṃ viya.
atk-s0101a0:517_3: Uttamañāṇavisayattā na takkena avacaritabbāti atakkāvacarā. Nipuṇāti saṇhasukhumasabhāvattā.
atk-s0101a0:518_0: Ye tathāgato sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedetīti ye dhamme tathāgato anaññaneyyo
atk-s0101a0:518_1: hutvā sayameva abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena paccakkhaṃ katvā pavedeti, dīpeti, katheti,
atk-s0101a0:518_2: pakāsetīti attho. Yehīti yehi guṇadhammehi. Yathābhuccanti yathābhūtaṃ. Vaṇṇaṃ sammā
atk-s0101a0:518_3: vadamānā vadeyyunti tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vattukāmā sammā vadeyyuṃ, ahāpetvā vattuṃ
atk-s0101a0:518_4: sakkuṇeyyunti attho. Katame ca pana te dhammā bhagavatā evaṃ thomitāti? Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:518_5: Yadi evaṃ, kasmā bahuvacananiddeso katoti? Puthucittasamāyogato ceva, puthuārammaṇato
atk-s0101a0:518_6: ca. Tañhi catūsu ñāṇasampayuttamahākiriyacittesu labbhati, na cassa koci dhammo ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:518_7: nāma na hoti. Yathāha – “atītaṃ sabbaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, tattha āvaraṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:518_8: natthīti anāvaraṇañāṇa”ntiādi. Iti puthucittasamāyogato punappunaṃ uppattivasena
atk-s0101a0:519_0: “Aññevā”ti idaṃ panettha vavatthāpanavacanaṃ, “aññeva, na pāṇātipātā veramaṇiādayo.
atk-s0101a0:519_1: Gambhīrāva na uttānā”ti evaṃ sabbapadehi yojetabbaṃ. Sāvakapāramīñāṇañhi gambhīraṃ,
atk-s0101a0:519_2: paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ pana tato gambhīrataranti tattha vavatthānaṃ natthi, sabbaññutaññāṇañca
atk-s0101a0:519_3: tatopi gambhīrataranti tatthāpi vavatthānaṃ natthi, ito panaññaṃ gambhīrataraṃ natthi;
atk-s0101a0:519_4: tasmā gambhīrā vāti vavatthānaṃ labbhati. Tathā duddasāva duranubodhā vāti sabbaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:520_0: Katame ca te bhikkhaveti ayaṃ pana tesaṃ dhammānaṃ kathetukamyatā pucchā. Santi,
atk-s0101a0:520_1: bhikkhave, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇātiādi pucchāvissajjanaṃ. Kasmā panetaṃ evaṃ āraddhanti
atk-s0101a0:520_2: ce? Buddhānañhi cattāri ṭhānāni patvā gajjitaṃ mahantaṃ hoti, ñāṇaṃ anupavisati,
atk-s0101a0:520_3: buddhañāṇassa mahantabhāvo paññāyati, desanā gambhīrā hoti, tilakkhaṇāhatā, suññatāpaṭisaṃyuttā.
atk-s0101a0:520_4: Katamāni cattāri? Vinayapaññattiṃ, bhūmantaraṃ, paccayākāraṃ, samayantaranti. Tasmā
atk-s0101a0:520_5: – “idaṃ lahukaṃ, idaṃ garukaṃ, idaṃ satekicchaṃ, idaṃ atekicchaṃ, ayaṃ āpatti, ayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:520_6: anāpatti, ayaṃ chejjagāminī, ayaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminī, ayaṃ desanāgāminī, ayaṃ lokavajjā,
atk-s0101a0:520_7: ayaṃ paṇṇattivajjā, imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ idaṃ paññapetabba”nti yaṃ evaṃ otiṇṇe vatthusmiṃ
atk-s0101a0:520_8: sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṃ nāma, tattha aññesaṃ thāmo vā balaṃ vā natthi; avisayo esa aññesaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:520_9: tathāgatasseva visayo. Iti vinayapaññattiṃ patvā buddhānaṃ gajjitaṃ mahantaṃ hoti,
atk-s0101a0:521_0: Tathā ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā nāma…pe… ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo nāma, pañca khandhā
atk-s0101a0:521_1: nāma, dvādasa āyatanāni nāma, aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo nāma, cattāri ariyasaccāni nāma,
atk-s0101a0:521_2: bāvīsatindriyāni nāma, nava hetū nāma, cattāro āhārā nāma, satta phassā nāma, satta
atk-s0101a0:521_3: vedanā nāma, satta saññā nāma, satta cetanā nāma, satta cittāni nāma. Etesu ettakā
atk-s0101a0:521_4: kāmāvacarā dhammā nāma, ettakā rūpāvacaraarūpāvacarapariyāpannā dhammā nāma, ettakā
atk-s0101a0:521_5: lokiyā dhammā nāma, ettakā lokuttarā dhammā nāmāti catuvīsatisamantapaṭṭhānaṃ anantanayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:521_6: abhidhammapiṭakaṃ vibhajitvā kathetuṃ aññesaṃ thāmo vā balaṃ vā natthi, avisayo esa
atk-s0101a0:521_7: aññesaṃ, tathāgatasseva visayo. Iti bhūmantaraparicchedaṃ patvā buddhānaṃ gajjitaṃ
atk-s0101a0:522_0: Tathā ayaṃ avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ navahākārehi paccayo hoti, uppādo hutvā paccayo hoti,
atk-s0101a0:522_1: pavattaṃ hutvā, nimittaṃ, āyūhanaṃ, saṃyogo, palibodho, samudayo, hetu, paccayo hutvā
atk-s0101a0:522_2: paccayo hoti, tathā saṅkhārādayo viññāṇādīnaṃ. Yathāha – “kathaṃ paccayapariggahe
atk-s0101a0:522_3: paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ? Avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ uppādaṭṭhiti ca pavattaṭṭhiti ca, nimittaṭṭhiti
atk-s0101a0:522_4: ca, āyūhanaṭṭhiti ca, saṃyogaṭṭhiti ca, palibodhaṭṭhiti ca, samudayaṭṭhiti ca, hetuṭṭhiti
atk-s0101a0:522_5: ca, paccayaṭṭhiti ca, imehi navahākārehi avijjā paccayo, saṅkhārā paccayasamuppannā,
atk-s0101a0:522_6: ubhopete dhammā paccayasamuppannāti paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ. Atītampi
atk-s0101a0:522_7: addhānaṃ, anāgatampi addhānaṃ avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ uppādaṭṭhiti ca…pe… jāti jarāmaraṇassa
atk-s0101a0:522_8: uppādaṭṭhiti ca…pe… paccayaṭṭhiti ca, imehi navahākārehi jāti paccayo, jarāmaraṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:522_9: paccayasamuppannaṃ, ubhopete dhammā paccayasamuppannāti paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”nti.
atk-s0101a0:522_10: Evamimaṃ tassa tassa dhammassa tathā tathā paccayabhāvena pavattaṃ tivaṭṭaṃ tiyaddhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:522_11: tisandhiṃ catusaṅkhepaṃ vīsatākāraṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ vibhajitvā kathetuṃ aññesaṃ
atk-s0101a0:522_12: thāmo vā balaṃ vā natthi, avisayo esa aññesaṃ, tathāgatasseva visayo, iti paccayākāraṃ
atk-s0101a0:522_13: patvā buddhānaṃ gajjitaṃ mahantaṃ hoti, ñāṇaṃ anupavisati…pe… suññatāpaṭisaṃyuttāti.
atk-s0101a0:523_0: Tathā cattāro janā sassatavādā nāma, cattāro ekaccasassatavādā, cattāro antānantikā,
atk-s0101a0:523_1: cattāro amarāvikkhepikā, dve adhiccasamuppannikā, soḷasa saññīvādā, aṭṭha asaññīvādā,
atk-s0101a0:523_2: aṭṭha nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā, satta ucchedavādā, pañca diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādā nāma.
atk-s0101a0:523_3: Te idaṃ nissāya idaṃ gaṇhantīti dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni bhinditvā nijjaṭaṃ niggumbaṃ
atk-s0101a0:523_4: katvā kathetuṃ aññesaṃ thāmo vā balaṃ vā natthi, avisayo esa aññesaṃ, tathāgatasseva
atk-s0101a0:523_5: visayo. Iti samayantaraṃ patvā buddhānaṃ gajjitaṃ mahantaṃ hoti, ñāṇaṃ anupavisati,
atk-s0101a0:523_6: buddhañāṇassa mahantatā paññāyati, desanā gambhīrā hoti, tilakkhaṇāhatā, suññatāpaṭisaṃyuttāti.
atk-s0101a0:524_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne samayantaraṃ labbhati, tasmā sabbaññutaññāṇassa mahantabhāvadassanatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:524_1: desanāya ca suññatāpakāsanavibhāvanatthaṃ samayantaraṃ anupavisanto dhammarājā –
atk-s0101a0:524_2: “santi, bhikkhave, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā”ti evaṃ pucchāvissajjanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0101a0:525_0: 29. Tattha santīti atthi saṃvijjanti upalabbhanti. Bhikkhaveti ālapanavacanaṃ. Eketi
atk-s0101a0:525_1: ekacce. Samaṇabrāhmaṇāti pabbajjūpagatabhāvena samaṇā, jātiyā brāhmaṇā. Lokena vā
atk-s0101a0:525_2: samaṇāti ca brāhmaṇāti ca evaṃ sammatā. Pubbantaṃ kappetvā vikappetvā gaṇhantīti
atk-s0101a0:525_3: pubbantakappikā. Pubbantakappo vā etesaṃ atthīti pubbantakappikā. Tattha antoti ayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:525_5: hi ante antasaddo. “Caranti loke parivārachannā anto asuddhā bahi sobhamānā”tiādīsu
atk-s0101a0:525_6: abbhantare. “Kāyabandhanassa anto jīrati. “Sā haritantaṃ vā panthantaṃ vā selantaṃ
atk-s0101a0:525_7: vā udakantaṃ vā”tiādīsu mariyādāyaṃ. “Antamidaṃ, bhikkhave, jīvikānaṃ yadidaṃ piṇḍolya”ntiādīsu
atk-s0101a0:525_8: lāmake. “Esevanto dukkhassā”tiādīsu parabhāge. Sabbapaccayasaṅkhayo hi dukkhassa
atk-s0101a0:525_9: parabhāgo koṭīti vuccati. “Sakkāyo kho, āvuso, eko anto”tiādīsu koṭṭhāse. Svāyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:526_0: Kappasaddopi – “tiṭṭhatu, bhante bhagavā kappaṃ”, “atthi kappo nipajjituṃ”, “kappakatena
atk-s0101a0:526_1: akappakataṃ saṃsibbitaṃ hotī”ti, evaṃ āyukappalesakappavinayakappādīsu sambahulesu
atk-s0101a0:526_2: atthesu vattati. Idha taṇhādiṭṭhīsu vattatīti veditabbo. Vuttampi cetaṃ – “kappāti
atk-s0101a0:526_3: dve kappā, taṇhākappo ca diṭṭhikappo cā”ti. Tasmā taṇhādiṭṭhivasena atītaṃ khandhakoṭṭhāsaṃ
atk-s0101a0:526_4: kappetvā pakappetvā ṭhitāti pubbantakappikāti evamettha attho veditabbo. Tesaṃ evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:526_5: pubbantaṃ kappetvā ṭhitānaṃ punappunaṃ uppajjanavasena pubbantameva anugatā diṭṭhīti
atk-s0101a0:526_6: pubbantānudiṭṭhino. Te evaṃdiṭṭhino taṃ pubbantaṃ ārabbha āgamma paṭicca aññampi
atk-s0101a0:526_7: janaṃ diṭṭhigatikaṃ karontā anekavihitāni adhimuttipadāni abhivadanti aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi.
atk-s0101a0:527_0: Tattha anekavihitānīti anekavidhāni. Adhimuttipadānīti adhivacanapadāni. Atha vā
atk-s0101a0:527_1: bhūtaṃ atthaṃ abhibhavitvā yathāsabhāvato aggahetvā pavattanato adhimuttiyoti diṭṭhiyo
atk-s0101a0:527_2: vuccanti. Adhimuttīnaṃ padāni adhimuttipadāni, diṭṭhidīpakāni vacanānīti attho. Aṭṭhārasahi
atk-s0101a0:528_0: 30. Idāni yehi aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi abhivadanti, tesaṃ kathetukamyatāya pucchāya
atk-s0101a0:528_1: “te ca kho bhonto”tiādinā nayena pucchitvā tāni vatthūni vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “santi,
atk-s0101a0:528_2: bhikkhave”tiādimāha. Tattha vadanti etenāti vādo, diṭṭhigatassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sassato
atk-s0101a0:528_3: vādo etesanti sassatavādā, sassatadiṭṭhinoti attho. Eteneva nayena ito paresampi
atk-s0101a0:528_4: evarūpānaṃ padānaṃ attho veditabbo. Sassataṃ attānañca lokañcāti rūpādīsu aññataraṃ
atk-s0101a0:528_5: attāti ca lokoti ca gahetvā taṃ sassataṃ amaraṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ paññapenti. Yathāha
atk-s0101a0:528_6: – “rūpaṃ attā ceva loko ca sassato cāti attānañca lokañca paññapenti tathā vedanaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:528_7: saññaṃ, saṅkhāre, viññāṇaṃ attā ceva loko ca sassato cāti attānañca lokañca paññapentī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:529_0: 31. Ātappamanvāyātiādīsu vīriyaṃ kilesānaṃ ātāpanabhāvena ātappanti vuttaṃ. Tadeva
atk-s0101a0:529_1: padahanavasena padhānaṃ. Punappunaṃ yuttavasena anuyogoti. Evaṃ tippabhedaṃ vīriyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:529_2: anvāya āgamma paṭiccāti attho. Appamādo vuccati satiyā avippavāso. Sammā manasikāroti
atk-s0101a0:529_3: upāyamanasikāro, pathamanasikāro, atthato ñāṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Yasmiñhi manasikāre
atk-s0101a0:529_4: ṭhitassa pubbenivāsānussati ñāṇaṃ ijjhati, ayaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne manasikāroti adhippeto.
atk-s0101a0:529_5: Tasmā vīriyañca satiñca ñāṇañca āgammāti ayamettha saṅkhepattho. Tathārūpanti tathājātikaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:529_6: Cetosamādhinti cittasamādhiṃ. Phusatīti vindati paṭilabhati. Yathā samāhite citteti
atk-s0101a0:529_7: yena samādhinā sammā āhite suṭṭhu ṭhapite cittamhi anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsantiādīnaṃ
atk-s0101a0:530_0: So evamāhāti so evaṃ jhānānubhāvasampanno hutvā diṭṭhigatiko evaṃ vadati. Vañjhoti
atk-s0101a0:530_1: vañjhapasuvañjhatālādayo viya aphalo kassaci ajanakoti. Etena “attā”ti ca “loko”ti
atk-s0101a0:530_2: ca gahitānaṃ jhānādīnaṃ rūpādijanakabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati. Pabbatakūṭaṃ viya ṭhitoti
atk-s0101a0:530_3: kūṭaṭṭho. Esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitoti esikaṭṭhāyī viya hutvā ṭhitoti esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhito. Yathā
atk-s0101a0:530_4: sunikhāto esikatthambho niccalo tiṭṭhati, evaṃ ṭhitoti attho. Ubhayenapi lokassa
atk-s0101a0:530_5: vināsābhāvaṃ dīpeti. Keci pana īsikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitoti pāḷiṃ vatvā muñje īsikā viya ṭhitoti
atk-s0101a0:530_6: vadanti. Tatrāyamadhippāyo – yadidaṃ jāyatīti vuccati, taṃ muñjato īsikā viya vijjamānameva
atk-s0101a0:530_7: nikkhamati. Yasmā ca īsikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhito, tasmā teva sattā sandhāvanti, ito aññattha gacchantīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:531_0: Saṃsarantīti aparāparaṃ sañcaranti. Cavantīti evaṃ saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti. Tathā upapajjantīti.
atk-s0101a0:531_1: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana pubbe “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti vatvā idāni te ca sattā sandhāvantītiādinā
atk-s0101a0:531_2: vacanena ayaṃ diṭṭhigatiko attanāyeva attano vādaṃ bhindati, diṭṭhigatikassa dassanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:531_3: nāma na nibaddhaṃ, thusarāsimhi nikhātakhāṇu viya cañcalaṃ, ummattakapacchiyaṃ pūvakhaṇḍagūthagomayādīni
atk-s0101a0:531_4: viya cettha sundarampi asundarampi hoti yevāti vuttaṃ. Atthitveva sassatisamanti
atk-s0101a0:531_5: ettha sassatīti niccaṃ vijjamānatāya mahāpathaviṃva maññati, tathā sinerupabbatacandimasūriye.
atk-s0101a0:531_6: Tato tehi samaṃ attānaṃ maññamānā atthi tveva sassatisamanti vadanti.
atk-s0101a0:532_0: Idāni sassato attā ca loko cātiādikāya paṭiññāya sādhanatthaṃ hetuṃ dassento “taṃ
atk-s0101a0:532_1: kissa hetu? Ahañhi ātappamanvāyā”tiādimāha. Tattha imināmahaṃ etaṃ jānāmīti iminā
atk-s0101a0:532_2: visesādhigamena ahaṃ etaṃ paccakkhato jānāmi, na kevalaṃ saddhāmattakeneva vadāmīti
atk-s0101a0:532_3: dasseti, makāro panettha padasandhikaraṇatthaṃ vutto. Idaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṃ ṭhānanti
atk-s0101a0:532_4: catūhi vatthūhīti vatthusaddena vuttesu catūsu ṭhānesu idaṃ paṭhamaṃ ṭhānaṃ, idaṃ
atk-s0101a0:533_0: 32-33. Upari vāradvayepi eseva nayo. Kevalañhi ayaṃ vāro anekajātisatasahassānussaraṇavasena
atk-s0101a0:534_0: 34. Catutthavāre takkayatīti takkī, takko vā assa atthīti takkī. Takketvā vitakketvā
atk-s0101a0:534_1: diṭṭhigāhino etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Vīmaṃsāya samannāgatoti vīmaṃsī. Vīmaṃsā nāma tulanā
atk-s0101a0:534_2: ruccanā khamanā. Yathā hi puriso yaṭṭhiyā udakaṃ vīmaṃsitvā otarati, evameva yo tulayitvā
atk-s0101a0:534_3: ruccitvā khamāpetvā diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, so “vīmaṃsī”ti veditabbo. Takkapariyāhatanti
atk-s0101a0:534_4: takkena pariyāhataṃ, tena tena pariyāyena takketvāti attho. Vīmaṃsānucaritanti tāya
atk-s0101a0:534_5: vuttappakārāya vīmaṃsāya anucaritaṃ. Sayaṃpaṭibhānanti attano paṭibhānamattasañjātaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:535_0: Tattha catubbidho takkī – anussutiko, jātissaro, lābhī, suddhatakkikoti. Tattha yo
atk-s0101a0:535_1: “vessantaro nāma rājā ahosī”tiādīni sutvā “tena hi yadi vessantarova bhagavā, sassato
atk-s0101a0:535_2: attā”ti takkayanto diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, ayaṃ anussutiko nāma. Dve tisso jātiyo saritvā
atk-s0101a0:535_3: – “ahameva pubbe asukasmiṃ nāma ahosiṃ, tasmā sassato attā”ti takkayanto jātissaratakkiko
atk-s0101a0:535_4: nāma. Yo pana lābhitāya “yathā me idāni attā sukhī hoti, atītepi evaṃ ahosi, anāgatepi
atk-s0101a0:535_5: bhavissatī”ti takkayitvā diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, ayaṃ lābhītakkiko nāma. “Evaṃ sati idaṃ
atk-s0101a0:535_6: hotī”ti takkamatteneva gaṇhanto pana suddhatakkiko nāma.
atk-s0101a0:536_0: 35. Etesaṃ vā aññatarenāti etesaṃyeva catunnaṃ vatthūnaṃ aññatarena ekena vā dvīhi
atk-s0101a0:536_1: vā tīhi vā. Natthi ito bahiddhāti imehi pana vatthūhi bahi aññaṃ ekaṃ kāraṇampi sassatapaññattiyā
atk-s0101a0:537_0: 36. Tayidaṃ, bhikkhave, tathāgato pajānātīti bhikkhave, taṃ idaṃ catubbidhampi diṭṭhigataṃ
atk-s0101a0:537_1: tathāgato nānappakārato jānāti. Tato taṃ pajānanākāraṃ dassento ime diṭṭhiṭṭhānātiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:537_2: Tattha diṭṭhiyova diṭṭhiṭṭhānā nāma. Api ca diṭṭhīnaṃ kāraṇampi diṭṭhiṭṭhānameva.
atk-s0101a0:537_3: Yathāha “katamāni aṭṭha diṭṭhiṭṭhānāni? Khandhāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, avijjāpi, phassopi,
atk-s0101a0:537_4: saññāpi, vitakkopi, ayonisomanasikāropi, pāpamittopi, paratoghosopi diṭṭhiṭṭhāna”nti.
atk-s0101a0:537_5: “Khandhā hetu, khandhā paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ upādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena, evaṃ khandhāpi
atk-s0101a0:537_6: diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ. Avijjā hetu…pe… pāpamitto hetu. Paratoghoso hetu, paratoghoso paccayo
atk-s0101a0:537_7: diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ upādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena, evaṃ paratoghosopi diṭṭhiṭṭhāna”nti. Evaṃgahitāti
atk-s0101a0:537_8: diṭṭhisaṅkhātā tāva diṭṭhiṭṭhānā – “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti evaṃgahitā ādinnā,
atk-s0101a0:537_9: pavattitāti attho. Evaṃparāmaṭṭhāti nirāsaṅkacittatāya punappunaṃ āmaṭṭhā parāmaṭṭhā,
atk-s0101a0:537_10: ‘idameva saccaṃ, moghamañña’nti pariniṭṭhāpitā. Kāraṇasaṅkhātā pana diṭṭhiṭṭhānā
atk-s0101a0:537_11: yathā gayhamānā diṭṭhiyo samuṭṭhāpenti, evaṃ ārammaṇavasena ca pavattanavasena ca
atk-s0101a0:537_12: āsevanavasena ca gahitā. Anādīnavadassitāya punappunaṃ gahaṇavasena parāmaṭṭhā. Evaṃgatikāti
atk-s0101a0:537_13: evaṃ nirayatiracchānapettivisayagatikānaṃ aññataragatikā. Evaṃ abhisamparāyāti idaṃ
atk-s0101a0:538_0: Tañca tathāgato pajānātīti na kevalañca tathāgato sakāraṇaṃ sagatikaṃ diṭṭhigatameva
atk-s0101a0:538_1: pajānāti, atha kho tañca sabbaṃ pajānāti, tato ca uttaritaraṃ sīlañceva samādhiñca
atk-s0101a0:538_2: sabbaññutaññāṇañca pajānāti. Tañca pajānanaṃ na parāmasatīti tañca evaṃvidhaṃ anuttaraṃ
atk-s0101a0:538_3: visesaṃ pajānantopi ahaṃ pajānāmīti taṇhādiṭṭhimānaparāmāsavasena tañca na parāmasati.
atk-s0101a0:538_4: Aparāmasato cassa paccattaññeva nibbuti viditāti evaṃ aparāmasato cassa aparāmāsapaccayā
atk-s0101a0:538_5: sayameva attanāyeva tesaṃ parāmāsakilesānaṃ nibbuti viditā. Pākaṭaṃ, bhikkhave, tathāgatassa nibbānanti dasseti.
atk-s0101a0:539_0: Idāni yathāpaṭipannena tathāgatena sā nibbuti adhigatā, taṃ paṭipattiṃ dassetuṃ yāsu
atk-s0101a0:539_1: vedanāsu rattā titthiyā “idha sukhino bhavissāma, ettha sukhino bhavissāmā”ti diṭṭhigahanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:539_2: pavisanti, tāsaṃyeva vedanānaṃ vasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhanto vedanānaṃ samudayañcātiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:539_4: vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati, taṇhāsamudayā vedanāsamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena
atk-s0101a0:539_5: vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati, kammasamudayā vedanāsamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena
atk-s0101a0:539_6: vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati, phassasamudayā vedanāsamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena
atk-s0101a0:539_7: vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati. Nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi vedanākkhandhassa
atk-s0101a0:539_8: udayaṃ passatī”ti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ vasena vedanānaṃ samudayaṃ yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0101a0:539_10: passati, taṇhānirodhā vedanānirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:539_11: passati, kammanirodhā vedanānirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:539_12: passati, phassanirodhā vedanānirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:539_13: passati. Vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ passantopi vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passatī”ti imesaṃ
atk-s0101a0:539_14: pañcannaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ vasena vedanānaṃ atthaṅgamaṃ yathābhūtaṃ viditvā, “yaṃ vedanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:539_15: paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ vedanāya assādo”ti evaṃ assādañca yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0101a0:539_16: viditvā, “yaṃ vedanā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā, ayaṃ vedanāya ādīnavo”ti evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:539_17: ādīnavañca yathābhūtaṃ viditvā, “yo vedanāya chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:539_18: idaṃ vedanāya nissaraṇa”nti evaṃ nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ viditvā vigatachandarāgatāya
atk-s0101a0:539_19: anupādāno anupādāvimutto, bhikkhave, tathāgato; yasmiṃ upādāne sati kiñci upādiyeyya,
atk-s0101a0:539_20: upādinnattā ca khandho bhaveyya, tassa abhāvā kiñci dhammaṃ anupādiyitvāva vimutto
atk-s0101a0:540_0: 37. Ime kho te, bhikkhaveti ye te ahaṃ – “katame, ca te, bhikkhave, dhammā gambhīrā”ti
atk-s0101a0:540_1: apucchiṃ, “ime kho te, bhikkhave, tañca tathāgato pajānāti tato ca uttaritaraṃ pajānātī”ti
atk-s0101a0:540_2: evaṃ niddiṭṭhā sabbaññutaññāṇadhammā gambhīrā duddasā…pe… paṇḍitavedanīyāti veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:540_3: Yehi tathāgatassa neva puthujjano, na sotāpannādīsu aññataro vaṇṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ vattuṃ
atk-s0101a0:540_4: sakkoti, atha kho tathāgatova yathābhūtaṃ vaṇṇaṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyyāti evaṃ pucchamānenāpi
atk-s0101a0:540_5: sabbaññutaññāṇameva puṭṭhaṃ, niyyātentenāpi tadeva niyyātitaṃ, antarā pana diṭṭhiyo vibhattāti.
atk-s0101a0:543: 38. Ekaccasassatikāti ekaccasassatavādā. Te duvidhā honti – sattekaccasassatikā, saṅkhārekaccasassatikāti. Duvidhāpi idha gahitāyeva.
atk-s0101a0:544_0: 39. Yanti nipātamattaṃ. Kadācīti kismiñci kāle. Karahacīti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Dīghassa
atk-s0101a0:544_1: addhunoti dīghassa kālassa. Accayenāti atikkamena. Saṃvaṭṭatīti vinassati. Yebhuyyenāti
atk-s0101a0:544_2: ye uparibrahmalokesu vā arūpesu vā nibbattanti, tadavasese sandhāya vuttaṃ. Jhānamanena
atk-s0101a0:544_3: nibbattattā manomayā. Pīti tesaṃ bhakkho āhāroti pītibhakkhā. Attanova tesaṃ pabhāti
atk-s0101a0:544_4: sayaṃpabhā. Antalikkhe carantīti antalikkhacarā. Subhesu uyyānavimānakapparukkhādīsu
atk-s0101a0:544_5: tiṭṭhantīti, subhaṭṭhāyino subhā vā manorammavatthābharaṇā hutvā tiṭṭhantīti subhaṭṭhāyino.
atk-s0101a0:545_0: 40. Vivaṭṭatīti saṇṭhāti. Suññaṃ brahmavimānanti pakatiyā nibbattasattānaṃ natthitāya
atk-s0101a0:545_1: suññaṃ, brahmakāyikabhūmi nibbattatīti attho. Tassa kattā vā kāretā vā natthi, visuddhimagge
atk-s0101a0:545_2: vuttanayena pana kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānā ratanabhūmi nibbattati. Pakatinibbattiṭṭhānesuyeva
atk-s0101a0:545_3: cettha uyyānakapparukkhādayo nibbattanti. Atha sattānaṃ pakatiyā vasitaṭṭhāne nikanti
atk-s0101a0:545_4: uppajjati, te paṭhamajjhānaṃ bhāvetvā tato otaranti, tasmā atha kho aññataro sattotiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:545_5: Āyukkhayā vā puññakkhayā vāti ye uḷāraṃ puññakammaṃ katvā yattha katthaci appāyuke
atk-s0101a0:545_6: devaloke nibbattanti, te attano puññabalena ṭhātuṃ na sakkonti, tassa pana devalokassa
atk-s0101a0:545_7: āyuppamāṇeneva cavantīti āyukkhayā cavantīti vuccanti. Ye pana parittaṃ puññakammaṃ
atk-s0101a0:545_8: katvā dīghāyukadevaloke nibbattanti, te yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhātuṃ na sakkonti, antarāva
atk-s0101a0:545_9: cavantīti puññakkhayā cavantīti vuccanti. Dīghamaddhānaṃ tiṭṭhatīti kappaṃ vā upaḍḍhakappaṃ vā.
atk-s0101a0:546_0: 41. Anabhiratīti aparassāpi sattassa āgamanapatthanā. Yā pana paṭighasampayuttā ukkaṇṭhitā,
atk-s0101a0:546_1: sā brahmaloke natthi. Paritassanāti ubbijjanā phandanā, sā panesā tāsatassanā, taṇhātassanā,
atk-s0101a0:546_2: diṭṭhitassanā, ñāṇatassanāti catubbidhā hoti. Tattha “jātiṃ paṭicca bhayaṃ bhayānakaṃ
atk-s0101a0:546_3: chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso cetaso utrāso. Jaraṃ… byādhiṃ… maraṇaṃ paṭicca…pe… utrāso”ti
atk-s0101a0:546_4: ayaṃ tāsatassanā nāma. “Aho vata aññepi sattā itthattaṃ āgaccheyyu”nti ayaṃ taṇhātassanā
atk-s0101a0:546_6: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā yebhuyyena bhayaṃ saṃvegaṃ santāsaṃ āpajjantī”ti ayaṃ ñāṇatassanā
atk-s0101a0:546_7: nāma. Idha pana taṇhātassanāpi diṭṭhitassanāpi vaṭṭati. Brahmavimānanti idha pana
atk-s0101a0:546_8: paṭhamābhinibbattassa atthitāya suññanti na vuttaṃ. Upapajjantīti upapattivasena
atk-s0101a0:547_0: 42. Abhibhūti abhibhavitvā ṭhito jeṭṭhakohamasmīti. Anabhibhūtoti aññehi anabhibhūto.
atk-s0101a0:547_1: Aññadatthūti ekaṃsavacane nipāto. Dassanavasena daso, sabbaṃ passāmīti attho. Vasavattīti
atk-s0101a0:547_2: sabbaṃ janaṃ vase vattemi. Issaro kattā nimmātāti ahaṃ loke issaro, ahaṃ lokassa
atk-s0101a0:547_4: mayā nimmitāti. Seṭṭho sajitāti ahaṃ lokassa uttamo ca sajitā ca, “tvaṃ khattiyo
atk-s0101a0:547_5: nāma hohi, tvaṃ brāhmaṇo, vesso, suddo, gahaṭṭho, pabbajito nāma. Antamaso tvaṃ oṭṭho
atk-s0101a0:547_6: hohi, goṇo hohī”ti “evaṃ sattānaṃ saṃvisajetā aha”nti maññati. Vasī pitā bhūtabhabyānanti
atk-s0101a0:547_7: ahamasmi ciṇṇavasitāya vasī, ahaṃ pitā bhūtānañca bhabyānañcāti maññati. Tattha aṇḍajajalābujā
atk-s0101a0:547_8: sattā antoaṇḍakose ceva antovatthimhi ca bhabyā nāma, bahi nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0101a0:547_9: bhūtā nāma. Saṃsedajā paṭhamacittakkhaṇe bhabyā, dutiyato paṭṭhāya bhūtā. Opapātikā
atk-s0101a0:547_10: paṭhamairiyāpathe bhabyā, dutiyato paṭṭhāya bhūtāti veditabbā. Te sabbepi mayhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:548_0: Idāni kāraṇato sādhetukāmo – “mayā ime sattā nimmitā”ti paṭiññaṃ katvā “taṃ kissa
atk-s0101a0:548_1: hetū”tiādimāha. Itthattanti itthabhāvaṃ, brahmabhāvanti attho. Iminā mayanti attano
atk-s0101a0:548_2: kammavasena cutāpi upapannāpi ca kevalaṃ maññanāmatteneva “iminā mayaṃ nimmitā”ti
atk-s0101a0:548_3: maññamānā vaṅkacchidde vaṅkaāṇī viya onamitvā tasseva pādamūlaṃ gacchantīti.
atk-s0101a0:549: 43. Vaṇṇavantataro cāti vaṇṇavantataro, abhirūpo pāsādikoti attho. Mahesakkhataroti issariyaparivāravasena mahāyasataro.
atk-s0101a0:550_0: 44. Ṭhānaṃ kho panetanti kāraṇaṃ kho panetaṃ. So tato cavitvā aññatra na gacchati,
atk-s0101a0:550_1: idheva āgacchati, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Agārasmāti gehā. Anagāriyanti pabbajjaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:550_2: Pabbajjā hi yasmā agārassa hi taṃ kasigorakkhādikammaṃ tattha natthi, tasmā anagāriyanti
atk-s0101a0:550_3: vuccati. Pabbajatīti upagacchati. Tato paraṃ nānussaratīti tato pubbenivāsā paraṃ
atk-s0101a0:550_4: na sarati, sarituṃ asakkonto tattha ṭhatvā diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0101a0:551_0: Niccotiādīsu tassa upapattiṃ apassanto niccoti vadati, maraṇaṃ apassanto dhuvoti,
atk-s0101a0:551_1: sadābhāvato sassatoti, jarāvasenāpi vipariṇāmassa abhāvato avipariṇāmadhammoti. Sesamettha
atk-s0101a0:552_0: 45-46. Dutiyavāre khiḍḍāya padussanti vinassantīti khiḍḍāpadosikā, padūsikātipi pāḷiṃ
atk-s0101a0:552_1: likhanti, sā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ natthi. Ativelanti atikālaṃ, aticiranti attho. Hassakhiḍḍāratidhammasamāpannāti
atk-s0101a0:552_2: hassarati dhammañceva khiḍḍāratidhammañca samāpannā anuyuttā, keḷihassasukhañceva
atk-s0101a0:552_3: kāyikavācasikakīḷāsukhañca anuyuttā, vuttappakāraratidhammasamaṅgino hutvā viharantīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:553_0: Sati sammussatīti khādanīyabhojanīyesu sati sammussati. Te kira puññavisesādhigatena
atk-s0101a0:553_1: mahantena attano sirivibhavena nakkhattaṃ kīḷantā tāya sampattimahantatāya – “āhāraṃ
atk-s0101a0:553_2: paribhuñjimha, na paribhuñjimhā”tipi na jānanti. Atha ekāhārātikkamanato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0101a0:553_3: nirantaraṃ khādantāpi pivantāpi cavantiyeva, na tiṭṭhanti. Kasmā? Kammajatejassa
atk-s0101a0:553_4: balavatāya, karajakāyassa mandatāya, manussānañhi kammajatejo mando, karajakāyo balavā.
atk-s0101a0:553_5: Tesaṃ tejassa mandatāya karajakāyassa balavatāya sattāhampi atikkamitvā uṇhodakaacchayāguādīhi
atk-s0101a0:553_6: sakkā vatthuṃ upatthambhetuṃ. Devānaṃ pana tejo balavā hoti, karajaṃ mandaṃ. Te ekaṃ
atk-s0101a0:553_7: āhāravelaṃ atikkamitvāva saṇṭhātuṃ na sakkonti. Yathā nāma gimhānaṃ majjhanhike tattapāsāṇe
atk-s0101a0:553_8: ṭhapitaṃ padumaṃ vā uppalaṃ vā sāyanhasamaye ghaṭasatenāpi siñciyamānaṃ pākatikaṃ
atk-s0101a0:553_9: na hoti, vinassatiyeva. Evameva pacchā nirantaraṃ khādantāpi pivantāpi cavantiyeva,
atk-s0101a0:553_10: na tiṭṭhanti. Tenāha “satiyā sammosā te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī”ti. Katame pana te
atk-s0101a0:553_11: devāti? Ime devāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vicāraṇā natthi, “devānaṃ kammajatejo balavā hoti,
atk-s0101a0:553_12: karajaṃ manda”nti avisesena vuttattā pana ye keci kabaḷīkārāhārūpajīvino devā evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:553_13: karonti, teyeva cavantīti veditabbā. Keci panāhu – “nimmānaratiparanimmitavasavattino
atk-s0101a0:553_14: te devā”ti. Khiḍḍāpadussanamatteneva hete khiḍḍāpadosikāti vuttā. Sesamettha purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:554_0: 47-48. Tatiyavāre manena padussanti vinassantīti manopadosikā, ete cātumahārājikā.
atk-s0101a0:554_1: Tesu kira eko devaputto – nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmīti saparivāro rathena vīthiṃ paṭipajjati,
atk-s0101a0:554_2: athañño nikkhamanto taṃ purato gacchantaṃ disvā – ‘bho ayaṃ kapaṇo’, adiṭṭhapubbaṃ
atk-s0101a0:554_3: viya etaṃ disvā – “pītiyā uddhumāto viya bhijjamāno viya ca gacchatī”ti kujjhati.
atk-s0101a0:554_4: Purato gacchantopi nivattitvā taṃ kuddhaṃ disvā – kuddhā nāma suviditā hontīti kuddhabhāvamassa
atk-s0101a0:554_5: ñatvā – “tvaṃ kuddho, mayhaṃ kiṃ karissasi, ayaṃ sampatti mayā dānasīlādīnaṃ vasena
atk-s0101a0:554_6: laddhā, na tuyhaṃ vasenā”ti paṭikujjhati. Ekasmiñhi kuddhe itaro akuddho rakkhati,
atk-s0101a0:554_7: ubhosu pana kuddhesu ekassa kodho itarassa paccayo hoti. Tassapi kodho itarassa paccayo
atk-s0101a0:554_8: hotīti ubho kandantānaṃyeva orodhānaṃ cavanti. Ayamettha dhammatā. Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:555_0: 49-52. Takkīvāde ayaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ bhedaṃ passati, cittaṃ pana yasmā purimaṃ purimaṃ
atk-s0101a0:555_1: pacchimassa pacchimassa paccayaṃ datvāva nirujjhati, tasmā cakkhādīnaṃ bhedato balavatarampi
atk-s0101a0:555_2: cittassa bhedaṃ na passati. So taṃ apassanto yathā nāma sakuṇo ekaṃ rukkhaṃ jahitvā
atk-s0101a0:555_3: aññasmiṃ nilīyati, evameva imasmiṃ attabhāve bhinne cittaṃ aññatra gacchatīti gahetvā
atk-s0101a0:557: 53. Antānantikāti antānantavādā, antaṃ vā anantaṃ vā antānantaṃ vā nevantānānantaṃ vā ārabbha pavattavādāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:558_0: 54-60. Antasaññī lokasmiṃ viharatīti paṭibhāganimittaṃ cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ avaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0101a0:558_1: taṃ – “loko”ti gahetvā antasaññī lokasmiṃ viharati, cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ katvā vaḍḍhitakasiṇo
atk-s0101a0:558_2: pana anantasaññī hoti, uddhamadho avaḍḍhetvā pana tiriyaṃ vaḍḍhetvā uddhamadho antasaññī,
atk-s0101a0:558_3: tiriyaṃ anantasaññī. Takkīvādo vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Ime cattāropi attanā diṭṭhapubbānusāreneva
atk-s0101a0:560_0: 61. Na maratīti amarā. Kā sā? Evantipi me notiādinā nayena pariyantarahitā diṭṭhigatikassa
atk-s0101a0:560_1: diṭṭhi ceva vācā ca. Vividho khepoti vikkhepo, amarāya diṭṭhiyā vācāya ca vikkhepoti
atk-s0101a0:560_2: amarāvikkhepo, so etesaṃ atthīti amarāvikkhepikā, aparo nayo – amarā nāma ekā macchajāti,
atk-s0101a0:560_3: sā ummujjananimujjanādivasena udake sandhāvamānā gahetuṃ na sakkāti, evameva ayampi
atk-s0101a0:560_4: vādo itocito ca sandhāvati, gāhaṃ na upagacchatīti amarāvikkhepoti vuccati. So etesaṃ
atk-s0101a0:561_0: 62. “Idaṃ kusala”nti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātīti dasa kusalakammapathe yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0101a0:561_1: nappajānātīti attho. Akusalepi dasa akusalakammapathāva adhippetā. So mamassa vighātoti
atk-s0101a0:561_2: “musā mayā bhaṇita”nti vippaṭisāruppattiyā mama vighāto assa, dukkhaṃ bhaveyyāti
atk-s0101a0:561_3: attho. So mamassa antarāyoti so mama saggassa ceva maggassa ca antarāyo assa. Musāvādabhayā
atk-s0101a0:561_4: musāvādaparijegucchāti musāvāde ottappena ceva hiriyā ca. Vācāvikkhepaṃ āpajjatīti
atk-s0101a0:561_5: vācāya vikkhepaṃ āpajjati. Kīdisaṃ? Amarāvikkhepaṃ, apariyantavikkhepanti attho.
atk-s0101a0:562_0: Evantipi me notiādīsu evantipi me noti aniyamitavikkhepo. Tathātipi me noti “sassato
atk-s0101a0:562_1: attā ca loko cā”ti vuttaṃ sassatavādaṃ paṭikkhipati. Aññathātipi me noti sassatato
atk-s0101a0:562_2: aññathā vuttaṃ ekaccasassataṃ paṭikkhipati. Notipi me noti – “na hoti tathāgato paraṃ
atk-s0101a0:562_3: maraṇā”ti vuttaṃ ucchedaṃ paṭikkhipati. No notipi me noti “neva hoti na na hotī”ti
atk-s0101a0:562_4: vuttaṃ takkīvādaṃ paṭikkhipati. Sayaṃ pana “idaṃ kusala”nti vā “akusala”nti vā puṭṭho
atk-s0101a0:562_5: na kiñci byākaroti. “Idaṃ kusala”nti puṭṭho “evantipi me no”ti vadati. Tato “kiṃ
atk-s0101a0:562_6: akusala”nti vutte “tathātipi me no”ti vadati. “Kiṃ ubhayato aññathā”ti vutte “aññathātipi
atk-s0101a0:562_7: me no”ti vadati. Tato “tividhenāpi na hoti, kiṃ te laddhī”ti vutte “notipi me no”ti
atk-s0101a0:562_8: vadati. Tato “kiṃ no noti te laddhī”ti vutte “no notipi me no”ti evaṃ vikkhepameva
atk-s0101a0:563_0: 63. Chando vā rāgo vāti ajānantopi sahasā kusalameva “kusala”nti vatvā akusalameva
atk-s0101a0:563_1: “akusala”nti vatvā mayā asukassa nāma evaṃ byākataṃ, kiṃ taṃ subyākatanti aññe paṇḍite
atk-s0101a0:563_2: pucchitvā tehi – “subyākataṃ, bhadramukha, kusalameva tayā kusalaṃ, akusalameva akusalanti
atk-s0101a0:563_3: byākata”nti vutte natthi mayā sadiso paṇḍitoti evaṃ me tattha chando vā rāgo vā assāti
atk-s0101a0:563_4: attho. Ettha ca chando dubbalarāgo, rāgo balavarāgo. Doso vā paṭigho vāti kusalaṃ
atk-s0101a0:563_5: pana “akusala”nti, akusalaṃ vā “kusala”nti vatvā aññe paṇḍite pucchitvā tehi – “dubyākataṃ
atk-s0101a0:563_6: tayā”ti vutte ettakampi nāma na jānāmīti tattha me assa doso vā paṭigho vāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:564_0: Taṃ mamassa upādānaṃ, so mamassa vighātoti taṃ chandarāgadvayaṃ mama upādānaṃ assa,
atk-s0101a0:564_1: dosapaṭighadvayaṃ vighāto. Ubhayampi vā daḷhaggahaṇavasena upādānaṃ, vihananavasena
atk-s0101a0:564_2: vighāto. Rāgo hi amuñcitukāmatāya ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhāti jalūkā viya. Doso vināsetukāmatāya
atk-s0101a0:564_3: āsīviso viya. Ubhopi cete santāpakaṭṭhena vihananti yevāti “upādāna”nti ca “vighāto”ti
atk-s0101a0:565_0: 64. Paṇḍitāti paṇḍiccena samannāgatā. Nipuṇāti saṇhasukhumabuddhino sukhumaatthantaraṃ
atk-s0101a0:565_1: paṭivijjhanasamatthā. Kataparappavādāti viññātaparappavādā ceva parehi saddhiṃ katavādaparicayā
atk-s0101a0:565_2: ca. Vālavedhirūpāti vālavedhidhanuggahasadisā. Te bhindantā maññeti vālavedhi viya
atk-s0101a0:565_3: vālaṃ sukhumānipi paresaṃ diṭṭhigatāni attano paññāgatena bhindantā viya carantīti
atk-s0101a0:565_4: attho. Te maṃ tatthāti te samaṇabrāhmaṇā maṃ tesu kusalākusalesu. Samanuyuñjeyyunti
atk-s0101a0:565_5: “kiṃ kusalaṃ, kiṃ akusalanti attano laddhiṃ vadā”ti laddhiṃ puccheyyuṃ. Samanugāheyyunti
atk-s0101a0:565_6: “idaṃ nāmā”ti vutte “kena kāraṇena etamatthaṃ gāheyyu”nti kāraṇaṃ puccheyyuṃ. Samanubhāseyyunti
atk-s0101a0:565_7: “iminā nāma kāraṇenā”ti vutte kāraṇe dosaṃ dassetvā “na tvaṃ idaṃ jānāsi, idaṃ pana
atk-s0101a0:565_8: gaṇha, idaṃ vissajjehī”ti evaṃ samanuyuñjeyyuṃ. Na sampāyeyyanti na sampādeyyaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:565_9: sampādetvā kathetuṃ na sakkuṇeyyanti attho. So mamassa vighātoti yaṃ taṃ punappunaṃ
atk-s0101a0:565_10: vatvāpi asampāyanaṃ nāma, so mama vighāto assa, oṭṭhatālujivhāgalasosanadukkhameva
atk-s0101a0:566_0: 65-66. Mandoti mandapañño apaññassevetaṃ nāmaṃ. Momūhoti atisammūḷho. Hoti tathāgatotiādīsu
atk-s0101a0:566_1: satto “tathāgato”ti adhippeto. Sesamettha uttānameva. Imepi cattāro pubbe pavattadhammānusāreneva
atk-s0101a0:568: 67. “Adhiccasamuppanno attā ca loko cā”ti dassanaṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ. Taṃ etesaṃ atthīti adhiccasamuppannikā. Adhiccasamuppannanti akāraṇasamuppannaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:569_0: 68-73. Asaññasattāti desanāsīsametaṃ, acittuppādā rūpamattakaattabhāvāti attho. Tesaṃ
atk-s0101a0:569_1: evaṃ uppatti veditabbā – ekacco hi titthāyatane pabbajitvā vāyokasiṇe parikammaṃ
atk-s0101a0:569_2: katvā catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā jhānā vuṭṭhāya – “citte dosaṃ passati, citte sati
atk-s0101a0:569_3: hatthacchedādidukkhañceva sabbabhayāni ca honti, alaṃ iminā cittena, acittakabhāvova
atk-s0101a0:569_4: santo”ti, evaṃ citte dosaṃ passitvā aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā asaññasattesu nibbattati,
atk-s0101a0:569_5: cittamassa cuticittanirodhena idheva nivattati, rūpakkhandhamattameva tattha pātubhavati.
atk-s0101a0:569_6: Te tattha yathā nāma jiyāvegakkhitto saro yattako jiyāvego, tattakameva ākāse gacchati.
atk-s0101a0:569_7: Evameva jhānavegakkhittā upapajjitvā yattako jhānavego, tattakameva kālaṃ tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0101a0:569_8: jhānavege pana parihīne tattha rūpakkhandho antaradhāyati, idha pana paṭisandhisaññā
atk-s0101a0:569_9: uppajjati. Yasmā pana tāya idha uppannasaññāya tesaṃ tattha cuti paññāyati, tasmā
atk-s0101a0:569_10: “saññuppādā ca pana te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī”ti vuttaṃ. Santatāyāti santabhāvāya.
atk-s0101a0:571_0: 74. Evaṃ aṭṭhārasa pubbantakappike dassetvā idāni catucattārīsaṃ aparantakappike
atk-s0101a0:571_2: kappetvā gaṇhantīti aparantakappikā, aparantakappo vā etesaṃ atthīti aparantakappikā.
atk-s0101a0:573: 75. Uddhamāghātanikāti āghātanaṃ vuccati maraṇaṃ, uddhamāghātanā attānaṃ vadantīti uddhamāghātanikā. Saññīti pavatto vādo, saññīvādo, so etesaṃ atthīti saññīvādā.
atk-s0101a0:574_1: gahetvā vā ājīvakādayo viya takkamatteneva vā “rūpī attā hoti, arogo paraṃ maraṇā
atk-s0101a0:574_2: saññī”ti naṃ paññapenti. Tattha arogoti nicco. Arūpasamāpattinimittaṃ pana “attā”ti
atk-s0101a0:574_3: samāpattisaññañcassa “saññā”ti gahetvā vā nigaṇṭhādayo viya takkamatteneva vā “arūpī
atk-s0101a0:574_4: attā hoti, arogo paraṃ maraṇā saññī”ti naṃ paññapenti. Tatiyā pana missakagāhavasena
atk-s0101a0:574_5: pavattā diṭṭhi. Catutthā takkagāheneva. Dutiyacatukkaṃ antānantikavāde vuttanayeneva
atk-s0101a0:574_6: veditabbaṃ. Tatiyacatukke samāpannakavasena ekattasaññī, asamāpannakavasena nānattasaññī,
atk-s0101a0:574_7: parittakasiṇavasena parittasaññī, vipulakasiṇavasena appamāṇasaññīti veditabbā. Catutthacatukke
atk-s0101a0:574_8: pana dibbena cakkhunā tikacatukkajjhānabhūmiyaṃ nibbattamānaṃ disvā “ekantasukhī”ti
atk-s0101a0:574_9: gaṇhāti. Niraye nibbattamānaṃ disvā “ekantadukkhī”ti. Manussesu nibbattamānaṃ disvā
atk-s0101a0:574_11: Visesato hi pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇalābhino pubbantakappikā honti, dibbacakkhukā aparantakappikāti.
atk-s0101a0:576_0: 78-83. Asaññīvādo saññīvāde ādimhi vuttānaṃ dvinnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:576_1: Tathā nevasaññīnāsaññīvādo. Kevalañhi tattha “saññī attā”ti gaṇhantānaṃ tā diṭṭhiyo,
atk-s0101a0:576_2: idha “asaññī”ti ca “nevasaññīnāsaññī”ti ca. Tattha na ekantena kāraṇaṃ pariyesitabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:578_0: 84. Ucchedavāde satoti vijjamānassa. Ucchedanti upacchedaṃ. Vināsanti adassanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:578_1: Vibhavanti bhāvavigamaṃ. Sabbānetāni aññamaññavevacanāneva. Tattha dve janā ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0101a0:578_2: gaṇhanti, lābhī ca alābhī ca. Lābhī arahato dibbena cakkhunā cutiṃ disvā upapattiṃ
atk-s0101a0:578_3: apassanto, yo vā cutimattameva daṭṭhuṃ sakkoti, na upapātaṃ; so ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0101a0:578_4: Alābhī ca “ko paralokaṃ na jānātī”ti kāmasukhagiddhatāya vā. “Yathā rukkhato paṇṇāni
atk-s0101a0:578_5: patitāni na puna viruhanti, evameva sattā”tiādinā takkena vā ucchedaṃ gaṇhāti. Idha
atk-s0101a0:578_6: pana taṇhādiṭṭhīnaṃ vasena tathā ca aññathā ca vikappetvāva imā satta diṭṭhiyo uppannāti veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:579_0: 85. Tattha rūpīti rūpavā. Cātumahābhūtikoti catumahābhūtamayo. Mātāpitūnaṃ etanti
atk-s0101a0:579_1: mātāpettikaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Sukkasoṇitaṃ. Mātāpettike sambhūto jātoti mātāpettikasambhavo.
atk-s0101a0:579_2: Iti rūpakāyasīsena manussattabhāvaṃ “attā”ti vadati. Ittheketi itthaṃ eke evameketi attho.
atk-s0101a0:580: 86. Dutiyo taṃ paṭikkhipitvā dibbattabhāvaṃ vadati. Dibboti devaloke sambhūto. Kāmāvacaroti cha kāmāvacaradevapariyāpanno. Kabaḷīkāraṃ āhāraṃ bhakkhatīti kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkho.
atk-s0101a0:581_0: 87. Manomayoti jhānamanena nibbatto. Sabbaṅgapaccaṅgīti sabbaṅgapaccaṅgayutto. Ahīnindriyoti
atk-s0101a0:581_1: paripuṇṇindriyo. Yāni brahmaloke atthi, tesaṃ vasena itaresañca saṇṭhānavasenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:582_0: 88-92. Sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamātiādīnaṃ attho visuddhimagge vutto. Ākāsānañcāyatanūpagotiādīsu
atk-s0101a0:582_1: pana ākāsānañcāyatanabhavaṃ upagatoti, evamattho veditabbo. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0101a0:584_0: 93. Diṭṭhadhammanibbānavāde diṭṭhadhammoti paccakkhadhammo vuccati, tattha tattha
atk-s0101a0:584_2: imasmiṃyeva attabhāve dukkhavūpasamananti attho. Taṃ vadantīti diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādā.
atk-s0101a0:585_0: 94. Pañcahi kāmaguṇehīti manāpiyarūpādīhi pañcahi kāmakoṭṭhāsehi bandhanehi vā. Samappitoti
atk-s0101a0:585_1: suṭṭhu appito allīno hutvā. Samaṅgībhūtoti samannāgato. Paricāretīti tesu kāmaguṇesu
atk-s0101a0:585_2: yathāsukhaṃ indriyāni cāreti sañcāreti itocito ca upaneti. Atha vā laḷati ramati
atk-s0101a0:585_3: kīḷati. Ettha ca duvidhā kāmaguṇā – mānusakā ceva dibbā ca. Mānusakā mandhātukāmaguṇasadisā
atk-s0101a0:585_4: daṭṭhabbā, dibbā paranimmitavasavattidevarājassa kāmaguṇasadisāti. Evarūpe kāme upagatānañhi
atk-s0101a0:586_0: 95. Dutiyavāre hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā paṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhā, pakatijahanaṭṭhena
atk-s0101a0:586_1: vipariṇāmadhammāti veditabbā. Tesaṃ vipariṇāmaññathābhāvāti tesaṃ kāmānaṃ vipariṇāmasaṅkhātā
atk-s0101a0:586_2: aññathābhāvā, yampi me ahosi, tampi me natthīti vuttanayena uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā.
atk-s0101a0:586_3: Tattha antonijjhāyanalakkhaṇo soko, tannissitalālappanalakkhaṇo paridevo, kāyappaṭipīḷanalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:586_4: dukkhaṃ, manovighātalakkhaṇaṃ domanassaṃ, visādalakkhaṇo upāyāso, vivicceva kāmehītiādīnamattho
atk-s0101a0:587_0: 96. Vitakkitanti abhiniropanavasena pavatto vitakko. Vicāritanti anumajjanavasena
atk-s0101a0:587_1: pavatto vicāro. Etenetanti etena vitakkitena ca vicāritena ca etaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:588_0: 97-98. Pītigatanti pītiyeva. Cetaso uppilāvitattanti cittassa uppilabhāvakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:588_1: Cetaso ābhogoti jhānā vuṭṭhāya tasmiṃ sukhe punappunaṃ cittassa ābhogo manasikāro
atk-s0101a0:589: Ettāvatā sabbāpi dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiyo kathitā honti. Yāsaṃ satteva ucchedadiṭṭhiyo, sesā sassatadiṭṭhiyo.
atk-s0101a0:590_0: 100-104. Idāni – “imehi kho te, bhikkhave”ti iminā vārena sabbepi te aparantakappike
atk-s0101a0:590_1: ekajjhaṃ niyyātetvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ vissajjeti. Puna – “imehi, kho te bhikkhave”tiādinā
atk-s0101a0:590_2: vārena sabbepi te pubbantāparantakappike ekajjhaṃ niyyātetvā tadeva ñāṇaṃ vissajjeti.
atk-s0101a0:590_3: Iti “katame ca te, bhikkhave, dhammā”tiādimhi pucchamānopi sabbaññutaññāṇameva pucchitvā
atk-s0101a0:590_4: vissajjamānopi sattānaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ tulāya tulayanto viya sinerupādato vālukaṃ uddharanto
atk-s0101a0:590_5: viya dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni uddharitvā sabbaññutaññāṇameva vissajjeti. Evamayaṃ yathānusandhivasena desanā āgatā.
atk-s0101a0:591_0: Tayo hi suttassa anusandhī – pucchānusandhi, ajjhāsayānusandhi, yathānusandhīti.
atk-s0101a0:591_1: Tattha “evaṃ vutte aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – kiṃ nu kho, bhante, orimaṃ
atk-s0101a0:591_2: tīraṃ, kiṃ pārimaṃ tīraṃ, ko majjhe saṃsīdo, ko thale ussādo, ko manussaggāho, ko
atk-s0101a0:591_3: amanussaggāho, ko āvaṭṭaggāho, ko antopūtibhāvo”ti evaṃ pucchantānaṃ bhagavatā vissajjitasuttavasena
atk-s0101a0:592_0: Atha kho aññatarassa bhikkhuno evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi – “iti kira bho rūpaṃ
atk-s0101a0:592_1: anattā…, vedanā…, saññā…, saṅkhārā …, viññāṇaṃ anattā, anattakatāni kira kammāni
atk-s0101a0:592_2: kamattānaṃ phusissantī”ti. Atha kho bhagavā tassa bhikkhuno cetasā ceto parivitakkamaññāya
atk-s0101a0:592_3: bhikkhū āmantesi – “ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati, yaṃ idhekacco moghapuriso
atk-s0101a0:592_4: avidvā avijjāgato taṇhādhipateyyena cetasā satthusāsanaṃ atidhāvitabbaṃ maññeyya
atk-s0101a0:592_5: – “iti kira bho rūpaṃ anattā…pe… phusissantī”ti. Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ
atk-s0101a0:592_6: niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti. Evaṃ paresaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā bhagavatā vuttasuttavasena
atk-s0101a0:593_0: Yena pana dhammena ādimhi desanā uṭṭhitā, tassa dhammassa anurūpadhammavasena vā
atk-s0101a0:593_1: paṭipakkhavasena vā yesu suttesu upari desanā āgacchati, tesaṃ vasena yathānusandhi
atk-s0101a0:593_2: veditabbo. Seyyathidaṃ, ākaṅkheyyasutte heṭṭhā sīlena desanā uṭṭhitā, upari cha abhiññā
atk-s0101a0:593_3: āgatā. Vatthasutte heṭṭhā kilesena desanā uṭṭhitā, upari brahmavihārā āgatā. Kosambakasutte
atk-s0101a0:593_4: heṭṭhā bhaṇḍanena uṭṭhitā, upari sāraṇīyadhammā āgatā. Kakacūpame heṭṭhā akkhantiyā
atk-s0101a0:593_5: uṭṭhitā, upari kakacūpamā āgatā. Imasmimpi brahmajāle heṭṭhā diṭṭhivasena desanā
atk-s0101a0:593_6: uṭṭhitā, upari suññatāpakāsanaṃ āgataṃ. Tena vuttaṃ – “evamayaṃ yathānusandhivasena desanā āgatā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:595_1: Tadapi tesaṃ bhavataṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ ajānataṃ apassataṃ vedayitaṃ taṇhāgatānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:595_2: paritassitavipphanditamevāti yena diṭṭhiassādena diṭṭhisukhena diṭṭhivedayitena te
atk-s0101a0:595_3: somanassajātā sassataṃ attānañca lokañca paññapenti catūhi vatthūhi, tadapi tesaṃ
atk-s0101a0:595_4: bhavantānaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvaṃ ajānantānaṃ apassantānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:595_5: vedayitaṃ taṇhāgatānaṃ kevalaṃ taṇhāgatānaṃyeva taṃ vedayitaṃ, tañca kho panetaṃ
atk-s0101a0:595_6: paritassitavipphanditameva. Diṭṭhisaṅkhātena ceva taṇhāsaṅkhātena ca paritassitena
atk-s0101a0:595_7: vipphanditameva calitameva kampitameva thusarāsimhi nikhātakhāṇusadisaṃ, na sotāpannassa
atk-s0101a0:595_8: dassanamiva niccalanti dasseti. Esa nayo ekaccasassatavādādīsupi.
atk-s0101a0:597_0: 118-130. Puna – “tatra, bhikkhave, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā sassatavādā”tiādi paramparapaccayadassanatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:597_1: āraddhaṃ. Tattha tadapi phassapaccayāti yena diṭṭhiassādena diṭṭhisukhena diṭṭhivedayitena
atk-s0101a0:597_2: te somanassajātā sassataṃ attānañca lokañca paññapenti catūhi vatthūhi, tadapi taṇhādiṭṭhipariphanditaṃ
atk-s0101a0:597_3: vedayitaṃ phassapaccayāti dasseti. Esa nayo sabbattha.
atk-s0101a0:598_0: 131-143. Idāni tassa paccayassa diṭṭhivedayite balavabhāvadassanatthaṃ puna – “tatra,
atk-s0101a0:598_1: bhikkhave, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā sassatavādā”tiādimāha. Tattha te vata aññatra phassāti
atk-s0101a0:598_2: te vata samaṇabrāhmaṇā taṃ vedayitaṃ vinā phassena paṭisaṃvedissantīti kāraṇametaṃ
atk-s0101a0:598_3: natthīti. Yathā hi patato gehassa upatthambhanatthāya thūṇā nāma balavapaccayo hoti,
atk-s0101a0:598_4: na taṃ thūṇāya anupatthambhitaṃ ṭhātuṃ sakkoti, evameva phassopi vedanāya balavapaccayo,
atk-s0101a0:598_5: taṃ vinā idaṃ diṭṭhivedayitaṃ natthīti dasseti. Esa nayo sabbattha.
atk-s0101a0:600_0: 144. Idāni tatra bhikkhave, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā sassatavādā sassataṃ attānañca lokañca
atk-s0101a0:600_1: paññapenti catūhi vatthūhi, yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā ekaccasassatikātiādinā nayena
atk-s0101a0:600_2: sabbadiṭṭhivedayitāni sampiṇḍeti. Kasmā? Upari phasse pakkhipanatthāya. Kathaṃ? Sabbe
atk-s0101a0:600_3: te chahi phassāyatanehi phussa phussa paṭisaṃvedentīti. Tattha cha phassāyatanāni
atk-s0101a0:600_6: hi ayaṃ āyatanasaddo pavattati. Tattha – “kambojo assānaṃ āyatanaṃ, gunnaṃ dakkhiṇāpatho”ti
atk-s0101a0:600_7: sañjātiyaṃ pavattati, sañjātiṭṭhāneti attho. “Manorame āyatane, sevanti naṃ vihaṅgamā”ti
atk-s0101a0:600_8: samosaraṇe. “Sati satiāyatane”ti kāraṇe. “Araññāyatane paṇṇakuṭīsu sammantī”ti paṇṇattimatte.
atk-s0101a0:600_9: Svāyamidha sañjātiādiatthattayepi yujjati. Cakkhādīsu hi phassapañcamakā dhammā sañjāyanti
atk-s0101a0:600_10: samosaranti, tāni ca tesaṃ kāraṇanti āyatanāni. Idha pana “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe
atk-s0101a0:600_11: ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso”ti iminā nayena phassasīseneva
atk-s0101a0:600_12: desanaṃ āropetvā phassaṃ ādiṃ katvā paccayaparamparaṃ dassetuṃ phassāyatanādīni vuttāni.
atk-s0101a0:601_0: Phussa phussa paṭisaṃvedentīti phusitvā phusitvā paṭisaṃvedenti. Ettha ca kiñcāpi
atk-s0101a0:601_1: āyatanānaṃ phusanakiccaṃ viya vuttaṃ, tathāpi na tesaṃ phusanakiccatā veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:601_2: Na hi āyatanāni phusanti, phassova taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ phusati, āyatanāni pana phasse
atk-s0101a0:601_3: upanikkhipitvā dassitāni; tasmā sabbe te cha phassāyatanasambhavena phassena rūpādīni
atk-s0101a0:601_4: ārammaṇāni phusitvā taṃ diṭṭhivedanaṃ paṭisaṃvedayantīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:602_0: Tesaṃ vedanāpaccayā taṇhātiādīsu vedanāti cha phassāyatanasambhavā vedanā. Sā rūpataṇhādibhedāya
atk-s0101a0:602_1: taṇhāya upanissayakoṭiyā paccayo hoti. Tena vuttaṃ – “tesaṃ vedanāpaccayā taṇhā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:602_2: Sā pana catubbidhassa upādānassa upanissayakoṭiyā ceva sahajātakoṭiyā ca paccayo
atk-s0101a0:602_3: hoti. Tathā upādānaṃ bhavassa. Bhavo jātiyā upanissayakoṭiyā paccayo hoti.
atk-s0101a0:603_0: Jātīti panettha savikārā pañcakkhandhā daṭṭhabbā, jāti jarāmaraṇassa ceva sokādīnañca
atk-s0101a0:603_1: upanissayakoṭiyā paccayo hoti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato pana paṭiccasamuppādakathā
atk-s0101a0:603_2: visuddhimagge vuttā. Idha panassa payojanamattameva veditabbaṃ. Bhagavā hi vaṭṭakathaṃ
atk-s0101a0:603_3: kathento – “purimā, bhikkhave, koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya, ‘ito pubbe avijjā nāhosi,
atk-s0101a0:603_4: atha pacchā samabhavī’ti evañcetaṃ, bhikkhave, vuccati, atha ca pana paññāyati “idappaccayā
atk-s0101a0:603_5: avijjā”ti evaṃ avijjāsīsena vā, purimā, bhikkhave, koṭi na paññāyati bhavataṇhāya…pe…
atk-s0101a0:603_6: “idappaccayā bhavataṇhā”ti evaṃ taṇhāsīsena vā, purimā, bhikkhave, koṭi na paññāyati
atk-s0101a0:603_7: bhavadiṭṭhiyā…pe… “idappaccayā bhavadiṭṭhī”ti evaṃ diṭṭhisīsena vā kathesi”. Idha
atk-s0101a0:603_8: pana diṭṭhisīsena kathento vedanārāgena uppajjamānā diṭṭhiyo kathetvā vedanāmūlakaṃ
atk-s0101a0:603_9: paṭiccasamuppādaṃ kathesi. Tena idaṃ dasseti – “evamete diṭṭhigatikā, idaṃ dassanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:603_10: gahetvā tīsu bhavesu catūsu yonīsu pañcasu gatīsu sattasu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu navasu
atk-s0101a0:603_11: sattāvāsesu ito ettha etto idhāti sandhāvantā saṃsarantā yante yuttagoṇo viya, thambhe
atk-s0101a0:603_12: upanibaddhakukkuro viya, vātena vippannaṭṭhanāvā viya ca vaṭṭadukkhameva anuparivattanti,
atk-s0101a0:605_0: 145. Evaṃ diṭṭhigatikādhiṭṭhānaṃ vaṭṭaṃ kathetvā idāni yuttayogabhikkhuadhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:605_1: katvā vivaṭṭaṃ dassento – “yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhū”tiādimāha. Tattha yatoti
atk-s0101a0:605_2: yadā. Channaṃ phassāyatanānanti yehi chahi phassāyatanehi phusitvā paṭisaṃvedayamānānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:605_3: diṭṭhigatikānaṃ vaṭṭaṃ vattati, tesaṃyeva channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ. Samudayantiādīsu
atk-s0101a0:605_5: samudayādayo veditabbā. Yathā pana tattha “phassasamudayā phassanirodhā”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:605_6: evamidha, taṃ cakkhādīsu – “āhārasamudayā āhāranirodhā”ti veditabbaṃ. Manāyatane
atk-s0101a0:606_0: Uttaritaraṃ pajānātīti diṭṭhigatiko diṭṭhimeva jānāti. Ayaṃ pana diṭṭhiñca diṭṭhito
atk-s0101a0:606_1: ca uttaritaraṃ sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttinti yāva arahattā jānāti. Ko evaṃ jānātīti?
atk-s0101a0:606_2: Khīṇāsavo jānāti, anāgāmī, sakadāgāmī, sotāpanno, bahussuto, ganthadharo bhikkhu
atk-s0101a0:606_3: jānāti, āraddhavipassako jānāti. Desanā pana arahattanikūṭeneva niṭṭhāpitāti.
atk-s0101a0:607_0: 146. Evaṃ vivaṭṭaṃ kathetvā idāni “desanājālavimutto diṭṭhigatiko nāma natthī”ti
atk-s0101a0:607_1: dassanatthaṃ puna – “ye hi keci, bhikkhave”ti ārabhi. Tattha antojālīkatāti imassa
atk-s0101a0:607_2: mayhaṃ desanājālassa antoyeva katā. Ettha sitā vāti etasmiṃ mama desanājāle sitā
atk-s0101a0:607_3: nissitā avasitāva. Ummujjamānā ummujjantīti kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Te adho osīdantāpi uddhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:607_4: uggacchantāpi mama desanājāle sitāva hutvā osīdanti ca uggacchanti ca. Ettha pariyāpannāti
atk-s0101a0:607_5: ettha mayhaṃ desanājāle pariyāpannā, etena ābaddhā antojālīkatā ca hutvā ummujjamānā
atk-s0101a0:607_6: ummujjanti, na hettha asaṅgahito diṭṭhigatiko nāma atthīti.
atk-s0101a0:608_0: Sukhumacchikenāti saṇhaacchikena sukhumacchiddenāti attho. Kevaṭṭo viya hi bhagavā,
atk-s0101a0:608_1: jālaṃ viya desanā, parittaudakaṃ viya dasasahassilokadhātu, oḷārikā pāṇā viya dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatikā.
atk-s0101a0:608_2: Tassa tīre ṭhatvā olokentassa oḷārikānaṃ pāṇānaṃ antojālīkatabhāvadassanaṃ viya bhagavato
atk-s0101a0:608_3: sabbadiṭṭhigatānaṃ desanājālassa antokatabhāvadassananti evamettha opammasaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:609_0: 147. Evaṃ imāhi dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhīhi sabbadiṭṭhīnaṃ saṅgahitattā sabbesaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:609_1: etasmiṃ desanājāle pariyāpannabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni attano katthaci apariyāpannabhāvaṃ
atk-s0101a0:609_3: nayanti etāyāti netti. Nayantīti gīvāya bandhitvā ākaḍḍhanti, rajjuyā etaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:609_4: Idha pana nettisadisatāya bhavataṇhā nettīti adhippetā. Sā hi mahājanaṃ gīvāya bandhitvā
atk-s0101a0:609_5: taṃ taṃ bhavaṃ neti upanetīti bhavanetti. Arahattamaggasatthena ucchinnā bhavanetti
atk-s0101a0:610_0: Kāyassa bhedā uddhanti kāyassa bhedato uddhaṃ. Jīvitapariyādānāti jīvitassa sabbaso
atk-s0101a0:610_1: pariyādinnattā parikkhīṇattā, puna appaṭisandhikabhāvāti attho. Na taṃ dakkhantīti
atk-s0101a0:610_2: taṃ tathāgataṃ. Devā vā manussā vā na dakkhissanti, apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ gamissatīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:611_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhaveti, upamāyaṃ pana idaṃ saṃsandanaṃ. Ambarukkho viya hi tathāgatassa
atk-s0101a0:611_1: kāyo, rukkhe jātamahāvaṇṭo viya taṃ nissāya pubbe pavattataṇhā. Tasmiṃ vaṇṭe upanibaddhā
atk-s0101a0:611_3: hutvā āyatiṃ nibbattanakā pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanāni aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo. Yathā
atk-s0101a0:611_4: pana tasmiṃ vaṇṭe chinne sabbāni tāni ambāni tadanvayāni honti, taṃyeva vaṇṭaṃ anugatāni,
atk-s0101a0:611_5: vaṇṭacchedā chinnāni yevāti attho; evameva ye bhavanettivaṇṭassa anupacchinnattā
atk-s0101a0:611_6: āyatiṃ uppajjeyyuṃ pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanāni aṭṭhārasadhātuyo, sabbe te dhammā
atk-s0101a0:611_7: tadanvayā honti bhavanettiṃ anugatā, tāya chinnāya chinnā yevāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:612_0: Yathā pana tasmimpi rukkhe maṇḍūkakaṇṭakavisasamphassaṃ āgamma anupubbena sussitvā
atk-s0101a0:612_1: mate – “imasmiṃ ṭhāne evarūpo nāma rukkho ahosī”ti vohāramattameva hoti, na taṃ rukkhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:612_2: koci passati, evaṃ ariyamaggasamphassaṃ āgamma taṇhāsinehassa pariyādinnattā anupubbena
atk-s0101a0:612_3: sussitvā viya bhinne imasmiṃ kāye, kāyassa bhedā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā na taṃ dakkhanti,
atk-s0101a0:612_4: tathāgatampi devamanussā na dakkhissanti, evarūpassa nāma kira satthuno idaṃ sāsananti
atk-s0101a0:612_5: vohāramattameva bhavissatīti anupādisesanibbānadhātuṃ pāpetvā desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0101a0:613_0: 148. Evaṃ vutte āyasmā ānandoti evaṃ bhagavatā imasmiṃ sutte vutte thero ādito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0101a0:613_1: sabbaṃ suttaṃ samannāharitvā evaṃ buddhabalaṃ dīpetvā kathitasuttassa na bhagavatā
atk-s0101a0:613_2: nāmaṃ gahitaṃ, handassa nāmaṃ gaṇhāpessāmīti cintetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca.
atk-s0101a0:614_0: Tasmātiha tvantiādīsu ayamatthayojanā – ānanda, yasmā imasmiṃ dhammapariyāye idhatthopi
atk-s0101a0:614_1: paratthopi vibhatto, tasmātiha tvaṃ imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ “atthajāla”ntipi naṃ dhārehi;
atk-s0101a0:614_2: yasmā panettha bahū tantidhammā kathitā, tasmā “dhammajāla”ntipi naṃ dhārehi; yasmā
atk-s0101a0:614_3: ca ettha seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ vibhattaṃ, tasmā “brahmajāla”ntipi
atk-s0101a0:614_4: naṃ dhārehi; yasmā ettha dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiyo vibhattā, tasmā “diṭṭhijāla”ntipi naṃ
atk-s0101a0:614_5: dhārehi; yasmā pana imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ sutvā devaputtamārampi khandhamārampi maccumārampi
atk-s0101a0:614_6: kilesamārampi sakkā maddituṃ, tasmā “anuttaro saṅgāmavijayotipi naṃ dhārehī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:615_0: Idamavoca bhagavāti idaṃ nidānāvasānato pabhuti yāva “anuttaro saṅgāmavijayotipi
atk-s0101a0:615_1: naṃ dhārehī”ti sakalaṃ suttantaṃ bhagavā paresaṃ paññāya alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhaṃ paramagambhīraṃ
atk-s0101a0:615_2: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pakāsento sūriyo viya andhakāraṃ diṭṭhigatamahandhakāraṃ vidhamanto avoca.
atk-s0101a0:616_0: 149. Attamanā te bhikkhūti te bhikkhū attamanā sakamanā, buddhagatāya pītiyā udaggacittā
atk-s0101a0:616_1: hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhagavato bhāsitanti evaṃ vicitranayadesanāvilāsayuttaṃ idaṃ
atk-s0101a0:616_3: brahmassarena bhāsamānassa bhagavato vacanaṃ. Abhinandunti anumodiṃsu ceva sampaṭicchiṃsu
atk-s0101a0:616_4: ca. Ayañhi abhinandasaddo – “abhinandati abhivadatī”tiādīsu taṇhāyampi āgato. “Annamevābhinandanti,
atk-s0101a0:619: Ādīsu sampaṭicchanepi. “Abhinanditvā anumoditvā”tiādīsu anumodanepi. Svāyamidha anumodanasampaṭicchanesu yujjati. Tena vuttaṃ – “abhinandunti anumodiṃsu ceva sampaṭicchiṃsu cā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:622: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasminti imasmiṃ niggāthakasutte. Niggāthakattā hi idaṃ veyyākaraṇanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:623_0: Dasasahassī lokadhātūti dasasahassacakkavāḷaparimāṇā lokadhātu. Akampitthāti na suttapariyosāneyeva
atk-s0101a0:623_1: akampitthāti veditabbā. Bhaññamāneti hi vuttaṃ. Tasmā dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhigatesu viniveṭhetvā
atk-s0101a0:623_2: desiyamānesu tassa tassa diṭṭhigatassa pariyosāne pariyosāneti dvāsaṭṭhiyā ṭhānesu
atk-s0101a0:624_0: Tattha aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi pathavīkampo veditabbo – dhātukkhobhena, iddhimato ānubhāvena,
atk-s0101a0:624_1: bodhisattassa gabbhokkantiyā, mātukucchito nikkhamanena, sambodhippattiyā, dhammacakkappavattanena,
atk-s0101a0:624_2: āyusaṅkhārossajjanena, parinibbānenāti. Tesaṃ vinicchayaṃ – “aṭṭha kho ime, ānanda,
atk-s0101a0:624_3: hetū aṭṭha paccayā mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāyā”ti evaṃ mahāparinibbāne āgatāya
atk-s0101a0:624_4: tantiyā vaṇṇanākāle vakkhāma. Ayaṃ pana mahāpathavī aparesupi aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu akampittha
atk-s0101a0:624_6: gotamakasutte, vessantarajātake, imasmiṃ brahmajāleti. Tattha mahābhinikkhamanabodhimaṇḍūpasaṅkamanesu
atk-s0101a0:624_7: vīriyabalena akampittha. Paṃsukūlaggahaṇe dvisahassadīpaparivāre cattāro mahādīpe
atk-s0101a0:624_8: pahāya pabbajitvā susānaṃ gantvā paṃsukūlaṃ gaṇhantena dukkaraṃ bhagavatā katanti
atk-s0101a0:624_10: akampittha. Kāḷakārāmagotamakasuttesu – “ahaṃ sakkhī bhagavā”ti sakkhibhāvena akampittha.
atk-s0101a0:624_11: Imasmiṃ pana brahmajāle dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhigatesu vijaṭetvā niggumbaṃ katvā desiyamānesu
atk-s0101a0:625_0: Na kevalañca etesu ṭhānesuyeva pathavī akampittha, atha kho tīsu saṅgahesupi mahāmahindattherassa
atk-s0101a0:625_1: imaṃ dīpaṃ āgantvā jotivane nisīditvā dhammaṃ desitadivasepi akampittha. Kalyāṇiyavihāre
atk-s0101a0:625_2: ca piṇḍapātiyattherassa cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjitvā tattheva nisīditvā buddhārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:625_3: pītiṃ gahetvā imaṃ suttantaṃ āraddhassa suttapariyosāne udakapariyantaṃ katvā akampittha.
atk-s0101a0:625_4: Lohapāsādassa pācīnaambalaṭṭhikaṭṭhānaṃ nāma ahosi. Tattha nisīditvā dīghabhāṇakattherā
atk-s0101a0:625_5: brahmajālasuttaṃ ārabhiṃsu, tesaṃ sajjhāyapariyosānepi udakapariyantameva katvā pathavī akampitthāti.
atk-s0101a0:632_0: 150. Evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe… rājagaheti sāmaññaphalasuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ apubbapadavaṇṇanā
atk-s0101a0:632_1: – rājagaheti evaṃnāmake nagare. Tañhi mandhātumahāgovindādīhi pariggahitattā rājagahanti
atk-s0101a0:632_2: vuccati. Aññepi ettha pakāre vaṇṇayanti, kiṃ tehi? Nāmamattametaṃ tassa nagarassa.
atk-s0101a0:632_3: Taṃ panetaṃ buddhakāle ca cakkavattikāle ca nagaraṃ hoti, sesakāle suññaṃ hoti yakkhapariggahitaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:632_4: tesaṃ vasanavanaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati. Viharatīti avisesena iriyāpathadibbabrahmaariyavihāresu
atk-s0101a0:632_6: iriyāpathesu aññatarairiyāpathasamāyogaparidīpanaṃ. Tena ṭhitopi gacchantopi nisinnopi
atk-s0101a0:632_7: sayānopi bhagavā viharati ceva veditabbo. So hi ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanaṃ aññena iriyāpathena
atk-s0101a0:632_8: vicchinditvā aparipatantaṃ attabhāvaṃ harati pavatteti, tasmā viharatīti vuccati.
atk-s0101a0:633_0: Jīvakassa komārabhaccassa ambavaneti idamassa yaṃ gocaragāmaṃ upanissāya viharati,
atk-s0101a0:633_1: tassa samīpanivāsanaṭṭhānaparidīpanaṃ. Tasmā – rājagahe viharati jīvakassa komārabhaccassa
atk-s0101a0:633_2: ambavaneti rājagahasamīpe jīvakassa komārabhaccassa ambavane viharatīti evamettha
atk-s0101a0:633_3: attho veditabbo. Samīpatthe hetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Tattha jīvatīti jīvako, kumārena
atk-s0101a0:633_4: bhatoti komārabhacco. Yathāha – “kiṃ bhaṇe, etaṃ kākehi samparikiṇṇanti? Dārako devāti.
atk-s0101a0:633_5: Jīvati bhaṇeti? Jīvati, devāti. Tena hi, bhaṇe taṃ dārakaṃ amhākaṃ antepuraṃ netvā
atk-s0101a0:633_6: dhātīnaṃ detha posetunti. Tassa jīvatīti jīvakoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Kumārena posāpitoti
atk-s0101a0:633_7: komārabhaccoti nāmaṃ akaṃsū”ti ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepo. Vitthārena pana jīvakavatthukhandhake
atk-s0101a0:634_0: Ayaṃ pana jīvako ekasmiṃ samaye bhagavato dosābhisannaṃ kāyaṃ virecetvā siveyyakaṃ
atk-s0101a0:634_1: dussayugaṃ datvā vatthānumodanāpariyosāne sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya cintesi – “mayā
atk-s0101a0:634_2: divasassa dvattikkhattuṃ buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ gantabbaṃ, idañca veḷuvanaṃ atidūre, mayhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:634_3: pana ambavanaṃ uyyānaṃ āsannataraṃ, yaṃnūnāhaṃ ettha bhagavato vihāraṃ kāreyya”nti.
atk-s0101a0:634_4: So tasmiṃ ambavane rattiṭṭhānadivāṭhānaleṇakuṭimaṇḍapādīni sampādetvā bhagavato anucchavikaṃ
atk-s0101a0:634_5: gandhakuṭiṃ kārāpetvā ambavanaṃ aṭṭhārasahatthubbedhena tambapaṭṭavaṇṇena pākārena
atk-s0101a0:634_6: parikkhipāpetvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sacīvarabhattena santappetvā dakkhiṇodakaṃ
atk-s0101a0:634_7: pātetvā vihāraṃ niyyātesi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “jīvakassa komārabhaccassa ambavane”ti.
atk-s0101a0:635_0: Aḍḍhateḷasehi bhikkhusatehīti aḍḍhasatena ūnehi terasahi bhikkhusatehi. Rājātiādīsu
atk-s0101a0:635_1: rājati attano issariyasampattiyā catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi mahājanaṃ rañjeti vaḍḍhetīti
atk-s0101a0:635_2: rājā. Magadhānaṃ issaroti māgadho. Ajātoyeva rañño sattu bhavissatīti nemittakehi
atk-s0101a0:636_0: Tasmiṃ kira kucchigate deviyā evarūpo dohaḷo uppajji – “aho vatāhaṃ rañño dakkhiṇabāhulohitaṃ
atk-s0101a0:636_1: piveyya”nti, sā “bhāriye ṭhāne dohaḷo uppanno, na sakkā kassaci ārocetu”nti taṃ kathetuṃ
atk-s0101a0:636_2: asakkontī kisā dubbaṇṇā ahosi. Taṃ rājā pucchi – “bhadde, tuyhaṃ attabhāvo na pakativaṇṇo,
atk-s0101a0:636_3: kiṃ kāraṇa”nti? “Mā puccha, mahārājāti”. “Bhadde, tvaṃ attano ajjhāsayaṃ mayhaṃ akathentī
atk-s0101a0:636_4: kassa kathessasī”ti tathā tathā nibandhitvā kathāpesi. Sutvā ca – “bāle, kiṃ ettha
atk-s0101a0:636_5: tuyhaṃ bhāriyasaññā ahosī”ti vejjaṃ pakkosāpetvā suvaṇṇasatthakena bāhuṃ phālāpetvā
atk-s0101a0:636_6: suvaṇṇasarakena lohitaṃ gahetvā udakena sambhinditvā pāyesi. Nemittakā taṃ sutvā
atk-s0101a0:636_7: – “esa gabbho rañño sattu bhavissati, iminā rājā haññissatī”ti byākariṃsu. Devī sutvā
atk-s0101a0:636_8: – “mayhaṃ kira kucchito nikkhanto rājānaṃ māressatī”ti gabbhaṃ pātetukāmā uyyānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:636_9: gantvā kucchiṃ maddāpesi, gabbho na patati. Sā punappunaṃ gantvā tatheva kāresi.
atk-s0101a0:636_10: Rājā kimatthaṃ ayaṃ abhiṇhaṃ uyyānaṃ gacchatīti parivīmaṃsanto taṃ kāraṇaṃ sutvā
atk-s0101a0:636_11: – “bhadde, tava kucchiyaṃ puttoti vā dhītāti vā na paññāyati, attano nibbattadārakaṃ
atk-s0101a0:636_12: evamakāsīti mahā aguṇarāsipi no jambudīpatale āvibhavissati, mā tvaṃ evaṃ karohī”ti
atk-s0101a0:636_13: nivāretvā ārakkhaṃ adāsi. Sā gabbhavuṭṭhānakāle “māressāmī”ti cintesi. Tadāpi ārakkhamanussā
atk-s0101a0:636_14: dārakaṃ apanayiṃsu. Athāparena samayena vuḍḍhippattaṃ kumāraṃ deviyā dassesuṃ. Sā
atk-s0101a0:636_15: taṃ disvāva puttasinehaṃ uppādesi, tena naṃ māretuṃ nāsakkhi. Rājāpi anukkamena puttassa oparajjamadāsi.
atk-s0101a0:637_0: Athekasmiṃ samaye devadatto rahogato cintesi – “sāriputtassa parisā mahāmoggallānassa
atk-s0101a0:637_1: parisā mahākassapassa parisāti, evamime visuṃ visuṃ dhurā, ahampi ekaṃ dhuraṃ nīharāmī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:637_2: So “na sakkā vinā lābhena parisaṃ uppādetuṃ, handāhaṃ lābhaṃ nibbattemī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0101a0:637_3: khandhake āgatanayena ajātasattuṃ kumāraṃ iddhipāṭihāriyena pasādetvā sāyaṃ pātaṃ
atk-s0101a0:637_4: pañcahi rathasatehi upaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchantaṃ ativissatthaṃ ñatvā ekadivasaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0101a0:637_5: etadavoca – “pubbe kho, kumāra, manussā dīghāyukā, etarahi appāyukā, tena hi tvaṃ
atk-s0101a0:637_6: kumāra, pitaraṃ hantvā rājā hohi, ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ hantvā buddho bhavissāmī”ti kumāraṃ pituvadhe uyyojeti.
atk-s0101a0:638_0: So – “ayyo devadatto mahānubhāvo, etassa aviditaṃ nāma natthī”ti ūruyā potthaniyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:638_1: bandhitvā divā divassa bhīto ubbiggo ussaṅkī utrasto antepuraṃ pavisitvā vuttappakāraṃ
atk-s0101a0:638_2: vippakāraṃ akāsi. Atha naṃ amaccā gahetvā anuyuñjitvā – “kumāro ca hantabbo, devadatto
atk-s0101a0:638_3: ca, sabbe ca bhikkhū hantabbā”ti sammantayitvā rañño āṇāvasena karissāmāti rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:639_0: Rājā ye amaccā māretukāmā ahesuṃ, tesaṃ ṭhānantarāni acchinditvā, ye na māretukāmā,
atk-s0101a0:639_1: te uccesu ṭhānesu ṭhapetvā kumāraṃ pucchi – “kissa pana tvaṃ, kumāra, maṃ māretukāmosī”ti?
atk-s0101a0:639_2: “Rajjenamhi, deva, atthiko”ti. Rājā tassa rajjaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0101a0:640_0: So mayhaṃ manoratho nipphannoti devadattassa ārocesi. Tato naṃ so āha – “tvaṃ siṅgālaṃ
atk-s0101a0:640_1: antokatvā bheripariyonaddhapuriso viya sukiccakārimhīti maññasi, katipāheneva te
atk-s0101a0:640_2: pitā tayā kataṃ avamānaṃ cintetvā sayameva rājā bhavissatī”ti. Atha, bhante, kiṃ
atk-s0101a0:640_3: karomīti? Mūlaghaccaṃ ghātehīti. Nanu, bhante, mayhaṃ pitā na satthavajjhoti? Āhārupacchedena
atk-s0101a0:640_4: naṃ mārehīti. So pitaraṃ tāpanagehe pakkhipāpesi, tāpanagehaṃ nāma kammakaraṇatthāya
atk-s0101a0:640_5: kataṃ dhūmagharaṃ. “Mama mātaraṃ ṭhapetvā aññassa daṭṭhuṃ mā dethā”ti āha. Devī suvaṇṇasarake
atk-s0101a0:640_6: bhattaṃ pakkhipitvā ucchaṅgenādāya pavisati. Rājā taṃ bhuñjitvā yāpeti. So – “mayhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:640_7: pitā kathaṃ yāpetī”ti pucchitvā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā – “mayhaṃ mātu ucchaṅgaṃ katvā
atk-s0101a0:640_8: pavisituṃ mā dethā”ti āha. Tato paṭṭhāya devī moḷiyaṃ pakkhipitvā pavisati. Tampi
atk-s0101a0:640_9: sutvā “moḷiṃ bandhitvā pavisituṃ mā dethā”ti. Tato suvaṇṇapādukāsu bhattaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0101a0:640_10: pidahitvā pādukā āruyha pavisati. Rājā tena yāpeti. Puna “kathaṃ yāpetī”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0101a0:640_11: tamatthaṃ sutvā “pādukā āruyha pavisitumpi mā dethā”ti āha. Tato paṭṭhāya devī gandhodakena
atk-s0101a0:640_12: nhāyitvā sarīraṃ catumadhurena makkhetvā pārupitvā pavisati. Rājā tassā sarīraṃ lehitvā
atk-s0101a0:640_13: yāpeti. Puna pucchitvā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “ito paṭṭhāya mayhaṃ mātu pavesanaṃ nivārethā”ti
atk-s0101a0:640_14: āha. Devī dvāramūle ṭhatvā “sāmi, bimbisāra, etaṃ daharakāle māretuṃ na adāsi, attano
atk-s0101a0:640_15: sattuṃ attanāva posesi, idaṃ pana dāni te pacchimadassanaṃ, nāhaṃ ito paṭṭhāya tumhe
atk-s0101a0:640_16: passituṃ labhāmi, sace mayhaṃ doso atthi, khamatha devā”ti roditvā kanditvā nivatti.
atk-s0101a0:641_0: Tato paṭṭhāya rañño āhāro natthi. Rājā maggaphalasukhena caṅkamena yāpeti. Ativiya
atk-s0101a0:641_1: assa attabhāvo virocati. So – “kathaṃ, me bhaṇe, pitā yāpetī”ti pucchitvā “caṅkamena,
atk-s0101a0:641_2: deva, yāpeti; ativiya cassa attabhāvo virocatī”ti sutvā ‘caṅkamaṃ dānissa hāressāmī’ti
atk-s0101a0:641_3: cintetvā – “mayhaṃ pitu pāde khurena phāletvā loṇatelena makkhetvā khadiraṅgārehi
atk-s0101a0:641_4: vītaccitehi pacathā”ti nhāpite pesesi. Rājā te disvā – “nūna mayhaṃ putto kenaci
atk-s0101a0:641_5: saññatto bhavissati, ime mama massukaraṇatthāyāgatā”ti cintesi. Te gantvā vanditvā
atk-s0101a0:641_6: aṭṭhaṃsu. ‘Kasmā āgatatthā’ti ca puṭṭhā taṃ sāsanaṃ ārocesuṃ. “Tumhākaṃ rañño manaṃ
atk-s0101a0:641_7: karothā”ti ca vuttā ‘nisīda, devā’ti vatvā ca rājānaṃ vanditvā – “deva, mayaṃ rañño
atk-s0101a0:641_8: āṇaṃ karoma, mā amhākaṃ kujjhittha, nayidaṃ tumhādisānaṃ dhammarājūnaṃ anucchavika”nti
atk-s0101a0:641_9: vatvā vāmahatthena gopphake gahetvā dakkhiṇahatthena khuraṃ gahetvā pādatalāni phāletvā
atk-s0101a0:641_10: loṇatelena makkhetvā khadiraṅgārehi vītaccitehi paciṃsu. Rājā kira pubbe cetiyaṅgaṇe
atk-s0101a0:641_11: saupāhano agamāsi, nisajjanatthāya paññattakaṭasārakañca adhotehi pādehi akkami,
atk-s0101a0:641_12: tassāyaṃ nissandoti vadanti. Rañño balavavedanā uppannā. So – “aho buddho, aho dhammo,
atk-s0101a0:641_13: aho saṅgho”ti anussarantoyeva cetiyaṅgaṇe khittamālā viya milāyitvā cātumahārājikadevaloke
atk-s0101a0:641_14: vessavaṇassa paricārako janavasabho nāma yakkho hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0101a0:642_0: Taṃ divasameva ajātasattussa putto jāto, puttassa jātabhāvañca pitumatabhāvañca nivedetuṃ
atk-s0101a0:642_1: dve lekhā ekakkhaṇeyeva āgatā. Amaccā – “paṭhamaṃ puttassa jātabhāvaṃ ārocessāmā”ti
atk-s0101a0:642_2: taṃ lekhaṃ rañño hatthe ṭhapesuṃ. Rañño taṅkhaṇeyeva puttasineho uppajjitvā sakalasarīraṃ
atk-s0101a0:642_3: khobhetvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca aṭṭhāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe pituguṇamaññāsi – “mayi jātepi
atk-s0101a0:642_4: mayhaṃ pitu evameva sineho uppanno”ti. So – “gacchatha, bhaṇe, mayhaṃ pitaraṃ vissajjethā”ti
atk-s0101a0:642_5: āha. “Kiṃ vissajjāpetha, devā”ti itaraṃ lekhaṃ hatthe ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:643_0: So taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā rodamāno mātusamīpaṃ gantvā – “ahosi nu, kho, amma, mayhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:643_1: pitu mayi jāte sineho”ti? Sā āha – “bālaputta, kiṃ vadesi, tava daharakāle aṅguliyā
atk-s0101a0:643_2: pīḷakā uṭṭhahi. Atha taṃ rodamānaṃ saññāpetuṃ asakkontā taṃ gahetvā vinicchayaṭṭhāne
atk-s0101a0:643_3: nisinnassa tava pitu santikaṃ agamaṃsu. Pitā te aṅguliṃ mukhe ṭhapesi. Pīḷakā mukheyeva
atk-s0101a0:643_4: bhijji. Atha kho pitā tava sinehena taṃ lohitamissakaṃ pubbaṃ aniṭṭhubhitvāva ajjhohari.
atk-s0101a0:643_5: Evarūpo te pitu sineho”ti. So roditvā paridevitvā pitu sarīrakiccaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0101a0:644_0: Devadattopi ajātasattuṃ upasaṅkamitvā – “purise, mahārāja, āṇāpehi, ye samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ
atk-s0101a0:644_1: jīvitā voropessantī”ti vatvā tena dinne purise pesetvā sayaṃ gijjhakūṭaṃ āruyha yantena
atk-s0101a0:644_2: silaṃ pavijjhitvā nāḷāgirihatthiṃ muñcāpetvāpi kenaci upāyena bhagavantaṃ māretuṃ
atk-s0101a0:644_3: asakkonto parihīnalābhasakkāro pañca vatthūni yācitvā tāni alabhamāno tehi janaṃ
atk-s0101a0:644_4: saññāpessāmīti saṅghabhedaṃ katvā sāriputtamoggallānesu parisaṃ ādāya pakkantesu
atk-s0101a0:644_5: uṇhalohitaṃ mukhena chaḍḍetvā navamāse gilānamañce nipajjitvā vippaṭisārajāto – “kuhiṃ
atk-s0101a0:644_6: etarahi satthā vasatī”ti pucchitvā “jetavane”ti vutte mañcakena maṃ āharitvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0101a0:644_7: dassethāti vatvā āhariyamāno bhagavato dassanārahassa kammassa akatattā jetavane
atk-s0101a0:644_8: pokkharaṇīsamīpeyeva dvedhā bhinnaṃ pathaviṃ pavisitvā mahāniraye patiṭṭhitoti. Ayamettha
atk-s0101a0:644_9: saṅkhepo. Vitthārakathānayo khandhake āgato. Āgatattā pana sabbaṃ na vuttanti. Evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:644_10: ajātoyeva rañño sattu bhavissatīti nemittakehi niddiṭṭhoti ajātasattu.
atk-s0101a0:645_0: Vedehiputtoti ayaṃ kosalarañño dhītāya putto, na videharañño. Vedehīti pana paṇḍitādhivacanametaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:645_1: Yathāha – “vedehikā gahapatānī, ayyo ānando vedehamunī”ti. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho –
atk-s0101a0:645_2: vidanti etenāti vedo, ñāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Vedena īhati ghaṭati vāyamatīti vedehī.
atk-s0101a0:646_0: Tadahūti tasmiṃ ahu, tasmiṃ divaseti attho. Upavasanti etthāti uposatho, upavasantīti
atk-s0101a0:646_1: sīlena vā anasanena vā upetā hutvā vasantīti attho. Ayaṃ panettha atthuddhāro – “āyāmāvuso,
atk-s0101a0:646_2: kappina, uposathaṃ gamissāmā”tiādīsu pātimokkhuddeso uposatho. “Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato
atk-s0101a0:646_3: kho, visākhe, uposatho upavuttho”tiādīsu sīlaṃ. “Suddhassa ve sadā phaggu, suddhassuposatho
atk-s0101a0:646_4: sadā”tiādīsu upavāso. “Uposatho nāma nāgarājā”tiādīsu paññatti. “Na, bhikkhave, tadahuposathe
atk-s0101a0:646_5: sabhikkhukā āvāsā”tiādīsu upavasitabbadivaso. Idhāpi soyeva adhippeto. So panesa
atk-s0101a0:646_6: aṭṭhamī cātuddasī pannarasībhedena tividho. Tasmā sesadvayanivāraṇatthaṃ pannaraseti
atk-s0101a0:647_0: Komudiyāti kumudavatiyā. Tadā kira kumudāni supupphitāni honti, tāni ettha santīti
atk-s0101a0:647_1: komudī. Cātumāsiniyāti cātumāsiyā, sā hi catunnaṃ māsānaṃ pariyosānabhūtāti cātumāsī.
atk-s0101a0:647_2: Idha pana cātumāsinīti vuccati. Māsapuṇṇatāya utupuṇṇatāya saṃvaccharapuṇṇatāya puṇṇā
atk-s0101a0:647_3: sampuṇṇāti puṇṇā. Mā iti cando vuccati, so ettha puṇṇoti puṇṇamā. Evaṃ puṇṇāya puṇṇamāyāti
atk-s0101a0:648_3: parivutoti attho. Uparipāsādavaragatoti pāsādavarassa uparigato. Mahārahe samussitasetacchatte
atk-s0101a0:648_4: kañcanāsane nisinno hoti. Kasmā nisinno? Niddāvinodanatthaṃ. Ayañhi rājā pitari upakkantadivasato
atk-s0101a0:648_6: viya kandamānoyeva pabujjhi. Kimetanti ca vutte, na kiñcīti vadati. Tenassa amanāpā
atk-s0101a0:648_7: niddā, iti niddāvinodanatthaṃ nisinno. Api ca tasmiṃ divase nakkhattaṃ saṅghuṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:648_10: racchāsabhāgena nakkhattakīḷaṃ anubhavamānena mahājanena samākiṇṇaṃ hoti. Iti nakkhattadivasatāyapi
atk-s0101a0:648_11: nisinnoti vadanti. Evaṃ pana vatvāpi – “rājakulassa nāma sadāpi nakkhattameva, niddāvinodanatthaṃyeva
atk-s0101a0:649_0: Udānaṃ udānesīti udāhāraṃ udāhari, yathā hi yaṃ telaṃ mānaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, vissanditvā
atk-s0101a0:649_1: gacchati, taṃ avasekoti vuccati. Yañca jalaṃ taḷākaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, ajjhottharitvā
atk-s0101a0:649_2: gacchati, taṃ oghoti vuccati; evameva yaṃ pītivacanaṃ hadayaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0101a0:649_3: adhikaṃ hutvā anto asaṇṭhahitvā bahinikkhamati, taṃ udānanti vuccati. Evarūpaṃ pītimayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:650_0: Dosināti dosāpagatā, abbhā, mahikā, dhūmo, rajo, rāhūti imehi pañcahi upakkilesehi
atk-s0101a0:650_1: virahitāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tasmā ramaṇīyātiādīni pañca thomanavacanāni. Sā hi mahājanassa
atk-s0101a0:650_2: manaṃ ramayatīti ramaṇīyā. Vuttadosavimuttāya candappabhāya obhāsitattā ativiya surūpāti
atk-s0101a0:650_3: abhirūpā. Dassituṃ yuttāti dassanīyā. Cittaṃ pasādetīti pāsādikā. Divasamāsādīnaṃ
atk-s0101a0:651_0: Kaṃ nu khvajjāti kaṃ nu kho ajja. Samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vāti samitapāpatāya samaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:651_1: Bāhitapāpatāya brāhmaṇaṃ. Yaṃ no payirupāsatoti vacanabyattayo esa, yaṃ amhākaṃ pañhapucchanavasena
atk-s0101a0:651_2: payirupāsantānaṃ madhuraṃ dhammaṃ sutvā cittaṃ pasīdeyyāti attho. Iti rājā iminā
atk-s0101a0:651_3: sabbenapi vacanena obhāsanimittakammaṃ akāsi. Kassa akāsīti? Jīvakassa. Kimatthaṃ?
atk-s0101a0:651_4: Bhagavato dassanatthaṃ. Kiṃ bhagavantaṃ sayaṃ dassanāya upagantuṃ na sakkotīti? Āma,
atk-s0101a0:652_0: Tena hi bhagavato upaṭṭhāko ariyasāvako attano pitā mārito, devadatto ca tameva nissāya
atk-s0101a0:652_1: bhagavato bahuṃ anatthamakāsi, iti mahāparādho esa, tāya mahāparādhatāya sayaṃ gantuṃ
atk-s0101a0:652_2: na sakkoti. Jīvako pana bhagavato upaṭṭhāko, tassa piṭṭhichāyāya bhagavantaṃ passissāmīti
atk-s0101a0:652_3: obhāsanimittakammaṃ akāsi. Kiṃ jīvako pana – “mayhaṃ idaṃ obhāsanimittakamma”nti
atk-s0101a0:652_4: jānātīti? Āma jānāti. Atha kasmā tuṇhī ahosīti? Vikkhepapacchedanatthaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:653_0: Tassañhi parisati channaṃ satthārānaṃ upaṭṭhākā bahū sannipatitā, te asikkhitānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:653_1: payirupāsanena sayampi asikkhitāva. Te mayi bhagavato guṇakathaṃ āraddhe antarantarā
atk-s0101a0:653_2: uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya attano satthārānaṃ guṇaṃ kathessanti, evaṃ me satthu guṇakathā pariyosānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:653_3: na gamissati. Rājā pana imesaṃ kulūpake upasaṅkamitvā gahitāsāratāya tesaṃ guṇakathāya
atk-s0101a0:653_4: anattamano hutvā maṃ paṭipucchissati, athāhaṃ nibbikkhepaṃ satthu guṇaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0101a0:653_5: rājānaṃ satthu santikaṃ gahetvā gamissāmīti jānantova vikkhepapacchedanatthaṃ tuṇhī ahosīti.
atk-s0101a0:654_0: Tepi amaccā evaṃ cintesuṃ – “ajja rājā pañcahi padehi rattiṃ thometi, addhā kiñci
atk-s0101a0:654_1: samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchitvā dhammaṃ sotukāmo, yassa cesa
atk-s0101a0:654_2: dhammaṃ sutvā pasīdissati, tassa ca mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ karissati, yassa pana kulūpako
atk-s0101a0:655_0: 151-152. Te evaṃ cintetvā – “ahaṃ attano kulūpakasamaṇassa vaṇṇaṃ vatvā rājānaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0101a0:655_1: gamissāmi, ahaṃ gamissāmī”ti attano attano kulūpakānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathetuṃ āraddhā. Tenāha
atk-s0101a0:655_2: – “evaṃ vutte aññataro rājāmacco”tiādi. Tattha pūraṇoti tassa satthupaṭiññassa nāmaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:655_3: Kassapoti gottaṃ. So kira aññatarassa kulassa ekūnadāsasataṃ pūrayamāno jāto, tenassa
atk-s0101a0:655_4: pūraṇoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Maṅgaladāsattā cassa “dukkaṭa”nti vattā natthi, akataṃ vā
atk-s0101a0:655_5: na katanti. So “kimahaṃ ettha vasāmī”ti palāyi. Athassa corā vatthāni acchindiṃsu,
atk-s0101a0:655_6: so paṇṇena vā tiṇena vā paṭicchādetumpi ajānanto jātarūpeneva ekaṃ gāmaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0101a0:655_7: Manussā taṃ disvā “ayaṃ samaṇo arahā appiccho, natthi iminā sadiso”ti pūvabhattādīni
atk-s0101a0:655_8: gahetvā upasaṅkamanti. So – “mayhaṃ sāṭakaṃ anivatthabhāvena idaṃ uppanna”nti tato
atk-s0101a0:655_9: paṭṭhāya sāṭakaṃ labhitvāpi na nivāsesi, tadeva pabbajjaṃ aggahesi, tassa santike
atk-s0101a0:655_10: aññepi aññepīti pañcasatamanussā pabbajiṃsu. Taṃ sandhāyāha – “pūraṇo kassapo”ti.
atk-s0101a0:656_0: Pabbajitasamūhasaṅkhāto saṅgho assa atthīti saṅghī. Sveva gaṇo assa atthīti gaṇī.
atk-s0101a0:656_1: Ācārasikkhāpanavasena tassa gaṇassa ācariyoti gaṇācariyo. Ñātoti paññāto pākaṭo.
atk-s0101a0:656_2: “Appiccho santuṭṭho. Appicchatāya vatthampi na nivāsetī”ti evaṃ samuggato yaso assa
atk-s0101a0:656_3: atthīti yasassī. Titthakaroti laddhikaro. Sādhusammatoti ayaṃ sādhu, sundaro, sappurisoti
atk-s0101a0:656_4: evaṃ sammato. Bahujanassāti assutavato andhabālaputhujjanassa. Pabbajitato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0101a0:656_5: atikkantā bahū rattiyo jānātīti rattaññū. Ciraṃ pabbajitassa assāti cirapabbajito,
atk-s0101a0:656_6: acirapabbajitassa hi kathā okappanīyā na hoti, tenāha “cirapabbajito”ti. Addhagatoti
atk-s0101a0:656_7: addhānaṃ gato, dve tayo rājaparivaṭṭe atītoti adhippāyo. Vayoanuppattoti pacchimavayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:656_8: anuppatto. Idaṃ ubhayampi – “daharassa kathā okappanīyā na hotī”ti etaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:657_0: Tuṇhī ahosīti suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ madhurarasaṃ ambapakkaṃ khāditukāmo puriso āharitvā hatthe
atk-s0101a0:657_1: ṭhapitaṃ kājarapakkaṃ disvā viya jhānābhiññādiguṇayuttaṃ tilakkhaṇabbhāhataṃ madhuraṃ
atk-s0101a0:657_2: dhammakathaṃ sotukāmo pubbe pūraṇassa dassanenāpi anattamano idāni guṇakathāya suṭṭhutaraṃ
atk-s0101a0:657_3: anattamano hutvā tuṇhī ahosi. Anattamano samānopi pana “sacāhaṃ etaṃ tajjetvā gīvāyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:657_4: gahetvā nīharāpessāmi, ‘yo yo kathesi, taṃ taṃ rājā evaṃ karotī’ti bhīto aññopi koci
atk-s0101a0:657_5: kiñci na kathessatī”ti amanāpampi taṃ kathaṃ adhivāsetvā tuṇhī eva ahosi. Athañño
