atk-s0101a0:838_10: buddhaputtoti. Iti imasmiṃ catukke yvāyaṃ harati ca paccāharati ca, tassa gocarasampajaññaṃ sikhāpattaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:839_0: Abhikkamādīsu pana asammuyhanaṃ asammohasampajaññaṃ, taṃ evaṃ veditabbaṃ – idha bhikkhu
atk-s0101a0:839_1: abhikkamanto vā paṭikkamanto vā yathā andhabālaputhujjanā abhikkamādīsu – “attā abhikkamati,
atk-s0101a0:839_2: attanā abhikkamo nibbattito”ti vā, “ahaṃ abhikkamāmi, mayā abhikkamo nibbattito”ti
atk-s0101a0:839_3: vā sammuyhanti, tathā asammuyhanto “abhikkamāmī”ti citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena
atk-s0101a0:839_4: saddhiṃ cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu viññattiṃ janayamānā uppajjati. Iti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasena
atk-s0101a0:839_5: ayaṃ kāyasammato aṭṭhisaṅghāto abhikkamati. Tassevaṃ abhikkamato ekekapāduddharaṇe
atk-s0101a0:839_6: pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā, itarā dve adhimattā honti
atk-s0101a0:839_7: balavatiyo; tathā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesu. Vossajjane tejodhātu vāyodhātūti dve dhātuyo
atk-s0101a0:839_8: omattā honti mandā, itarā dve adhimattā balavatiyo, tathā sannikkhepanasannirujjhanesu.
atk-s0101a0:839_9: Tattha uddharaṇe pavattā rūpārūpadhammā atiharaṇaṃ na pāpuṇanti, tathā atiharaṇe
atk-s0101a0:839_10: pavattā vītiharaṇaṃ, vītiharaṇe pavattā vossajjanaṃ, vossajjane pavattā sannikkhepanaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:839_11: sannikkhepane pavattā sannirujjhanaṃ na pāpuṇanti. Tattha tattheva pabbaṃ pabbaṃ
atk-s0101a0:839_12: sandhi sandhi odhi odhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilāni viya paṭapaṭāyantā bhijjanti.
atk-s0101a0:839_13: Tattha ko eko abhikkamati, kassa vā ekassa abhikkamanaṃ? Paramatthato hi dhātūnaṃyeva
atk-s0101a0:839_14: gamanaṃ, dhātūnaṃ ṭhānaṃ, dhātūnaṃ nisajjanaṃ, dhātūnaṃ sayanaṃ. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ koṭṭhāse saddhiṃ rūpena.
atk-s0101a0:840: Aññaṃ uppajjate cittaṃ, aññaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati;
atk-s0101a0:843: Niṭṭhito abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hotīti padassa attho.
atk-s0101a0:844_0: Ālokite vilokiteti ettha pana ālokitaṃ nāma purato pekkhaṇaṃ. Vilokitaṃ nāma anudisāpekkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:844_1: Aññānipi heṭṭhā upari pacchato pekkhaṇavasena olokitaullokitāpalokitāni nāma honti,
atk-s0101a0:844_2: tāni idha na gahitāni. Sāruppavasena pana imāneva dve gahitāni, iminā vā mukhena
atk-s0101a0:845_0: Tattha “ālokessāmī”ti citte uppanne cittavaseneva anoloketvā atthapariggaṇhanaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:845_1: taṃ āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā veditabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā – “sace,
atk-s0101a0:845_2: bhikkhave, nandassa puratthimā disā āloketabbā hoti, sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā
atk-s0101a0:845_3: nando puratthimaṃ disaṃ āloketi – ‘evaṃ me puratthimaṃ disaṃ ālokayato na abhijjhādomanassā
atk-s0101a0:845_4: pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssavissantī’ti. Itiha tattha sampajāno hoti. Sace, bhikkhave,
atk-s0101a0:845_5: nandassa pacchimā disā…pe… uttarā disā…pe… dakkhiṇā disā…pe… uddhaṃ…pe… adho…pe…
atk-s0101a0:845_6: anudisā anuviloketabbā hoti, sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā nando anudisaṃ anuviloketi
atk-s0101a0:845_7: – ‘evaṃ me anudisaṃ anuvilokayato na abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssavissantī’ti.
atk-s0101a0:846_0: Api ca idhāpi pubbe vuttacetiyadassanādivaseneva sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca veditabbā,
atk-s0101a0:846_1: kammaṭṭhānassa pana avijahanameva gocarasampajaññaṃ. Tasmā ettha khandhadhātuāyatanakammaṭṭhānikehi
atk-s0101a0:846_2: attano kammaṭṭhānavaseneva, kasiṇādikammaṭṭhānikehi vā pana kammaṭṭhānasīseneva ālokanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:846_3: vilokanaṃ kātabbaṃ. Abbhantare attā nāma āloketā vā viloketā vā natthi, ‘ālokessāmī’ti
atk-s0101a0:846_4: pana citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena saddhiṃ cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu viññattiṃ
atk-s0101a0:846_5: janayamānā uppajjati. Iti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasena heṭṭhimaṃ akkhidalaṃ
atk-s0101a0:846_6: adho sīdati, uparimaṃ uddhaṃ laṅgheti. Koci yantakena vivaranto nāma natthi. Tato
atk-s0101a0:846_7: cakkhuviññāṇaṃ dassanakiccaṃ sādhentaṃ uppajjatīti evaṃ pajānanaṃ panettha asammohasampajaññaṃ
atk-s0101a0:846_8: nāma. Api ca mūlapariññā āgantukatāva kālikabhāvavasena pettha asammohasampajaññaṃ
atk-s0101a0:849_0: Tattha bhavaṅgaṃ upapattibhavassa aṅgakiccaṃ sādhayamānaṃ pavattati, taṃ āvaṭṭetvā
atk-s0101a0:849_1: kiriyamanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā, taṃnirodhā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ dassanakiccaṃ
atk-s0101a0:849_2: sādhayamānaṃ, taṃnirodhā vipākamanodhātu sampaṭicchanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā, taṃnirodhā
atk-s0101a0:849_4: voṭṭhabbanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā, taṃnirodhā sattakkhattuṃ javanaṃ javati. Tattha paṭhamajavanepi
atk-s0101a0:849_5: – “ayaṃ itthī, ayaṃ puriso”ti rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena ālokitavilokitaṃ nāma na
atk-s0101a0:849_6: hoti. Dutiyajavanepi…pe… sattamajavanepi. Etesu pana yuddhamaṇḍale yodhesu viya heṭṭhupariyavasena
atk-s0101a0:849_7: bhijjitvā patitesu – “ayaṃ itthī, ayaṃ puriso”ti rajjanādivasena ālokitavilokitaṃ
atk-s0101a0:849_8: hoti. Evaṃ tāvettha mūlapariññāvasena asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:850_0: Cakkhudvāre pana rūpe āpāthamāgate bhavaṅgacalanato uddhaṃ sakakiccanipphādanavasena
atk-s0101a0:850_1: āvajjanādīsu uppajjitvā niruddhesu avasāne javanaṃ uppajjati, taṃ pubbe uppannānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:850_2: āvajjanādīnaṃ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āgantukapuriso viya hoti. Tassa yathā paragehe
atk-s0101a0:850_3: kiñci yācituṃ paviṭṭhassa āgantukapurisassa gehassāmikesu tuṇhīmāsinesu āṇākaraṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:850_4: na yuttaṃ, evaṃ āvajjanādīnaṃ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āvajjanādīsupi arajjantesu adussantesu
atk-s0101a0:850_5: amuyhantesu ca rajjanadussanamuyhanaṃ ayuttanti evaṃ āgantukabhāvavasena asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:851_0: Yāni panetāni cakkhudvāre voṭṭhabbanapariyosānāni cittāni uppajjanti, tāni saddhiṃ
atk-s0101a0:851_1: sampayuttadhammehi tattha tattheva bhijjanti, aññamaññaṃ na passantīti, ittarāni
atk-s0101a0:851_2: tāvakālikāni honti. Tattha yathā ekasmiṃ ghare sabbesu mānusakesu matesu avasesassa
atk-s0101a0:851_3: ekassa taṅkhaṇaññeva maraṇadhammassa na yuttā naccagītādīsu abhirati nāma. Evameva
atk-s0101a0:851_4: ekadvāre sasampayuttesu āvajjanādīsu tattha tattheva matesu avasesassa taṅkhaṇeyeva
atk-s0101a0:851_5: maraṇadhammassa javanassāpi rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena abhirati nāma na yuttāti.
atk-s0101a0:852_0: Api ca khandhāyatanadhātupaccayapaccavekkhaṇavasena petaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ettha hi cakkhu
atk-s0101a0:852_1: ceva rūpā ca rūpakkhandho, dassanaṃ viññāṇakkhandho, taṃsampayuttā vedanā vedanākkhandho,
atk-s0101a0:852_2: saññā saññākkhandho, phassādikā saṅkhārakkhandho. Evametesaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:852_3: samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati. Tattha ko eko āloketi, ko viloketi?
atk-s0101a0:853_0: Tathā cakkhu cakkhāyatanaṃ, rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ, dassanaṃ manāyatanaṃ, vedanādayo sampayuttadhammā
atk-s0101a0:853_1: dhammāyatanaṃ. Evametesaṃ catunnaṃ āyatanānaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0101a0:853_2: Tattha ko eko āloketi, ko viloketi?
atk-s0101a0:854_0: Tathā cakkhu cakkhudhātu, rūpaṃ rūpadhātu, dassanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātu, taṃsampayuttā
atk-s0101a0:854_1: vedanādayo dhammā dhammadhātu. Evametāsaṃ catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:854_2: paññāyati. Tattha ko eko āloketi, ko viloketi?
atk-s0101a0:855_0: Tathā cakkhu nissayapaccayo, rūpā ārammaṇapaccayo, āvajjanaṃ anantarasamanantarūpanissayanatthivigatapaccayo,
atk-s0101a0:855_1: āloko upanissayapaccayo, vedanādayo sahajātapaccayo. Evametesaṃ paccayānaṃ samavāye
atk-s0101a0:855_2: ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati. Tattha ko eko āloketi, ko viloketīti? Evamettha khandhāyatanadhātupaccayapaccavekkhaṇavasenapi
atk-s0101a0:856_0: Samiñjite pasāriteti pabbānaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇe. Tattha cittavaseneva samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:856_1: akatvā hatthapādānaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇapaccayā atthānatthaṃ pariggaṇhitvā atthapariggaṇhanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:856_2: sātthakasampajaññaṃ. Tattha hatthapāde aticiraṃ samiñjetvā vā pasāretvā vā ṭhitassa
atk-s0101a0:856_3: khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjati, cittaṃ ekaggataṃ na labhati, kammaṭṭhānaṃ paripatati,
atk-s0101a0:856_4: visesaṃ nādhigacchati. Kāle samiñjentassa kāle pasārentassa pana tā vedanā nuppajjanti,
atk-s0101a0:856_5: cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ phātiṃ gacchati, visesamadhigacchatīti, evaṃ atthānatthapariggaṇhanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:857: Atthe pana satipi sappāyāsappāyaṃ pariggaṇhitvā sappāyapariggaṇhanaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ nayo –
atk-s0101a0:858_0: Mahācetiyaṅgaṇe kira daharabhikkhū sajjhāyaṃ gaṇhanti, tesaṃ piṭṭhipassesu daharabhikkhuniyo
atk-s0101a0:858_1: dhammaṃ suṇanti. Tatreko daharo hatthaṃ pasārento kāyasaṃsaggaṃ patvā teneva kāraṇena
atk-s0101a0:858_2: gihī jāto. Aparo bhikkhu pādaṃ pasārento aggimhi pasāresi, aṭṭhimāhacca pādo jhāyi.
atk-s0101a0:858_3: Aparo vammike pasāresi, so āsīvisena ḍaṭṭho. Aparo cīvarakuṭidaṇḍake pasāresi, taṃ
atk-s0101a0:858_4: maṇisappo ḍaṃsi. Tasmā evarūpe asappāye apasāretvā sappāye pasāretabbaṃ. Idamettha sappāyasampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:859_0: Gocarasampajaññaṃ pana mahātheravatthunā dīpetabbaṃ – mahāthero kira divāṭhāne nisinno
atk-s0101a0:859_1: antevāsikehi saddhiṃ kathayamāno sahasā hatthaṃ samiñjetvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā
atk-s0101a0:859_2: saṇikaṃ samiñjesi. Taṃ antevāsikā pucchiṃsu – “kasmā, bhante, sahasā hatthaṃ samiñjitvā
atk-s0101a0:859_3: puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṇikaṃ samiñjiyitthā”ti? Yato paṭṭhāyāhaṃ, āvuso, kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:859_4: manasikātuṃ āraddho, na me kammaṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā hattho samiñjitapubbo, idāni pana
atk-s0101a0:859_5: me tumhehi saddhiṃ kathayamānena kammaṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā samiñjito. Tasmā puna yathāṭhāne
atk-s0101a0:859_6: ṭhapetvā samiñjesinti. Sādhu, bhante, bhikkhunā nāma evarūpena bhavitabbanti. Evametthāpi
atk-s0101a0:860_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci samiñjento vā pasārento vā natthi, vuttappakāracittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena
atk-s0101a0:860_1: pana suttākaḍḍhanavasena dāruyantassa hatthapādalacalanaṃ viya samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:860_2: hotīti evaṃ parijānanaṃ panettha asammohasampajaññanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:861_1: bhikkhāpaṭiggahaṇādivasena paribhogo dhāraṇaṃ nāma. Tattha saṅghāṭicīvaradhāraṇe
atk-s0101a0:861_2: tāva nivāsetvā vā pārupitvā vā piṇḍāya carato āmisalābho sītassa paṭighātāyātiādinā
atk-s0101a0:861_3: nayena bhagavatā vuttappakāroyeva ca attho attho nāma. Tassa vasena sātthakasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:862_0: Uṇhapakatikassa pana dubbalassa ca cīvaraṃ sukhumaṃ sappāyaṃ, sītālukassa ghanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:862_1: dupaṭṭaṃ. Viparītaṃ asappāyaṃ. Yassa kassaci jiṇṇaṃ asappāyameva, aggaḷādidānena
atk-s0101a0:862_2: hissa taṃ palibodhakaraṃ hoti. Tathā paṭṭuṇṇadukūlādibhedaṃ lobhanīyacīvaraṃ. Tādisañhi
atk-s0101a0:862_3: araññe ekakassa nivāsantarāyakaraṃ jīvitantarāyakarañcāpi hoti. Nippariyāyena pana
atk-s0101a0:862_4: yaṃ nimittakammādimicchājīvavasena uppannaṃ, yañcassa sevamānassa akusalā dhammā
atk-s0101a0:862_5: abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, taṃ asappāyaṃ. Viparītaṃ sappāyaṃ. Tassa
atk-s0101a0:863_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci cīvaraṃ pārupento natthi, vuttappakārena cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva
atk-s0101a0:863_1: pana cīvarapārupanaṃ hoti. Tattha cīvarampi acetanaṃ, kāyopi acetano. Cīvaraṃ na
atk-s0101a0:863_2: jānāti – “mayā kāyo pārupito”ti. Kāyopi na jānāti – “ahaṃ cīvarena pārupito”ti. Dhātuyova
atk-s0101a0:863_3: dhātusamūhaṃ paṭicchādenti paṭapilotikāyapotthakarūpapaṭicchādane viya. Tasmā neva
atk-s0101a0:863_4: sundaraṃ cīvaraṃ labhitvā somanassaṃ kātabbaṃ, na asundaraṃ labhitvā domanassaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:864_0: Nāgavammikacetiyarukkhādīsu hi keci mālāgandhadhūmavatthādīhi sakkāraṃ karonti, keci
atk-s0101a0:864_2: somanassaṃ vā domanassaṃ vā karonti. Evameva neva sundaraṃ cīvaraṃ labhitvā somanassaṃ
atk-s0101a0:864_3: kātabbaṃ, na asundaraṃ labhitvā domanassanti, evaṃ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha
atk-s0101a0:865: Pattadhāraṇepi pattaṃ sahasāva aggahetvā imaṃ gahetvā piṇḍāya caramāno bhikkhaṃ labhissāmīti, evaṃ pattaggahaṇapaccayā paṭilabhitabbaṃ atthavasena sātthakasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:866_0: Kisadubbalasarīrassa pana garupatto asappāyo, yassa kassaci catupañcagaṇṭhikāhato
atk-s0101a0:866_1: dubbisodhanīyo asappāyova. Duddhotapattopi na vaṭṭati, taṃ dhovantasseva cassa palibodho
atk-s0101a0:866_2: hoti. Maṇivaṇṇapatto pana lobhanīyo, cīvare vuttanayeneva asappāyo, nimittakammādivasena
atk-s0101a0:866_3: laddho pana yañcassa sevamānassa akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti,
atk-s0101a0:866_4: ayaṃ ekantaasappāyova. Viparīto sappāyo. Tassa vasenettha sappāyasampajaññaṃ. Kammaṭṭhānāvijahanavaseneva
atk-s0101a0:867_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci pattaṃ gaṇhanto natthi, vuttappakārena cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravaseneva
atk-s0101a0:867_1: pattaggahaṇaṃ nāma hoti. Tattha pattopi acetano, hatthāpi acetanā. Patto na jānāti
atk-s0101a0:867_2: – “ahaṃ hatthehi gahito”ti. Hatthāpi na jānanti – “amhehi patto gahito”ti. Dhātuyova
atk-s0101a0:867_3: dhātusamūhaṃ gaṇhanti, saṇḍāsena aggivaṇṇapattaggahaṇe viyāti. Evaṃ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha
atk-s0101a0:868_0: Api ca yathā chinnahatthapāde vaṇamukhehi paggharitapubbalohitakimikule nīlamakkhikasamparikiṇṇe
atk-s0101a0:868_1: anāthasālāyaṃ nipanne anāthamanusse disvā, ye dayālukā purisā, te tesaṃ vaṇamattacoḷakāni
atk-s0101a0:868_2: ceva kapālādīhi ca bhesajjāni upanāmenti. Tattha coḷakānipi kesañci saṇhāni, kesañci
atk-s0101a0:868_3: thūlāni pāpuṇanti. Bhesajjakapālakānipi kesañci susaṇṭhānāni, kesañci dussaṇṭhānāni
atk-s0101a0:868_4: pāpuṇanti, na te tattha sumanā vā dummanā vā honti. Vaṇapaṭicchādanamatteneva hi
atk-s0101a0:868_5: coḷakena, bhesajjapaṭiggahaṇamatteneva ca kapālakena tesaṃ attho. Evameva yo bhikkhu
atk-s0101a0:868_6: vaṇacoḷakaṃ viya cīvaraṃ, bhesajjakapālakaṃ viya ca pattaṃ, kapāle bhesajjamiva ca
atk-s0101a0:868_7: patte laddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ sallakkheti, ayaṃ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe asammohasampajaññena
atk-s0101a0:869_0: Asitādīsu asiteti piṇḍapātabhojane. Pīteti yāguādipāne. Khāyiteti piṭṭhakhajjādikhādane.
atk-s0101a0:869_1: Sāyiteti madhuphāṇitādisāyane. Tattha neva davāyātiādinā nayena vutto aṭṭhavidhopi
atk-s0101a0:869_2: attho attho nāma. Tasseva vasena sātthakasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:870_0: Lūkhapaṇītatittamadhurarasādīsu pana yena bhojanena yassa phāsu na hoti, taṃ tassa
atk-s0101a0:870_1: asappāyaṃ. Yaṃ pana nimittakammādivasena paṭiladdhaṃ, yañcassa bhuñjato akusalā dhammā
atk-s0101a0:870_2: abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, taṃ ekantaasappāyameva, viparītaṃ sappāyaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:870_3: Tassa vasenettha sappāyasampajaññaṃ. Kammaṭṭhānāvijahanavaseneva ca gocarasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:871_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci bhuñjako natthi, vuttappakāracittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva
atk-s0101a0:871_1: pattappaṭiggahaṇaṃ nāma hoti. Cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva hatthassa patte otāraṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:871_2: nāma hoti. Cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva ālopakaraṇaṃ ālopauddhāraṇaṃ mukhavivaraṇañca
atk-s0101a0:871_3: hoti, na koci kuñcikāya yantakena vā hanukaṭṭhīni vivarati. Cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva
atk-s0101a0:871_4: ālopassa mukhe ṭhapanaṃ, uparidantānaṃ musalakiccasādhanaṃ, heṭṭhimadantānaṃ udukkhalakiccasādhanaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:871_5: jivhāya hatthakiccasādhanañca hoti. Iti tattha aggajivhāya tanukakheḷo mūlajivhāya
atk-s0101a0:871_6: bahalakheḷo makkheti. Taṃ heṭṭhādantaudukkhale jivhāhatthaparivattakaṃ kheḷodakena
atk-s0101a0:871_7: temitaṃ uparidantamusalasañcuṇṇitaṃ koci kaṭacchunā vā dabbiyā vā antopavesento nāma
atk-s0101a0:871_8: natthi, vāyodhātuyāva pavisati. Paviṭṭhaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ koci palālasanthāraṃ katvā dhārento
atk-s0101a0:871_9: nāma natthi, vāyodhātuvaseneva tiṭṭhati. Ṭhitaṃ ṭhitaṃ koci uddhanaṃ katvā aggiṃ
atk-s0101a0:871_10: jāletvā pacanto nāma natthi, tejodhātuyāva paccati. Pakkaṃ pakkaṃ koci daṇḍakena
atk-s0101a0:871_11: vā yaṭṭhiyā vā bahi nīhārako nāma natthi, vāyodhātuyeva nīharati. Iti vāyodhātu paṭiharati
atk-s0101a0:871_12: ca, vītiharati ca, dhāreti ca, parivatteti ca, sañcuṇṇeti ca, visoseti ca, nīharati
atk-s0101a0:871_13: ca. Pathavīdhātu dhāreti ca, parivatteti ca, sañcuṇṇeti ca, visoseti ca. Āpodhātu
atk-s0101a0:871_14: sineheti ca, allattañca anupāleti. Tejodhātu antopaviṭṭhaṃ paripāceti. Ākāsadhātu
atk-s0101a0:871_15: añjaso hoti. Viññāṇadhātu tattha tattha sammāpayogamanvāya ābhujatīti. Evaṃ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha
atk-s0101a0:872_0: Api ca gamanato pariyesanato paribhogato āsayato nidhānato aparipakkato paripakkato
atk-s0101a0:872_1: phalato nissandato sammakkhanatoti, evaṃ dasavidhapaṭikūlabhāvapaccavekkhaṇato pettha
atk-s0101a0:872_2: asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ. Vitthārakathā panettha visuddhimagge āhārapaṭikūlasaññāniddesato gahetabbā.
atk-s0101a0:873_0: Uccārapassāvakammeti uccārassa ca passāvassa ca karaṇe. Tattha pattakāle uccārapassāvaṃ
atk-s0101a0:873_1: akarontassa sakalasarīrato sedā muccanti, akkhīni bhamanti, cittaṃ na ekaggaṃ hoti,
atk-s0101a0:873_2: aññe ca rogā uppajjanti. Karontassa pana sabbaṃ taṃ na hotīti ayamettha attho. Tassa
atk-s0101a0:874_0: Aṭṭhāne uccārapassāvaṃ karontassa pana āpatti hoti, ayaso vaḍḍhati, jīvitantarāyo
atk-s0101a0:874_1: hoti, patirūpe ṭhāne karontassa sabbaṃ taṃ na hotīti idamettha sappāyaṃ tassa vasena
atk-s0101a0:875_0: Abbhantare attā nāma uccārapassāvakammaṃ karonto natthi, cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva
atk-s0101a0:875_1: pana uccārapassāvakammaṃ hoti. Yathā vā pana pakke gaṇḍe gaṇḍabhedena pubbalohitaṃ
atk-s0101a0:875_2: akāmatāya nikkhamati. Yathā ca atibharitā udakabhājanā udakaṃ akāmatāya nikkhamati.
atk-s0101a0:875_3: Evaṃ pakkāsayamuttavatthīsu sannicitā uccārapassāvā vāyuvegasamuppīḷitā akāmatāyapi
atk-s0101a0:875_4: nikkhamanti. So panāyaṃ evaṃ nikkhamanto uccārapassāvo neva tassa bhikkhuno attano
atk-s0101a0:875_5: hoti, na parassa, kevalaṃ sarīranissandova hoti. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā udakatumbato purāṇudakaṃ
atk-s0101a0:875_6: chaḍḍentassa neva taṃ attano hoti, na paresaṃ; kevalaṃ paṭijagganamattameva hoti;
atk-s0101a0:876_0: Gatādīsu gateti gamane. Ṭhiteti ṭhāne. Nisinneti nisajjāya. Sutteti sayane. Jāgariteti
atk-s0101a0:876_1: jāgaraṇe. Bhāsiteti kathane. Tuṇhībhāveti akathane. “Gacchanto vā gacchāmīti pajānāti,
atk-s0101a0:876_2: ṭhito vā ṭhitomhīti pajānāti, nisinno vā nisinnomhīti pajānāti, sayāno vā sayānomhīti
atk-s0101a0:876_3: pajānātī”ti imasmiñhi sutte addhānairiyāpathā kathitā. “Abhikkante paṭikkante ālokite
atk-s0101a0:876_4: vilokite samiñjite pasārite”ti imasmiṃ majjhimā. “Gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite”ti
atk-s0101a0:876_5: idha pana khuddakacuṇṇiyairiyāpathā kathitā. Tasmā tesupi vuttanayeneva sampajānakāritā veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:877_0: Tipiṭakamahāsivatthero panāha – yo ciraṃ gantvā vā caṅkamitvā vā aparabhāge ṭhito
atk-s0101a0:877_1: iti paṭisañcikkhati – “caṅkamanakāle pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ettheva niruddhā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:878_0: Yo sajjhāyaṃ vā karonto, pañhaṃ vā vissajjento, kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasikaronto ciraṃ
atk-s0101a0:878_1: ṭhatvā aparabhāge nisinno iti paṭisañcikkhati – “ṭhitakāle pavattā rūpārūpadhammā
atk-s0101a0:878_2: ettheva niruddhā”ti. Ayaṃ ṭhite sampajānakārī nāma.
atk-s0101a0:879: Yo sajjhāyādikaraṇavaseneva ciraṃ nisīditvā aparabhāge uṭṭhāya iti paṭisañcikkhati – “nisinnakāle pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ettheva niruddhā”ti. Ayaṃ nisinne sampajānakārī nāma.
atk-s0101a0:880_0: Yo pana nipannako sajjhāyaṃ vā karonto kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasikaronto niddaṃ okkamitvā
atk-s0101a0:880_1: aparabhāge uṭṭhāya iti paṭisañcikkhati – “sayanakāle pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ettheva
atk-s0101a0:880_2: niruddhā”ti. Ayaṃ sutte jāgarite ca sampajānakārī nāma. Kiriyamayacittānañhi appavattanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:881_0: Yo pana bhāsamāno – “ayaṃ saddo nāma oṭṭhe ca paṭicca, dante ca jivhañca tāluñca
atk-s0101a0:881_1: paṭicca, cittassa ca tadanurūpaṃ payogaṃ paṭicca jāyatī”ti sato sampajānova bhāsati.
atk-s0101a0:881_2: Ciraṃ vā pana kālaṃ sajjhāyaṃ vā katvā, dhammaṃ vā kathetvā, kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā pavattetvā,
atk-s0101a0:881_3: pañhaṃ vā vissajjetvā, aparabhāge tuṇhībhūto iti paṭisañcikkhati – “bhāsitakāle uppannā
atk-s0101a0:881_4: rūpārūpadhammā ettheva niruddhā”ti. Ayaṃ bhāsite sampajānakārī nāma.
atk-s0101a0:882_0: Yo tuṇhībhūto ciraṃ dhammaṃ vā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasikatvā aparabhāge iti paṭisañcikkhati
atk-s0101a0:882_2: sati bhāsati nāma, asati tuṇhī bhavati nāmāti. Ayaṃ tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī nāmāti.
atk-s0101a0:883_0: Tayidaṃ mahāsivattherena vuttaṃ asammohadhuraṃ mahāsatipaṭṭhānasutte adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:883_1: Imasmiṃ pana sāmaññaphale sabbampi catubbidhaṃ sampajaññaṃ labbhati. Tasmā vuttanayeneva
atk-s0101a0:883_2: cettha catunnaṃ sampajaññānaṃ vasena sampajānakāritā veditabbā. Sampajānakārīti ca
atk-s0101a0:883_3: sabbapadesu satisampayuttasseva sampajaññassa vasena attho veditabbo. Satisampajaññena
atk-s0101a0:883_4: samannāgatoti etassa hi padassa ayaṃ vitthāro. Vibhaṅgappakaraṇe pana – “sato sampajāno
atk-s0101a0:883_5: abhikkamati, sato sampajāno paṭikkamatī”ti evaṃ etāni padāni vibhattāneva. Evaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:883_6: kho mahārājāti evaṃ satisampayuttassa sampajaññassa vasena abhikkamādīni pavattento
atk-s0101a0:885_0: 215. Idha, mahārāja, bhikkhu santuṭṭho hotīti ettha santuṭṭhoti itarītarapaccayasantosena
atk-s0101a0:885_1: samannāgato. So panesa santoso dvādasavidho hoti, seyyathidaṃ – cīvare yathālābhasantoso,
atk-s0101a0:885_2: yathābalasantoso, yathāsāruppasantosoti tividho. Evaṃ piṇḍapātādīsu. Tassāyaṃ pabhedavaṇṇanā –
atk-s0101a0:886_0: Idha bhikkhu cīvaraṃ labhati, sundaraṃ vā asundaraṃ vā. So teneva yāpeti, aññaṃ na
atk-s0101a0:886_1: pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhati. Ayamassa cīvare yathālābhasantoso. Atha pana pakatidubbalo
atk-s0101a0:886_2: vā hoti, ābādhajarābhibhūto vā, garucīvaraṃ pārupanto kilamati. So sabhāgena bhikkhunā
atk-s0101a0:886_3: saddhiṃ taṃ parivattetvā lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa cīvare yathābalasantoso.
atk-s0101a0:886_4: Aparo paṇītapaccayalābhī hoti. So pattacīvarādīnaṃ aññataraṃ mahagghapattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0101a0:886_5: bahūni vā pana pattacīvarāni labhitvā idaṃ therānaṃ cirapabbajitānaṃ, idaṃ bahussutānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:886_6: anurūpaṃ, idaṃ gilānānaṃ, idaṃ appalābhīnaṃ hotūti datvā tesaṃ purāṇacīvaraṃ vā gahetvā
atk-s0101a0:886_7: saṅkārakūṭādito vā nantakāni uccinitvā tehi saṅghāṭiṃ katvā dhārentopi santuṭṭhova
atk-s0101a0:887_0: Idha pana bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā, so teneva yāpeti, aññaṃ
atk-s0101a0:887_1: na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhati. Ayamassa piṇḍapāte yathālābhasantoso. Yo pana
atk-s0101a0:887_2: attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ labhati, yenassa paribhuttena
atk-s0101a0:887_3: aphāsu hoti. So sabhāgassa bhikkhuno taṃ datvā tassa hatthato sappāyabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā
atk-s0101a0:887_4: samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa piṇḍapāte yathābalasantoso. Aparo
atk-s0101a0:887_5: bahuṃ paṇītaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ labhati. So taṃ cīvaraṃ viya theracirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhīgilānānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:887_6: datvā tesaṃ vā sesakaṃ piṇḍāya vā caritvā missakāhāraṃ bhuñjantopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0101a0:888_0: Idha pana bhikkhu senāsanaṃ labhati, manāpaṃ vā amanāpaṃ vā, so tena neva somanassaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:888_1: na domanassaṃ uppādeti; antamaso tiṇasanthārakenapi yathāladdheneva tussati. Ayamassa
atk-s0101a0:888_2: senāsane yathālābhasantoso. Yo pana attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā
atk-s0101a0:888_3: senāsanaṃ labhati, yatthassa vasato aphāsu hoti, so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā
atk-s0101a0:888_4: tassa santake sappāyasenāsane vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa senāsane yathābalasantoso.
atk-s0101a0:889_0: Aparo mahāpuñño leṇamaṇḍapakūṭāgārādīni bahūni paṇītasenāsanāni labhati. So tāni
atk-s0101a0:889_2: vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa senāsane yathāsāruppasantoso. Yopi – “uttamasenāsanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:889_3: nāma pamādaṭṭhānaṃ, tattha nisinnassa thinamiddhaṃ okkamati, niddābhibhūtassa puna
atk-s0101a0:889_4: paṭibujjhato kāmavitakkā pātubhavantī”ti paṭisañcikkhitvā tādisaṃ senāsanaṃ pattampi
atk-s0101a0:889_5: na sampaṭicchati. So taṃ paṭikkhipitvā abbhokāsarukkhamūlādīsu vasantopi santuṭṭhova
atk-s0101a0:890_0: Idha pana bhikkhu bhesajjaṃ labhati, lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā, so yaṃ labhati, teneva
atk-s0101a0:890_1: tussati, aññaṃ na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhati. Ayamassa gilānapaccaye yathālābhasantoso.
atk-s0101a0:890_2: Yo pana telena atthiko phāṇitaṃ labhati. So taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa
atk-s0101a0:890_3: hatthato telaṃ gahetvā aññadeva vā pariyesitvā bhesajjaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0101a0:891_0: Aparo mahāpuñño bahuṃ telamadhuphāṇitādipaṇītabhesajjaṃ labhati. So taṃ cīvaraṃ viya
atk-s0101a0:891_1: theracirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhīgilānānaṃ datvā tesaṃ ābhatena yena kenaci yāpentopi
atk-s0101a0:891_2: santuṭṭhova hoti. Yo pana ekasmiṃ bhājane muttaharīṭakaṃ ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ catumadhuraṃ
atk-s0101a0:891_3: – “gaṇhāhi, bhante, yadicchasī”ti vuccamāno sacassa tesu aññatarenapi rogo vūpasammati,
atk-s0101a0:891_4: atha muttaharīṭakaṃ nāma buddhādīhi vaṇṇitanti catumadhuraṃ paṭikkhipitvā muttaharīṭakeneva
atk-s0101a0:891_5: bhesajjaṃ karonto paramasantuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa gilānapaccaye yathāsāruppasantoso.
atk-s0101a0:892_0: Iminā pana dvādasavidhena itarītarapaccayasantosena samannāgatassa bhikkhuno aṭṭha
atk-s0101a0:892_1: parikkhārā vaṭṭanti. Tīṇi cīvarāni, patto, dantakaṭṭhacchedanavāsi, ekā sūci, kāyabandhanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:893: “Ticīvarañca patto ca, vāsi sūci ca bandhanaṃ;
atk-s0101a0:895_0: Te sabbe kāyaparihārikāpi honti kucchiparihārikāpi. Kathaṃ? Ticīvaraṃ tāva nivāsetvā
atk-s0101a0:895_1: ca pārupitvā ca vicaraṇakāle kāyaṃ pariharati, posetīti kāyaparihārikaṃ hoti. Cīvarakaṇṇena
atk-s0101a0:895_2: udakaṃ parissāvetvā pivanakāle khāditabbaphalāphalagahaṇakāle ca kucchiṃ pariharati;
atk-s0101a0:896: Pattopi tena udakaṃ uddharitvā nhānakāle kuṭiparibhaṇḍakaraṇakāle ca kāyaparihāriko hoti. Āhāraṃ gahetvā bhuñjanakāle kucchiparihāriko.
atk-s0101a0:897: Vāsipi tāya dantakaṭṭhacchedanakāle mañcapīṭhānaṃ aṅgapādacīvarakuṭidaṇḍakasajjanakāle ca kāyaparihārikā hoti. Ucchuchedananāḷikerāditacchanakāle kucchiparihārikā.
atk-s0101a0:898: Sūcipi cīvarasibbanakāle kāyaparihārikā hoti. Pūvaṃ vā phalaṃ vā vijjhitvā khādanakāle kucchiparihārikā.
atk-s0101a0:899: Kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā vicaraṇakāle kāyaparihārikaṃ. Ucchuādīni bandhitvā gahaṇakāle kucchiparihārikaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:900_0: Parissāvanaṃ tena udakaṃ parissāvetvā nhānakāle, senāsanaparibhaṇḍakaraṇakāle ca
atk-s0101a0:900_1: kāyaparihārikaṃ. Pānīyaṃ parissāvanakāle, teneva tilataṇḍulaputhukādīni gahetvā khādanakāle
atk-s0101a0:900_2: ca kucchiparihāriyaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva aṭṭhaparikkhārikassa parikkhāramattā. Navaparikkhārikassa
atk-s0101a0:900_3: pana seyyaṃ pavisantassa tatraṭṭhakaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ vā kuñcikā vā vaṭṭati. Dasaparikkhārikassa
atk-s0101a0:900_4: nisīdanaṃ vā cammakhaṇḍaṃ vā vaṭṭati. Ekādasaparikkhārikassa pana kattarayaṭṭhi vā
atk-s0101a0:900_5: telanāḷikā vā vaṭṭati. Dvādasaparikkhārikassa chattaṃ vā upāhanaṃ vā vaṭṭati. Etesu
atk-s0101a0:900_6: ca aṭṭhaparikkhārikova santuṭṭho, itare asantuṭṭhā mahicchā mahābhārāti na vattabbā.
atk-s0101a0:900_7: Etepi hi appicchāva santuṭṭhāva subharāva sallahukavuttinova. Bhagavā pana na yimaṃ
atk-s0101a0:900_8: suttaṃ tesaṃ vasena kathesi, aṭṭhaparikkhārikassa vasena kathesi. So hi khuddakavāsiñca
atk-s0101a0:900_9: sūciñca parissāvane pakkhipitvā pattassa anto ṭhapetvā pattaṃ aṃsakūṭe laggetvā ticīvaraṃ
atk-s0101a0:900_10: kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ katvā yenicchakaṃ sukhaṃ pakkamati. Paṭinivattetvā gahetabbaṃ nāmassa
atk-s0101a0:900_11: na hoti. Iti imassa bhikkhuno sallahukavuttitaṃ dassento bhagavā – “santuṭṭho hoti
atk-s0101a0:900_14: sabbaṃ gahetvāva kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ katvāva gacchati. “Mama vihāro pariveṇaṃ upaṭṭhāko”ti
atk-s0101a0:900_15: āsaṅgo vā bandho vā na hoti. So jiyā mutto saro viya, yūthā apakkanto madahatthī
atk-s0101a0:900_16: viya ca icchiticchitaṃ senāsanaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ vanapabbhāraṃ paribhuñjanto
atk-s0101a0:900_17: ekova tiṭṭhati, ekova nisīdati. Sabbiriyāpathesu ekova adutiyo.
atk-s0101a0:906_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya sādhento – “seyyathāpī”tiādimāha. Tattha pakkhī sakuṇoti
atk-s0101a0:906_1: pakkhayutto sakuṇo. Ḍetīti uppatati. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho – sakuṇā nāma “asukasmiṃ
atk-s0101a0:906_2: padese rukkho paripakkaphalo”ti ñatvā nānādisāhi āgantvā nakhapattatuṇḍādīhi tassa
atk-s0101a0:906_3: phalāni vijjhantā vidhunantā khādanti. ‘Idaṃ ajjatanāya, idaṃ svātanāya bhavissatī’ti
atk-s0101a0:906_4: tesaṃ na hoti. Phale pana khīṇe neva rukkhassa ārakkhaṃ ṭhapenti, na tattha pattaṃ
atk-s0101a0:906_5: vā nakhaṃ vā tuṇḍaṃ vā ṭhapenti. Atha kho tasmiṃ rukkhe anapekkho hutvā, yo yaṃ disābhāgaṃ
atk-s0101a0:906_6: icchati, so tena sapattabhārova uppatitvā gacchati. Evameva ayaṃ bhikkhu nissaṅgo
atk-s0101a0:906_7: nirapekkho yena kāmaṃ pakkamati. Tena vuttaṃ “samādāyeva pakkamatī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:908_0: 216. So iminā cātiādinā kiṃ dasseti? Araññavāsassa paccayasampattiṃ dasseti. Yassa
atk-s0101a0:908_1: hi ime cattāro paccayā natthi, tassa araññavāso na ijjhati. Tiracchānagatehi vā vanacarakehi
atk-s0101a0:908_2: vā saddhiṃ vattabbataṃ āpajjati. Araññe adhivatthā devatā – “kiṃ evarūpassa pāpabhikkhuno
atk-s0101a0:908_3: araññavāsenā”ti bheravasaddaṃ sāventi, hatthehi sīsaṃ paharitvā palāyanākāraṃ karonti.
atk-s0101a0:908_4: “Asuko bhikkhu araññaṃ pavisitvā idañcidañca pāpakammaṃ akāsī”ti ayaso pattharati.
atk-s0101a0:908_5: Yassa panete cattāro paccayā atthi, tassa araññavāso ijjhati. So hi attano sīlaṃ
atk-s0101a0:908_6: paccavekkhanto kiñci kāḷakaṃ vā tilakaṃ vā apassanto pītiṃ uppādetvā taṃ khayavayato
atk-s0101a0:908_7: sammasanto ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati. Araññe adhivatthā devatā attamanā vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇanti.
atk-s0101a0:908_8: Itissa udake pakkhittatelabindu viya yaso vitthāriko hoti.
atk-s0101a0:909_0: Tattha vivittanti suññaṃ, appasaddaṃ, appanigghosanti attho. Etadeva hi sandhāya
atk-s0101a0:909_1: vibhaṅge – “vivittanti santike cepi senāsanaṃ hoti, tañca anākiṇṇaṃ gahaṭṭhehi pabbajitehi.
atk-s0101a0:909_2: Tena taṃ vivitta”nti vuttaṃ. Seti ceva āsati ca etthāti senāsanaṃ mañcapīṭhādīnametaṃ
atk-s0101a0:909_3: adhivacanaṃ. Tenāha – “senāsananti mañcopi senāsanaṃ, pīṭhampi, bhisipi, bimbohanampi,
atk-s0101a0:909_4: vihāropi, aḍḍhayogopi, pāsādopi, hammiyampi, guhāpi, aṭṭopi, māḷopi leṇampi, veḷugumbopi,
atk-s0101a0:909_5: rukkhamūlampi, maṇḍapopi, senāsanaṃ, yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamanti, sabbametaṃ senāsana”nti.
atk-s0101a0:910_0: Api ca – “vihāro aḍḍhayogo pāsādo hammiyaṃ guhā”ti idaṃ vihārasenāsanaṃ nāma. “Mañco
atk-s0101a0:910_1: pīṭhaṃ bhisi bimbohana”nti idaṃ mañcapīṭhasenāsanaṃ nāma. “Cimilikā cammakhaṇḍo tiṇasanthāro
atk-s0101a0:910_2: paṇṇasanthāro”ti idaṃ santhatasenāsanaṃ nāma. “Yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamantī”ti
atk-s0101a0:910_3: idaṃ okāsasenāsanaṃ nāmāti. Evaṃ catubbidhaṃ senāsanaṃ hoti, taṃ sabbaṃ senāsanaggahaṇena saṅgahitameva.
atk-s0101a0:911_0: Idha panassa sakuṇasadisassa cātuddisassa bhikkhuno anucchavikasenāsanaṃ dassento
atk-s0101a0:911_1: araññaṃ rukkhamūlantiādimāha. Tattha araññanti nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā sabbametaṃ
atk-s0101a0:911_2: araññanti. Idaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vasena āgataṃ. “Āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ
atk-s0101a0:911_3: pacchima”nti idaṃ pana imassa bhikkhuno anurūpaṃ. Tassa lakkhaṇaṃ visuddhimagge dhutaṅganiddese
atk-s0101a0:911_4: vuttaṃ. Rukkhamūlanti yaṃ kiñci sandacchāyaṃ vivittarukkhamūlaṃ. Pabbatanti selaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:911_5: Tattha hi udakasoṇḍīsu udakakiccaṃ katvā sītāya rukkhacchāyāya nisinnassa nānādisāsu
atk-s0101a0:911_6: khāyamānāsu sītena vātena bījiyamānassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti. Kandaranti kaṃ vuccati
atk-s0101a0:911_7: udakaṃ, tena dāritaṃ, udakena bhinnaṃ pabbatapadesaṃ. Yaṃ nadītumbantipi, nadīkuñjantipi
atk-s0101a0:911_8: vadanti. Tattha hi rajatapaṭṭasadisā vālikā hoti, matthake maṇivitānaṃ viya vanagahaṇaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:911_9: maṇikhandhasadisaṃ udakaṃ sandati. Evarūpaṃ kandaraṃ oruyha pānīyaṃ pivitvā gattāni
atk-s0101a0:911_10: sītāni katvā vālikaṃ ussāpetvā paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ paññapetvā nisinnassa samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0101a0:911_11: karoto cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti. Giriguhanti dvinnaṃ pabbatānaṃ antare, ekasmiṃyeva vā
atk-s0101a0:911_12: umaggasadisaṃ mahāvivaraṃ susānalakkhaṇaṃ visuddhimagge vuttaṃ. Vanapatthanti gāmantaṃ
atk-s0101a0:911_13: atikkamitvā manussānaṃ anupacāraṭṭhānaṃ, yattha na kasanti na vapanti, tenevāha –
atk-s0101a0:911_15: Ākaṅkhamāno panettha cīvarakuṭiṃ katvā vasati. Palālapuñjanti palālarāsi. Mahāpalālapuñjato
atk-s0101a0:911_16: hi palālaṃ nikkaḍḍhitvā pabbhāraleṇasadise ālaye karonti, gacchagumbhādīnampi upari
atk-s0101a0:911_17: palālaṃ pakkhipitvā heṭṭhā nisinnā samaṇadhammaṃ karonti. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:912_0: Pacchābhattanti bhattassa pacchato. Piṇḍapātapaṭikkantoti piṇḍapātapariyesanato paṭikkanto.
atk-s0101a0:912_1: Pallaṅkanti samantato ūrubaddhāsanaṃ. Ābhujitvāti bandhitvā. Ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti
atk-s0101a0:912_2: uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujuṃ ṭhapetvā aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhike koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādetvā.
atk-s0101a0:912_3: Evañhi nisinnassa cammamaṃsanhārūni na paṇamanti. Athassa yā tesaṃ paṇamanapaccayā
atk-s0101a0:912_4: khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjeyyuṃ, tā nuppajjanti. Tāsu anuppajjamānāsu cittaṃ ekaggaṃ
atk-s0101a0:912_5: hoti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ na paripatati, vuḍḍhiṃ phātiṃ vepullaṃ upagacchati. Parimukhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:912_6: satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ satiṃ ṭhapayitvā. Mukhasamīpe vā katvāti
atk-s0101a0:912_7: attho. Teneva vibhaṅge vuttaṃ – “ayaṃ sati upaṭṭhitā hoti sūpaṭṭhitā nāsikagge vā
atk-s0101a0:912_8: mukhanimitte vā, tena vuccati parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā”ti. Athavā parīti pariggahaṭṭho.
atk-s0101a0:912_9: Mukhanti niyyānaṭṭho. Satīti upaṭṭhānaṭṭho. Tena vuccati – “parimukhaṃ sati”nti.
atk-s0101a0:912_10: Evaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttanayenapettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepo – “pariggahitaniyyānasatiṃ katvā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:913_0: 217. Abhijjhaṃ loketi ettha lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena pañcupādānakkhandhā loko, tasmā
atk-s0101a0:913_1: pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu rāgaṃ pahāya kāmacchandaṃ vikkhambhetvāti ayametthattho.
atk-s0101a0:913_2: Vigatābhijjhenāti vikkhambhanavasena pahīnattā vigatābhijjhena, na cakkhuviññāṇasadisenāti
atk-s0101a0:913_3: attho. Abhijjhāya cittaṃ parisodhetīti abhijjhāto cittaṃ parimoceti. Yathā taṃ sā
atk-s0101a0:913_4: muñcati ceva, muñcitvā ca na puna gaṇhati, evaṃ karotīti attho. Byāpādapadosaṃ pahāyātiādīsupi
atk-s0101a0:913_5: eseva nayo. Byāpajjati iminā cittaṃ pūtikummāsādayo viya purimapakatiṃ vijahatīti
atk-s0101a0:913_6: byāpādo. Vikārāpattiyā padussati, paraṃ vā padūseti vināsetīti padoso. Ubhayametaṃ
atk-s0101a0:913_7: kodhassevādhivacanaṃ. Thinaṃ cittagelaññaṃ. Middhaṃ cetasikagelaññaṃ, thinañca middhañca
atk-s0101a0:913_9: parisuddhāya saññāya samannāgato. Sato sampajānoti satiyā ca ñāṇena ca samannāgato.
atk-s0101a0:913_10: Idaṃ ubhayaṃ ālokasaññāya upakārattā vuttaṃ. Uddhaccañca kukkuccañca uddhaccakukkuccaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:913_11: Tiṇṇavicikicchoti vicikicchaṃ taritvā atikkamitvā ṭhito. “Kathamidaṃ kathamida”nti
atk-s0101a0:913_12: evaṃ nappavattatīti akathaṃkathī. Kusalesu dhammesūti anavajjesu dhammesu. “Ime nu
atk-s0101a0:913_13: kho kusalā kathamime kusalā”ti evaṃ na vicikicchati. Na kaṅkhatīti attho. Ayamettha
atk-s0101a0:913_14: saṅkhepo. Imesu pana nīvaraṇesu vacanatthalakkhaṇādibhedato yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ
atk-s0101a0:914_0: 218. Yā panāyaṃ seyyathāpi mahārājāti upamā vuttā. Tattha iṇaṃ ādāyāti vaḍḍhiyā dhanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:914_1: gahetvā. Byantiṃ kareyyāti vigatantaṃ kareyya, yathā tesaṃ kākaṇikamattopi pariyanto
atk-s0101a0:914_2: nāma nāvasissati, evaṃ kareyya; sabbaso paṭiniyyāteyyāti attho. Tato nidānanti āṇaṇyanidānaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:914_3: So hi “aṇaṇomhī”ti āvajjanto balavapāmojjaṃ labhati, somanassaṃ adhigacchati, tena
atk-s0101a0:915_0: 219. Visabhāgavedanuppattiyā kakaceneva catuiriyāpathaṃ chindanto ābādhatīti ābādho,
atk-s0101a0:915_1: svāssa atthīti ābādhiko. Taṃ samuṭṭhānena dukkhena dukkhito. Adhimattagilānoti bāḷhagilāno.
atk-s0101a0:915_2: Nacchādeyyāti adhimattabyādhiparetatāya na rucceyya. Balamattāti balameva, balañcassa
atk-s0101a0:915_3: kāye na bhaveyyāti attho. Tatonidānanti ārogyanidānaṃ. Tassa hi – “arogomhī”ti āvajjayato
atk-s0101a0:915_4: tadubhayaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ – “labhetha pāmojjaṃ, adhigaccheyya somanassa”nti.
atk-s0101a0:916: 220. Na cassa kiñci bhogānaṃ vayoti kākaṇikamattampi bhogānaṃ vayo na bhaveyya. Tatonidānanti bandhanāmokkhanidānaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva sabbapadesu yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:917_0: 221-222. Anattādhīnoti na attani adhīno, attano ruciyā kiñci kātuṃ na labhati. Parādhīnoti
atk-s0101a0:917_1: paresu adhīno parasseva ruciyā vattati. Na yena kāmaṃ gamoti yena disābhāgenassa
atk-s0101a0:917_2: gantukāmatā hoti, icchā uppajjati gamanāya, tena gantuṃ na labhati. Dāsabyāti dāsabhāvā.
atk-s0101a0:917_3: Bhujissoti attano santako. Tatonidānanti bhujissanidānaṃ. Kantāraddhānamagganti kantāraṃ
atk-s0101a0:917_4: addhānamaggaṃ, nirudakaṃ dīghamagganti attho. Tatonidānanti khemantabhūminidānaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:918_0: 223. Ime pañca nīvaraṇe appahīneti ettha bhagavā appahīnakāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ iṇasadisaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:918_1: sesāni rogādisadisāni katvā dasseti. Tatrāyaṃ sadisatā. Yo hi paresaṃ iṇaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0101a0:918_2: vināseti, so tehi iṇaṃ dehīti vuccamānopi pharusaṃ vuccamānopi bajjhamānopi vadhīyamānopi
atk-s0101a0:918_3: kiñci paṭibāhituṃ na sakkoti, sabbaṃ titikkhati. Titikkhākāraṇaṃ hissa taṃ iṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:918_4: Evameva yo yamhi kāmacchandena rajjati, taṇhāsahagatena taṃ vatthuṃ gaṇhati, so tena
atk-s0101a0:918_5: pharusaṃ vuccamānopi bajjhamānopi vadhīyamānopi sabbaṃ titikkhati, titikkhākāraṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:918_6: hissa so kāmacchando hoti, gharasāmikehi vadhīyamānānaṃ itthīnaṃ viyāti, evaṃ iṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:919_0: Yathā pana pittarogāturo madhusakkarādīsupi dinnesu pittarogāturatāya tesaṃ rasaṃ
atk-s0101a0:919_1: na vindati, “tittakaṃ tittaka”nti uggiratiyeva. Evameva byāpannacitto hitakāmehi
atk-s0101a0:919_2: ācariyupajjhāyehi appamattakampi ovadiyamāno ovādaṃ na gaṇhati. “Ati viya me tumhe
atk-s0101a0:919_3: upaddavethā”tiādīni vatvā vibbhamati. Pittarogāturatāya so puriso madhusakkarādīnaṃ
atk-s0101a0:919_4: viya kodhāturatāya jhānasukhādibhedaṃ sāsanarasaṃ na vindatīti. Evaṃ rogo viya byāpādo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0101a0:920_0: Yathā pana nakkhattadivase bandhanāgāre baddho puriso nakkhattassa neva ādiṃ na majjhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:920_1: na pariyosānaṃ passati. So dutiyadivase mutto aho hiyyo nakkhattaṃ manāpaṃ, aho naccaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:920_2: aho gītantiādīni sutvāpi paṭivacanaṃ na deti. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Nakkhattassa ananubhūtattā.
atk-s0101a0:920_3: Evameva thinamiddhābhibhūto bhikkhu vicittanayepi dhammassavane pavattamāne neva
atk-s0101a0:920_4: tassa ādiṃ na majjhaṃ na pariyosānaṃ jānāti. Sopi uṭṭhite dhammassavane aho dhammassavanaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:920_5: aho kāraṇaṃ, aho upamāti dhammassavanassa vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇamānānaṃ sutvāpi paṭivacanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:920_6: na deti. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Thinamiddhavasena dhammakathāya ananubhūtattā. Evaṃ bandhanāgāraṃ
atk-s0101a0:921_0: Yathā pana nakkhattaṃ kīḷantopi dāso – “idaṃ nāma accāyikaṃ karaṇīyaṃ atthi, sīghaṃ
atk-s0101a0:921_1: tattha gacchāhi. No ce gacchasi, hatthapādaṃ vā te chindāmi kaṇṇanāsaṃ vā”ti vutto
atk-s0101a0:921_2: sīghaṃ gacchatiyeva. Nakkhattassa ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ anubhavituṃ na labhati, kasmā?
atk-s0101a0:921_3: Parādhīnatāya, evameva vinaye apakataññunā vivekatthāya araññaṃ paviṭṭhenāpi kismiñcideva
atk-s0101a0:921_4: antamaso kappiyamaṃsepi akappiyamaṃsasaññāya uppannāya vivekaṃ pahāya sīlavisodhanatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:921_5: vinayadharassa santikaṃ gantabbaṃ hoti, vivekasukhaṃ anubhavituṃ na labhati, kasmā?
atk-s0101a0:921_6: Uddhaccakukkuccābhibhūtatāyāti. Evaṃ dāsabyaṃ viya uddhaccakukkuccaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:922_0: Yathā pana kantāraddhānamaggappaṭipanno puriso corehi manussānaṃ viluttokāsaṃ pahatokāsañca
atk-s0101a0:922_1: disvā daṇḍakasaddenapi sakuṇasaddenapi “corā āgatā”ti ussaṅkitaparisaṅkitova hoti,
atk-s0101a0:922_2: gacchatipi tiṭṭhatipi nivattatipi, gataṭṭhānato agataṭṭhānameva bahutaraṃ hoti. So
atk-s0101a0:922_3: kicchena kasirena khemantabhūmiṃ pāpuṇāti vā na vā pāpuṇāti. Evameva yassa aṭṭhasu
atk-s0101a0:922_4: ṭhānesu vicikicchā uppannā hoti, so – “buddho nu kho, no nu kho buddho”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0101a0:922_5: vicikicchanto adhimuccitvā saddhāya gaṇhituṃ na sakkoti. Asakkonto maggaṃ vā phalaṃ
atk-s0101a0:922_6: vā na pāpuṇātīti. Yathā kantāraddhānamagge – “corā atthi natthī”ti punappunaṃ āsappanaparisappanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:922_7: apariyogāhanaṃ chambhitattaṃ cittassa uppādento khemantapattiyā antarāyaṃ karoti,
atk-s0101a0:922_8: evaṃ vicikicchāpi – “buddho nu kho, na buddho”tiādinā nayena punappunaṃ āsappanaparisappanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:922_9: apariyogāhanaṃ chambhitattaṃ cittassa uppādayamānā ariyabhūmippattiyā antarāyaṃ karotīti
atk-s0101a0:923_0: 224. Idāni – “seyyathāpi, mahārāja, āṇaṇya”nti ettha bhagavā pahīnakāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:923_1: āṇaṇyasadisaṃ, sesāni ārogyādisadisāni katvā dasseti. Tatrāyaṃ sadisatā, yathā hi
atk-s0101a0:923_2: puriso iṇaṃ ādāya kammante payojetvā samiddhataṃ patto – “idaṃ iṇaṃ nāma palibodhamūla”nti
atk-s0101a0:923_3: cintetvā savaḍḍhikaṃ iṇaṃ niyyātetvā paṇṇaṃ phālāpeyya. Athassa tato paṭṭhāya neva
atk-s0101a0:923_4: koci dūtaṃ peseti, na paṇṇaṃ. So iṇasāmike disvāpi sace icchati, āsanā uṭṭhahati,
atk-s0101a0:923_5: no ce na uṭṭhahati, kasmā? Tehi saddhiṃ nillepatāya alaggatāya. Evameva bhikkhu –
atk-s0101a0:923_6: “ayaṃ kāmacchando nāma palibodhamūla”nti cintetvā cha dhamme bhāvetvā kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:923_7: pajahati. Te pana cha dhamme mahāsatipaṭṭhāne vaṇṇayissāma. Tassevaṃ pahīnakāmacchandassa
atk-s0101a0:923_8: yathā iṇamuttassa purisassa iṇassāmike disvā neva bhayaṃ na chambhitattaṃ hoti. Evameva
atk-s0101a0:923_9: paravatthumhi neva saṅgo na baddho hoti. Dibbānipi rūpāni passato kileso na samudācarati.
atk-s0101a0:924_0: Yathā pana so pittarogāturo puriso bhesajjakiriyāya taṃ rogaṃ vūpasametvā tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0101a0:924_1: madhusakkarādīnaṃ rasaṃ vindati. Evameva bhikkhu “ayaṃ byāpādo nāma mahā anatthakaro”ti
atk-s0101a0:924_2: cha dhamme bhāvetvā byāpādanīvaraṇaṃ pajahati. Sabbanīvaraṇesu cha dhamme mahāsatipaṭṭhāneyeva
atk-s0101a0:924_3: vaṇṇayissāma. Na kevalañca teyeva, yepi thinamiddhādīnaṃ pahānāya bhāvetabbā, tepi
atk-s0101a0:924_4: sabbe tattheva vaṇṇayissāma. So evaṃ pahīnabyāpādo yathā pittarogavimutto puriso
atk-s0101a0:924_5: madhusakkarādīnaṃ rasaṃ sampiyāyamāno paṭisevati, evameva ācārapaṇṇattiādīni sikkhāpadāni
atk-s0101a0:924_6: sirasā sampaṭicchitvā sampiyāyamāno sikkhati. Tasmā bhagavā ārogyamiva byāpādappahānaṃ āha.
atk-s0101a0:925_0: Yathā so nakkhattadivase bandhanāgāraṃ pavesito puriso aparasmiṃ nakkhattadivase
atk-s0101a0:925_1: – “pubbepi ahaṃ pamādadosena baddho, tena nakkhattaṃ nānubhaviṃ. Idāni appamatto
atk-s0101a0:925_2: bhavissāmī”ti yathāssa paccatthikā okāsaṃ na labhanti, evaṃ appamatto hutvā nakkhattaṃ
atk-s0101a0:925_3: anubhavitvā – ‘aho nakkhattaṃ, aho nakkhatta’nti udānaṃ udānesi, evameva bhikkhu
atk-s0101a0:925_4: – “idaṃ thinamiddhaṃ nāma mahāanatthakara”nti cha dhamme bhāvetvā thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:925_5: pajahati, so evaṃ pahīnathinamiddho yathā bandhanā mutto puriso sattāhampi nakkhattassa
atk-s0101a0:925_7: anubhavanto saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Tasmā bhagavā bandhanā mokkhamiva
atk-s0101a0:926_0: Yathā pana dāso kiñcideva mittaṃ upanissāya sāmikānaṃ dhanaṃ datvā attānaṃ bhujissaṃ
atk-s0101a0:926_1: katvā tato paṭṭhāya yaṃ icchati, taṃ karoti. Evameva bhikkhu – “idaṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ
atk-s0101a0:926_2: nāma mahā anatthakara”nti cha dhamme bhāvetvā uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pajahati. So evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:926_3: pahīnauddhaccakukkucco yathā bhujisso puriso yaṃ icchati, taṃ karoti, na taṃ koci
atk-s0101a0:926_4: balakkārena tato nivatteti, evameva yathā sukhaṃ nekkhammapaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjati,
atk-s0101a0:926_5: na taṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ balakkārena tato nivatteti. Tasmā bhagavā bhujissaṃ viya
atk-s0101a0:927_0: Yathā balavā puriso hatthasāraṃ gahetvā sajjāvudho saparivāro kantāraṃ paṭipajjeyya,
atk-s0101a0:927_1: taṃ corā dūratova disvā palāyeyyuṃ. So sotthinā taṃ kantāraṃ nittharitvā khemantaṃ
atk-s0101a0:927_2: patto haṭṭhatuṭṭho assa. Evameva bhikkhu “ayaṃ vicikicchā nāma mahā anatthakārikā”ti
atk-s0101a0:927_3: cha dhamme bhāvetvā vicikicchaṃ pajahati. So evaṃ pahīnavicikiccho yathā balavā puriso
atk-s0101a0:927_4: sajjāvudho saparivāro nibbhayo core tiṇaṃ viya agaṇetvā sotthinā nikkhamitvā khemantabhūmiṃ
atk-s0101a0:927_5: pāpuṇāti, evameva bhikkhu duccaritakantāraṃ nittharitvā paramaṃ khemantabhūmiṃ amataṃ
atk-s0101a0:927_6: mahānibbānaṃ pāpuṇāti. Tasmā bhagavā khemantabhūmiṃ viya vicikicchāpahānaṃ āha.
atk-s0101a0:928_0: 225. Pāmojjaṃ jāyatīti tuṭṭhākāro jāyati. Pamuditassa pīti jāyatīti tuṭṭhassa sakalasarīraṃ
atk-s0101a0:928_1: khobhayamānā pīti jāyati. Pītimanassa kāyo passambhatīti pītisampayuttacittassa puggalassa
atk-s0101a0:928_2: nāmakāyo passambhati, vigatadaratho hoti. Sukhaṃ vedetīti kāyikampi cetasikampi sukhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:928_3: vedayati. Cittaṃ samādhiyatīti iminā nekkhammasukhena sukhitassa upacāravasenapi
atk-s0101a0:930_0: 226. So vivicceva kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatītiādi pana upacārasamādhinā
atk-s0101a0:930_1: samāhite citte uparivisesadassanatthaṃ appanāsamādhinā samāhite citte tassa samādhino
atk-s0101a0:930_2: pabhedadassanatthaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Imameva kāyanti imaṃ karajakāyaṃ. Abhisandetīti
atk-s0101a0:930_3: temeti sneheti, sabbattha pavattapītisukhaṃ karoti. Parisandetīti samantato sandeti.
atk-s0101a0:930_4: Paripūretīti vāyunā bhastaṃ viya pūreti. Parippharatīti samantato phusati. Sabbāvato
atk-s0101a0:930_5: kāyassāti assa bhikkhuno sabbakoṭṭhāsavato kāyassa kiñci upādinnakasantatipavattiṭṭhāne
atk-s0101a0:930_6: chavimaṃsalohitānugataṃ aṇumattampi ṭhānaṃ paṭhamajjhānasukhena aphuṭaṃ nāma na hoti.
atk-s0101a0:931_0: 227. Dakkhoti cheko paṭibalo nhānīyacuṇṇāni kātuñceva payojetuñca sannetuñca. Kaṃsathāleti
atk-s0101a0:931_1: yena kenaci lohena katabhājane. Mattikabhājanaṃ pana thiraṃ na hoti. Sannentassa
atk-s0101a0:931_2: bhijjati. Tasmā taṃ na dasseti. Paripphosakaṃ paripphosakanti siñcitvā siñcitvā.
atk-s0101a0:931_3: Sanneyyāti vāmahatthena kaṃsathālaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇahatthena pamāṇayuttaṃ udakaṃ
atk-s0101a0:931_4: siñcitvā siñcitvā parimaddanto piṇḍaṃ kareyya. Snehānugatāti udakasinehena anugatā.
atk-s0101a0:931_5: Snehaparetāti udakasinehena pariggahitā. Santarabāhirāti saddhiṃ antopadesena ceva
atk-s0101a0:931_6: bahipadesena ca sabbatthakameva udakasinehena phuṭāti attho. Na ca paggharaṇīti na
atk-s0101a0:931_7: ca bindu bindu udakaṃ paggharati, sakkā hoti hatthenapi dvīhipi tīhipi aṅgulīhi gahetuṃ
atk-s0101a0:933_0: 228-229. Dutiyajjhānasukhūpamāyaṃ ubbhidodakoti ubbhinnaudako, na heṭṭhā ubbhijjitvā
atk-s0101a0:933_1: uggacchanakaudako. Antoyeva pana ubbhijjanakaudakoti attho. Āyamukhanti āgamanamaggo.
atk-s0101a0:933_2: Devoti megho. Kālena kālanti kāle kāle, anvaddhamāsaṃ vā anudasāhaṃ vāti attho. Dhāranti
atk-s0101a0:933_3: vuṭṭhiṃ. Na anuppaveccheyyāti na ca paveseyya, na vasseyyāti attho. Sītā vāridhārā
atk-s0101a0:933_4: ubbhijjitvāti sītaṃ dhāraṃ uggantvā rahadaṃ pūrayamānaṃ ubbhijjitvā. Heṭṭhā uggacchanaudakañhi
atk-s0101a0:933_5: uggantvā uggantvā bhijjantaṃ udakaṃ khobheti, catūhi disāhi pavisanaudakaṃ purāṇapaṇṇatiṇakaṭṭhadaṇḍakādīhi
atk-s0101a0:933_6: udakaṃ khobheti, vuṭṭhiudakaṃ dhārānipātapubbuḷakehi udakaṃ khobheti. Sannisinnameva
atk-s0101a0:933_7: pana hutvā iddhinimmitamiva uppajjamānaṃ udakaṃ imaṃ padesaṃ pharati, imaṃ padesaṃ
atk-s0101a0:933_8: na pharatīti natthi, tena aphuṭokāso nāma na hotīti. Tattha rahado viya karajakāyo.
atk-s0101a0:933_9: Udakaṃ viya dutiyajjhānasukhaṃ. Sesaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:935_0: 230-231. Tatiyajjhānasukhūpamāyaṃ uppalāni ettha santīti uppalinī. Sesapadadvayepi
atk-s0101a0:935_1: eseva nayo. Ettha ca setarattanīlesu yaṃ kiñci uppalaṃ uppalameva. Ūnakasatapattaṃ
atk-s0101a0:935_2: puṇḍarīkaṃ, satapattaṃ padumaṃ. Pattaniyamaṃ vā vināpi setaṃ padumaṃ, rattaṃ puṇḍarīkanti
atk-s0101a0:935_3: ayamettha vinicchayo. Udakānuggatānīti udakato na uggatāni. Anto nimuggaposīnīti
atk-s0101a0:935_4: udakatalassa anto nimuggāniyeva hutvā posīni, vaḍḍhīnīti attho. Sesaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:937_0: 232-233. Catutthajjhānasukhūpamāyaṃ parisuddhena cetasā pariyodātenāti ettha nirupakkilesaṭṭhena
atk-s0101a0:937_1: parisuddhaṃ, pabhassaraṭṭhena pariyodātanti veditabbaṃ. Odātena vatthenāti idaṃ utupharaṇatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:937_2: vuttaṃ. Kiliṭṭhavatthena hi utupharaṇaṃ na hoti, taṅkhaṇadhotaparisuddhena utupharaṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:937_3: balavaṃ hoti. Imissāya hi upamāya vatthaṃ viya karajakāyo, utupharaṇaṃ viya catutthajjhānasukhaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:937_4: Tasmā yathā sunhātassa purisassa parisuddhaṃ vatthaṃ sasīsaṃ pārupitvā nisinnassa
atk-s0101a0:937_5: sarīrato utu sabbameva vatthaṃ pharati. Na koci vatthassa aphuṭokāso hoti. Evaṃ catutthajjhānasukhena
atk-s0101a0:937_6: bhikkhuno karajakāyassa na koci okāso aphuṭo hotīti. Evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Imesaṃ
atk-s0101a0:937_7: pana catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ anupadavaṇṇanā ca bhāvanānayo ca visuddhimagge vuttoti idha na vitthārito.
atk-s0101a0:938_0: Ettāvatā cesa rūpajjhānalābhīyeva, na arūpajjhānalābhīti na veditabbo. Na hi aṭṭhasu
atk-s0101a0:938_1: samāpattīsu cuddasahākārehi ciṇṇavasībhāvaṃ vinā upari abhiññādhigamo hoti. Pāḷiyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:938_2: pana rūpajjhānāniyeva āgatāni. Arūpajjhānāni āharitvā kathetabbāni.
atk-s0101a0:940_0: 234. So evaṃ samāhite citte…pe… āneñjappatteti so cuddasahākārehi aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu
atk-s0101a0:940_1: ciṇṇavasībhāvo bhikkhūti dasseti. Sesamettha visuddhimagge vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:940_2: Ñāṇadassanāya cittaṃ abhinīharatīti ettha ñāṇadassananti maggañāṇampi, vuccati phalañāṇampi,
atk-s0101a0:940_3: sabbaññutaññāṇampi, paccavekkhaṇañāṇampi, vipassanāñāṇampi. “Kiṃ nu kho, āvuso, ñāṇadassanavisuddhatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:940_4: bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti ettha hi maggañāṇaṃ ñāṇadassananti vuttaṃ. “Ayamañño
atk-s0101a0:940_5: uttarimanussadhammo alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti ettha phalañāṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:940_6: “Bhagavatopi kho ñāṇadassanaṃ udapādi sattāhakālaṅkato āḷāro kālāmo”ti ettha sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:940_7: “Ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṃ udapādi akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jātī”ti ettha paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:940_8: idha pana ñāṇadassanāya cittanti idaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ ñāṇadassananti vuttanti.
atk-s0101a0:941_0: Abhinīharatīti vipassanāñāṇassa nibbattanatthāya tanninnaṃ tappoṇaṃ tappabbhāraṃ
atk-s0101a0:941_1: karoti. Rūpīti ādīnamattho vuttoyeva. Odanakummāsūpacayoti odanena ceva kummāsena
atk-s0101a0:941_4: khuddakasambāhanena parimaddanadhammo. Daharakāle vā ūrūsu sayāpetvā gabbhāvāsena
atk-s0101a0:941_5: dussaṇṭhitānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ aṅgānaṃ saṇṭhānasampādanatthaṃ añchanapīḷanādivasena parimaddanadhammo.
atk-s0101a0:941_6: Evaṃ pariharitopi bhedanaviddhaṃsanadhammo bhijjati ceva vikirati ca, evaṃ sabhāvoti
atk-s0101a0:941_7: attho. Tattha rūpī cātumahābhūtikotiādīsu chahi padehi samudayo kathito. Aniccapadena
atk-s0101a0:941_8: saddhiṃ pacchimehi dvīhi atthaṅgamo. Ettha sitaṃ ettha paṭibaddhanti ettha cātumahābhūtike
atk-s0101a0:942_0: 235. Subhoti sundaro. Jātimāti parisuddhākarasamuṭṭhito. Suparikammakatoti suṭṭhu
atk-s0101a0:942_1: kataparikammo apanītapāsāṇasakkharo. Acchoti tanucchavi. Vippasannoti suṭṭhu pasanno.
atk-s0101a0:942_2: Sabbākārasampannoti dhovanavedhanādīhi sabbehi ākārehi sampanno. Nīlantiādīhi vaṇṇasampattiṃ
atk-s0101a0:942_3: dasseti. Tādisañhi āvutaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti. Evameva khoti ettha evaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:942_4: veditabbaṃ. Maṇi viya hi karajakāyo. Āvutasuttaṃ viya vipassanāñāṇaṃ. Cakkhumā puriso
atk-s0101a0:942_5: viya vipassanālābhī bhikkhu, hatthe karitvā paccavekkhato ayaṃ kho maṇīti maṇino
atk-s0101a0:942_6: āvibhūtakālo viya vipassanāñāṇaṃ, abhinīharitvā nisinnassa bhikkhuno cātumahābhūtikakāyassa
atk-s0101a0:942_7: āvibhūtakālo, tatridaṃ suttaṃ āvutanti suttassāvibhūtakālo viya vipassanāñāṇaṃ, abhinīharitvā
atk-s0101a0:942_8: nisinnassa bhikkhuno tadārammaṇānaṃ phassapañcamakānaṃ vā sabbacittacetasikānaṃ vā
atk-s0101a0:943_0: Idañca vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggañāṇānantaraṃ. Evaṃ santepi yasmā abhiññāvāre āraddhe etassa
atk-s0101a0:943_1: antarāvāro natthi tasmā idheva dassitaṃ. Yasmā ca aniccādivasena akatasammasanassa
atk-s0101a0:943_2: dibbāya sotadhātuyā bheravaṃ saddaṃ suṇato, pubbenivāsānussatiyā bherave khandhe
atk-s0101a0:943_3: anussarato, dibbena cakkhunā bheravampi rūpaṃ passato bhayasantāso uppajjati, na
atk-s0101a0:943_4: aniccādivasena katasammasanassa tasmā abhiññaṃ pattassa bhayavinodanahetusampādanatthampi
atk-s0101a0:943_5: idaṃ idheva dassitaṃ. Api ca yasmā vipassanāsukhaṃ nāmetaṃ maggaphalasukhasampādakaṃ
atk-s0101a0:943_6: pāṭiyekkaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ tasmāpi āditova idaṃ idha dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:945_0: 236-237. Manomayanti manena nibbattitaṃ. Sabbaṅgapaccaṅginti sabbehi aṅgehi ca paccaṅgehi
atk-s0101a0:945_1: ca samannāgataṃ. Ahīnindriyanti saṇṭhānavasena avikalindriyaṃ. Iddhimatā nimmitarūpañhi
atk-s0101a0:945_2: sace iddhimā odāto tampi odātaṃ. Sace aviddhakaṇṇo tampi aviddhakaṇṇanti evaṃ sabbākārehi
atk-s0101a0:945_3: tena sadisameva hoti. Muñjamhā īsikantiādi upamāttayampi hi sadisabhāvadassanatthameva
atk-s0101a0:945_4: vuttaṃ. Muñjasadisā eva hi tassa anto īsikā hoti. Kosisadisoyeva asi, vaṭṭāya kosiyā
atk-s0101a0:945_5: vaṭṭaṃ asimeva pakkhipanti, patthaṭāya patthaṭaṃ. Karaṇḍāti idampi ahikañcukassa
atk-s0101a0:945_6: nāmaṃ, na vilīvakaraṇḍakassa. Ahikañcuko hi ahinā sadisova hoti. Tattha kiñcāpi “puriso
atk-s0101a0:945_7: ahiṃ karaṇḍā uddhareyyā”ti hatthena uddharamāno viya dassito, atha kho cittenevassa
atk-s0101a0:945_8: uddharaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ayañhi ahi nāma sajātiyaṃ ṭhito, kaṭṭhantaraṃ vā rukkhantaraṃ
atk-s0101a0:945_9: vā nissāya, tacato sarīraṃ nikkaḍḍhanappayogasaṅkhātena thāmena, sarīraṃ khādayamānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:945_10: viya purāṇatacaṃ jigucchantoti imehi catūhi kāraṇehi sayameva kañcukaṃ pajahati,
atk-s0101a0:945_11: na sakkā tato aññena uddharituṃ, tasmā cittena uddharaṇaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttanti
atk-s0101a0:945_12: veditabbaṃ. Iti muñjādisadisaṃ imassa bhikkhuno sarīraṃ, īsikādisadisaṃ nimmitarūpanti.
atk-s0101a0:945_13: Idamettha opammasaṃsandanaṃ. Nimmānavidhānaṃ panettha parato ca iddhividhādipañcaabhiññākathā
atk-s0101a0:945_14: sabbākārena visuddhimagge vitthāritāti tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Upamāmattameva hi idha adhikaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:947_0: 238-239. Tattha chekakumbhakārādayo viya iddhividhañāṇalābhī bhikkhu daṭṭhabbo. Suparikammakatamattikādayo
atk-s0101a0:947_1: viya iddhividhañāṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Icchiticchitabhājanavikatiādikaraṇaṃ viya tassa
atk-s0101a0:948_0: 240-241. Dibbasotadhātuupamāyaṃ yasmā kantāraddhānamaggo sāsaṅko hoti sappaṭibhayo.
atk-s0101a0:948_1: Tattha ussaṅkitaparisaṅkitena ‘ayaṃ bherisaddo’, ‘ayaṃ mudiṅgasaddo’ti na sakkā vavatthapetuṃ,
atk-s0101a0:948_2: tasmā kantāraggahaṇaṃ akatvā khemamaggaṃ dassento addhānamaggappaṭipannoti āha. Appaṭibhayañhi
atk-s0101a0:948_3: khemamaggaṃ sīse sāṭakaṃ katvā saṇikaṃ paṭipanno vuttappakāre sadde sukhaṃ vavatthapeti.
atk-s0101a0:948_4: Tassa savanena tesaṃ tesaṃ saddānaṃ āvibhūtakālo viya yogino dūrasantikabhedānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:949_0: 242-243. Cetopariyañāṇūpamāyaṃ daharoti taruṇo. Yuvāti yobbannena samannāgato. Maṇḍanakajātikoti
atk-s0101a0:949_1: yuvāpi samāno na ālasiyo na kiliṭṭhavatthasarīro, atha kho maṇḍanapakatiko, divasassa
atk-s0101a0:949_2: dve tayo vāre nhāyitvā suddhavatthaparidahanaalaṅkārakaraṇasīloti attho. Sakaṇikanti
atk-s0101a0:949_3: kāḷatilakavaṅgamukhadūsipīḷakādīnaṃ aññatarena sadosaṃ. Tattha yathā tassa mukhanimittaṃ
atk-s0101a0:949_4: paccavekkhato mukhe doso pākaṭo hoti, evaṃ cetopariyañāṇāya cittaṃ abhinīharitvā
atk-s0101a0:949_5: nisinnassa bhikkhuno paresaṃ soḷasavidhaṃ cittaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:950_0: 244-245. Pubbenivāsañāṇūpamāyaṃ taṃ divasaṃ katakiriyā pākaṭā hotīti taṃ divasaṃ
atk-s0101a0:950_1: gatagāmattayameva gahitaṃ. Tattha gāmattayagatapuriso viya pubbenivāsañāṇalābhī daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0101a0:950_2: tayo gāmā viya tayo bhavā daṭṭhabbā, tassa purisassa tīsu gāmesu taṃ divasaṃ katakiriyāya
atk-s0101a0:950_3: āvibhāvo viya pubbenivāsāya cittaṃ abhinīharitvā nisinnassa bhikkhuno tīsu bhavesu
atk-s0101a0:951_0: 246-247. Dibbacakkhūpamāyaṃ vīthiṃ sañcaranteti aparāparaṃ sañcarante. Vīthiṃ carantetipi
atk-s0101a0:951_1: pāṭho. Ayamevattho. Tattha nagaramajjhe siṅghāṭakamhi pāsādo viya imassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0101a0:951_2: karajakāyo daṭṭhabbo, pāsāde ṭhito cakkhumā puriso viya ayameva dibbacakkhuṃ patvā
atk-s0101a0:951_3: ṭhito bhikkhu, gehaṃ pavisantā viya paṭisandhivasena mātukucchiyaṃ pavisantā, gehā
atk-s0101a0:951_4: nikkhamantā viya mātukucchito nikkhamantā, rathikāya vīthiṃ sañcarantā viya aparāparaṃ
atk-s0101a0:951_5: sañcaraṇakasattā, purato abbhokāsaṭṭhāne majjhe siṅghāṭake nisinnā viya tīsu bhavesu
atk-s0101a0:951_6: tattha tattha nibbattasattā, pāsādatale ṭhitapurisassa tesaṃ manussānaṃ āvibhūtakālo
atk-s0101a0:951_7: viya dibbacakkhuñāṇāya cittaṃ abhinīharitvā nisinnassa bhikkhuno tīsu bhavesu nibbattasattānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:951_8: āvibhūtakālo daṭṭhabbo. Idañca desanāsukhatthameva vuttaṃ. Āruppe pana dibbacakkhussa gocaro natthīti.
atk-s0101a0:953_0: 248. So evaṃ samāhite citteti idha vipassanāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:953_1: Āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāyāti āsavānaṃ khayañāṇanibbattanatthāya. Ettha ca āsavānaṃ khayo
atk-s0101a0:953_2: nāma maggopi phalampi nibbānampi bhaṅgopi vuccati. “Khaye ñāṇaṃ, anuppāde ñāṇa”nti
atk-s0101a0:953_3: ettha hi maggo āsavānaṃ khayoti vutto. “Āsavānaṃ khayā samaṇo hotī”ti ettha phalaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:955: Āsavā tassa vaḍḍhanti, ārā so āsavakkhayā”ti. ;
atk-s0101a0:956: Ettha nibbānaṃ. “Āsavānaṃ khayo vayo bhedo aniccatā antaradhāna”nti ettha bhaṅgo. Idha pana nibbānaṃ adhippetaṃ. Arahattamaggopi vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-s0101a0:957_0: Cittaṃ abhinīharatīti vipassanā cittaṃ tanninnaṃ tappoṇaṃ tappabbhāraṃ karoti. So
atk-s0101a0:957_1: idaṃ dukkhantiādīsu “ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ, na ito bhiyyo”ti sabbampi dukkhasaccaṃ sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhena
atk-s0101a0:957_2: yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti attho. Tassa ca dukkhassa nibbattikaṃ taṇhaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti.
atk-s0101a0:957_3: Tadubhayampi yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā nirujjhati, taṃ tesaṃ appavattiṃ nibbānaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhanirodho”ti;
atk-s0101a0:957_4: tassa ca sampāpakaṃ ariyamaggaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhena
atk-s0101a0:958_0: Evaṃ sarūpato saccāni dassetvā puna kilesavasena pariyāyato dassento “ime āsavā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:958_1: Tassa evaṃ jānato evaṃ passatoti tassa bhikkhuno evaṃ jānantassa evaṃ passantassa,
atk-s0101a0:958_2: saha vipassanāya koṭippattaṃ maggaṃ kathesi. Kāmāsavāti kāmāsavato. Vimuccatīti iminā
atk-s0101a0:958_3: maggakkhaṇaṃ dasseti. Vimuttasminti iminā phalakkhaṇaṃ. Vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hotīti
atk-s0101a0:958_4: iminā paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. Khīṇā jātītiādīhi tassa bhūmiṃ. Tena hi ñāṇena khīṇāsavo
atk-s0101a0:959_0: Katamā panassa jāti khīṇā? Kathañca naṃ pajānātīti? Na tāvassa atītā jāti khīṇā,
atk-s0101a0:959_1: pubbeva khīṇattā. Na anāgatā, anāgate vāyāmābhāvato. Na paccuppannā, vijjamānattā.
atk-s0101a0:959_2: Yā pana maggassa abhāvitattā uppajjeyya ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu ekacatupañcakkhandhappabhedā
atk-s0101a0:959_3: jāti, sā maggassa bhāvitattā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammataṃ āpajjanena khīṇā. Taṃ so maggabhāvanāya
atk-s0101a0:959_4: pahīnakilese paccavekkhitvā “kilesābhāve vijjamānampi kammaṃ āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikaṃva
atk-s0101a0:960_0: Vusitanti vutthaṃ parivutthaṃ. Brahmacariyanti maggabrahmacariyaṃ. Puthujjanakalyāṇakena
atk-s0101a0:960_1: hi saddhiṃ satta sekkhā brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasanti nāma, khīṇāsavo vutthavāso, tasmā
atk-s0101a0:960_2: so attano brahmacariyavāsaṃ paccavekkhanto vusitaṃ brahmacariyanti pajānāti. Kataṃ
atk-s0101a0:960_3: karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanāvasena
atk-s0101a0:960_4: soḷasavidhaṃ kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitaṃ. Tena tena maggena pahātabbakilesā pahīnā, dukkhamūlaṃ
atk-s0101a0:960_5: samucchinnanti attho. Puthujjanakalyāṇakādayo hi taṃ kiccaṃ karonti, khīṇāsavo katakaraṇīyo.
atk-s0101a0:960_6: Tasmā so attano karaṇīyaṃ paccavekkhanto kataṃ karaṇīyanti pajānāti. Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti
atk-s0101a0:960_7: idāni puna itthabhāvāya evaṃ soḷasakiccabhāvāya kilesakkhayabhāvāya vā kattabbaṃ
atk-s0101a0:960_8: maggabhāvanākiccaṃ me natthīti pajānāti. Atha vā itthattāyāti itthabhāvato imasmā
atk-s0101a0:960_9: evaṃ pakārā. Idāni vattamānakhandhasantānā aparaṃ khandhasantānaṃ mayhaṃ natthi.
atk-s0101a0:960_10: Ime pana pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakā rukkhā viya, te carimakacittanirodhena
atk-s0101a0:960_11: anupādāno viya jātavedo nibbāyissanti apaṇṇattikabhāvañca gamissantīti pajānāti.
atk-s0101a0:961_0: 249. Pabbatasaṅkhepeti pabbatamatthake. Anāviloti nikkaddamo. Sippiyo ca sambukā
atk-s0101a0:961_1: ca sippisambukaṃ. Sakkharā ca kathalāni ca sakkharakathalaṃ. Macchānaṃ gumbā ghaṭāti
atk-s0101a0:961_2: macchagumbaṃ. Tiṭṭhantampi carantampīti ettha sakkharakathalaṃ tiṭṭhatiyeva, itarāni
atk-s0101a0:961_3: carantipi tiṭṭhantipi. Yathā pana antarantarā ṭhitāsupi nisinnāsupi vijjamānāsupi
atk-s0101a0:961_4: “etā gāvo carantī”ti carantiyo upādāya itarāpi carantīti vuccanti. Evaṃ tiṭṭhantameva
atk-s0101a0:961_5: sakkharakathalaṃ upādāya itarampi dvayaṃ tiṭṭhantanti vuttaṃ. Itarañca dvayaṃ carantaṃ
atk-s0101a0:961_6: upādāya sakkharakathalampi carantanti vuttaṃ. Tattha cakkhumato purisassa tīre ṭhatvā
atk-s0101a0:961_7: passato sippikasambukādīnaṃ vibhūtakālo viya āsavānaṃ khayāya cittaṃ abhinīharitvā
atk-s0101a0:961_8: nisinnassa bhikkhuno catunnaṃ saccānaṃ vibhūtakālo daṭṭhabboti.
atk-s0101a0:962_0: Ettāvatā vipassanāñāṇaṃ, manomayañāṇaṃ, iddhividhañāṇaṃ, dibbasotañāṇaṃ, cetopariyañāṇaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:962_2: dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ, āsavakkhayañāṇanti dasa ñāṇāni niddiṭṭhāni honti. Tesaṃ ārammaṇavibhāgo
atk-s0101a0:962_6: Avasesānaṃ ārammaṇabhedo visuddhimagge vutto. Uttaritaraṃ vā paṇītataraṃ vāti yena
atk-s0101a0:962_7: kenaci pariyāyena ito seṭṭhataraṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ nāma natthīti bhagavā arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0101a0:964_0: 250. Rājā tattha tattha sādhukāraṃ pavattento ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ sakkaccaṃ sutvā
atk-s0101a0:964_1: “ciraṃ vatamhi ime pañhe puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇe pucchanto, thuse koṭṭento viya kiñci
atk-s0101a0:964_2: sāraṃ nālatthaṃ, aho vata bhagavato guṇasampadā, yo me dīpasahassaṃ jālento viya
atk-s0101a0:964_3: mahantaṃ ālokaṃ katvā ime pañhe vissajjesi. Suciraṃ vatamhi dasabalassa guṇānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0101a0:964_4: ajānanto vañcito”ti cintetvā buddhaguṇānussaraṇasambhūtāya pañcavidhāya pītiyā phuṭasarīro
atk-s0101a0:964_5: attano pasādaṃ āvikaronto upāsakattaṃ paṭivedesi. Taṃ dassetuṃ “evaṃ vutte rājā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:965_0: Tattha abhikkantaṃ, bhanteti ayaṃ abhikkantasaddo khayasundarābhirūpaabbhanumodanesu
atk-s0101a0:965_1: dissati. “Abhikkantā bhante, ratti, nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo, ciranisinno bhikkhusaṅgho”tiādīsu
atk-s0101a0:965_2: hi khaye dissati. “Ayaṃ me puggalo khamati, imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro
atk-s0101a0:966: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
atk-s0101a0:968: Ādīsu abhirūpe. “Abhikkantaṃ bho, gotamā”tiādīsu abbhanumodane. Idhāpi abbhanumodaneyeva. Yasmā ca abbhanumodane, tasmā ‘sādhu sādhu bhante’ti vuttaṃ hotīti veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:970: Hāse soke pasāde ca, kare āmeḍitaṃ budhoti.
atk-s0101a0:971: Iminā ca lakkhaṇena idha pasādavasena, pasaṃsāvasena cāyaṃ dvikkhattuṃ vuttoti veditabbo. Athavā abhikkantanti abhikantaṃ atiiṭṭhaṃ atimanāpaṃ atisundaranti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:972_0: Ettha ekena abhikkantasaddena desanaṃ thometi, ekena attano pasādaṃ. Ayañhettha adhippāyo,
atk-s0101a0:972_1: abhikkantaṃ bhante, yadidaṃ bhagavato dhammadesanā, ‘abhikkantaṃ’ yadidaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0101a0:972_2: dhammadesanaṃ āgamma mama pasādoti. Bhagavatoyeva vā vacanaṃ dve dve atthe sandhāya
atk-s0101a0:972_3: thometi. Bhagavato vacanaṃ abhikkantaṃ dosanāsanato, abhikkantaṃ guṇādhigamanato.
atk-s0101a0:972_4: Tathā saddhājananato, paññājananato, sātthato, sabyañjanato, uttānapadato, gambhīratthato,
atk-s0101a0:972_5: kaṇṇasukhato, hadayaṅgamato, anattukkaṃsanato, aparavambhanato, karuṇāsītalato, paññāvadātato,
atk-s0101a0:972_6: āpātharamaṇīyato, vimaddakkhamato, suyyamānasukhato, vīmaṃsiyamānahitatoti evamādīhi yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:973_0: Tato parampi catūhi upamāhi desanaṃyeva thometi. Tattha nikkujjitanti adhomukhaṭhapitaṃ
atk-s0101a0:973_1: heṭṭhāmukhajātaṃ vā. Ukkujjeyyāti upari mukhaṃ kareyya. Paṭicchannanti tiṇapaṇṇādichāditaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:973_2: Vivareyyāti ugghāṭeyya. Mūḷhassa vāti disāmūḷhassa. Maggaṃ ācikkheyyāti hatthe gahetvā
atk-s0101a0:973_4: caturaṅge tame. Ayaṃ tāva anuttānapadattho. Ayaṃ pana sādhippāyayojanā. Yathā koci
atk-s0101a0:973_5: nikkujjitaṃ ukkujjeyya, evaṃ saddhammavimukhaṃ asaddhamme patitaṃ maṃ asaddhammā
atk-s0101a0:973_6: vuṭṭhāpentana. Yathā paṭicchannaṃ vivareyya, evaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānā
atk-s0101a0:973_7: pabhuti micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannaṃ sāsanaṃ vivarantena, yathā mūḷhassa maggaṃ
atk-s0101a0:973_8: ācikkheyya, evaṃ kummaggamicchāmaggappaṭipannassa me saggamokkhamaggaṃ āvikarontena,
atk-s0101a0:973_9: yathā andhakāre telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya, evaṃ mohandhakāranimuggassa me buddhādiratanarūpāni
atk-s0101a0:973_11: etehi pariyāyehi pakāsitattā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsitoti.
atk-s0101a0:974_0: Evaṃ desanaṃ thometvā imāya desanāya ratanattaye pasannacitto pasannākāraṃ karonto
atk-s0101a0:974_1: esāhantiādimāha. Tattha esāhanti eso ahaṃ. Bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmīti bhagavā
atk-s0101a0:974_2: me saraṇaṃ, parāyanaṃ, aghassa tātā, hitassa ca vidhātāti. Iminā adhippāyena bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0101a0:974_3: gacchāmi bhajāmi sevāmi payirupāsāmi, evaṃ vā jānāmi bujjhāmīti. Yesañhi dhātūnaṃ
atk-s0101a0:974_4: gatiattho, buddhipi tesaṃ attho. Tasmā gacchāmīti imassa jānāmi bujjhāmīti ayampi
atk-s0101a0:974_5: attho vutto. Dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañcāti ettha pana adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodhe
atk-s0101a0:974_6: yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne catūsu apāyesu apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo, so atthato
atk-s0101a0:974_7: ariyamaggo ceva nibbānañca. Vuttañcetaṃ – “yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā, ariyo
atk-s0101a0:974_8: aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti vitthāro. Na kevalañca ariyamaggo ceva nibbānañca.
atk-s0101a0:974_9: Api ca kho ariyaphalehi saddhiṃ pariyattidhammopi. Vuttañhetaṃ chattamāṇavakavimāne –
atk-s0101a0:977_0: Ettha hi rāgavirāgoti maggo kathito. Anejamasokanti phalaṃ. Dhammamasaṅkhatanti nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:977_1: Appaṭikūlaṃ madhuramimaṃ paguṇaṃ suvibhattanti piṭakattayena vibhattā dhammakkhandhāti.
atk-s0101a0:977_2: Diṭṭhisīlasaṃghātena saṃhatoti saṅgho, so atthato aṭṭha ariyapuggalasamūho. Vuttañhetaṃ tasmiññeva vimāne –
atk-s0101a0:979: Aṭṭha ca puggaladhammadasā te, saṅghamimaṃ saraṇatthamupehī”ti. ;
atk-s0101a0:980: Bhikkhūnaṃ saṅgho bhikkhusaṅgho. Ettāvatā rājā tīṇi saraṇagamanāni paṭivedesi.
atk-s0101a0:982_0: Idāni tesu saraṇagamanesu kosallatthaṃ saraṇaṃ, saraṇagamanaṃ, yo ca saraṇaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0101a0:982_1: saraṇagamanappabhedo, saraṇagamanaphalaṃ, saṅkileso, bhedoti, ayaṃ vidhi veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:982_2: Seyyathidaṃ – saraṇatthato tāva hiṃsatīti saraṇaṃ. Saraṇagatānaṃ teneva saraṇagamanena
atk-s0101a0:982_3: bhayaṃ santāsaṃ dukkhaṃ duggatiparikilesaṃ hanati vināsetīti attho, ratanattayassevetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:983_0: Atha vā hite pavattanena ahitā ca nivattanena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsati buddho. Bhavakantārā
atk-s0101a0:983_1: uttāraṇena assāsadānena ca dhammo; appakānampi kārānaṃ vipulaphalapaṭilābhakaraṇena
atk-s0101a0:983_2: saṅgho. Tasmā imināpi pariyāyena ratanattayaṃ saraṇaṃ. Tappasādataggarutāhi vihatakileso
atk-s0101a0:983_3: tapparāyaṇatākārappavatto cittuppādo saraṇagamanaṃ. Taṃ samaṅgīsatto saraṇaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0101a0:983_4: Vuttappakārena cittuppādena etāni me tīṇi ratanāni saraṇaṃ, etāni parāyaṇanti evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:983_5: upetīti attho. Evaṃ tāva saraṇaṃ, saraṇagamanaṃ, yo ca saraṇaṃ gacchati, idaṃ tayaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:984_0: Saraṇagamanappabhede pana duvidhaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ – lokuttaraṃ lokiyañca. Tattha lokuttaraṃ
atk-s0101a0:984_2: hutvā kiccato sakalepi ratanattaye ijjhati. Lokiyaṃ puthujjanānaṃ saraṇagamanupakkilesavikkhambhanena
atk-s0101a0:984_3: ārammaṇato buddhādiguṇārammaṇaṃ hutvā ijjhati. Taṃ atthato buddhādīsu vatthūsu saddhāpaṭilābho
atk-s0101a0:984_4: saddhāmūlikā ca sammādiṭṭhi dasasu puññakiriyavatthūsu diṭṭhijukammanti vuccati.
atk-s0101a0:984_5: Tayidaṃ catudhā vattati – attasanniyyātanena, tapparāyaṇatāya, sissabhāvūpagamanena, paṇipātenāti.
atk-s0101a0:985_0: Tattha attasanniyyātanaṃ nāma – “ajjādiṃ katvā ahaṃ attānaṃ buddhassa niyyātemi,
atk-s0101a0:985_1: dhammassa, saṅghassā”ti evaṃ buddhādīnaṃ attapariccajanaṃ. Tapparāyaṇatā nāma “ajjādiṃ
atk-s0101a0:985_2: katvā ‘ahaṃ buddhaparāyaṇo, dhammaparāyaṇo, saṅghaparāyaṇo’ti. Maṃ dhārethā”ti evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:985_3: tapparāyaṇabhāvo. Sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ nāma – “ajjādiṃ katvā – ‘ahaṃ buddhassa antevāsiko,
atk-s0101a0:985_4: dhammassa, saṅghassa antevāsiko’ti maṃ dhārethā”ti evaṃ sissabhāvūpagamo. Paṇipāto
atk-s0101a0:985_6: tiṇṇaṃ vatthūnaṃ karomī’ti maṃ dhārethā”ti evaṃ buddhādīsu paramanipaccākāro. Imesañhi
atk-s0101a0:985_7: catunnaṃ ākārānaṃ aññatarampi karontena gahitaṃyeva hoti saraṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:986_0: Api ca bhagavato attānaṃ pariccajāmi, dhammassa, saṅghassa, attānaṃ pariccajāmi,
atk-s0101a0:986_1: jīvitaṃ pariccajāmi, pariccattoyeva me attā, pariccattaṃyeva jīvitaṃ, jīvitapariyantikaṃ
atk-s0101a0:986_2: buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, buddho me saraṇaṃ leṇaṃ tāṇanti; evampi attasanniyyātanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:986_3: veditabbaṃ. “Satthārañca vatāhaṃ passeyyaṃ, bhagavantameva passeyyaṃ, sugatañca vatāhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:986_4: passeyyaṃ, bhagavantameva passeyyaṃ, sammāsambuddhañca vatāhaṃ passeyyaṃ, bhagavantameva
atk-s0101a0:986_5: passeyya”nti. Evampi mahākassapassa saraṇagamanaṃ viya sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:987: “So ahaṃ vicarissāmi, gāmā gāmaṃ purā puraṃ;
atk-s0101a0:989_0: Evampi āḷavakādīnaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ viya tapparāyaṇatā veditabbā. Atha kho brahmāyu
atk-s0101a0:989_1: brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā
atk-s0101a0:989_2: bhagavato pādāni mukhena ca paricumbati, pāṇīhi ca parisambāhati, nāmañca sāveti
atk-s0101a0:989_3: – “brahmāyu ahaṃ, bho gotama brāhmaṇo, brahmāyu ahaṃ, bho gotama brāhmaṇo”ti evampi paṇipāto daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0101a0:990_0: So panesa ñātibhayācariyadakkhiṇeyyavasena catubbidho hoti. Tattha dakkhiṇeyyapaṇipātena
atk-s0101a0:990_1: saraṇagamanaṃ hoti, na itarehi. Seṭṭhavaseneva hi saraṇaṃ gaṇhāti, seṭṭhavasena ca
atk-s0101a0:990_2: bhijjati. Tasmā yo sākiyo vā koliyo vā – “buddho amhākaṃ ñātako”ti vandati, aggahitameva
atk-s0101a0:990_3: hoti saraṇaṃ. Yo vā – “samaṇo gotamo rājapūjito mahānubhāvo avandīyamāno anatthampi
atk-s0101a0:990_4: kareyyā”ti bhayena vandati, aggahitameva hoti saraṇaṃ. Yo vā bodhisattakāle bhagavato
atk-s0101a0:990_5: santike kiñci uggahitaṃ saramāno buddhakāle vā –
atk-s0101a0:992: Ekena bhogaṃ bhuñjeyya, dvīhi kammaṃ payojaye;
atk-s0101a0:994: Evarūpaṃ anusāsaniṃ uggahetvā – “ācariyo me”ti vandati, aggahitameva hoti saraṇaṃ. Yo pana – “ayaṃ loke aggadakkhiṇeyyo”ti vandati, teneva gahitaṃ hoti saraṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:995_0: Evaṃ gahitasaraṇassa ca upāsakassa vā upāsikāya vā aññatitthiyesu pabbajitampi ñātiṃ
atk-s0101a0:995_1: – “ñātako me aya”nti vandato saraṇagamanaṃ na bhijjati, pageva apabbajitaṃ. Tathā
atk-s0101a0:995_2: rājānaṃ bhayavasena vandato. So hi raṭṭhapūjitattā avandīyamāno anatthampi kareyyāti.
atk-s0101a0:995_3: Tathā yaṃ kiñci sippaṃ sikkhāpakaṃ titthiyampi – “ācariyo me aya”nti vandatopi na
atk-s0101a0:996: Ettha ca lokuttarassa saraṇagamanassa cattāri sāmaññaphalāni vipākaphalaṃ, sabbadukkhakkhayo ānisaṃsaphalaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0101a0:997: “Yo ca buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato;
atk-s0101a0:1001: Etaṃ kho saraṇaṃ khemaṃ, etaṃ saraṇamuttamaṃ;
atk-s0101a0:1003_0: Api ca niccādito anupagamanādivasena petassa ānisaṃsaphalaṃ veditabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1003_1: – “aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso, yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato upagaccheyya…pe…
atk-s0101a0:1003_2: kañci saṅkhāraṃ sukhato…pe… kañci dhammaṃ attato upagaccheyya…pe… mātaraṃ jīvitā
atk-s0101a0:1003_3: voropeyya…pe… pitaraṃ…pe… arahantaṃ…pe… paduṭṭhacitto tathāgatassa lohitaṃ uppādeyya…pe….
atk-s0101a0:1003_4: saṅghaṃ bhindeyya…pe… aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddiseyya, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti. Lokiyassa
atk-s0101a0:1003_5: pana saraṇagamanassa bhavasampadāpi bhogasampadāpi phalameva. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0101a0:1004: “Ye keci buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ;
atk-s0101a0:1006_0: Aparampi vuttaṃ – “atha kho sakko devānamindo asītiyā devatāsahassehi saddhiṃ yenāyasmā
atk-s0101a0:1006_1: mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami…pe… ekamantaṃ ṭhitaṃ kho sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ āyasmā
atk-s0101a0:1006_2: mahāmoggallāno etadavoca – “sādhu kho, devānaminda, buddhaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ hoti. Buddhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1006_3: saraṇagamanahetu kho, devānaminda, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā
atk-s0101a0:1006_4: sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti…pe… te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti – dibbena
atk-s0101a0:1006_5: āyunā, dibbena vaṇṇena, dibbena sukhena, dibbena yasena, dibbena ādhipateyyena, dibbehi
atk-s0101a0:1006_6: rūpehi saddehi gandhehi rasehi phoṭṭhabbehī”ti. Esa nayo dhamme ca saṅghe ca. Api
atk-s0101a0:1006_7: ca velāmasuttādīnaṃ vasenāpi saraṇagamanassa phalaviseso veditabbo. Evaṃ saraṇagamanassa phalaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1007_0: Tattha ca lokiyasaraṇagamanaṃ tīsu vatthūsu aññāṇasaṃsayamicchāñāṇādīhi saṃkilissati,
atk-s0101a0:1007_1: na mahājutikaṃ hoti, na mahāvipphāraṃ. Lokuttarassa natthi saṃkileso. Lokiyassa ca
atk-s0101a0:1007_2: saraṇagamanassa duvidho bhedo – sāvajjo ca anavajjo ca. Tattha sāvajjo aññasatthārādīsu
atk-s0101a0:1007_3: attasanniyyātanādīhi hoti, so ca aniṭṭhaphalo hoti. Anavajjo kālakiriyāya hoti, so
atk-s0101a0:1007_4: avipākattā aphalo. Lokuttarassa pana nevatthi bhedo. Bhavantarepi hi ariyasāvako
atk-s0101a0:1007_5: aññaṃ satthāraṃ na uddisatīti. Evaṃ saraṇagamanassa saṃkileso ca bhedo ca veditabboti.
atk-s0101a0:1008_0: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhante bhagavā dhāretūti maṃ bhagavā “upāsako aya”nti evaṃ dhāretu,
atk-s0101a0:1008_1: jānātūti attho. Upāsakavidhikosallatthaṃ panettha – ko upāsako? Kasmā upāsakoti vuccati?
atk-s0101a0:1008_2: Kimassa sīlaṃ? Ko ājīvo? Kā vipatti? Kā sampattīti? Idaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1009_0: Tattha ko upāsakoti yo koci saraṇagato gahaṭṭho. Vuttañhetaṃ – “yato kho, mahānāma,
atk-s0101a0:1009_1: buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1010: Kasmā upāsakoti ratanattayaṃ upāsanato. So hi buddhaṃ upāsatīti upāsako, tathā dhammaṃ saṃghaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1011_0: Kimassa sīlanti pañca veramaṇiyo. Yathāha – “yato kho, mahānāma, upāsako pāṇātipātā
atk-s0101a0:1011_1: paṭivirato hoti, adinnādānā… kāmesumicchācārā… musāvādā… surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā
atk-s0101a0:1011_2: paṭivirato hoti, ettāvatā kho, mahānāma, upāsako sīlavā hotī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1012_0: Ko ājīvoti pañca micchāvaṇijjā pahāya dhammena samena jīvitakappanaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1012_1: – “pañcimā, bhikkhave, vaṇijjā upāsakena akaraṇīyā. Katamā pañca? Satthavaṇijjā,
atk-s0101a0:1012_2: sattavaṇijjā, maṃsavaṇijjā, majjavaṇijjā, visavaṇijjā. Imā kho, bhikkhave, pañca
atk-s0101a0:1013_0: Kā vipattīti yā tasseva sīlassa ca ājīvassa ca vipatti, ayamassa vipatti. Api ca
atk-s0101a0:1013_1: yāya esa caṇḍālo ceva hoti, malañca patikuṭṭho ca, sāpissa vipattīti veditabbā. Te
atk-s0101a0:1013_2: ca atthato assaddhiyādayo pañca dhammā honti. Yathāha – “pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi
atk-s0101a0:1013_3: samannāgato upāsako upāsakacaṇḍālo ca hoti, upāsakamalañca, upāsakapatikuṭṭho ca.
atk-s0101a0:1013_4: Katamehi pañcahi? Assaddho hoti, dussīlo hoti, kotūhalamaṅgaliko hoti, maṅgalaṃ pacceti,
atk-s0101a0:1013_5: no kammaṃ, ito ca bahiddhā dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pariyesati, tattha ca pubbakāraṃ karotī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1014_0: Kā sampattīti yā cassa sīlasampadā ceva ājīvasampadā ca, sā sampatti; ye cassa ratanabhāvādikarā
atk-s0101a0:1014_1: saddhādayo pañca dhammā. Yathāha – “pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako
atk-s0101a0:1014_2: upāsakaratanañca hoti, upāsakapadumañca, upāsakapuṇḍarīkañca. Katamehi pañcahi? Saddho
atk-s0101a0:1014_3: hoti, sīlavā hoti, na kotūhalamaṅgaliko hoti, kammaṃ pacceti, no maṅgalaṃ, na ito
atk-s0101a0:1014_4: bahiddhā dakkhiṇeyyaṃ gavesati, idha ca pubbakāraṃ karotī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1015_0: Ajjataggeti etthāyaṃ aggasaddo ādikoṭikoṭṭhāsaseṭṭhesu dissati. “Ajjatagge, samma
atk-s0101a0:1015_1: dovārika, āvarāmi dvāraṃ nigaṇṭhānaṃ nigaṇṭhīna”ntiādīsu hi ādimhi dissati. “Teneva
atk-s0101a0:1015_2: aṅgulaggena taṃ aṅgulaggaṃ parāmaseyya. Ucchaggaṃ veḷagga”ntiādīsu koṭiyaṃ. “Ambilaggaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1015_3: vā madhuraggaṃ vā tittakaggaṃ vā vihāraggena vā pariveṇaggena vā bhājetu”ntiādīsu
atk-s0101a0:1015_4: koṭṭhāse. “Yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā…pe… tathāgato tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”tiādīsu
atk-s0101a0:1015_5: seṭṭhe. Idha panāyaṃ ādimhi daṭṭhabbo. Tasmā ajjataggeti ajjataṃ ādiṃ katvāti evametthattho
atk-s0101a0:1015_6: veditabbo. Ajjatanti ajjabhāvaṃ. Ajjadaggeti vā pāṭho, dakāro padasandhikaro. Ajja agganti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1016_0: Pāṇupetanti pāṇehi upetaṃ. Yāva me jīvitaṃ pavattati, tāva upetaṃ anaññasatthukaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1016_1: tīhi saraṇagamanehi saraṇaṃ gataṃ upāsakaṃ kappiyakārakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretu jānātu.
atk-s0101a0:1016_2: Ahañhi sacepi me tikhiṇena asinā sīsaṃ chindeyya, neva buddhaṃ “na buddho”ti vā,
atk-s0101a0:1016_3: dhammaṃ “na dhammo”ti vā, saṅghaṃ “na saṅgho”ti vā vadeyyanti.
atk-s0101a0:1017_0: Evaṃ attasanniyyātanena saraṇaṃ gantvā attanā kataṃ aparādhaṃ pakāsento accayo maṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1017_1: bhantetiādimāha. Tattha accayoti aparādho. Maṃ accagamāti maṃ atikkamma abhibhavitvā
atk-s0101a0:1017_2: pavatto. Dhammikaṃ dhammarājānanti ettha dhammaṃ caratīti dhammiko. Dhammeneva rājā
atk-s0101a0:1017_3: jāto, na pitughātanādinā adhammenāti dhammarājā. Jīvitā voropesinti jīvitā viyojesiṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1017_4: Paṭiggaṇhātūti khamatu. Āyatiṃ saṃvarāyāti anāgate saṃvaratthāya. Puna evarūpassa
atk-s0101a0:1018_0: 251. Tagghāti ekaṃse nipāto. Yathā dhammaṃ paṭikarosīti yathā dhammo ṭhito tatheva
atk-s0101a0:1018_1: karosi, khamāpesīti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ te mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmāti taṃ tava aparādhaṃ mayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1018_2: khamāma. Vuḍḍhihesā, mahārāja ariyassa vinayeti esā, mahārāja, ariyassa vinaye buddhassa
atk-s0101a0:1018_3: bhagavato sāsane vuḍḍhi nāma. Katamā? Yāyaṃ accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaritvā
atk-s0101a0:1018_4: āyatiṃ saṃvarāpajjanā, desanaṃ pana puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ karonto – “yo accayaṃ accayato
atk-s0101a0:1018_5: disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaroti, āyatiṃ saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti āha.
atk-s0101a0:1019_0: 252. Evaṃ vutteti evaṃ bhagavatā vutte. Handa ca dāni mayaṃ bhanteti ettha handāti
atk-s0101a0:1019_1: vacasāyatthe nipāto. So hi gamanavacasāyaṃ katvā evamāha. Bahukiccāti balavakiccā.
atk-s0101a0:1019_2: Bahukaraṇīyāti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Yassadāni tvanti yassa idāni tvaṃ mahārāja gamanassa
atk-s0101a0:1019_3: kālaṃ maññasi jānāsi, tassa kālaṃ tvameva jānāsīti vuttaṃ hoti. Padakkhiṇaṃ katvā
atk-s0101a0:1019_4: pakkāmīti tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ añjaliṃ sirasi
atk-s0101a0:1019_5: patiṭṭhapetvā yāva dassanavisayaṃ bhagavato abhimukhova paṭikkamitvā dassanavijahanaṭṭhānabhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1020_0: 253. Khatāyaṃ, bhikkhave, rājāti khato ayaṃ, bhikkhave, rājā. Upahatāyanti upahato
atk-s0101a0:1020_1: ayaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ayaṃ, bhikkhave, rājā khato upahato bhinnapatiṭṭho jāto,
atk-s0101a0:1020_2: tathānena attanāva attā khato, yathā attano patiṭṭhā na jātāti. Virajanti rāgarajādivirahitaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1020_3: Rāgamalādīnaṃyeva vigatattā vītamalaṃ. Dhammacakkhunti dhammesu vā cakkhuṃ, dhammamayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1020_4: vā cakkhuṃ, aññesu ṭhānesu tiṇṇaṃ maggānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Idha pana sotāpattimaggasseva.
atk-s0101a0:1020_5: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – sace iminā pitā ghātito nābhavissa, idāni idhevāsane nisinno sotāpattimaggaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1020_6: patto abhavissa, pāpamittasaṃsaggena panassa antarāyo jāto. Evaṃ santepi yasmā ayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1020_7: tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā ratanattayaṃ saraṇaṃ gato, tasmā mama sāsanamahantatāya
atk-s0101a0:1020_8: yathā nāma koci purisassa vadhaṃ katvā pupphamuṭṭhimattena daṇḍena mucceyya, evameva
atk-s0101a0:1020_9: lohakumbhiyaṃ nibbattitvā tiṃsavassasahassāni adho patanto heṭṭhimatalaṃ patvā tiṃsavassasahassāni
