atk-s0101a0:1020_10: uddhaṃ gacchanto punapi uparimatalaṃ pāpuṇitvā muccissatīti idampi kira bhagavatā
atk-s0101a0:1021_0: Idaṃ pana suttaṃ sutvā raññā koci ānisaṃso laddhoti? Mahāānisaṃso laddho. Ayañhi
atk-s0101a0:1021_1: pitu māritakālato paṭṭhāya neva rattiṃ na divā niddaṃ labhati, satthāraṃ pana upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0101a0:1021_2: imāya madhurāya ojavantiyā dhammadesanāya sutakālato paṭṭhāya niddaṃ labhi. Tiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1021_3: ratanānaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ akāsi. Pothujjanikāya saddhāya samannāgato nāma iminā raññā
atk-s0101a0:1021_4: sadiso nāhosi. Anāgate pana vijitāvī nāma paccekabuddho hutvā parinibbāyissatīti.
atk-s0101a0:1021_5: Idamavoca bhagavā. Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
atk-s0101a0:1024_0: 254. Evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe… kosalesūti ambaṭṭhasuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ apubbapadavaṇṇanā. Kosalesūti
atk-s0101a0:1024_1: kosalā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā. Tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado rūḷhīsaddena kosalāti
atk-s0101a0:1024_2: vuccati, tasmiṃ kosalesu janapade. Porāṇā panāhu – yasmā pubbe mahāpanādaṃ rājakumāraṃ
atk-s0101a0:1024_3: nānānāṭakādīni disvā sitamattampi akarontaṃ sutvā rājā āha – “yo mama puttaṃ hasāpeti,
atk-s0101a0:1024_4: sabbālaṅkārena naṃ alaṅkaromī”ti. Tato naṅgalānipi chaḍḍetvā mahājanakāye sannipatite
atk-s0101a0:1024_5: manussā sātirekāni sattavassāni nānākīḷāyo dassetvāpi taṃ hasāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu,
atk-s0101a0:1024_6: tato sakko devarājā nāṭakaṃ pesesi, so dibbanāṭakaṃ dassetvā hasāpesi. Atha te manussā
atk-s0101a0:1024_7: attano attano vasanokāsābhimukhā pakkamiṃsu. Te paṭipathe mittasuhajjādayo disvā
atk-s0101a0:1024_8: paṭisanthāraṃ karontā – “kacci bho kusalaṃ, kacci bho kusala”nti āhaṃsu. Tasmā taṃ
atk-s0101a0:1024_9: “kusala”nti vacanaṃ upādāya so padeso kosalāti vuccatīti.
atk-s0101a0:1025_0: Cārikaṃ caramānoti addhānagamanaṃ gacchanto. Cārikā ca nāmesā bhagavato duvidhā hoti
atk-s0101a0:1025_1: – turitacārikā ca, aturitacārikā ca. Tattha dūrepi bodhaneyyapuggalaṃ disvā tassa
atk-s0101a0:1025_2: bodhanatthāya sahasā gamanaṃ turitacārikā nāma, sā mahākassapassa paccuggamanādīsu
atk-s0101a0:1025_3: daṭṭhabbā. Bhagavā hi mahākassapattheraṃ paccuggacchanto muhuttena tigāvutaṃ maggaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1025_4: agamāsi. Āḷavakassatthāya tiṃsayojanaṃ, tathā aṅgulimālassa. Pakkusātissa pana pañcacattālīsayojanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1025_5: Mahākappinassa vīsayojanasataṃ. Dhaniyassatthāya sattayojanasatāni agamāsi. Dhammasenāpatino
atk-s0101a0:1026_0: Ekadivasaṃ kira thero – “tissasāmaṇerassa santikaṃ, bhante, gacchāmī”ti āha. Bhagavā
atk-s0101a0:1026_1: – “ahampi gamissāmī”ti vatvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi – “ānanda, vīsatisahassānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1026_2: chaḷabhiññānaṃ ārocehi, bhagavā kira vanavāsissa tissasāmaṇerassa santikaṃ gamissatī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1026_3: Tato dutiyadivase vīsatisahassakhīṇāsavaparivāro ākāse uppatitvā vīsatiyojanasatamatthake
atk-s0101a0:1026_4: tassa gocaragāmadvāre otaritvā cīvaraṃ pārupi. Taṃ kammantaṃ gacchamānā manussā disvā
atk-s0101a0:1026_5: – “satthā no āgato, mā kammantaṃ agamitthā”ti vatvā āsanāni paññapetvā yāguṃ datvā
atk-s0101a0:1026_6: pātarāsabhattaṃ karontā – “kuhiṃ, bhante, bhagavā gacchatī”ti daharabhikkhū pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1026_7: Upāsakā na bhagavā aññattha gacchati, idheva tissasāmaṇerassa dassanatthāyāgatoti.
atk-s0101a0:1026_8: Te – “amhākaṃ kulūpakassa kira therassa dassanatthāya satthā āgato, no vata no thero
atk-s0101a0:1027_0: Atha kho bhagavato bhattakiccapariyosāne sāmaṇero gāme piṇḍāya caritvā – “upāsakā,
atk-s0101a0:1027_1: mahābhikkhusaṅgho”ti pucchi. Athassa te “satthā, bhante, āgato”ti ārocesuṃ. So bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1027_2: upasaṅkamitvā piṇḍapātena āpucchi. Satthā tassa pattaṃ hatthena gahetvā – “alaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1027_3: tissa, niṭṭhitaṃ bhattakicca”nti āha. Tato upajjhāyaṃ āpucchitvā attano pattāsane
atk-s0101a0:1027_4: nisīditvā bhattakiccamakāsi. Athassa bhattakiccapariyosāne satthā maṅgalaṃ vatvā
atk-s0101a0:1027_5: nikkhamitvā gāmadvāre ṭhatvā – “kataro te, tissa, vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gatamaggo”ti āha.
atk-s0101a0:1027_6: Ayaṃ bhagavāti. Maggaṃ desayamāno purato yāhi tissāti. Bhagavā kira sadevakassa lokassa
atk-s0101a0:1027_7: maggadesakopi samāno sakale tigāvute magge ‘sāmaṇeraṃ daṭṭhuṃ lacchāmī’ti taṃ maggadesakaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1028_0: So attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā bhagavato vattamakāsi. Atha naṃ bhagavā – “kataro
atk-s0101a0:1028_1: te, tissa, caṅkamo”ti pucchitvā tattha gantvā sāmaṇerassa nisīdanapāsāṇe nisīditvā
atk-s0101a0:1028_2: – “tissa, imasmiṃ ṭhāne sukhaṃ vasī”ti pucchi. So āha – “āma, bhante, imasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-s0101a0:1028_3: vasantassa sīhabyagghahatthimigamorādīnaṃ saddaṃ suṇato araññasaññā uppajjati, tāya
atk-s0101a0:1028_4: sukhaṃ vasāmī”ti. Atha naṃ bhagavā – “tissa, bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātehi, buddhadāyajjaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1028_5: te dassāmī”ti vatvā sannipatite bhikkhusaṅghe upasampādetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva
atk-s0101a0:1028_6: agamāsīti. Ayaṃ turitacārikā nāma. Yaṃ pana gāmanigamapaṭipāṭiyā devasikaṃ yojanadviyojanavasena
atk-s0101a0:1028_7: piṇḍapātacariyādīhi lokaṃ anuggaṇhantassa gamanaṃ, ayaṃ aturitacārikā nāma.
atk-s0101a0:1029_0: Imaṃ pana cārikaṃ caranto bhagavā mahāmaṇḍalaṃ, majjhimamaṇḍalaṃ, antomaṇḍalanti
atk-s0101a0:1029_1: imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maṇḍalānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ carati. Tattha mahāmaṇḍalaṃ navayojanasatikaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1029_2: majjhimamaṇḍalaṃ chayojanasatikaṃ, antomaṇḍalaṃ tiyojanasatikaṃ. Yadā mahāmaṇḍale
atk-s0101a0:1029_3: cārikaṃ caritukāmo hoti, mahāpavāraṇāya pavāretvā pāṭipadadivase mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro
atk-s0101a0:1029_4: nikkhamati. Samantā yojanasataṃ ekakolāhalaṃ hoti. Purimaṃ purimaṃ āgatā nimantetuṃ
atk-s0101a0:1029_5: labhanti. Itaresu dvīsu maṇḍalesu sakkāro mahāmaṇḍale osarati. Tattha bhagavā tesu
atk-s0101a0:1029_6: tesu gāmanigamesu ekāhaṃ dvīhaṃ vasanto mahājanaṃ āmisappaṭiggahena anuggaṇhanto
atk-s0101a0:1029_7: dhammadānena cassa vivaṭṭasannissitaṃ kusalaṃ vaḍḍhento navahi māsehi cārikaṃ pariyosāpeti.
atk-s0101a0:1029_8: Sace pana antovasse bhikkhūnaṃ samathavipassanā taruṇā honti, mahāpavāraṇāya apavāretvā
atk-s0101a0:1029_9: pavāraṇāsaṅgahaṃ datvā kattikapuṇṇamāyaṃ pavāretvā migasirassa paṭhamapāṭipadadivase
atk-s0101a0:1029_10: mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro nikkhamitvā majjhimamaṇḍale osarati. Aññenapi kāraṇena
atk-s0101a0:1029_11: majjhimamaṇḍale cārikaṃ caritukāmo catumāsaṃ vasitvāva nikkhamati. Vuttanayeneva
atk-s0101a0:1029_12: itaresu dvīsu maṇḍalesu sakkāro majjhimamaṇḍale osarati. Bhagavā purimanayeneva lokaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1029_13: anuggaṇhanto aṭṭhahi māsehi cārikaṃ pariyosāpeti. Sace pana catumāsaṃ vutthavassassāpi
atk-s0101a0:1029_14: bhagavato veneyyasattā aparipakkindriyā honti, tesaṃ indriyaparipākaṃ āgamayamāno
atk-s0101a0:1029_15: aparampi ekamāsaṃ vā dviticatumāsaṃ vā tattheva vasitvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro
atk-s0101a0:1029_16: nikkhamati. Vuttanayeneva itaresu dvīsu maṇḍalesu sakkāro antomaṇḍale osarati. Bhagavā
atk-s0101a0:1029_17: purimanayeneva lokaṃ anuggaṇhanto sattahi vā chahi vā pañcahi vā catūhi vā māsehi
atk-s0101a0:1029_18: cārikaṃ pariyosāpeti. Iti imesu tīsu maṇḍalesu yattha katthaci cārikaṃ caranto na
atk-s0101a0:1029_19: cīvarādihetu carati. Atha kho ye duggatabālajiṇṇabyādhitā, te kadā tathāgataṃ āgantvā
atk-s0101a0:1029_20: passissanti. Mayi pana cārikaṃ carante mahājano tathāgatassa dassanaṃ labhissati.
atk-s0101a0:1029_21: Tattha keci cittāni pasādessanti, keci mālādīhi pūjessanti, keci kaṭacchubhikkhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1029_22: dassanti, keci micchādassanaṃ pahāya sammādiṭṭhikā bhavissanti. Taṃ nesaṃ bhavissati
atk-s0101a0:1029_23: dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyāti. Evaṃ lokānukampakāya cārikaṃ carati.
atk-s0101a0:1030_0: Api ca catūhi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti, jaṅghavihāravasena sarīraphāsukatthāya,
atk-s0101a0:1030_2: paripākagatindriye bodhaneyyasatte bodhanatthāyāti. Aparehipi catūhi kāraṇehi buddhā
atk-s0101a0:1030_3: bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchissantīti vā, dhammaṃ, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1030_4: gacchissantīti vā, mahatā dhammavassena catasso parisā santappessāmīti vā. Aparehipi
atk-s0101a0:1030_5: pañcahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti pāṇātipātā viramissantīti vā,
atk-s0101a0:1030_7: vā. Aparehipi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti – paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1030_8: paṭilabhissantīti vā, dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ…pe… nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ paṭilabhissantīti
atk-s0101a0:1030_9: vā. Aparehipi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti – sotāpattimaggaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1030_10: adhigamissantīti vā, sotāpattiphalaṃ…pe… arahattaphalaṃ sacchikarissantīti vāti.
atk-s0101a0:1030_11: Ayaṃ aturitacārikā, idha cārikāti adhippetā. Sā panesā duvidhā hoti – anibaddhacārikā
atk-s0101a0:1030_12: ca nibaddhacārikā ca. Tattha yaṃ gāmanigamanagarapaṭipāṭivasena carati, ayaṃ anibaddhacārikā
atk-s0101a0:1030_13: nāma. Yaṃ panekasseva bodhaneyyasattassatthāya gacchati, ayaṃ nibaddhacārikā nāma. Esā idha adhippetā.
atk-s0101a0:1031_0: Tadā kira bhagavato pacchimayāmakiccapariyosāne dasasahassilokadhātuyā ñāṇajālaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1031_2: anto paviṭṭho. Atha bhagavā ayaṃ brāhmaṇo mayhaṃ ñāṇajāle paññāyati, “atthi nu khvassa
atk-s0101a0:1031_3: upanissayo”ti vīmaṃsanto sotāpattimaggassa upanissayaṃ disvā – “eso mayi etaṃ janapadaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1031_4: gate lakkhaṇapariyesanatthaṃ ambaṭṭhaṃ antevāsiṃ pahiṇissati, so mayā saddhiṃ vādapaṭivādaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1031_5: katvā nānappakāraṃ asabbhivākyaṃ vakkhati, tamahaṃ dametvā nibbisevanaṃ karissāmi.
atk-s0101a0:1031_6: So ācariyassa kathessati, athassācariyo taṃ kathaṃ sutvā āgamma mama lakkhaṇāni pariyesissati,
atk-s0101a0:1031_7: tassāhaṃ dhammaṃ desessāmi. So desanāpariyosāne sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahissati. Desanā
atk-s0101a0:1031_8: mahājanassa saphalā bhavissatī”ti pañcabhikkhusataparivāro taṃ janapadaṃ paṭipanno.
atk-s0101a0:1031_9: Tena vuttaṃ – “kosalesu cārikaṃ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1032_0: Yena icchānaṅgalanti yena disābhāgena icchānaṅgalaṃ avasaritabbaṃ. Yasmiṃ vā padese
atk-s0101a0:1032_1: icchānaṅgalaṃ. Ijjhānaṅgalantipi pāṭho. Tadavasarīti tena avasari, taṃ vā avasari.
atk-s0101a0:1032_2: Tena disābhāgena gato, taṃ vā padesaṃ gatoti attho. Icchānaṅgale viharati icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍeti
atk-s0101a0:1032_3: icchānaṅgalaṃ upanissāya icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍe sīlakhandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā samādhikontaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1032_4: ussāpetvā sabbaññutaññāṇasaraṃ parivattayamāno dhammarājā yathābhirucitena vihārena viharati.
atk-s0101a0:1034_0: 255. Tena kho pana samayenāti yena samayena bhagavā tattha viharati, tena samayena,
atk-s0101a0:1034_1: tasmiṃ samayeti ayamattho. Brahmaṃ aṇatīti brāhmaṇo, mante sajjhāyatīti attho. Idameva
atk-s0101a0:1034_2: hi jātibrāhmaṇānaṃ niruttivacanaṃ. Ariyā pana bāhitapāpattā brāhmaṇāti vuccanti.
atk-s0101a0:1034_3: Pokkharasātīti idaṃ tassa nāmaṃ. Kasmā pokkharasātīti vuccati. Tassa kira kāyo setapokkharasadiso,
atk-s0101a0:1034_4: devanagare ussāpitarajatatoraṇaṃ viya sobhati. Sīsaṃ panassa kāḷavaṇṇaṃ indanīlamaṇimayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1034_5: viya. Massupi candamaṇḍale kāḷamegharāji viya khāyati. Akkhīni nīluppalasadisāni.
atk-s0101a0:1034_6: Nāsā rajatapanāḷikā viya suvaṭṭitā suparisuddhā. Hatthapādatalāni ceva mukhadvārañca
atk-s0101a0:1034_7: katalākhārasaparikammaṃ viya sobhati, ativiya sobhaggappatto brāhmaṇassa attabhāvo.
atk-s0101a0:1034_8: Arājake ṭhāne rājānaṃ kātuṃ yuttamimaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ. Evamesa sassiriko. Iti naṃ pokkharasadisattā
atk-s0101a0:1035_0: Ayaṃ pana kassapasammāsambuddhakāle tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū dasabalassa dānaṃ datvā
atk-s0101a0:1035_1: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā devaloke nibbatti. So tato manussalokamāgacchanto mātukucchivāsaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1035_2: jigucchitvā himavantapadese mahāsare padumagabbhe nibbatti. Tassa ca sarassa avidūre
atk-s0101a0:1035_3: tāpaso paṇṇasālāya vasati. So tīre ṭhito taṃ padumaṃ disvā – “idaṃ padumaṃ avasesapadumehi
atk-s0101a0:1035_4: mahantataraṃ. Pupphitakāle naṃ gahessāmī”ti cintesi. Taṃ sattāhenāpi na pupphati.
atk-s0101a0:1035_5: Tāpaso kasmā nu kho idaṃ sattāhenāpi na pupphati. Handa naṃ gahessāmīti otaritvā
atk-s0101a0:1035_6: gaṇhi. Taṃ tena nāḷato chinnamattaṃyeva pupphitaṃ. Athassabbhantare suvaṇṇacuṇṇapiñjaraṃ
atk-s0101a0:1035_7: viya rajatabimbakaṃ padumareṇupiñjaraṃ setavaṇṇaṃ dārakaṃ addasa. So mahāpuñño esa
atk-s0101a0:1035_8: bhavissati. Handa naṃ paṭijaggāmīti paṇṇasālaṃ netvā paṭijaggitvā sattavassakālato
atk-s0101a0:1035_9: paṭṭhāya tayo vede uggaṇhāpesi. Dārako tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāraṃ gantvā paṇḍito byatto
atk-s0101a0:1035_10: jambudīpe aggabrāhmaṇo ahosi. So aparena samayena rañño kosalassa sippaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0101a0:1035_11: Athassa sippe pasanno rājā ukkaṭṭhaṃ nāma mahānagaraṃ brahmadeyyaṃ adāsi. Iti naṃ
atk-s0101a0:1036_0: Ukkaṭṭhaṃ ajjhāvasatīti ukkaṭṭhanāmake nagare vasati. Abhibhavitvā vā āvasati. Tassa
atk-s0101a0:1036_1: nagarassa sāmiko hutvā yāya mariyādāya tattha vasitabbaṃ, tāya mariyādāya vasi. Tassa
atk-s0101a0:1036_2: kira nagarassa vatthuṃ ukkā ṭhapetvā ukkāsu jalamānāsu aggahesuṃ, tasmā taṃ ukkaṭṭhanti
atk-s0101a0:1036_3: vuccati. Okkaṭṭhantipi pāṭho, soyevattho. Upasaggavasena panettha bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1036_4: veditabbaṃ. Tassa anupayogattā ca sesapadesu. Tattha lakkhaṇaṃ saddasatthato pariyesitabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1037_0: Sattussadanti sattehi ussadaṃ, ussannaṃ bahujanaṃ ākiṇṇamanussaṃ. Posāvaniyahatthiassamoramigādianekasattasamākiṇṇañcāti
atk-s0101a0:1037_1: attho. Yasmā panetaṃ nagaraṃ bahi āvijjhitvā jātena hatthiassādīnaṃ ghāsatiṇena ceva
atk-s0101a0:1037_2: gehacchādanatiṇena ca sampannaṃ. Tathā dārukaṭṭhehi ceva gehasambhārakaṭṭhehi ca.
atk-s0101a0:1037_3: Yasmā cassabbhantare vaṭṭacaturassādisaṇṭhānā bahū pokkharaṇiyo jalajakusumavicittāni
atk-s0101a0:1037_4: ca bahūni anekāni taḷākāni udakassa niccabharitāneva honti, tasmā satiṇakaṭṭhodakanti
atk-s0101a0:1037_5: vuttaṃ. Saha dhaññenāti sadhaññaṃ pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇādibhedaṃ bahudhaññasannicayanti
atk-s0101a0:1037_6: attho. Ettāvatā yasmiṃ nagare brāhmaṇo setacchattaṃ ussāpetvā rājalīlāya vasati,
atk-s0101a0:1038_0: Rājato laddhaṃ bhoggaṃ rājabhoggaṃ. Kena dinnanti ce? Raññā pasenadinā kosalena dinnaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1038_1: Rājadāyanti rañño dāyabhūtaṃ, dāyajjanti attho. Brahmadeyyanti seṭṭhadeyyaṃ, chattaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1038_2: ussāpetvā rājasaṅkhepena bhuñjitabbanti attho. Atha vā rājabhogganti sabbaṃ chejjabhejjaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1038_3: anusāsantena nadītitthapabbatādīsu suṅkaṃ gaṇhantena setacchattaṃ ussāpetvā raññā
atk-s0101a0:1038_4: hutvā bhuñjitabbaṃ. Raññā pasenadinā kosalena dinnaṃ rājadāyanti ettha taṃ nagaraṃ
atk-s0101a0:1038_5: raññā dinnattā rājadāyaṃ dāyakarājadīpanatthaṃ panassa “raññā pasenadinā kosalena
atk-s0101a0:1038_6: dinna”nti idaṃ vuttaṃ. Brahmadeyyanti seṭṭhadeyyaṃ. Yathā dinnaṃ na puna gahetabbaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1038_7: hoti, nissaṭṭhaṃ pariccattaṃ. Evaṃ dinnanti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1039_0: Assosīti suṇi upalabhi, sotadvārasampattavacananigghosānusārena aññāsi. Khoti avadhāraṇatthe
atk-s0101a0:1039_1: padapūraṇamatte vā nipāto. Tattha avadhāraṇatthena assosi eva, nāssa koci savanantarāyo
atk-s0101a0:1039_2: ahosīti ayamattho veditabbo. Padapūraṇena pana padabyañjanasiliṭṭhatāmattameva.
atk-s0101a0:1040_0: Idāni yamatthaṃ brāhmaṇo pokkharasāti assosi, taṃ pakāsento – “samaṇo khalu bho gotamo”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1040_1: Tattha samitapāpattā samaṇoti veditabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ – “samitāssa honti pāpakā akusalā
atk-s0101a0:1040_2: dhammā”tiādi. Bhagavā ca anuttarena ariyamaggena samitapāpo. Tenassa yathābhūtaguṇādhigatametaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1040_3: nāmaṃ, yadidaṃ samaṇoti. Khalūti anussavanatthe nipāto. Bhoti brāhmaṇajātisamudāgataṃ
atk-s0101a0:1040_4: ālapanamattaṃ. Vuttampi cetaṃ – “bhovādī nāma so hoti, sace hoti sakiñcano”ti. Gotamoti
atk-s0101a0:1040_5: bhagavantaṃ gottavasena parikitteti. Tasmā samaṇo khalu bho gotamoti ettha samaṇo
atk-s0101a0:1041_0: Sakyaputtoti idaṃ pana bhagavato uccākulaparidīpanaṃ. Sakyakulā pabbajitoti saddhāpabbajitabhāvaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1041_1: Kenaci pārijuññena anabhibhūto aparikkhīṇaṃyeva taṃ kulaṃ pahāya saddhāya pabbajitoti
atk-s0101a0:1041_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Tato paraṃ vuttatthameva. Taṃ kho panātiādi sāmaññaphale vuttameva.
atk-s0101a0:1041_3: Sādhu kho panāti sundaraṃ kho pana. Atthāvahaṃ sukhāvahanti vuttaṃ hoti. Tathārūpānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1041_4: arahatanti yathārūpo so bhavaṃ gotamo, evarūpānaṃ yathābhūtaguṇādhigamena loke arahantoti
atk-s0101a0:1041_5: laddhasaddhānaṃ arahataṃ. Dassanaṃ hotīti pasādasommāni akkhīni ummīletvā dassanamattampi
atk-s0101a0:1043_0: 256. Ajjhāyakoti idaṃ – “na dānime jhāyanti, na dānime jhāyantīti kho, vāseṭṭha,
atk-s0101a0:1043_1: ajjhāyakā ajjhāyakā tveva tatiyaṃ akkharaṃ upanibbatta”nti, evaṃ paṭhamakappikakāle
atk-s0101a0:1043_2: jhānavirahitānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ garahavacanaṃ. Idāni pana taṃ ajjhāyatīti ajjhāyako.
atk-s0101a0:1043_3: Mante parivattetīti iminā atthena pasaṃsāvacanaṃ katvā voharanti. Mante dhāretīti mantadharo.
atk-s0101a0:1044_0: Tiṇṇaṃ vedānanti iruvedayajuvedasāmavedānaṃ. Oṭṭhapahatakaraṇavasena pāraṃ gatoti
atk-s0101a0:1044_1: pāragū. Saha nighaṇḍunā ca keṭubhena ca sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṃ. Nighaṇḍūti nighaṇḍurukkhādīnaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1044_2: vevacanapakāsakaṃ satthaṃ. Keṭubhanti kiriyākappavikappo kavīnaṃ upakārāvahaṃ satthaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1044_3: Saha akkharappabhedena sākkharappabhedānaṃ. Akkharappabhedoti sikkhā ca nirutti ca.
atk-s0101a0:1044_4: Itihāsapañcamānanti āthabbaṇavedaṃ catutthaṃ katvā itiha āsa, itiha āsāti īdisavacanapaṭisaṃyutto
atk-s0101a0:1044_5: purāṇakathāsaṅkhāto itihāso pañcamo etesanti itihāsapañcamā, tesaṃ itihāsapañcamānaṃ vedānaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1045_0: Padaṃ tadavasesañca byākaraṇaṃ adhīyati vedeti cāti padako veyyākaraṇo. Lokāyataṃ
atk-s0101a0:1045_1: vuccati vitaṇḍavādasatthaṃ. Mahāpurisalakkhaṇanti mahāpurisānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ lakkhaṇadīpakaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1045_3: nāma ahesuṃ, yesaṃ vasena iminā lakkhaṇena samannāgatā buddhā nāma honti, iminā paccekabuddhā,
atk-s0101a0:1045_4: iminā dve aggasāvakā, asīti mahāsāvakā, buddhamātā, buddhapitā, aggupaṭṭhāko, aggupaṭṭhāyikā,
atk-s0101a0:1046_0: Anavayoti imesu lokāyatamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu anūno paripūrakārī, avayo na hotīti
atk-s0101a0:1046_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Avayo nāma yo tāni atthato ca ganthato ca sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti. Anuññātapaṭiññātoti
atk-s0101a0:1046_2: anuññāto ceva paṭiññāto ca. Ācariyenassa “yaṃ ahaṃ jānāmi, taṃ tvaṃ jānāsī”tiādinā
atk-s0101a0:1046_3: anuññāto. “Āma ācariyā”ti attanā tassa paṭivacanadānapaṭiññāya paṭiññātoti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1046_4: Katarasmiṃ adhikāre? Sake ācariyake tevijjake pāvacane. Esa kira brāhmaṇo cintesi
atk-s0101a0:1046_5: “imasmiṃ loke ‘ahaṃ buddho, ahaṃ buddho’ti uggatassa nāmaṃ gahetvā bahū janā vicaranti.
atk-s0101a0:1046_6: Tasmā na me anussavamatteneva upasaṅkamituṃ yuttaṃ. Ekaccañhi upasaṅkamantassa apakkamanampi
atk-s0101a0:1046_7: garu hoti, anatthopi uppajjati. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ mama antevāsikaṃ pesetvā – ‘buddho vā,
atk-s0101a0:1046_8: no vā’ti jānitvāva upasaṅkameyya”nti, tasmā māṇavaṃ āmantetvā ayaṃ tātātiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1047: 257. Taṃ bhavantanti tassa bhoto gotamassa. Tathā santaṃ yevāti tathā satoyeva. Idhāpi hi itthambhūtākhyānatthavaseneva upayogavacanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1048_0: 258. Yathā kathaṃ panāhaṃ, bho, tanti ettha kathaṃ panāhaṃ bho taṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1048_1: jānissāmi, yathā sakkā so ñātuṃ, tathā me ācikkhāhīti attho. Yathāti vā nipātamattamevetaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1048_2: Kathanti ayaṃ ākārapucchā. Kenākārenāhaṃ taṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ jānissāmīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1048_3: Evaṃ vutte kira naṃ upajjhāyo “kiṃ tvaṃ, tāta, pathaviyaṃ ṭhito, pathaviṃ na passāmīti
atk-s0101a0:1048_4: viya; candimasūriyānaṃ obhāse ṭhito, candimasūriye na passāmīti viya vadasī”tiādīni
atk-s0101a0:1048_5: vatvā jānanākāraṃ dassento āgatāni kho, tātātiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1049_0: Tattha mantesūti vedesu. Tathāgato kira uppajjissatīti paṭikacceva suddhāvāsā devā
atk-s0101a0:1049_1: vedesu lakkhaṇāni pakkhipitvā buddhamantā nāmeteti brāhmaṇaveseneva vede vācenti.
atk-s0101a0:1049_2: Tadanusārena mahesakkhā sattā tathāgataṃ jānissantīti. Tena pubbe vedesu mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni
atk-s0101a0:1049_3: āgacchanti. Parinibbute pana tathāgate anukkamena antaradhāyanti. Tenetarahi natthīti.
atk-s0101a0:1049_5: dveyeva niṭṭhā. Kāmañcāyaṃ gatisaddo “pañca kho imā, sāriputta, gatiyo”tiādīsu bhavabhede
atk-s0101a0:1049_7: paññāyaṃ. “Gatigata”ntiādīsu visaṭabhāve. Idha pana niṭṭhāyaṃ vattatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:1050_0: Tattha kiñcāpi yehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato rājā cakkavattī hoti, na teheva buddho
atk-s0101a0:1050_1: hoti; jātisāmaññato pana tāniyeva tānīti vuccanti. Tena vuttaṃ – “yehi samannāgatassā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1050_2: Sace agāraṃ ajjhāvasatīti yadi agāre vasati. Rājā hoti cakkavattīti catūhi acchariyadhammehi,
atk-s0101a0:1050_3: saṅgahavatthūhi ca lokaṃ rañjanato rājā, cakkaratanaṃ vatteti, catūhi sampatticakkehi
atk-s0101a0:1050_4: vattati, tehi ca paraṃ vatteti, parahitāya ca iriyāpathacakkānaṃ vatto etasmiṃ atthīti
atk-s0101a0:1050_5: cakkavattī. Ettha ca rājāti sāmaññaṃ. Cakkavattīti visesaṃ. Dhammena caratīti dhammiko.
atk-s0101a0:1050_6: Ñāyena samena vattatīti attho. Dhammena rajjaṃ labhitvā rājā jātoti dhammarājā. Parahitadhammakaraṇena
atk-s0101a0:1050_7: vā dhammiko. Attahitadhammakaraṇena dhammarājā. Caturantāya issaroti cāturanto, catusamuddaantāya,
atk-s0101a0:1050_8: catubbidhadīpavibhūsitāya pathaviyā issaroti attho. Ajjhattaṃ kopādipaccatthike bahiddhā
atk-s0101a0:1050_9: ca sabbarājāno vijetīti vijitāvī. Janapadatthāvariyappattoti janapade dhuvabhāvaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1050_10: thāvarabhāvaṃ patto, na sakkā kenaci cāletuṃ. Janapado vā tamhi thāvariyappatto anuyutto
atk-s0101a0:1051_0: Seyyathidanti nipāto, tassa cetāni katamānīti attho. Cakkaratanantiādīsu cakkañca,
atk-s0101a0:1051_1: taṃ ratijananaṭṭhena ratanañcāti cakkaratanaṃ. Esa nayo sabbattha. Imesu pana ratanesu
atk-s0101a0:1051_2: ayaṃ cakkavattirājā cakkaratanena ajitaṃ jināti, hatthiassaratanehi vijite yathāsukhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1051_4: Paṭhamena cassa ussāhasattiyogo, pacchimena mantasattiyogo, hatthiassagahapatiratanehi
atk-s0101a0:1051_5: pabhusattiyogo suparipuṇṇo hoti, itthimaṇiratanehi tividhasattiyogaphalaṃ. So itthimaṇiratanehi
atk-s0101a0:1051_6: bhogasukhamanubhavati, sesehi issariyasukhaṃ. Visesato cassa purimāni tīṇi adosakusalamūlajanitakammānubhāvena
atk-s0101a0:1051_8: veditabbaṃ. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana bojjhaṅgasaṃyutte ratanasuttassa upadesato gahetabbo.
atk-s0101a0:1052_0: Parosahassanti atirekasahassaṃ. Sūrāti abhīrukajātikā. Vīraṅgarūpāti devaputtasadisakāyā.
atk-s0101a0:1052_1: Evaṃ tāva eke vaṇṇayanti. Ayaṃ panettha sabbhāvo. Vīrāti uttamasūrā vuccanti, vīrānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1052_2: aṅgaṃ vīraṅgaṃ, vīrakāraṇaṃ vīriyanti vuttaṃ hoti. Vīraṅgarūpaṃ etesanti vīraṅgarūpā,
atk-s0101a0:1052_3: vīriyamayasarīrā viyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Parasenappamaddanāti sace paṭimukhaṃ tiṭṭheyya
atk-s0101a0:1052_4: parasenā taṃ parimaddituṃ samatthāti adhippāyo. Dhammenāti “pāṇo na hantabbo”tiādinā
atk-s0101a0:1052_5: pañcasīladhammena. Arahaṃ hoti sammāsambuddho loke vivaṭṭacchadoti ettha rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhiavijjāduccaritachadanehi
atk-s0101a0:1052_6: sattahi paṭicchanne kilesandhakāre loke taṃ chadanaṃ vivaṭṭetvā samantato sañjātāloko
atk-s0101a0:1052_7: hutvā ṭhitoti vivaṭṭacchado. Tattha paṭhamena padena pūjārahatā. Dutiyena tassā hetu,
atk-s0101a0:1052_8: yasmā sammāsambuddhoti, tatiyena buddhattahetubhūtā vivaṭṭacchadatā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:1052_9: Atha vā vivaṭṭo ca vicchado cāti vivaṭṭacchado, vaṭṭarahito chadanarahito cāti vuttaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1052_10: hoti. Tena arahaṃ vaṭṭābhāvena, sammāsambuddho chadanābhāvenāti evaṃ purimapadadvayasseva
atk-s0101a0:1052_11: hetudvayaṃ vuttaṃ hoti, dutiyena vesārajjena cettha purimasiddhi, paṭhamena dutiyasiddhi,
atk-s0101a0:1052_12: tatiyacatutthehi tatiyasiddhi hoti. Purimañca dhammacakkhuṃ, dutiyaṃ buddhacakkhuṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1052_13: tatiyaṃ samantacakkhuṃ sādhetīti veditabbaṃ. Tvaṃ mantānaṃ paṭiggahetāti iminā’ssa
atk-s0101a0:1053_0: 259. Sopi tāya ācariyakathāya lakkhaṇesu vigatasammoho ekobhāsajāte viya buddhamante
atk-s0101a0:1053_1: sampassamāno evaṃ bhoti āha. Tassattho – ‘yathā, bho, tvaṃ vadasi, evaṃ karissāmī’ti.
atk-s0101a0:1053_2: Vaḷavārathamāruyhāti vaḷavāyuttaṃ rathaṃ abhirūhitvā. Brāhmaṇo kira yena rathena
atk-s0101a0:1053_3: sayaṃ vicarati, tameva rathaṃ datvā māṇavaṃ pesesi. Māṇavāpi pokkharasātisseva antevāsikā.
atk-s0101a0:1053_4: So kira tesaṃ – “ambaṭṭhena saddhiṃ gacchathā”ti saññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1054: Yāvatikā yānassa bhūmīti yattakaṃ sakkā hoti yānena gantuṃ, ayaṃ yānassa bhūmi nāma. Yānā paccorohitvāti ayānabhūmiṃ, dvārakoṭṭhakasamīpaṃ gantvā yānato paṭiorohitvā.
atk-s0101a0:1055_0: Tena kho pana samayenāti yasmiṃ samaye ambaṭṭho ārāmaṃ pāvisi. Tasmiṃ pana samaye,
atk-s0101a0:1055_1: ṭhitamajjhanhikasamaye. Kasmā pana tasmiṃ samaye caṅkamantīti? Paṇītabhojanapaccayassa
atk-s0101a0:1055_2: thinamiddhassa vinodanatthaṃ, divāpadhānikā vā te. Tādisānañhi pacchābhattaṃ caṅkamitvā
atk-s0101a0:1055_3: nhāyitvā sarīraṃ utuṃ gāhāpetvā nisajja samaṇadhammaṃ karontānaṃ cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1055_4: Yena te bhikkhūti so kira – “kuhiṃ samaṇo gotamo”ti pariveṇato pariveṇaṃ anāgantvā
atk-s0101a0:1055_5: “pucchitvāva pavisissāmī”ti vilokento araññahatthī viya mahācaṅkame caṅkamamāne paṃsukūlike
atk-s0101a0:1055_6: bhikkhū disvā tesaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi. Taṃ sandhāya yena te bhikkhūtiādi vuttaṃ. Dassanāyāti
atk-s0101a0:1056_0: 260. Abhiññātakolaññoti pākaṭakulajo. Tadā kira jambudīpe ambaṭṭhakulaṃ nāma pākaṭakulamahosi.
atk-s0101a0:1056_1: Abhiññātassāti rūpajātimantakulāpadesehi pākaṭassa. Agarūti abhāriko. Yo hi ambaṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1056_2: ñāpetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya, tassa tena saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo garu bhaveyya. Bhagavato pana
atk-s0101a0:1056_3: tādisānaṃ māṇavānaṃ satenāpi sahassenāpi pañhaṃ puṭṭhassa vissajjane dandhāyitattaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1056_4: natthīti maññamānā – “agaru kho panā”ti cintayiṃsu. Vihāroti gandhakuṭiṃ sandhāya āhaṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1057_0: Ataramānoti aturito, saṇikaṃ padappamāṇaṭṭhāne padaṃ nikkhipanto vattaṃ katvā susammaṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1057_1: muttādalasinduvārasantharasadisaṃ vālikaṃ avināsentoti attho. Āḷindanti pamukhaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1057_2: Ukkāsitvāti ukkāsitasaddaṃ katvā. Aggaḷanti dvārakavāṭaṃ. Ākoṭehīti agganakhehi saṇikaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1057_3: kuñcikacchiddasamīpe ākoṭehīti vuttaṃ hoti. Dvāraṃ kira atiupari amanussā, atiheṭṭhā
atk-s0101a0:1057_4: dīghajātikā koṭenti. Tathā anākoṭetvā majjhe chiddasamīpe koṭetabbanti idaṃ dvārākoṭanavattanti dīpentā vadanti.
atk-s0101a0:1058_0: 261. Vivari bhagavā dvāranti na bhagavā uṭṭhāya dvāraṃ vivari. Vivariyatūti pana
atk-s0101a0:1058_1: hatthaṃ pasāresi. Tato “bhagavā tumhehi anekāsu kappakoṭīsu dānaṃ dadamānehi na sahatthā
atk-s0101a0:1058_2: dvāravivaraṇakammaṃ kata”nti sayameva dvāraṃ vivaṭaṃ. Taṃ pana yasmā bhagavato manena
atk-s0101a0:1058_3: vivaṭaṃ, tasmā vivari bhagavā dvāranti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a0:1059_0: Bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodiṃsūti yathā khamanīyādīni pucchanto bhagavā tehi, evaṃ tepi
atk-s0101a0:1059_1: bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodā ahesuṃ. Sītodakaṃ viya uṇhodakena sammoditaṃ ekībhāvaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1059_2: agamaṃsu. Yāya ca “kacci, bho gotama, khamanīyaṃ; kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci bhoto ca
atk-s0101a0:1059_3: gotamassa sāvakānañca appābādhaṃ, appātaṅkaṃ, lahuṭṭhānaṃ, balaṃ, phāsuvihāro”tiādikāya
atk-s0101a0:1059_4: kathāya sammodiṃsu, taṃ pītipāmojjasaṅkhātasammodajananato sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato
atk-s0101a0:1059_5: ca sammodanīyaṃ, atthabyañjanamadhuratāya sucirampi kālaṃ sāretuṃ nirantaraṃ pavattetuṃ
atk-s0101a0:1059_6: arahabhāvato saritabbabhāvato ca sāraṇīyaṃ. Suyyamānasukhato sammodanīyaṃ, anussariyamānasukhato
atk-s0101a0:1059_7: ca sāraṇīyaṃ. Tathā byañjanaparisuddhatāya sammodanīyaṃ, atthaparisuddhatāya sāraṇīyaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1059_8: Evaṃ anekehi pariyāyehi sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā pariyosāpetvā niṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0101a0:1060_0: Ambaṭṭho pana māṇavoti so kira bhagavato rūpasampattiyaṃ cittappasādamattampi akatvā
atk-s0101a0:1060_1: “dasabalaṃ apasādessāmī”ti udare baddhasāṭakaṃ muñcitvā kaṇṭhe olambetvā ekena hatthena
atk-s0101a0:1060_2: dussakaṇṇaṃ gahetvā caṅkamaṃ abhirūhitvā kālena bāhuṃ, kālena udaraṃ, kālena piṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0101a0:1060_3: dassento, kālena hatthavikāraṃ, kālena bhamukavikāraṃ karonto, “kacci te bho, gotama,
atk-s0101a0:1060_4: dhātusamatā, kacci bhikkhāhārena na kilamatha, akilamathākāroyeva pana te paññāyati;
atk-s0101a0:1060_5: thūlāni hi te aṅgapaccaṅgāni, pāsādikattha gatagataṭṭhāne. ‘te bahujanā rājapabbajitoti
atk-s0101a0:1060_6: ca buddho’ti ca uppannabahumānā paṇītaṃ ojavantamāhāraṃ denti. Passatha, bho, gehaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1060_7: cittasālā viya, dibbapāsādo viya. Imaṃ mañcaṃ passatha, bimbohanaṃ passatha, kiṃ
atk-s0101a0:1060_8: evarūpe ṭhāne vasantassa samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ dukkara”nti evarūpaṃ uppaṇḍanakathaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1060_9: anācārabhāvasāraṇīyaṃ katheti, tena vuttaṃ – “ambaṭṭho pana māṇavo caṅkamantopi nisinnena
atk-s0101a0:1060_10: bhagavatā kiñci kiñci kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāreti, ṭhitopi nisinnena bhagavatā kiñci
atk-s0101a0:1061_0: 262. Atha kho bhagavāti atha bhagavā – “ayaṃ māṇavo hatthaṃ pasāretvā bhavaggaṃ gahetukāmo
atk-s0101a0:1061_1: viya, pādaṃ pasāretvā avīciṃ vicaritukāmo viya, mahāsamuddaṃ taritukāmo viya, sineruṃ
atk-s0101a0:1061_2: ārohitukāmo viya ca aṭṭhāne vāyamati, handa, tena saddhiṃ mantemī”ti ambaṭṭhaṃ māṇavaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1061_3: etadavoca. Ācariyapācariyehīti ācariyehi ca tesaṃ ācariyehi ca.
atk-s0101a0:1063_0: 263. Gacchanto vāti ettha kāmaṃ tīsu iriyāpathesu brāhmaṇo ācariyabrāhmaṇena saddhiṃ
atk-s0101a0:1063_1: sallapitumarahati. Ayaṃ pana māṇavo mānathaddhatāya kathāsallāpaṃ karonto cattāropi
atk-s0101a0:1063_2: iriyāpathe yojessāmīti “sayāno vā hi, bho gotama, sayānenā”ti āha.
atk-s0101a0:1064_0: Tato kira taṃ bhagavā – “ambaṭṭha, gacchantassa vā gacchantena, ṭhitassa vā ṭhitena,
atk-s0101a0:1064_1: nisinnassa vā nisinnenācariyena saddhiṃ kathā nāma sabbācariyesu labbhati. Tvaṃ pana
atk-s0101a0:1064_2: sayāno sayānenācariyena saddhiṃ kathesi, kiṃ te ācariyo gorūpaṃ, udāhu tva”nti āha.
atk-s0101a0:1064_3: So kujjhitvā – “ye ca kho te, bho gotama, muṇḍakā”tiādimāha. Tattha muṇḍe muṇḍāti
atk-s0101a0:1064_4: samaṇe ca samaṇāti vattuṃ vaṭṭeyya. Ayaṃ pana hīḷento muṇḍakā samaṇakāti āha. Ibbhāti
atk-s0101a0:1064_5: gahapatikā. Kaṇhāti kaṇhā, kāḷakāti attho. Bandhupādāpaccāti ettha bandhūti brahmā
atk-s0101a0:1064_6: adhippeto. Tañhi brāhmaṇā pitāmahoti voharanti. Pādānaṃ apaccā pādāpaccā, brahmuno
atk-s0101a0:1064_7: piṭṭhipādato jātāti adhippāyo. Tassa kira ayaṃ laddhi – brāhmaṇā brahmuno mukhato
atk-s0101a0:1064_8: nikkhantā, khattiyā urato, vessā nābhito, suddā jāṇuto, samaṇā piṭṭhipādatoti. Evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1064_9: kathento ca panesa kiñcāpi aniyametvā katheti. Atha kho bhagavantameva vadāmīti katheti.
atk-s0101a0:1065_0: Atha kho bhagavā – “ayaṃ ambaṭṭho āgatakālato paṭṭhāya mayā saddhiṃ kathayamāno mānameva
atk-s0101a0:1065_1: nissāya kathesi, āsīvisaṃ gīvāyaṃ gaṇhanto viya, aggikkhandhaṃ āliṅganto viya, mattavāraṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1065_2: soṇḍāya parāmasanto viya, attano pamāṇaṃ na jānāti. Handa naṃ jānāpessāmī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0101a0:1065_3: “atthikavato kho pana te, ambaṭṭhā”tiādimāha. Tattha āgantvā kattabbakiccasaṅkhāto
atk-s0101a0:1065_4: attho, etassa atthīti atthikaṃ, tassa māṇavassa cittaṃ. Atthikamassa atthīti atthikavā,
atk-s0101a0:1065_5: tassa atthikavato tava idhāgamanaṃ ahosīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1066_0: Kho panāti nipātamattaṃ. Yāyeva kho panatthāyāti yeneva kho panatthena. Āgaccheyyāthāti
atk-s0101a0:1066_1: mama vā aññesaṃ vā santikaṃ yadā kadāci āgaccheyyātha. Tameva atthanti idaṃ purisaliṅgavaseneva
atk-s0101a0:1066_2: vuttaṃ. Manasi kareyyāthāti citte kareyyātha. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – tvaṃ ācariyena attano
atk-s0101a0:1066_3: karaṇīyena pesito, na amhākaṃ paribhavanatthāya, tasmā tameva kiccaṃ manasi karohīti.
atk-s0101a0:1066_4: Evamassa aññesaṃ santikaṃ āgatānaṃ vattaṃ dassetvā mānaniggaṇhanatthaṃ “avusitavāyeva
atk-s0101a0:1066_5: kho panā”tiādimāha. Tassattho passatha bho ayaṃ ambaṭṭho māṇavo ācariyakule avusitavā
atk-s0101a0:1066_6: asikkhito appassutova samāno. Vusitamānīti “ahaṃ vusitavā sikkhito bahussuto”ti attānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1066_7: maññati. Etassa hi evaṃ pharusavacanasamudācāre kāraṇaṃ kimaññatra avusitattāti ācariyakule
atk-s0101a0:1066_8: asaṃvuddhā asikkhitā appassutāyeva hi evaṃ vadantīti.
atk-s0101a0:1067_0: 264. Kupitoti kuddho. Anattamanoti asakamano, kiṃ pana bhagavā tassa kujjhanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1067_1: ñatvā evamāha udāhu añatvāti? Ñatvā āhāti. Kasmā ñatvā āhāti? Tassa mānanimmadanatthaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1067_2: Bhagavā hi aññāsi – “ayaṃ mayā evaṃ vutte kujjhitvā mama ñātake akkosissati. Athassāhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1067_3: yathā nāma kusalo bhisakko dosaṃ uggiletvā nīharati, evameva gottena gottaṃ, kulāpadesena
atk-s0101a0:1067_4: kulāpadesaṃ, uṭṭhāpetvā bhavaggappamāṇena viya uṭṭhitaṃ mānaddhajaṃ mūle chetvā nipātessāmī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1067_5: Khuṃsentoti ghaṭṭento. Vambhentoti hīḷento. Pāpito bhavissatīti caṇḍabhāvādidosaṃ pāpito bhavissati.
atk-s0101a0:1068_0: Caṇḍāti mānanissitakodhayuttā. Pharusāti kharā. Lahusāti lahukā. Appakeneva tussanti
atk-s0101a0:1068_1: vā dussanti vā udakapiṭṭhe alābukaṭāhaṃ viya appakeneva uplavanti. Bhassāti bahubhāṇino.
atk-s0101a0:1068_2: Sakyānaṃ mukhe vivaṭe aññassa vacanokāso natthīti adhippāyeneva vadati. Samānāti
atk-s0101a0:1068_3: idaṃ santāti purimapadassa vevacanaṃ. Na sakkarontīti na brāhmaṇānaṃ sundarenākārena
atk-s0101a0:1068_4: karonti. Na garuṃ karontīti brāhmaṇesu gāravaṃ na karonti. Na mānentīti na manena
atk-s0101a0:1068_5: piyāyanti. Na pūjentīti mālādīhi nesaṃ pūjaṃ na karonti. Na apacāyantīti abhivādanādīhi
atk-s0101a0:1068_6: nesaṃ apacitikammaṃ nīcavuttiṃ na dassenti tayidanti taṃ idaṃ. Yadime sakyāti yaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1068_7: ime sakyā na brāhmaṇe sakkaronti…pe… na apacāyanti, taṃ tesaṃ asakkārakaraṇādi sabbaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1070_0: 265. Aparaddhunti aparajjhiṃsu. Ekamidāhanti ettha idanti nipātamattaṃ. Ekaṃ ahanti
atk-s0101a0:1070_1: attho. Sandhāgāranti rajjaanusāsanasālā. Sakyāti abhisittarājāno. Sakyakumārāti anabhisittā.
atk-s0101a0:1070_4: karontā. Mamaññeva maññeti evamahaṃ maññāmi, mamaññeva anuhasanti, na aññanti.
atk-s0101a0:1071_0: Kasmā pana te evamakaṃsūti? Te kira ambaṭṭhassa kulavaṃsaṃ jānanti. Ayañca tasmiṃ
atk-s0101a0:1071_1: samaye yāva pādantā olambetvā nivatthasāṭakassa ekena hatthena dussakaṇṇaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0101a0:1071_2: khandhaṭṭhikaṃ nāmetvā mānamadena matto viya āgacchati. Tato – “passatha bho amhākaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1071_3: dāsassa kaṇhāyanagottassa ambaṭṭhassa āgamanakāraṇa”nti vadantā evamakaṃsu. Sopi
atk-s0101a0:1071_4: attano kulavaṃsaṃ jānāti. Tasmā “mamaññeva maññe”ti takkayittha.
atk-s0101a0:1072: Āsanenāti “idamāsanaṃ, ettha nisīdāhī”ti evaṃ āsanena nimantanaṃ nāma hoti, tathā na koci akāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1074_0: 266. Laṭukikāti khettaleḍḍūnaṃ antarenivāsinī khuddakasakuṇikā. Kulāvaketi nivāsanaṭṭhāne.
atk-s0101a0:1074_1: Kāmalāpinīti yadicchakabhāṇinī, yaṃ yaṃ icchati taṃ taṃ lapati, na taṃ koci haṃso
atk-s0101a0:1074_2: vā koñco vā moro vā āgantvā “kiṃ tvaṃ lapasī’ti nisedheti. Abhisajjitunti kodhavasena laggituṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1075: Evaṃ vutte māṇavo – “ayaṃ samaṇo gotamo attano ñātake laṭukikasadise katvā amhe haṃsakoñcamorasadise karoti, nimmāno dāni jāto”ti maññamāno uttari cattāro vaṇṇe dasseti.
atk-s0101a0:1077_0: 267. Nimmādetīti nimmadeti nimmāne karoti. Yaṃnūnāhanti yadi panāhaṃ. “Kaṇhāyanohamasmi,
atk-s0101a0:1077_1: bho gotamā”ti idaṃ kira vacanaṃ ambaṭṭho tikkhattuṃ mahāsaddena avoca. Kasmā avoca?
atk-s0101a0:1077_2: Kiṃ asuddhabhāvaṃ na jānātīti? Āma jānāti. Jānantopi bhavapaṭicchannametaṃ kāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1077_3: taṃ anena na diṭṭhaṃ. Apassanto mahāsamaṇo kiṃ vakkhatīti maññamāno mānathaddhatāya
atk-s0101a0:1077_4: avoca. Mātāpettikanti mātāpitūnaṃ santakaṃ. Nāmagottanti paṇṇattivasena nāmaṃ, paveṇīvasena
atk-s0101a0:1077_5: gottaṃ. Anussaratoti anussarantassa kulakoṭiṃ sodhentassa. Ayyaputtāti sāmino puttā.
atk-s0101a0:1077_6: Dāsiputtoti gharadāsiyāva putto. Tasmā yathā dāsena sāmino upasaṅkamitabbā, evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1077_7: anupasaṅkamantaṃ taṃ disvā sakyā anujagghiṃsūti dasseti.
atk-s0101a0:1078_0: Ito paraṃ tassa dāsabhāvaṃ sakyānañca sāmibhāvaṃ pakāsetvā attano ca ambaṭṭhassa
atk-s0101a0:1078_1: ca kulavaṃsaṃ āharanto sakyā kho panātiādimāha. Tattha dahantīti ṭhapenti, okkāko
atk-s0101a0:1078_2: no pubbapurisoti, evaṃ karontīti attho. Tassa kira rañño kathanakāle ukkā viya mukhato
atk-s0101a0:1078_3: pabhā niccharati, tasmā taṃ “okkāko”ti sañjāniṃsūti. Pabbājesīti nīhari.
atk-s0101a0:1079_0: Idāni te nāmavasena dassento – “okkāmukha”ntiādimāha. Tatrāyaṃ anupubbī kathā – paṭhamakappikānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1079_1: kira rañño mahāsammatassa rojo nāma putto ahosi. Rojassa vararojo, vararojassa kalyāṇo,
atk-s0101a0:1079_2: kalyāṇassa varakalyāṇo, varakalyāṇassa mandhātā, mandhātussa varamandhātā, varamandhātussa
atk-s0101a0:1079_3: uposatho, uposathassa varo, varassa upavaro, upavarassa maghadevo, maghadevassa paramparāya
atk-s0101a0:1079_4: caturāsītikhattiyasahassāni ahesuṃ. Tesaṃ pacchato tayo okkākavaṃsā ahesuṃ. Tesu
atk-s0101a0:1079_5: tatiyaokkākassa pañca mahesiyo ahesuṃ – hatthā, cittā, jantu, jālinī, visākhāti.
atk-s0101a0:1079_6: Ekekissā pañcapañcaitthisataparivārā. Sabbajeṭṭhāya cattāro puttā – okkāmukho, karakaṇḍu,
atk-s0101a0:1079_7: hatthiniko, sinisūroti. Pañca dhītaro – piyā, suppiyā, ānandā, vijitā, vijitasenāti.
atk-s0101a0:1079_8: Iti sā nava putte vijāyitvā kālamakāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1080_0: Atha rājā aññaṃ dahariṃ abhirūpaṃ rājadhītaraṃ ānetvā aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Sā
atk-s0101a0:1080_1: jantuṃ nāma puttaṃ vijāyi. Atha naṃ pañcamadivase alaṅkaritvā rañño dassesi. Rājā
atk-s0101a0:1080_2: tuṭṭho tassā varaṃ adāsi. Sā ñātakehi saddhiṃ mantetvā puttassa rajjaṃ yāci. Rājā
atk-s0101a0:1080_3: – “nassa, vasali, mama puttānaṃ antarāyaṃ icchasī”ti tajjesi. Sā punappunaṃ raho
atk-s0101a0:1080_4: rājānaṃ paritosetvā – “mahārāja, musāvādo nāma na vaṭṭatī”tiādīni vatvā yācatiyeva.
atk-s0101a0:1080_5: Atha rājā putte āmantesi – “ahaṃ tātā, tumhākaṃ kaniṭṭhaṃ jantukumāraṃ disvā tassa
atk-s0101a0:1080_6: mātuyā sahasā varaṃ adāsiṃ, sā puttassa rajjaṃ pariṇāmetuṃ icchati. Tumhe ṭhapetvā
atk-s0101a0:1080_7: maṅgalahatthiṃ maṅgalaassaṃ maṅgalarathañca yattake icchatha, tattake hatthiassarathe
atk-s0101a0:1080_8: gahetvā gacchatha. Mamaccayena āgantvā rajjaṃ kareyyāthā”ti, aṭṭhahi amaccehi saddhiṃ uyyojesi.
atk-s0101a0:1081_0: Te nānappakāraṃ roditvā kanditvā – “tāta, amhākaṃ dosaṃ khamathā”ti rājānañceva rājorodhe
atk-s0101a0:1081_1: ca khamāpetvā, “mayampi bhātūhi saddhiṃ gacchāmā”ti rājānaṃ āpucchitvā nagarā nikkhantā
atk-s0101a0:1081_2: bhaginiyo ādāya caturaṅginiyā senāya parivutā nagarā nikkhamiṃsu. “Kumārā pituaccayena
atk-s0101a0:1081_3: āgantvā rajjaṃ kāressanti, gacchāma ne upaṭṭhahāmā”ti cintetvā bahū manussā anubandhiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1081_4: Paṭhamadivase yojanamattā senā ahosi, dutiye dviyojanamattā, tatiye tiyojanamattā.
atk-s0101a0:1081_5: Kumārā mantayiṃsu – “mahā balakāyo, sace mayaṃ kañci sāmantarājānaṃ madditvā janapadaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1081_6: gaṇheyyāma, sopi no nappasaheyya. Kiṃ paresaṃ pīḷāya katāya, mahā ayaṃ jambudīpo,
atk-s0101a0:1081_7: araññe nagaraṃ māpessāmā”ti himavantābhimukhā gantvā nagaravatthuṃ pariyesiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1082_0: Tasmiñca samaye amhākaṃ bodhisatto brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbattitvā kapilabrāhmaṇo
atk-s0101a0:1082_1: nāma hutvā nikkhamma isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavantapasse pokkharaṇiyā tīre sākavanasaṇḍe
atk-s0101a0:1082_2: paṇṇasālaṃ māpetvā vasati. So kira bhummajālaṃ nāma vijjaṃ jānāti, yāya uddhaṃ asītihatthe
atk-s0101a0:1082_3: ākāse, heṭṭhā ca bhūmiyampi guṇadosaṃ passati. Etasmiṃ padese tiṇagumbalatā dakkhiṇāvaṭṭā
atk-s0101a0:1082_4: pācīnābhimukhā jāyanti. Sīhabyagghādayo migasūkare sappabiḷārā ca maṇḍūkamūsike anubandhamānā
atk-s0101a0:1082_5: taṃ padesaṃ patvā na sakkonti te anubandhituṃ. Tehi te aññadatthu santajjitā nivattantiyeva.
atk-s0101a0:1082_6: So – “ayaṃ pathaviyā aggapadeso”ti ñatvā tattha attano paṇṇasālaṃ māpesi.
atk-s0101a0:1083_0: Atha te kumāre nagaravatthuṃ pariyesamāne attano vasanokāsaṃ āgate disvā pucchitvā
atk-s0101a0:1083_1: taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā tesu anukampaṃ janetvā avoca – “imasmiṃ paṇṇasālaṭṭhāne māpitaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1083_2: nagaraṃ jambudīpe agganagaraṃ bhavissati. Ettha jātapurisesu ekeko purisasatampi
atk-s0101a0:1083_3: purisasahassampi abhibhavituṃ sakkhissati. Ettha nagaraṃ māpetha, paṇṇasālaṭṭhāne
atk-s0101a0:1083_4: rañño gharaṃ karotha. Imasmiñhi okāse ṭhatvā caṇḍālaputtopi cakkavattibalena atiseyyo”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1083_5: Nanu, bhante, ayyassa vasanokāsoti? “Mama vasanokāso”ti mā cintayittha. Mayhaṃ ekapasse
atk-s0101a0:1083_6: paṇṇasālaṃ katvā nagaraṃ māpetvā kapilavatthunti nāmaṃ karothā”ti. Te tathā katvā
atk-s0101a0:1084_0: Athāmaccā – “ime dārakā vayappattā, sace nesaṃ pitā santike bhaveyya, so āvāhavivāhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1084_1: kareyya. Idāni pana amhākaṃ bhāro”ti cintetvā kumārehi saddhiṃ mantayiṃsu. Kumārā
atk-s0101a0:1084_2: amhākaṃ sadisā khattiyadhītaro nāma na passāma, nāpi bhaginīnaṃ sadise khattiyakumārake,
atk-s0101a0:1084_3: asadisasaṃyoge ca no uppannā puttā mātito vā pitito vā aparisuddhā jātisambhedaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1084_4: pāpuṇissanti. Tasmā mayaṃ bhaginīhiyeva saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ rocemāti. Te jātisambhedabhayena
atk-s0101a0:1084_5: jeṭṭhakabhaginiṃ mātuṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā avasesāhi saṃvāsaṃ kappesuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1085_0: Tesaṃ puttehi ca dhītāhi ca vaḍḍhamānānaṃ aparena samayena jeṭṭhakabhaginiyā kuṭṭharogo
atk-s0101a0:1085_1: udapādi, koviḷārapupphasadisāni gattāni ahesuṃ. Rājakumārā imāya saddhiṃ ekato nisajjaṭṭhānabhojanādīni
atk-s0101a0:1085_2: karontānampi upari ayaṃ rogo saṅkamatīti cintetvā ekadivasaṃ uyyānakīḷaṃ gacchantā
atk-s0101a0:1085_3: viya taṃ yāne āropetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā bhūmiyaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇāpetvā tattha khādanīyabhojanīyena
atk-s0101a0:1085_4: saddhiṃ taṃ pakkhipitvā gharasaṅkhepena upari padaraṃ paṭicchādetvā paṃsuṃ datvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1086_0: Tena ca samayena rāmo nāma bārāṇasirājā kuṭṭharogo nāṭakitthīhi ca orodhehi ca jigucchiyamāno
atk-s0101a0:1086_1: tena saṃvegena jeṭṭhaputtassa rajjaṃ datvā araññaṃ pavisitvā tattha paṇṇasālaṃ māpetvā
atk-s0101a0:1086_2: mūlaphalāni paribhuñjanto nacirasseva arogo suvaṇṇavaṇṇo hutvā ito cito ca vicaranto
atk-s0101a0:1086_3: mahantaṃ susirarukkhaṃ disvā tassabbhantare soḷasahatthappamāṇaṃ okāsaṃ sodhetvā
atk-s0101a0:1086_4: dvārañca vātapānañca yojetvā nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā tattha vāsaṃ kappesi. So aṅgārakaṭāhe
atk-s0101a0:1086_5: aggiṃ katvā rattiṃ migasūkarādīnaṃ sadde suṇanto sayati. So – “asukasmiṃ padese sīho
atk-s0101a0:1086_6: saddamakāsi, asukasmiṃ byaggho”ti sallakkhetvā pabhāte tattha gantvā vighāsamaṃsaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1087_0: Athekadivasaṃ tasmiṃ paccūsasamaye aggiṃ jāletvā nisinne rājadhītāya sarīragandhena
atk-s0101a0:1087_1: āgantvā byaggho tasmiṃ padese paṃsuṃ viyūhanto padare vivaramakāsi, tena ca vivarena
atk-s0101a0:1087_2: sā byagghaṃ disvā bhītā vissaramakāsi. So taṃ saddaṃ sutvā – “itthisaddo eso”ti ca
atk-s0101a0:1087_3: sallakkhetvā pātova tattha gantvā – “ko etthā”ti āha. Mātugāmo sāmīti. Kiṃ jātikāsīti?
atk-s0101a0:1087_4: Okkākamahārājassa dhītā sāmīti. Nikkhamāti? Na sakkā sāmīti. Kiṃ kāraṇāti? Chavirogo
atk-s0101a0:1087_5: me atthīti. So sabbaṃ pavattiṃ pucchitvā khattiyamānena anikkhamantiṃ – “ahampi khattiyo”ti
atk-s0101a0:1087_6: attano khattiyabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā nisseṇiṃ datvā uddharitvā attano vasanokāsaṃ netvā
atk-s0101a0:1087_7: sayaṃ paribhuttabhesajjāniyeva datvā nacirasseva arogaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ katvā tāya
atk-s0101a0:1087_8: saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ kappesi. Sā paṭhamasaṃvāseneva gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā dve putte vijāyi,
atk-s0101a0:1087_9: punapi dveti, evaṃ soḷasakkhattumpi vijāyi. Evaṃ dvattiṃsa bhātaro ahesuṃ. Te anupubbena
atk-s0101a0:1088_0: Athekadivasaṃ eko rāmarañño nagaravāsī vanacarako pabbate ratanāni gavesanto rājānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1088_1: disvā sañjānitvā āha – “jānāmahaṃ, deva, tumhe”ti. Tato naṃ rājā sabbaṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0101a0:1088_2: pucchi. Tasmiṃyeva ca khaṇe te dārakā āgamiṃsu. So te disvā – “ke ime”ti āha. “Puttā
atk-s0101a0:1088_3: me”ti ca vutte tesaṃ mātikavaṃsaṃ pucchitvā – “laddhaṃ dāni me pābhata”nti nagaraṃ
atk-s0101a0:1088_4: gantvā rañño ārocesi. So ‘pitaraṃ ānayissāmī’ti caturaṅginiyā senāya tattha gantvā
atk-s0101a0:1088_5: pitaraṃ vanditvā – “rajjaṃ, deva, sampaṭicchā”ti yāci. So – “alaṃ, tāta, na tattha
atk-s0101a0:1088_6: gacchāmi, idheva me imaṃ rukkhaṃ apanetvā nagaraṃ māpehī”ti āha. So tathā katvā tassa
atk-s0101a0:1088_7: nagarassa kolarukkhaṃ apanetvā katattā kolanagaranti ca byagghapathe katattā byagghapathanti
atk-s0101a0:1088_8: cāti dve nāmāni āropetvā pitaraṃ vanditvā attano nagaraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1089_0: Tato vayappatte kumāre mātā āha – “tātā, tumhākaṃ kapilavatthuvāsino sakyā mātulā
atk-s0101a0:1089_1: santi. Mātuladhītānaṃ pana vo evarūpaṃ nāma kesaggahaṇaṃ hoti, evarūpaṃ dussagahaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1089_2: Yadā tā nhānatitthaṃ āgacchanti, tadā gantvā yassa yā ruccati, so taṃ gaṇhatū”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1089_3: Te tatheva gantvā tāsu nhatvā sīsaṃ sukkhāpayamānāsu yaṃ yaṃ icchiṃsu, taṃ taṃ gahetvā
atk-s0101a0:1089_4: nāmaṃ sāvetvā agamiṃsu. Sakyarājāno sutvā “hotu, bhaṇe, amhākaṃ ñātakā eva te”ti
atk-s0101a0:1089_5: tuṇhī ahesuṃ. Ayaṃ sakyakoliyānaṃ uppatti. Evaṃ tesaṃ sakyakoliyānaṃ aññamaññaṃ āvāhavivāhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1089_6: karontānaṃ yāva buddhakālā anupacchinnova vaṃso āgato. Tattha bhagavā sakyavaṃsaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1089_7: dassetuṃ – “te raṭṭhasmā pabbājitā himavantapasse pokkharaṇiyā tīre”tiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0101a0:1089_8: sammantīti vasanti. Sakyā vata bhoti raṭṭhasmā pabbājitā araññe vasantāpi jātisambhedamakatvā
atk-s0101a0:1089_9: kulavaṃsaṃ anurakkhituṃ sakyā, samatthā, paṭibalāti attho. Tadaggeti taṃ aggaṃ katvā,
atk-s0101a0:1089_10: tato paṭṭhāyāti attho. So ca nesaṃ pubbapurisoti so okkāko rājā etesaṃ pubbapuriso.
atk-s0101a0:1090_0: Evaṃ sakyavaṃsaṃ pakāsetvā idāni ambaṭṭhavaṃsaṃ pakāsento – “rañño kho panā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1090_1: Kaṇhaṃ nāma janesīti kāḷavaṇṇaṃ antokucchiyaṃyeva sañjātadantaṃ parūḷhamassudāṭhikaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1090_2: puttaṃ vijāyi. Pabyāhāsīti yakkho jātoti bhayena palāyitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya ṭhitesu
atk-s0101a0:1090_3: gharamānusakesu ito cito ca vicaranto dhovatha mantiādīni vadanto uccāsaddamakāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1091_0: 268. Te māṇavakā bhagavantaṃ etadavocunti attano upārambhamocanatthāya – “etaṃ mā
atk-s0101a0:1091_1: bhava”ntiādivacanaṃ avocuṃ. Tesaṃ kira etadahosi – “ambaṭṭho amhākaṃ ācariyassa jeṭṭhantevāsī,
atk-s0101a0:1091_2: sace mayaṃ evarūpe ṭhāne ekadvevacanamattampi na vakkhāma, ayaṃ no ācariyassa santike
atk-s0101a0:1091_3: amhe paribhindissatī”ti upārambhamocanatthaṃ evaṃ avocuṃ. Cittena panassa nimmadabhāvaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1091_4: ākaṅkhanti. Ayaṃ kira mānanissitattā tesampi appiyova. Kalyāṇavākkaraṇoti madhuravacano.
atk-s0101a0:1091_5: Asmiṃ vacaneti attanā uggahite vedattayavacane. Paṭimantetunti pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ paṭikathetuṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1091_6: vissajjetunti attho. Etasmiṃ vā dāsiputtavacane. Paṭimantetunti uttaraṃ kathetuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1092_0: 269. Atha kho bhagavāti atha kho bhagavā – “sace ime māṇavakā ettha nisinnā evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1092_1: uccāsaddaṃ karissanti, ayaṃ kathā pariyosānaṃ na gamissati. Handa, ne nissadde katvā
atk-s0101a0:1092_2: ambaṭṭheneva saddhiṃ kathemī”ti te māṇavake etadavoca. Tattha mantavhoti mantayatha.
atk-s0101a0:1092_3: Mayā saddhiṃ paṭimantetūti mayā saha kathetu. Evaṃ vutte māṇavakā cintayiṃsu – “ambaṭṭho
atk-s0101a0:1092_4: tāva dāsiputtosīti vutte puna sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ nāsakkhi. Ayaṃ kho jāti nāma dujjānā,
atk-s0101a0:1092_5: sace aññampi kiñci samaṇo gotamo ‘tvaṃ dāso’ti vakkhati, ko tena saddhiṃ aḍḍaṃ karissati.
atk-s0101a0:1092_6: Ambaṭṭho attanā baddhaṃ puṭakaṃ attanāva mocetū”ti attānaṃ parimocetvā tasseva upari
atk-s0101a0:1093_0: 270. Sahadhammikoti sahetuko sakāraṇo. Akāmā byākātabboti attanā anicchantenapi byākaritabbo,
atk-s0101a0:1093_1: avassaṃ vissajjetabboti attho. Aññena vā aññaṃ paṭicarissasīti aññena vacanena aññaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1093_2: vacanaṃ paṭicarissasi ajjhottharissasi, paṭicchādessasīti attho. Yo hi “kiṃ gotto
atk-s0101a0:1093_3: tva”nti evaṃ puṭṭho – “ahaṃ tayo vede jānāmī”tiādīni vadati, ayaṃ aññena aññaṃ paṭicarati
atk-s0101a0:1093_4: nāma. Pakkamissasi vāti pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ jānantova akathetukāmatāya uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamissasi vā.
atk-s0101a0:1094_0: Tuṇhī ahosīti samaṇo gotamo maṃ sāmaṃyeva dāsiputtabhāvaṃ kathāpetukāmo, sāmaṃ kathite
atk-s0101a0:1094_1: ca dāso nāma jātoyeva hoti. Ayaṃ pana dvatikkhattuṃ codetvā tuṇhī bhavissati, tato
atk-s0101a0:1094_2: ahaṃ parivattitvā pakkamissāmīti cintetvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0101a0:1095_0: 271. Vajiraṃ pāṇimhi assāti vajirapāṇi. Yakkhoti na yo vā so vā yakkho, sakko devarājāti
atk-s0101a0:1095_1: veditabbo. Ādittanti aggivaṇṇaṃ. Sampajjalitanti suṭṭhu pajjalitaṃ. Sajotibhūtanti
atk-s0101a0:1095_2: samantato jotibhūtaṃ, ekaggijālabhūtanti attho. Ṭhito hotīti mahantaṃ sīsaṃ, kandalamakuḷasadisā
atk-s0101a0:1095_3: dāṭhā bhayānakāni akkhināsādīni evaṃ virūparūpaṃ māpetvā ṭhito.
atk-s0101a0:1096_0: Kasmā panesa āgatoti? Diṭṭhivissajjāpanatthaṃ. Api ca – “ahañceva kho pana dhammaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1096_1: deseyyaṃ, pare ca me na ājāneyyu”nti evaṃ dhammadesanāya appossukkabhāvaṃ āpanne
atk-s0101a0:1096_2: bhagavati sakko mahābrahmunā saddhiṃ āgantvā – “bhagavā dhammaṃ desetha, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1096_3: āṇāya avattamāne mayaṃ vattāpessāma, tumhākaṃ dhammacakkaṃ hotu, amhākaṃ āṇācakka”nti
atk-s0101a0:1096_4: paṭiññaṃ akāsi. Tasmā – “ajja ambaṭṭhaṃ tāsetvā pañhaṃ vissajjāpessāmī”ti āgato.
atk-s0101a0:1097_0: Bhagavā ceva passati ambaṭṭho cāti yadi hi taṃ aññepi passeyyuṃ, taṃ kāraṇaṃ agaru
atk-s0101a0:1097_1: assa, “ayaṃ samaṇo gotamo ambaṭṭhaṃ attano vāde anotarantaṃ ñatvā yakkhaṃ āvāhetvā
atk-s0101a0:1097_2: dassesi, tato ambaṭṭho bhayena kathesī”ti vadeyyuṃ. Tasmā bhagavā ceva passati ambaṭṭho
atk-s0101a0:1097_3: ca. Tassa taṃ disvāva sakalasarīrato sedā mucciṃsu. Antokucchi viparivattamānā mahāravaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1097_4: viravi. So “aññepi nu kho passantī”ti olokento kassaci lomahaṃsamattampi nāddasa.
atk-s0101a0:1097_5: Tato – “idaṃ bhayaṃ mameva uppannaṃ, sacāhaṃ yakkhoti vakkhāmi, ‘kiṃ tavameva akkhīni
atk-s0101a0:1097_6: atthi, tvameva yakkhaṃ passasi, paṭhamaṃ yakkhaṃ adisvā samaṇena gotamena vādasaṅghaṭṭe
atk-s0101a0:1097_7: pakkhittova yakkhaṃ passasī’ti vadeyyu”nti cintetvā “na dāni me idha aññaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1097_8: atthi, aññatra samaṇā gotamā”ti maññamāno atha kho ambaṭṭho māṇavo…pe… bhagavantaṃ etadavoca.
atk-s0101a0:1098_0: 272. Tāṇaṃ gavesīti tāṇaṃ gavesamāno. Leṇaṃ gavesīti leṇaṃ gavesamāno. Saraṇaṃ gavesīti
atk-s0101a0:1098_1: saraṇaṃ gavesamāno. Ettha ca tāyati rakkhatīti tāṇaṃ. Nilīyanti etthāti leṇaṃ. Saratīti
atk-s0101a0:1098_2: saraṇaṃ, bhayaṃ hiṃsati, viddhaṃsetīti attho. Upanisīditvāti upagamma heṭṭhāsane
atk-s0101a0:1100_0: 273-274. Dakkhiṇajanapadanti dakkhiṇāpathoti pākaṭaṃ. Gaṅgāya dakkhiṇato pākaṭajanapadaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1100_1: Tadā kira dakkhiṇāpathe bahū brāhmaṇatāpasā honti, so tattha gantvā ekaṃ tāpasaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1100_2: vattapaṭipattiyā ārādhesi. So tassa upakāraṃ disvā āha – “ambho, purisa, mantaṃ te
atk-s0101a0:1100_3: demi, yaṃ icchasi, taṃ mantaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti. So āha – “na me ācariya, aññena mantena,
atk-s0101a0:1100_4: kiccaṃ atthi, yassānubhāvena āvudhaṃ na parivattati, taṃ me mantaṃ dehī”ti. So –
atk-s0101a0:1100_5: “bhadraṃ, bho”ti tassa dhanuagamanīyaṃ ambaṭṭhaṃ nāma vijjaṃ adāsi, so taṃ vijjaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1100_6: gahetvā tattheva vīmaṃsitvā – “idāni me manorathaṃ pūressāmī”ti isivesaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0101a0:1100_7: okkākassa santikaṃ gato. Tena vuttaṃ – “dakkhiṇajanapadaṃ gantvā brahmamante adhīyitvā
atk-s0101a0:1101_0: Ettha brahmamanteti ānubhāvasampannatāya seṭṭhamante. Ko nevaṃ’re ayaṃ mayhaṃ dāsiputtoti
atk-s0101a0:1101_1: ko nu evaṃ are ayaṃ mama dāsiputto. So taṃ khurappanti so rājā taṃ māretukāmatāya
atk-s0101a0:1101_2: sannahitaṃ saraṃ tassa mantānubhāvena neva khipituṃ na apanetuṃ sakkhi, tāvadeva
atk-s0101a0:1102_0: Amaccāti mahāmaccā. Pārisajjāti itare parisāvacarā. Etadavocunti – “daṇḍakīrañño
atk-s0101a0:1102_1: kisavacchatāpase aparaddhassa āvudhavuṭṭhiyā sakalaraṭṭhaṃ vinaṭṭhaṃ. Nāḷikero pañcasu
atk-s0101a0:1102_2: tāpasasatesu ajjuno ca aṅgīrase aparaddho pathaviṃ bhinditvā nirayaṃ paviṭṭho”ti
atk-s0101a0:1102_3: cintayantā bhayena etaṃ sotthi, bhaddantetiādivacanaṃ avocuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1103_0: Sotthi bhavissati raññoti idaṃ vacanaṃ kaṇho ciraṃ tuṇhī hutvā tato anekappakāraṃ
atk-s0101a0:1103_1: yācīyamāno – “tumhākaṃ raññā mādisassa isino khurappaṃ sannayhantena bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1103_2: kata”ntiādīni ca vatvā pacchā abhāsi. Undriyissatīti bhijjissati, thusamuṭṭhi viya
atk-s0101a0:1103_3: vippakiriyissatīti. Idaṃ so “janaṃ tāsessāmī”ti musā bhaṇati. Sarasanthambhanamatteyeva
atk-s0101a0:1103_4: hissa vijjāya ānubhāvo, na aññatra. Ito paresupi vacanesu eseva nayo.
atk-s0101a0:1104_0: Pallomoti pannalomo. Lomahaṃsanamattampissa na bhavissati. Idaṃ kira so “sace me
atk-s0101a0:1104_1: rājā taṃ dārikaṃ dassatī”ti paṭiññaṃ kāretvā avaca. Kumāre khurappaṃ patiṭṭhapesīti
atk-s0101a0:1104_2: tena “saro otaratū”ti mante parivatti, te kumārassa nābhiyaṃ patiṭṭhapesi. Dhītaraṃ
atk-s0101a0:1104_3: adāsīti sīsaṃ dhovitvā adāsaṃ bhujissaṃ katvā dhītaraṃ adāsi, uḷāre ca taṃ ṭhāne
atk-s0101a0:1104_4: ṭhapesi. Mā kho tumhe māṇavakāti idaṃ pana bhagavā – “ekena pakkhena ambaṭṭho sakyānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1104_5: ñāti hotī”ti pakāsento tassa samassāsanatthaṃ āha. Tato ambaṭṭho ghaṭasatena abhisitto
atk-s0101a0:1104_6: viya passaddhadaratho hutvā samassāsetvā samaṇo gotamo maṃ “tosessāmī”ti ekena pakkhena
atk-s0101a0:1106_0: 275. Atha kho bhagavā – “ayaṃ ambaṭṭho khattiyosmī”ti saññaṃ karoti, attano akhattiyabhāvaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1106_1: na jānāti, handa naṃ jānāpessāmīti khattiyavaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ uttaridesanaṃ vaḍḍhento
atk-s0101a0:1106_2: – “taṃ kiṃ maññasi ambaṭṭhā”tiādimāha. Tattha idhāti imasmiṃ loke. Brāhmaṇesūti brāhmaṇānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1106_3: antare. Āsanaṃ vā udakaṃ vāti aggāsanaṃ vā aggodakaṃ vā. Saddheti matake uddissa
atk-s0101a0:1106_4: katabhatte. Thālipāketi maṅgalādibhatte. Yaññeti yaññabhatte. Pāhuneti pāhunakānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1106_5: katabhatte paṇṇākārabhatte vā. Api nussāti api nu assa khattiyaputtassa. Āvaṭaṃ vā
atk-s0101a0:1106_6: assa anāvaṭaṃ vāti, brāhmaṇakaññāsu nivāraṇaṃ bhaveyya vā no vā, brāhmaṇadārikaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1106_7: labheyya vā na vā labheyyāti attho. Anupapannoti khattiyabhāvaṃ apatto, aparisuddhoti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1107_0: 276. Itthiyā vā itthiṃ karitvāti itthiyā vā itthiṃ pariyesitvā. Kismiñcideva pakaraṇeti
atk-s0101a0:1107_1: kismiñcideva dose brāhmaṇānaṃ ayutte akattabbakaraṇe. Bhassapuṭenāti bhasmapuṭena,
atk-s0101a0:1108_0: 277. Janetasminti janitasmiṃ, pajāyāti attho. Ye gottapaṭisārinoti ye janetasmiṃ
atk-s0101a0:1108_1: gottaṃ paṭisaranti – “ahaṃ gotamo, ahaṃ kassapo”ti, tesu loke gottapaṭisārīsu khattiyo
atk-s0101a0:1108_2: seṭṭho. Anumatā mayāti mama sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā desitā mayā anuññātā.
atk-s0101a0:1111_0: 278. Imāya pana gāthāya vijjācaraṇasampannoti idaṃ padaṃ sutvā ambaṭṭho cintesi –
atk-s0101a0:1111_1: “vijjā nāma tayo vedā, caraṇaṃ pañca sīlāni, tayidaṃ amhākaṃyeva atthi, vijjācaraṇasampanno
atk-s0101a0:1111_2: ce seṭṭho, mayameva seṭṭhā”ti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā vijjācaraṇaṃ pucchanto – “katamaṃ pana
atk-s0101a0:1111_3: taṃ, bho gotama, caraṇaṃ, katamā ca pana sā vijjā”ti āha. Athassa bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇasamaye
atk-s0101a0:1111_4: siddhaṃ jātivādādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ vijjācaraṇaṃ paṭikkhipitvā anuttaraṃ vijjācaraṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1111_5: dassetukāmo – “na kho ambaṭṭhā”tiādimāha. Tattha jātivādoti jātiṃ ārabbha vādo, brāhmaṇassevidaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1111_6: vaṭṭati, na suddassātiādi vacananti attho. Esa nayo sabbattha. Jātivādavinibaddhāti
atk-s0101a0:1112_0: Tato ambaṭṭho – “yattha dāni mayaṃ laggissāmāti cintayimha, tato no samaṇo gotamo
atk-s0101a0:1112_1: mahāvāte thusaṃ dhunanto viya dūrameva avakkhipi. Yattha pana mayaṃ na laggāma, tattha
atk-s0101a0:1112_2: no niyojesi. Ayaṃ no vijjācaraṇasampadā ñātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā puna vijjācaraṇasampadaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1112_3: pucchi. Athassa bhagavā samudāgamato pabhuti vijjācaraṇaṃ dassetuṃ – “idha ambaṭṭha
atk-s0101a0:1113_0: 279. Ettha ca bhagavā caraṇapariyāpannampi tividhaṃ sīlaṃ vibhajanto “idamassa hoti
atk-s0101a0:1113_1: caraṇasmi”nti aniyyātetvā “idampissa hoti sīlasmi”nti sīlavaseneva niyyātesi. Kasmā?
atk-s0101a0:1113_2: Tassapi hi kiñci kiñci sīlaṃ atthi, tasmā caraṇavasena niyyātiyamāne “mayampi caraṇasampannā”ti
atk-s0101a0:1113_3: tattha tattheva laggeyya. Yaṃ pana tena supinepi na diṭṭhapubbaṃ, tasseva vasena
atk-s0101a0:1113_4: niyyātento paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. Idampissa hoti caraṇasmiṃ…pe… catutthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1113_5: jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, idampissa hoti caraṇasmintiādimāha. Ettāvatā aṭṭhapi
atk-s0101a0:1113_6: samāpattiyo caraṇanti niyyātitā honti, vipassanā ñāṇato pana paṭṭhāya aṭṭhavidhāpi
atk-s0101a0:1115_1: vā. Khārividhamādāyāti ettha khārīti araṇī kamaṇḍalu sujādayo tāpasaparikkhārā. Vidhoti
atk-s0101a0:1115_2: kājo. Tasmā khāribharitaṃ kājamādāyāti attho. Ye pana khārivividhanti paṭhanti, te
atk-s0101a0:1115_3: “khārīti kājassa nāmaṃ, vividhanti bahukamaṇḍaluādiparikkhāra”nti vaṇṇayanti. Pavattaphalabhojanoti
atk-s0101a0:1115_5: paricārako. Kāmañca guṇādhikopi khīṇāsavasāmaṇero puthujjanabhikkhuno vuttanayena
atk-s0101a0:1115_6: paricārako hoti, ayaṃ pana na tādiso guṇavasenapi veyyāvaccakaraṇavasenapi lāmakoyeva.
atk-s0101a0:1116_0: Kasmā pana tāpasapabbajjā sāsanassa vināsamukhanti vuttāti? Yasmā gacchantaṃ gacchantaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1116_1: sāsanaṃ tāpasapabbajjāvasena osakkissati. Imasmiñhi sāsane pabbajitvā tisso sikkhā
atk-s0101a0:1116_2: pūretuṃ asakkontaṃ lajjino sikkhākāmā – “natthi tayā saddhiṃ uposatho vā pavāraṇā
atk-s0101a0:1116_3: vā saṅghakammaṃ vā”ti jigucchitvā parivajjenti. So “dukkaraṃ khuradhārūpamaṃ sāsane
atk-s0101a0:1116_4: paṭipattipūraṇaṃ dukkhaṃ, tāpasapabbajjā pana sukarā ceva bahujanasammatā cā”ti vibbhamitvā
atk-s0101a0:1116_5: tāpaso hoti. Aññe taṃ disvā – “kiṃ tayā kata”nti pucchanti. So – “bhāriyaṃ tumhākaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1116_6: sāsane kammaṃ, idha pana sachandacārino maya”nti vadati. Sopi, yadi evaṃ ahampi ettheva
atk-s0101a0:1116_7: pabbajāmīti tassa anusikkhanto tāpaso hoti. Evamaññepi aññepīti kamena tāpasāva bahukā
atk-s0101a0:1116_8: honti. Tesaṃ uppannakāle sāsanaṃ osakkitaṃ nāma bhavissati. Loke evarūpo buddho nāma
atk-s0101a0:1116_9: uppajji, tassa īdisaṃ nāma sāsanaṃ ahosīti sutamattameva bhavissati. Idaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0101a0:1117_0: Kudālapiṭakanti kandamūlaphalaggahaṇatthaṃ kudālañceva piṭakañca. Gāmasāmantaṃ vāti
atk-s0101a0:1117_1: vijjācaraṇasampadādīni anabhisambhuṇanto, kasikammādīhi ca jīvitaṃ nipphādetuṃ dukkhanti
atk-s0101a0:1117_2: maññamāno bahujanakuhāpanatthaṃ gāmasāmante vā nigamasāmante vā aggisālaṃ katvā sappiteladadhimadhuphāṇitatilataṇḍulādīhi
atk-s0101a0:1117_3: ceva nānādārūhi ca homakaraṇavasena aggiṃ paricaranto acchati.
atk-s0101a0:1118_0: Catudvāraṃ agāraṃ karitvāti catumukhaṃ pānāgāraṃ katvā tassa dvāre maṇḍapaṃ katvā
atk-s0101a0:1118_1: tattha pānīyaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā āgatāgate pānīyena āpucchati. Yampissa addhikā kilantā
atk-s0101a0:1118_2: pānīyaṃ pivitvā parituṭṭhā bhattapuṭaṃ vā taṇḍulādīni vā denti, taṃ sabbaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0101a0:1118_3: ambilayāguādīni katvā bahutaraṃ āmisagahaṇatthaṃ kesañci annaṃ deti, kesañci bhattapacanabhājanādīni.
atk-s0101a0:1118_4: Tehipi dinnaṃ āmisaṃ vā pubbaṇṇādīni vā gaṇhati, tāni vaḍḍhiyā payojeti. Evaṃ vaḍḍhamānavibhavo
atk-s0101a0:1118_5: gomahiṃsadāsīdāsapariggahaṃ karoti, mahantaṃ kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapeti. Imaṃ sandhāyetaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1118_6: vuttaṃ – “catudvāraṃ agāraṃ karitvā acchatī”ti. “Tamahaṃ yathāsatti yathābalaṃ paṭipūjessāmī”ti
atk-s0101a0:1118_7: idaṃ panassa paṭipattimukhaṃ. Iminā hi mukhena so evaṃ paṭipajjatīti. Ettāvatā ca
atk-s0101a0:1119_0: Kathaṃ? Aṭṭhavidhā hi tāpasā – saputtabhariyā, uñchācariyā, anaggipakkikā, asāmapākā,
atk-s0101a0:1119_1: asmamuṭṭhikā, dantavakkalikā, pavattaphalabhojanā, paṇḍupalāsikāti. Tattha ye keṇiyajaṭilo
atk-s0101a0:1119_2: viya kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapetvā vasanti, te saputtabhariyā nāma.
atk-s0101a0:1120: Ye pana “saputtadārabhāvo nāma pabbajitassa ayutto”ti lāyanamaddanaṭṭhānesu vīhimuggamāsatilādīni saṅkaḍḍhitvā pacitvā paribhuñjanti, te uñchācariyā nāma.
atk-s0101a0:1121: Ye “khalena khalaṃ vicaritvā vīhiṃ āharitvā koṭṭetvā paribhuñjanaṃ nāma ayutta”nti gāmanigamesu taṇḍulabhikkhaṃ gahetvā pacitvā paribhuñjanti, te anaggipakkikā nāma.
atk-s0101a0:1122: Ye pana “kiṃ pabbajitassa sāmapākenā”ti gāmaṃ pavisitvā pakkabhikkhameva gaṇhanti, te asāmapākā nāma.
atk-s0101a0:1123: Ye “divase divase bhikkhāpariyeṭṭhi nāma dukkhā pabbajitassā”ti muṭṭhipāsāṇena ambāṭakādīnaṃ rukkhānaṃ tacaṃ koṭṭetvā khādanti, te asmamuṭṭhikā nāma.
atk-s0101a0:1124: Ye pana “pāsāṇena tacaṃ koṭṭetvā vicaraṇaṃ nāma dukkha”nti danteheva ubbāṭetvā khādanti, te dantavakkalikā nāma.
atk-s0101a0:1125: Ye “dantehi ubbāṭetvā khādanaṃ nāma dukkhaṃ pabbajitassā”ti leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi paharitvā patitāni phalāni paribhuñjanti, te pavattaphalabhojanā nāma.
atk-s0101a0:1126: Ye pana “leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi pātetvā paribhogo nāma asāruppo pabbajitassā”ti sayaṃ patitāneva pupphaphalapaṇḍupalāsādīni khādantā yāpenti, te paṇḍupalāsikā nāma.
atk-s0101a0:1127_0: Te tividhā – ukkaṭṭhamajjhimamudukavasena. Tattha ye nisinnaṭṭhānato anuṭṭhāya hatthena
atk-s0101a0:1127_1: pāpuṇanaṭṭhāneva patitaṃ gahetvā khādanti, te ukkaṭṭhā. Ye ekarukkhato aññaṃ rukkhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1127_2: na gacchanti, te majjhimā. Ye taṃ taṃ rukkhamūlaṃ gantvā pariyesitvā khādanti, te mudukā.
atk-s0101a0:1128_0: Imā pana aṭṭhapi tāpasapabbajjā imāhi catūhiyeva saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Kathaṃ? Etāsu
atk-s0101a0:1128_1: hi saputtabhariyā ca uñchācariyā ca agāraṃ bhajanti. Anaggipakkikā ca asāmapākā ca
atk-s0101a0:1128_2: agyāgāraṃ bhajanti. Asmamuṭṭhikā ca dantavakkalikā ca kandamūlaphalabhojanaṃ bhajanti.
atk-s0101a0:1128_3: Pavattaphalabhojanā ca paṇḍupalāsikā ca pavattaphalabhojanaṃ bhajanti. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1128_4: – “ettāvatā ca bhagavatā sabbāpi tāpasapabbajjā niddiṭṭhā hontī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1129_0: 281-282. Idāni bhagavā sācariyakassa ambaṭṭhassa vijjācaraṇasampadāya apāyamukhampi
atk-s0101a0:1129_1: appattabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ taṃ kiṃ maññasi ambaṭṭhātiādimāha. Taṃ uttānatthameva. Attanā
atk-s0101a0:1129_2: āpāyikopi aparipūramānoti attanā vijjācaraṇasampadāya āpāyikenāpi aparipūramānena.
atk-s0101a0:1131_0: 283. Dattikanti dinnakaṃ. Sammukhībhāvampi na dadātīti kasmā na dadāti? So kira sammukhā
atk-s0101a0:1131_1: āvaṭṭaniṃ nāma vijjaṃ jānāti. Yadā rājā mahārahena alaṅkārena alaṅkato hoti, tadā
atk-s0101a0:1131_2: rañño samīpe ṭhatvā tassa alaṅkārassa nāmaṃ gaṇhati. Tassa rājā nāme gahite na demīti
atk-s0101a0:1131_3: vattuṃ na sakkoti. Datvā puna chaṇadivase alaṅkāraṃ āharathāti vatvā, natthi, deva,
atk-s0101a0:1131_4: tumhehi brāhmaṇassa dinnoti vutto, “kasmā me dinno”ti pucchi. Te amaccā ‘so brāhmaṇo
atk-s0101a0:1131_5: sammukhā āvaṭṭanimāyaṃ jānāti. Tāya tumhe āvaṭṭetvā gahetvā gacchatī’ti āhaṃsu. Apare
atk-s0101a0:1131_6: raññā saha tassa atisahāyabhāvaṃ asahantā āhaṃsu – “deva, etassa brāhmaṇassa sarīre
atk-s0101a0:1131_7: saṅkhaphalitakuṭṭhaṃ nāma atthi. Tumhe etaṃ disvāva āliṅgatha parāmasatha, idañca
atk-s0101a0:1131_8: kuṭṭhaṃ nāma kāyasaṃsaggavasena anugacchati, mā evaṃ karothā”ti. Tato paṭṭhāya tassa
atk-s0101a0:1132_0: Yasmā pana so brāhmaṇo paṇḍito khattavijjāya kusalo, tena saha mantetvā katakammaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1132_1: nāma na virujjhati, tasmā sāṇipākārassa anto ṭhatvā bahi ṭhitena tena saddhiṃ manteti.
atk-s0101a0:1132_2: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “tiro dussantena mantetī”ti. Tattha tirodussantenāti tirodussena.
atk-s0101a0:1132_3: Ayameva vā pāṭho. Dhammikanti anavajjaṃ. Payātanti abhiharitvā dinnaṃ. Kathaṃ tassa
atk-s0101a0:1132_4: rājāti yassa rañño brāhmaṇo īdisaṃ bhikkhaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya, kathaṃ tassa brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0101a0:1132_5: so rājā sammukhībhāvampi na dadeyya. Ayaṃ pana adinnakaṃ māyāya gaṇhati, tenassa
atk-s0101a0:1132_6: sammukhībhāvaṃ rājā na detīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbanti ayamettha adhippāyo. “Idaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1132_7: pana kāraṇaṃ ṭhapetvā rājānañceva brāhmaṇañca na añño koci jānāti. Tadetaṃ evaṃ rahassampi
atk-s0101a0:1132_8: paṭicchannampi addhā sabbaññū samaṇo gotamoti niṭṭhaṃ gamissatī”ti bhagavā pakāsesi.
atk-s0101a0:1133_0: 284. Idāni ayañca ambaṭṭho, ācariyo cassa mante nissāya atimānino. Tena tesaṃ mantanissitamānanimmadanatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1133_1: uttari desanaṃ vaḍḍhento taṃ kiṃ maññasi, ambaṭṭha, idha rājātiādimāha. Tattha rathūpatthareti
atk-s0101a0:1133_2: rathamhi rañño ṭhānatthaṃ attharitvā sajjitapadese. Uggehi vāti uggatuggatehi vā
atk-s0101a0:1133_3: amaccehi. Rājaññehīti anabhisittakumārehi. Kiñcideva mantananti asukasmiṃ dese taḷākaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1133_4: vā mātikaṃ vā kātuṃ vaṭṭati, asukasmiṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā nagaraṃ vā nivesetunti
atk-s0101a0:1133_5: evarūpaṃ pākaṭamantanaṃ. Tadeva mantananti yaṃ raññā mantitaṃ tadeva. Tādisehiyeva
atk-s0101a0:1133_6: sīsukkhepabhamukkhepādīhi ākārehi manteyya. Rājabhaṇitanti yathā raññā bhaṇitaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1133_7: tassatthassa sādhanasamatthaṃ. Sopi tassatthassa sādhanasamatthameva bhaṇitaṃ bhaṇatīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1134_0: 285. Pavattāroti pavattayitāro. Yesanti yesaṃ santakaṃ. Mantapadanti vedasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1134_1: mantameva. Gītanti aṭṭhakādīhi dasahi porāṇakabrāhmaṇehi sarasampattivasena sajjhāyitaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1134_2: Pavuttanti aññesaṃ vuttaṃ, vācitanti attho. Samihitanti samupabyūḷhaṃ rāsikataṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1134_3: piṇḍaṃ katvā ṭhapitanti attho. Tadanugāyantīti etarahi brāhmaṇā taṃ tehi pubbe gītaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1134_4: anugāyanti anusajjhāyanti. Tadanubhāsantīti taṃ anubhāsanti, idaṃ purimasseva vevacanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1134_5: Bhāsitamanubhāsantīti tehi bhāsitaṃ sajjhāyitaṃ anusajjhāyanti. Vācitamanuvācentīti
atk-s0101a0:1135_0: Seyyathidanti te katamehi attho. Aṭṭhakotiādīni tesaṃ nāmāni. Te kira dibbena cakkhunā
atk-s0101a0:1135_1: oloketvā parūpaghātaṃ akatvā kassapasammāsambuddhassa bhagavato pāvacanena saha saṃsanditvā
atk-s0101a0:1135_2: mante ganthiṃsu. Aparāpare pana brāhmaṇā pāṇātipātādīni pakkhipitvā tayo vede bhinditvā
atk-s0101a0:1135_3: buddhavacanena saddhiṃ viruddhe akaṃsu. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti yena tvaṃ isi bhaveyyāsi,
atk-s0101a0:1135_4: etaṃ kāraṇaṃ na vijjati. Idha bhagavā yasmā – “esa pucchiyamānopi, attano avattharaṇabhāvaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1135_5: ñatvā paṭivacanaṃ na dassatī”ti jānāti, tasmā paṭiññaṃ agahetvāva taṃ isibhāvaṃ paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0101a0:1136_0: 286. Idāni yasmā te porāṇā dasa brāhmaṇā nirāmagandhā anitthigandhā rajojalladharā
atk-s0101a0:1136_1: brahmacārino araññāyatane pabbatapādesu vanamūlaphalāhārā vasiṃsu. Yadā katthaci
atk-s0101a0:1136_2: gantukāmā honti, iddhiyā ākāseneva gacchanti, natthi tesaṃ yānena kiccaṃ. Sabbadisāsu
atk-s0101a0:1136_3: ca nesaṃ mettādibrahmavihārabhāvanāva ārakkhā hoti, natthi tesaṃ pākārapurisaguttīhi
atk-s0101a0:1136_4: attho. Iminā ca ambaṭṭhena sutapubbā tesaṃ paṭipatti; tasmā imassa sācariyakassa
atk-s0101a0:1136_5: tesaṃ paṭipattito ārakabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ – “taṃ kiṃ maññasi, ambaṭṭhā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1137_0: Tattha vicitakāḷakanti vicinitvā apanītakāḷakaṃ. Veṭhakanatapassāhīti dussapaṭṭadussaveṇi
atk-s0101a0:1137_1: ādīhi veṭhakehi namitaphāsukāhi. Kuttavālehīti sobhākaraṇatthaṃ kappetuṃ, yuttaṭṭhānesu
atk-s0101a0:1137_2: kappitavālehi. Ettha ca vaḷavānaṃyeva vālā kappitā, na rathānaṃ, vaḷavapayuttattā
atk-s0101a0:1137_3: pana rathāpi “kuttavālā”ti vuttā. Ukkiṇṇaparikhāsūti khataparikhāsu. Okkhittapalighāsūti
atk-s0101a0:1137_4: ṭhapitapalighāsu. Nagarūpakārikāsūti ettha upakārikāti paresaṃ ārohanivāraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1137_5: samantā nagaraṃ pākārassa adhobhāge katasudhākammaṃ vuccati. Idha pana tāhi upakārikāhi
atk-s0101a0:1137_6: yuttāni nagarāneva “nagarūpakārikāyo”ti adhippetāni. Rakkhāpentīti tādisesu nagaresu
atk-s0101a0:1137_7: vasantāpi attānaṃ rakkhāpenti. Kaṅkhāti “sabbaññū, na sabbaññū”ti evaṃ saṃsayo. Vimatīti
atk-s0101a0:1137_8: tasseva vevacanaṃ, virūpā mati, vinicchinituṃ asamatthāti attho. Idaṃ bhagavā “ambaṭṭhassa
atk-s0101a0:1137_9: iminā attabhāvena maggapātubhāvo natthi, kevalaṃ divaso vītivattati, ayaṃ kho pana
atk-s0101a0:1137_10: lakkhaṇapariyesanatthaṃ āgato, tampi kiccaṃ nassarati. Handassa satijananatthaṃ nayaṃ demī”ti āha.
atk-s0101a0:1139_0: 287. Evaṃ vatvā pana yasmā buddhānaṃ nisinnānaṃ vā nipannānaṃ vā koci lakkhaṇaṃ pariyesituṃ
atk-s0101a0:1139_1: na sakkoti, ṭhitānaṃ pana caṅkamantānaṃ vā sakkoti. Āciṇṇañcetaṃ buddhānaṃ lakkhaṇapariyesanatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1139_2: āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā caṅkamādhiṭṭhānaṃ nāma, tena bhagavā uṭṭhāyāsanā bahi
atk-s0101a0:1139_3: nikkhanto. Tasmā atha kho bhagavātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1140_0: Samannesīti gavesi, ekaṃ dveti vā gaṇayanto samānayi. Yebhuyyenāti pāyena, bahukāni
atk-s0101a0:1140_1: addasa, appāni na addasāti attho. Tato yāni na addasa tesaṃ dīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ –
atk-s0101a0:1140_2: “ṭhapetvā dve”ti. Kaṅkhatīti “aho vata passeyya”nti patthanaṃ uppādeti. Vicikicchatīti
atk-s0101a0:1140_3: tato tato tāni vicinanto kicchati na sakkoti daṭṭhuṃ. Nādhimuccatīti tāya vicikicchāya
atk-s0101a0:1140_4: sanniṭṭhānaṃ na gacchati. Na sampasīdatīti tato – “paripuṇṇalakkhaṇo aya”nti bhagavati
atk-s0101a0:1140_5: pasādaṃ nāpajjati. Kaṅkhāya vā dubbalā vimati vuttā, vicikicchāya majjhimā, anadhimuccanatāya
atk-s0101a0:1140_6: balavatī, asampasādena tehi tīhi dhammehi cittassa kālusiyabhāvo. Kosohiteti vatthikosena
atk-s0101a0:1140_7: paṭicchanne. Vatthaguyheti aṅgajāte bhagavato hi varavāraṇasseva kosohitaṃ vatthaguyhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1140_8: suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ padumagabbhasamānaṃ. Taṃ so vatthapaṭicchannattā apassanto, antomukhagatāya
atk-s0101a0:1140_9: ca jivhāya pahūtabhāvaṃ asallakkhento tesu dvīsu lakkhaṇesu kaṅkhī ahosi vicikicchī.
atk-s0101a0:1141_0: 288. Tathārūpanti taṃ rūpaṃ. Kimettha aññena vattabbaṃ? Vuttametaṃ nāgasenatthereneva
atk-s0101a0:1141_1: milindaraññā puṭṭhena – “dukkaraṃ, bhante, nāgasena, bhagavatā katanti. Kiṃ mahārājāti?
atk-s0101a0:1141_2: Mahājanena hirikaraṇokāsaṃ brahmāyu brāhmaṇassa ca antevāsi uttarassa ca, bāvarissa
atk-s0101a0:1141_3: antevāsīnaṃ soḷasabrāhmaṇānañca, selassa brāhmaṇassa ca antevāsīnaṃ tisatamāṇavānañca
atk-s0101a0:1141_4: dassesi, bhanteti. Na, mahārāja, bhagavā guyhaṃ dassesi. Chāyaṃ bhagavā dassesi.
atk-s0101a0:1141_5: Iddhiyā abhisaṅkharitvā nivāsananivatthaṃ kāyabandhanabaddhaṃ cīvarapārutaṃ chāyārūpakamattaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1141_6: dassesi mahārājāti. Chāyaṃ diṭṭhe sati diṭṭhaṃyeva nanu, bhanteti? Tiṭṭhatetaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0101a0:1141_7: hadayarūpaṃ disvā bujjhanakasatto bhaveyya, hadayamaṃsaṃ nīharitvā dasseyya sammāsambuddhoti.
atk-s0101a0:1142_0: Ninnāmetvāti nīharitvā. Anumasīti kathinasūciṃ viya katvā anumajji, tathākaraṇena
atk-s0101a0:1142_1: cettha mudubhāvo, kaṇṇasotānumasanena dīghabhāvo, nāsikasotānumasanena tanubhāvo,
atk-s0101a0:1143: 289. Paṭimānentoti āgamento, āgamanamassa patthento udikkhantoti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1144: 290. Kathāsallāpoti kathā ca sallāpo ca, kathanaṃ paṭikathananti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1145_0: 291. Aho vatāti garahavacanametaṃ. Reti idaṃ hīḷanavasena āmantanaṃ. Paṇḍitakāti
atk-s0101a0:1145_1: tameva jigucchanto āha. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Evarūpena kira bho puriso atthacarakenāti
atk-s0101a0:1145_2: idaṃ yādiso tvaṃ, edise atthacarake hitakārake sati puriso nirayaṃyeva gaccheyya,
atk-s0101a0:1145_3: na aññatrāti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vadati. Āsajja āsajjāti ghaṭṭetvā ghaṭṭetvā. Amhepi
atk-s0101a0:1145_4: evaṃ upaneyya upaneyyāti brāhmaṇo kho pana ambaṭṭha pokkharasātītiādīni vatvā evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1145_5: upanetvā upanetvā paṭicchannaṃ kāraṇaṃ āvikaritvā suṭṭhu dāsādibhāvaṃ āropetvā avaca,
atk-s0101a0:1145_6: tayā amhe akkosāpitāti adhippāyo. Padasāyeva pavattesīti pādena paharitvā bhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1145_7: pātesi. Yañca so pubbe ācariyena saddhiṃ rathaṃ āruhitvā sārathi hutvā agamāsi, tampissa
atk-s0101a0:1145_8: ṭhānaṃ acchinditvā rathassa purato padasā yevassa gamanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1147_0: 292-296. Ativikāloti suṭṭhu vikālo, sammodanīyakathāyapi kālo natthi. Āgamā nu khvidha
atk-s0101a0:1147_1: bhoti āgamā nu kho idha bho. Adhivāsetūti sampaṭicchatu. Ajjatanāyāti yaṃ me tumhesu
atk-s0101a0:1147_2: kāraṃ karoto ajja bhavissati puññañca pītipāmojjañca tadatthāya. Adhivāsesi bhagavā
atk-s0101a0:1147_3: tuṇhībhāvenāti bhagavā kāyaṅgaṃ vā vācaṅgaṃ vā acopetvā abbhantareyeva khantiṃ dhārento
atk-s0101a0:1147_4: tuṇhībhāvena adhivāsesi. Brāhmaṇassa anuggahaṇatthaṃ manasāva sampaṭicchīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1148_0: 297. Paṇītenāti uttamena. Sahatthāti sahatthena. Santappesīti suṭṭhu tappesi paripuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1148_1: suhitaṃ yāvadatthaṃ akāsi. Sampavāresīti suṭṭhu pavāresi, alaṃ alanti hatthasaññāya
atk-s0101a0:1148_2: paṭikkhipāpesi. Bhuttāvinti bhuttavantaṃ. Onītapattapāṇinti pattato onītapāṇiṃ, apanītahatthanti
atk-s0101a0:1148_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Onittapattapāṇintipi pāṭho. Tassattho – onittaṃ nānābhūtaṃ vinābhūtaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1148_4: pattaṃ pāṇito assāti onittapattapāṇi, taṃ onittapattapāṇiṃ. Hatthe ca pattañca dhovitvā
atk-s0101a0:1148_5: ekamante pattaṃ nikkhipitvā nisinnanti attho. Ekamantaṃ nisīdīti bhagavantaṃ evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1148_6: bhūtaṃ ñatvā ekasmiṃ okāse nisīdīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1149_0: 298. Anupubbiṃ kathanti anupaṭipāṭikathaṃ. Ānupubbikathā nāma dānānantaraṃ sīlaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1149_1: sīlānantaraṃ saggo, saggānantaraṃ maggoti etesaṃ atthānaṃ dīpanakathā. Teneva – “seyyathidaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1149_2: dānakatha”ntiādimāha. Okāranti avakāraṃ lāmakabhāvaṃ. Sāmukkaṃsikāti sāmaṃ ukkaṃsikā,
atk-s0101a0:1149_3: attanāyeva uddharitvā gahitā, sayambhūñāṇena diṭṭhā, asādhāraṇā aññesanti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1149_4: Kā pana sāti? Ariyasaccadesanā. Tenevāha – “dukkhaṃ, samudayaṃ, nirodhaṃ, magga”nti.
atk-s0101a0:1149_5: Dhammacakkhunti ettha sotāpattimaggo adhippeto. Tassa uppattiākāradassanatthaṃ –
atk-s0101a0:1149_6: “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti āha. Tañhi nirodhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1149_7: katvā kiccavasena evaṃ sabbasaṅkhataṃ paṭivijjhantaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0101a0:1151_0: 299. Diṭṭho ariyasaccadhammo etenāti diṭṭhadhammo. Esa nayo sesapadesupi. Tiṇṇā vicikicchā
atk-s0101a0:1151_1: anenāti tiṇṇavicikiccho. Vigatā kathaṃkathā assāti vigatakathaṃkatho. Vesārajjappattoti
atk-s0101a0:1151_2: visāradabhāvaṃ patto. Kattha? Satthusāsane. Nāssa paro paccayo, na parassa saddhāya
atk-s0101a0:1151_3: ettha vattatīti aparappaccayo. Sesaṃ sabbattha vuttanayattā uttānatthattā ca pākaṭamevāti.
atk-s0101a0:1153_0: 300. Evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe… aṅgesūti soṇadaṇḍasuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ apubbapadavaṇṇanā. Aṅgesūti
atk-s0101a0:1153_1: aṅgā nāma aṅgapāsādikatāya evaṃ laddhavohārā jānapadino rājakumārā, tesaṃ nivāso
atk-s0101a0:1153_2: ekopi janapado rūḷhisaddena aṅgāti vuccati, tasmiṃ aṅgesu janapade. Cārikanti idhāpi
atk-s0101a0:1153_3: aturitacārikā ceva nibaddhacārikā ca adhippetā. Tadā kira bhagavato dasasahassilokadhātuṃ
atk-s0101a0:1153_4: olokentassa soṇadaṇḍo brāhmaṇo ñāṇajālassa anto paññāyittha. Atha bhagavā ayaṃ brāhmaṇo
atk-s0101a0:1153_5: mayhaṃ ñāṇajāle paññāyati. ‘Atthi nu khvassupanissayo’ti vīmaṃsanto addasa. ‘Mayi
atk-s0101a0:1153_6: tattha gate etassa antevāsino dvādasahākārehi brāhmaṇassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitvā mama santike
atk-s0101a0:1153_7: āgantuṃ na dassanti. So pana tesaṃ vādaṃ bhinditvā ekūnatiṃsa ākārehi mama vaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1153_8: bhāsitvā maṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchissati. So pañhavissajjanapariyosāne saraṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1153_9: gamissatī’ti, disvā pañcasatabhikkhuparivāro taṃ janapadaṃ paṭipanno. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1153_10: – aṅgesu cārikaṃ caramāno…pe… yena campā tadavasarīti.
atk-s0101a0:1154_0: Gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīreti tassa campānagarassa avidūre gaggarāya nāma rājaggamahesiyā
atk-s0101a0:1154_1: khaṇitattā gaggarāti laddhavohārā pokkharaṇī atthi. Tassā tīre samantato nīlādipañcavaṇṇakusumapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1154_2: mahantaṃ campakavanaṃ. Tasmiṃ bhagavā kusumagandhasugandhe campakavane viharati.
atk-s0101a0:1154_3: Taṃ sandhāya gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīreti vuttaṃ. Māgadhena seniyena bimbisārenāti
atk-s0101a0:1154_4: ettha so rājā magadhānaṃ issarattā māgadho. Mahatiyā senāya samannāgatattā seniyo.
atk-s0101a0:1154_5: Bimbīti suvaṇṇaṃ. Tasmā sārasuvaṇṇasadisavaṇṇatāya bimbisāroti vuccati.
atk-s0101a0:1155_0: 301-302. Bahū bahū hutvā saṃhatāti saṅghā. Ekekissāya disāya saṅgho etesaṃ atthīti
atk-s0101a0:1155_1: saṅghī. Pubbe nagarassa anto agaṇā bahi nikkhamitvā gaṇataṃ pattāti gaṇībhūtā. Khattaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1155_2: āmantesīti. Khattā vuccati pucchitapañhe byākaraṇasamattho mahāmatto, taṃ āmantesi
atk-s0101a0:1155_3: āgamentūti muhuttaṃ paṭimānentu, mā gacchantūti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1157_0: 303. Nānāverajjakānanti nānāvidhesu rajjesu, aññesu aññesu kāsikosalādīsu rajjesu
atk-s0101a0:1157_1: jātā, tāni vā tesaṃ nivāsā, tato vā āgatāti nānāverajjakā, tesaṃ nānāverajjakānaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1157_2: Kenacideva karaṇīyenāti tasmiṃ kira nagare dvīhi karaṇīyehi brāhmaṇā sannipatanti
atk-s0101a0:1157_3: – yaññānubhavanatthaṃ vā mantasajjhāyanatthaṃ vā. Tadā ca tasmiṃ nagare yamaññā natthi.
atk-s0101a0:1157_4: Soṇadaṇḍassa pana santike mantasajjhāyanatthaṃ ete sannipatitā. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1157_5: – “kenacideva karaṇīyenā”ti. Te tassa gamanaṃ sutvā cintesuṃ – “ayaṃ soṇadaṇḍo uggatabrāhmaṇo
atk-s0101a0:1157_6: yebhuyyena ca aññe brāhmaṇā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā, ayameva na gato. Svāyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1157_7: sace tattha gamissati, addhā samaṇassa gotamassa āvaṭṭaniyā māyāya āvaṭṭito, taṃ
atk-s0101a0:1157_8: saraṇaṃ gamissati. Tato etassāpi gehadvāre brāhmaṇānaṃ sannipāto na bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1157_9: “Handassa gamanantarāyaṃ karomā”ti sammantayitvā tattha agamaṃsu. Taṃ sandhāya –
atk-s0101a0:1158_0: Tattha imināpaṅgenāti imināpi kāraṇena. Evaṃ etaṃ kāraṇaṃ vatvā puna – “attano vaṇṇe
atk-s0101a0:1158_1: bhaññamāne atussanakasatto nāma natthi. Handassa vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇanena gamanaṃ nivāressāmā”ti
atk-s0101a0:1158_2: cintetvā bhavañhi soṇadaṇḍo ubhato sujātotiādīni kāraṇāni āhaṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1159_0: Ubhatoti dvīhi pakkhehi. Mātito ca pitito cāti bhoto mātā brāhmaṇī, mātumātā brāhmaṇī,
atk-s0101a0:1159_1: tassāpi mātā brāhmaṇī; pitā brāhmaṇo, pitupitā brāhmaṇo, tassāpi pitā brāhmaṇoti,
atk-s0101a0:1159_2: evaṃ bhavaṃ ubhato sujāto mātito ca pitito ca. Saṃsuddhagahaṇikoti saṃsuddhā te mātugahaṇī
atk-s0101a0:1159_3: kucchīti attho. Samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyāti ettha pana kammajatejodhātu “gahaṇī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0101a0:1160_0: Yāva sattamā pitāmahayugāti ettha pitupitā pitāmaho, pitāmahassa yugaṃ pitāmahayugaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1160_1: Yuganti āyuppamāṇaṃ vuccati. Abhilāpamattameva cetaṃ. Atthato pana pitāmahoyeva pitāmahayugaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1160_2: Tato uddhaṃ sabbepi pubbapurisā pitāmahaggahaṇeneva gahitā. Evaṃ yāva sattamo puriso,
atk-s0101a0:1160_3: tāva saṃsuddhagahaṇiko. Atha vā akkhitto anupakuṭṭho jātivādenāti dassenti. Akkhittoti
atk-s0101a0:1160_4: – “apanetha etaṃ, kiṃ iminā”ti evaṃ akkhitto anavakkhitto. Anupakuṭṭhoti na upakuṭṭho,
atk-s0101a0:1160_5: na akkosaṃ vā nindaṃ vā laddhapubbo. Kena kāraṇenāti? Jātivādena. Itipi – “hīnajātiko
atk-s0101a0:1161_0: Aḍḍhoti issaro. Mahaddhanoti mahatā dhanena samannāgato. Bhavato hi gehe pathaviyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1161_1: paṃsuvālikā viya bahudhanaṃ, samaṇo pana gotamo adhano bhikkhāya udaraṃ pūretvā yāpetīti
atk-s0101a0:1161_2: dassenti. Mahābhogoti pañcakāmaguṇavasena mahāupabhogo. Evaṃ yaṃ yaṃ guṇaṃ vadanti,
atk-s0101a0:1161_3: tassa tassa paṭipakkhavasena bhagavato aguṇaṃyeva dassemāti maññamānā vadanti.
atk-s0101a0:1162_0: Abhirūpoti aññehi manussehi abhirūpo adhikarūpo. Dassanīyoti divasampi passantānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1162_1: atittikaraṇato dassanayoggo. Dassaneneva cittapasādajananato pāsādiko. Pokkharatā
atk-s0101a0:1162_2: vuccati sundarabhāvo, vaṇṇassa pokkharatā vaṇṇapokkharatā, tāya vaṇṇasampattiyā yuttoti
atk-s0101a0:1162_3: attho. Porāṇā panāhu – “pokkharanti sarīraṃ vadanti, vaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇamevā”ti. Tesaṃ matena
atk-s0101a0:1162_4: vaṇṇañca pokkharañca vaṇṇapokkharāni. Tesaṃ bhāvo vaṇṇapokkharatā. Iti paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāyāti
atk-s0101a0:1162_5: uttamena parisuddhena vaṇṇena ceva sarīrasaṇṭhānasampattiyā cāti attho. Brahmavaṇṇīti
atk-s0101a0:1162_6: seṭṭhavaṇṇī. Parisuddhavaṇṇesupi seṭṭhena suvaṇṇavaṇṇena samannāgatoti attho. Brahmavacchasīti
atk-s0101a0:1162_7: mahābrahmuno sarīrasadiseneva sarīrena samannāgato. Akhuddāvakāso dassanāyāti “bhoto
atk-s0101a0:1162_8: sarīre dassanassa okāso na khuddako mahā, sabbāneva te aṅgapaccaṅgāni dassanīyāneva,
