atk-s0101a0:1163_0: Sīlamassa atthīti sīlavā. Vuddhaṃ vaddhitaṃ sīlamassāti vuddhasīlī. Vuddhasīlenāti
atk-s0101a0:1163_1: vuddhena vaddhitena sīlena. Samannāgatoti yutto. Idaṃ vuddhasīlīpadasseva vevacanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1164_0: Kalyāṇavācotiādīsu kalyāṇā sundarā parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanā vācā assāti kalyāṇavāco.
atk-s0101a0:1164_1: Kalyāṇaṃ madhuraṃ vākkaraṇaṃ assāti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo. Vākkaraṇanti udāharaṇaghoso.
atk-s0101a0:1164_2: Guṇaparipuṇṇabhāvena pure bhavāti porī. Pure vā bhavattā porī. Poriyā nāgarikitthiyā
atk-s0101a0:1164_3: sukhumālattanena sadisāti porī, tāya poriyā. Vissaṭṭhāyāti apalibuddhāya sandiṭṭhavilambitādidosarahitāya.
atk-s0101a0:1164_4: Anelagalāyāti elagaḷenavirahitāya. Yassa kassaci hi kathentassa elā gaḷanti, lālā
atk-s0101a0:1164_5: vā paggharanti, kheḷaphusitāni vā nikkhamanti, tassa vācā elagaḷaṃ nāma hoti, tabbiparitāyāti
atk-s0101a0:1164_6: attho. Atthassa viññāpaniyāti ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā bhāsitatthassa viññāpanasamatthāya.
atk-s0101a0:1165_0: Jiṇṇoti jarājiṇṇatāya jiṇṇo. Vuddhoti aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ vuddhibhāvamariyādappatto.
atk-s0101a0:1165_1: Mahallakoti jātimahallakatāya samannāgato. Cirakālappasutoti vuttaṃ hoti. Addhagatoti
atk-s0101a0:1165_2: addhānaṃ gato, dve tayo rājaparivaṭṭe atītoti adhippāyo. Vayoanuppattoti pacchimavayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1165_3: sampatto, pacchimavayo nāma vassasatassa pacchimo tatiyabhāgo.
atk-s0101a0:1166_0: Api ca jiṇṇoti porāṇo, cirakālappavattakulanvayoti vuttaṃ hoti. Vuddhoti sīlācārādiguṇavuddhiyā
atk-s0101a0:1166_1: yutto. Mahallakoti vibhavamahantāya samannāgato. Addhagatoti maggappaṭipanno brāhmaṇānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1168_0: 304. Evaṃ vutteti evaṃ tehi brāhmaṇehi vutte. Soṇadaṇḍo – “ime brāhmaṇā jātiādīhi
atk-s0101a0:1168_1: mama vaṇṇaṃ vadanti, na kho pana metaṃ yuttaṃ attano vaṇṇe rajjituṃ. Handāhaṃ etesaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1168_2: vādaṃ bhinditvā samaṇassa gotamassa mahantabhāvaṃ ñāpetvā etesaṃ tattha gamanaṃ karomī”ti
atk-s0101a0:1168_3: cintetvā tena hi – bho mamapi suṇāthātiādimāha. Tattha yepi ubhato sujātoti ādayo
atk-s0101a0:1168_4: attano guṇehi sadisā guṇā tepi; “ko cāhaṃ ke ca samaṇassa gotamassa jātisampattiādayo
atk-s0101a0:1168_5: guṇā”ti attano guṇehi uttaritareyeva maññamāno, itare pana ekanteneva bhagavato mahantabhāvadīpanatthaṃ pakāseti.
atk-s0101a0:1169_0: Mayameva arahāmāti evaṃ niyāmentovettha idaṃ dīpeti – “yadi guṇamahantatāya upasaṅkamitabbo
atk-s0101a0:1169_1: nāma hoti. Yathā hi sineruṃ upanidhāya sāsapo, mahāsamuddaṃ upanidhāya gopadakaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1169_2: sattasu mahāsaresu udakaṃ upanidhāya ussāvabindu paritto lāmako. Evameva samaṇassa
atk-s0101a0:1169_3: gotamassa jātisampattiādayopi guṇe upanidhāya amhākaṃ guṇā parittā lāmakā; tasmā
atk-s0101a0:1169_4: mayameva arahāma taṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamitu”nti.
atk-s0101a0:1170: Mahantaṃ ñātisaṃghaṃ ohāyāti mātipakkhe asītikulasahassāni, pitipakkhe asītikulasahassānīti evaṃ saṭṭhikulasatasahassaṃ ohāya pabbajito.
atk-s0101a0:1171_0: Bhūmigatañca vehāsaṭṭhañcāti ettha rājaṅgaṇe ceva uyyāne ca sudhāmaṭṭhapokkharaṇiyo
atk-s0101a0:1171_1: sattaratanānaṃ pūretvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapitaṃ dhanaṃ bhūmigataṃ nāma. Pāsādaniyūhādayo
atk-s0101a0:1171_2: paripūretvā ṭhapitaṃ vehāsaṭṭhaṃ nāma. Etaṃ tāva kulapariyāyena āgataṃ. Tathāgatassa
atk-s0101a0:1171_3: pana jātadivaseyeva saṅkho, elo, uppalo, puṇḍarīkoti cattāro nidhayo uggatā. Tesu
atk-s0101a0:1171_4: saṅkho gāvutiko, elo aḍḍhayojaniko, uppalo tigāvutiko, puṇḍarīko yojaniko. Tesupi
atk-s0101a0:1171_5: gahitaṃ gahitaṃ pūratiyeva, iti bhagavā pahūtaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ ohāya pabbajitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:1172_0: Daharova samānoti taruṇova samāno. Susukāḷakesoti suṭṭhu kāḷakeso, añjanavaṇṇasadisakeso
atk-s0101a0:1172_1: hutvā vāti attho. Bhadrenāti bhaddakena. Paṭhamena vayasāti tiṇṇaṃ vayānaṃ paṭhamavayena.
atk-s0101a0:1172_2: Akāmakānanti anicchamānānaṃ. Anādaratthe sāmivacanaṃ. Assūni mukhe etesanti assumukhā,
atk-s0101a0:1172_3: tesaṃ assumukhānaṃ, assūhi kilinnamukhānanti attho. Rudantānanti kanditvā rodamānānaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1172_4: Akhuddāvakāsoti ettha bhagavato aparimāṇoyeva dassanāya okāsoti veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:1173_0: Tatridaṃ vatthu – rājagahe kira aññataro brāhmaṇo samaṇassa gotamassa pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ
atk-s0101a0:1173_1: na sakkotīti sutvā bhagavato piṇḍāya pavisanakāle saṭṭhihatthaṃ veḷuṃ gahetvā nagaradvārassa
atk-s0101a0:1173_2: bahi ṭhatvā sampatte bhagavati veḷuṃ gahetvā samīpe aṭṭhāsi. Veḷu bhagavato jāṇukamattaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1173_3: pāpuṇi. Puna divase dve veḷū ghaṭetvā samīpe aṭṭhāsi. Bhagavāpi dvinnaṃ veḷūnaṃ upari
atk-s0101a0:1173_4: kaṭimattameva paññāyamāno – “brāhmaṇa, kiṃ karosī”ti āha. Tumhākaṃ pamāṇaṃ gaṇhāmīti.
atk-s0101a0:1173_5: “Brāhmaṇa, sacepi tvaṃ sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ pūretvā ṭhite veḷū ghaṭetvā āgamissasi,
atk-s0101a0:1173_6: neva me pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ sakkhissasi. Na hi mayā cattāri asaṅkhyeyāni kappasatasahassañca
atk-s0101a0:1173_7: tathā pāramiyo pūritā, yathā me paro pamāṇaṃ gaṇheyya, atulo, brāhmaṇa, tathāgato
atk-s0101a0:1175: Na sakkā puññaṃ saṅkhātuṃ, imettamapi kenacī”ti. ;
atk-s0101a0:1177_0: Aparampi vatthu – rāhu kira asurindo cattāri yojanasahassāni aṭṭha ca yojanasatāni
atk-s0101a0:1177_1: ucco. Bāhantaramassa dvādasayojanasatāni. Bahalantarena cha yojanasatāni. Hatthatalapādatalānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1177_2: puthulato tīṇi yojanasatāni. Aṅgulipabbāni paṇṇāsayojanāni. Bhamukantaraṃ paṇṇāsayojanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1177_3: Mukhaṃ dviyojanasataṃ tiyojanasatagambhīraṃ tiyojanasataparimaṇḍalaṃ. Gīvā tiyojanasataṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1177_4: Nalāṭaṃ tiyojanasataṃ. Sīsaṃ navayojanasataṃ. “So ahaṃ uccosmi, satthāraṃ onamitvā
atk-s0101a0:1177_5: oloketuṃ na sakkhissāmī”ti cintetvā nāgacchi. So ekadivasaṃ bhagavato vaṇṇaṃ sutvā
atk-s0101a0:1178_0: Atha bhagavā tassajjhāsayaṃ viditvā – “catūsu iriyāpathesu katarena dassessāmī”ti
atk-s0101a0:1178_1: cintetvā “ṭhitako nāma nīcopi ucco viya paññāyati. Nipannovassa attānaṃ dassessāmī”ti
atk-s0101a0:1178_2: “ānanda, gandhakuṭipariveṇe mañcakaṃ paññāpehī”ti vatvā tattha sīhaseyyaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0101a0:1178_3: Rāhu āgantvā nipannaṃ bhagavantaṃ gīvaṃ unnāmetvā nabhamajjhe puṇṇacandaṃ viya ullokesi.
atk-s0101a0:1178_4: Kimidaṃ asurindāti ca vutte – “bhagavā onamitvā oloketuṃ na sakkhissāmī”ti nāgacchinti.
atk-s0101a0:1178_5: Na mayā, asurinda, adhomukhena pāramiyo pūritā. Uddhaggameva katvā dānaṃ dinnanti.
atk-s0101a0:1178_6: Taṃ divasaṃ rāhu saraṇaṃ agamāsi. Evaṃ bhagavā akhuddāvakāso dassanāya.
atk-s0101a0:1179_0: Catupārisuddhisīlena sīlavā, taṃ pana sīlaṃ ariyaṃ uttamaṃ parisuddhaṃ. Tenāha –
atk-s0101a0:1179_1: “ariyasīlī”ti. Tadetaṃ anavajjaṭṭhena kusalaṃ. Tenāha – “kusalasīlī”ti. Kusalasīlenāti idamassa vevacanaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1180_0: Bahūnaṃ ācariyapācariyoti bhagavato ekekāya dhammadesanāya caturāsītipāṇasahassāni
atk-s0101a0:1180_1: aparimāṇāpi devamanussā maggaphalāmataṃ pivanti, tasmā bahūnaṃ ācariyo. Sāvakaveneyyānaṃ pana pācariyoti.
atk-s0101a0:1181_0: Khīṇakāmarāgoti ettha kāmaṃ bhagavato sabbepi kilesā khīṇā. Brāhmaṇo pana te na jānāti.
atk-s0101a0:1181_1: Attano jānanaṭṭhāneyeva guṇaṃ katheti. Vigatacāpalloti – “pattamaṇḍanā cīvaramaṇḍanā
atk-s0101a0:1181_2: senāsanamaṇḍanā imassa vā pūtikāyassa…pe… kelanā paṭikelanā”ti evaṃ vuttacāpallā virahito.
atk-s0101a0:1182_0: Apāpapurekkhāroti apāpe nava lokuttaradhamme purato katvā vicarati. Brahmaññāya pajāyāti
atk-s0101a0:1182_1: sāriputtamoggallānamahākassapādibhedāya brāhmaṇapajāya, etissāya ca pajāya purekkhāro.
atk-s0101a0:1182_2: Ayañhi pajā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ purakkhatvā caratīti attho. Api ca apāpapurekkhāroti
atk-s0101a0:1182_3: na pāpaṃ purekkhāro na pāpaṃ purato katvā carati, na pāpaṃ icchatīti attho. Kassa?
atk-s0101a0:1182_4: Brahmaññāya pajāya. Attanā saddhiṃ paṭiviruddhāyapi brāhmaṇapajāya aviruddho hitasukhatthiko yevāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1183_0: Tiroraṭṭhāti pararaṭṭhato. Tirojanapadāti parajanapadato. Pañhaṃ pucchituṃ āgacchantīti
atk-s0101a0:1183_2: pucchissāmā”ti āgacchanti. Tattha keci pucchāya vā dosaṃ vissajjanasampaṭicchane
atk-s0101a0:1183_3: vā asamatthataṃ sallakkhetvā apucchitvāva tuṇhī nisīdanti. Keci pucchanti. Kesañci
atk-s0101a0:1183_4: bhagavā pucchāya ussāhaṃ janetvā vissajjeti. Evaṃ sabbesampi tesaṃ vimatiyo tīraṃ
atk-s0101a0:1183_5: patvā mahāsamuddassa ūmiyo viya bhagavantaṃ patvā bhijjanti.
atk-s0101a0:1184_0: Ehi svāgatavādīti devamanussapabbajitagahaṭṭhesu taṃ taṃ attano santikaṃ āgataṃ –
atk-s0101a0:1184_1: “ehi svāgata”nti evaṃ vadatīti attho. Sakhiloti tattha katamaṃ sākhalyaṃ? “Yā sā
atk-s0101a0:1184_2: vācā nelā kaṇṇasukhā”tiādinā nayena vuttasākhalyena samannāgato, muduvacanoti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1184_3: Sammodakoti paṭisanthārakusalo, āgatāgatānaṃ catunnaṃ parisānaṃ – “kacci, bhikkhave,
atk-s0101a0:1184_4: khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīya”ntiādinā nayena sabbaṃ addhānadarathaṃ vūpasamento viya
atk-s0101a0:1184_5: paṭhamataraṃ sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kattāti attho. Abbhākuṭikoti yathā ekacce parisaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1184_6: patvā thaddhamukhā saṅkuṭitamukhā honti, na ediso, parisadassanena panassa bālātapasamphassena
atk-s0101a0:1184_7: viya padumaṃ mukhapadumaṃ vikasati puṇṇacandasassirikaṃ hoti. Uttānamukhoti yathā
atk-s0101a0:1184_8: ekacce nikujjitamukhā viya sampattāya parisāya na kiñci kathenti, atidullabhakathā
atk-s0101a0:1184_9: honti, na evarūpo. Samaṇo pana gotamo sulabhakatho. Na tassa santikaṃ āgatāgatānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1184_10: – “kasmā mayaṃ idhāgatā”ti vippaṭisāro uppajjati dhammaṃ pana sutvā attamanāva hontīti
atk-s0101a0:1184_11: dasseti. Pubbabhāsīti bhāsanto ca paṭhamataraṃ bhāsati, tañca kho kālayuttaṃ pamāṇayuttaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1185_0: Na tasmiṃ gāme vāti yattha kira bhagavā paṭivasati, tattha mahesakkhā devatā ārakkhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1185_1: gaṇhanti, taṃ nissāya manussānaṃ upaddavo na hoti, paṃsupisācakādayoyeva hi manusse
atk-s0101a0:1185_2: viheṭhenti, te tāsaṃ ānubhāvena dūraṃ apakkamanti. Api ca bhagavato mettābalenapi
atk-s0101a0:1186_0: Saṅghītiādīsu anusāsitabbo sayaṃ vā uppādito saṅgho assa atthīti saṅghī. Tādiso cassa
atk-s0101a0:1186_1: gaṇo atthīti gaṇī. Purimapadasseva vā vevacanametaṃ. Ācārasikkhāpanavasena gaṇassa
atk-s0101a0:1186_2: ācariyoti gaṇācariyo. Puthutitthakarānanti bahūnaṃ titthakarānaṃ. Yathā vā tathā
atk-s0101a0:1186_3: vāti yena vā tena vā acelakādimattakenāpi kāraṇena. Samudāgacchatīti samantato upagacchati abhivaḍḍhati.
atk-s0101a0:1187_0: Atithi no te hontīti te amhākaṃ āgantukā, navakā pāhunakā hontīti attho. Pariyāpuṇāmīti
atk-s0101a0:1187_1: jānāmi. Aparimāṇavaṇṇoti tathārūpeneva sabbaññunāpi appameyyavaṇṇo – “pageva mādisenā”ti
atk-s0101a0:1192_0: 305. Imaṃ pana satthu guṇakathaṃ sutvā te brāhmaṇā cintayiṃsu – yathā soṇadaṇḍo brāhmaṇo
atk-s0101a0:1192_1: samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇe bhaṇati, anomaguṇo so bhavaṃ gotamo; evaṃ tassa guṇe jānamānena
atk-s0101a0:1192_2: kho pana ācariyena aticiraṃ adhivāsitaṃ, handa naṃ anuvattāmāti anuvattiṃsu. Tasmā
atk-s0101a0:1192_3: evaṃ vutte “te brāhmaṇā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha alamevāti yuttameva. Api puṭosenāti
atk-s0101a0:1192_4: puṭosaṃ vuccati pātheyyaṃ, taṃ gahetvāpi upasaṅkamituṃ yuttamevāti attho. Puṭaṃsenātipi
atk-s0101a0:1192_5: pāṭho, tassattho, puṭo aṃse assāti puṭaṃso, tena puṭaṃsena. Aṃsena hi pātheyyapuṭaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1194_1: attho. Añjaliṃ paṇāmetvāti ete ubhatopakkhikā, te evaṃ cintayiṃsu – “sace no micchādiṭṭhikā
atk-s0101a0:1194_2: codessanti – ‘kasmā tumhe samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ vanditthā’ti? Tesaṃ – ‘kiṃ añjalimattakaraṇenāpi
atk-s0101a0:1194_3: vandanaṃ nāma hotī’ti vakkhāma. Sace no sammādiṭṭhikā codessanti – ‘kasmā tumhe bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1194_4: na vanditthā’ti. ‘Kiṃ sīsena bhūmiyaṃ paharanteneva vandanaṃ nāma hoti, nanu añjalikammampi
atk-s0101a0:1194_5: vandanaṃ evā’ti vakkhāmā”ti. Nāmagottanti “bho, gotama, ahaṃ asukassa putto datto
atk-s0101a0:1194_6: nāma, mitto nāma, idhāgato”ti vadantā nāmaṃ sāventi nāma. “Bho, gotama, ahaṃ vāseṭṭho
atk-s0101a0:1194_7: nāma, kaccāno nāma, idhāgato”ti vadantā gottaṃ sāventi nāma. Ete kira daliddā jiṇṇā
atk-s0101a0:1194_8: kulaputtā “parisamajjhe nāmagottavasena pākaṭā bhavissāmā”ti evamakaṃsu. Ye pana
atk-s0101a0:1194_9: tuṇhībhūtā nisīdiṃsu, te kerāṭikā ceva andhabālā ca. Tattha kerāṭikā – “ekaṃ dve
atk-s0101a0:1194_10: kathāsallāpepi karonto vissāsiko hoti, atha vissāse sati ekaṃ dve bhikkhā adātuṃ
atk-s0101a0:1194_11: na yutta”nti tato attānaṃ mocetvā tuṇhī nisīdanti. Andhabālā aññāṇatāyeva avakkhittamattikāpiṇḍo
atk-s0101a0:1196_0: 309-310. Cetasā cetoparivitakkanti bhagavā – “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo āgatakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0101a0:1196_1: adhomukho thaddhagatto kiṃ cintayamāno nisinno, kiṃ nu kho cintetī”ti āvajjanto attano
atk-s0101a0:1196_2: cetasā tassa cittaṃ aññāsi. Tena vuttaṃ – “cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāyā”ti. Vihaññatīti
atk-s0101a0:1196_3: vighātaṃ āpajjati. Anuviloketvā parisanti bhagavato sakasamaye pañhapucchanena udake
atk-s0101a0:1196_4: miyamāno ukkhipitvā thale ṭhapito viya samapassaddhakāyacitto hutvā parisaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1196_5: diṭṭhisañjāneneva “upadhārentu me bhonto vacana”nti vadanto viya anuviloketvā parisaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1197_0: 311-313. Sujaṃ paggaṇhantānanti yaññayajanatthāya sujaṃ gaṇhantesu brāhmaṇesu paṭhamo
atk-s0101a0:1197_1: vā dutiyo vāti attho. Sujāya diyyamānaṃ mahāyāgaṃ paṭiggaṇhantānanti porāṇā. Iti
atk-s0101a0:1197_2: brāhmaṇo sakasamayavasena sammadeva pañhaṃ vissajjesi. Bhagavā pana visesato uttamabrāhmaṇassa
atk-s0101a0:1197_3: dassanatthaṃ – “imesaṃ panā”tiādimāha. Etadavocunti sace jātivaṇṇamantasampanno brāhmaṇo
atk-s0101a0:1197_4: na hoti, atha ko carahi loke brāhmaṇo bhavissati? Nāseti no ayaṃ soṇadaṇḍo, handassa
atk-s0101a0:1197_5: vādaṃ paṭikkhipissāmāti cintetvā etadavocuṃ. Apavadatīti paṭikkhipati. Anupakkhandatīti
atk-s0101a0:1197_6: anupavisati. Idaṃ – “sace tvaṃ pasādavasena samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gantukāmo, gaccha;
atk-s0101a0:1197_7: mā brāhmaṇassa samayaṃ bhindī”ti adhippāyena āhaṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1198_0: 314. Etadavocāti imesu brāhmaṇesu evaṃ ekappahāreneva viravantesu “ayaṃ kathā pariyosānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1198_1: na gamissati, handa ne nissadde katvā soṇadaṇḍeneva saddhiṃ kathemī”ti cintetvā –
atk-s0101a0:1199_0: 315-316. Sahadhammenāti sakāraṇena. Samasamoti ṭhapetvā ekadesasamattaṃ samabhāvena
atk-s0101a0:1199_1: samo, sabbākārena samoti attho. Ahamassa mātāpitaro jānāmīti bhaginiyā puttassa mātāpitaro
atk-s0101a0:1199_2: kiṃ na jānissati, kulakoṭiparidīpanaṃ sandhāyeva vadati. Musāvādampi bhaṇeyyāti atthabhañjanakaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1199_3: musāvādaṃ katheyya. Kiṃ vaṇṇo karissatīti abbhantare guṇe asati kiṃ karissati? Kimassa
atk-s0101a0:1199_4: brāhmaṇabhāvaṃ rakkhituṃ sakkhissatīti attho. Athāpi siyā puna – “pakatisīle ṭhitassa
atk-s0101a0:1199_5: brāhmaṇabhāvaṃ sādhentī”ti evampi sīlameva sādhessati, tasmiṃ hissa asati brāhmaṇabhāvo
atk-s0101a0:1199_6: nāhosīti sammohamattaṃ vaṇṇādayo. Idaṃ pana sutvā te brāhmaṇā – “sabhāvaṃ ācariyo
atk-s0101a0:1199_7: āha, akāraṇāva mayaṃ ujjhāyimhā”ti tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1201_0: 317. Tato bhagavā ‘kathito brāhmaṇena pañho, kiṃ panettha patiṭṭhātuṃ sakkhissati,
atk-s0101a0:1201_1: na sakkhissatī’ti? Tassa vīmaṃsanatthaṃ – “imesaṃ pana brāhmaṇā”tiādimāha. Sīlaparidhotāti
atk-s0101a0:1201_2: sīlaparisuddhā. Yattha sīlaṃ tattha paññāti yasmiṃ puggale sīlaṃ, tattheva paññā,
atk-s0101a0:1201_3: kuto dussīle paññā? Paññārahite vā jaḷe eḷamūge kuto sīlanti? Sīlapaññāṇanti sīlañca
atk-s0101a0:1201_4: paññāṇañca sīlapaññāṇaṃ. Paññāṇanti paññāyeva. Evametaṃ brāhmaṇāti bhagavā brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0101a0:1201_5: vacanaṃ anujānanto āha. Tattha sīlaparidhotā paññāti catupārisuddhisīlena dhotā.
atk-s0101a0:1201_6: Kathaṃ pana sīlena paññaṃ dhovatīti? Yassa puthujjanassa sīlaṃ saṭṭhiasītivassāni
atk-s0101a0:1201_7: akhaṇḍaṃ hoti, so maraṇakālepi sabbakilese ghātetvā sīlena paññaṃ dhovitvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1201_8: gaṇhāti. Kandarasālapariveṇe mahāsaṭṭhivassatthero viya. There kira maraṇamañce nipajjitvā
atk-s0101a0:1201_9: balavavedanāya nitthunante, tissamahārājā “theraṃ passissāmī”ti gantvā pariveṇadvāre
atk-s0101a0:1201_10: ṭhito taṃ saddaṃ sutvā pucchi – “kassa saddo aya”nti? Therassa nitthunanasaddoti.
atk-s0101a0:1201_11: “Pabbajjāya saṭṭhivassena vedanāpariggahamattampi na kataṃ, na dāni naṃ vandissāmī”ti
atk-s0101a0:1201_12: nivattitvā mahābodhiṃ vandituṃ gato. Tato upaṭṭhākadaharo theraṃ āha – “kiṃ no, bhante,
atk-s0101a0:1201_13: lajjāpetha, saddhopi rājā vippaṭisārī hutvā na vandissāmī”ti gatoti. Kasmā āvusoti?
atk-s0101a0:1201_14: Tumhākaṃ nitthunanasaddaṃ sutvāti. “Tena hi me okāsaṃ karothā”ti vatvā vedanaṃ vikkhambhitvā
atk-s0101a0:1201_15: arahattaṃ patvā daharassa saññaṃ adāsi – “gacchāvuso, idāni rājānaṃ amhe vandāpehī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1201_16: Daharo gantvā – “idāni kira theraṃ, vandathā”ti āha. Rājā saṃsumārapatitena theraṃ
atk-s0101a0:1201_17: vandanto – “nāhaṃ ayyassa arahattaṃ vandāmi, puthujjanabhūmiyaṃ pana ṭhatvā rakkhitasīlameva
atk-s0101a0:1201_18: vandāmī”ti āha, evaṃ sīlena paññaṃ dhovati nāma. Yassa pana abbhantare sīlasaṃvaro
atk-s0101a0:1201_19: natthi, ugghāṭitaññutāya pana catuppadikagāthāpariyosāne paññāya sīlaṃ dhovitvā saha
atk-s0101a0:1201_20: paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Ayaṃ paññāya sīlaṃ dhovati nāma. Seyyathāpi santatimahāmatto.
atk-s0101a0:1202_0: 318. Katamaṃ pana taṃ brāhmaṇāti kasmā āha? Bhagavā kira cintesi – “brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇasamaye
atk-s0101a0:1202_1: pañcasīlāni ‘sīla’nti paññāpenti, vedattayauggahaṇapaññā paññāti. Uparivisesaṃ na
atk-s0101a0:1202_2: jānanti. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ brāhmaṇassa uttarivisesabhūtaṃ maggasīlaṃ, phalasīlaṃ, maggapaññaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1202_3: phalapaññañca dassetvā arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhapeyya”nti. Atha naṃ kathetukamyatāya
atk-s0101a0:1202_4: pucchanto – “katamaṃ pana taṃ, brāhmaṇa, sīlaṃ katamā sā paññā”ti āha. Atha brāhmaṇo
atk-s0101a0:1202_5: – “mayā sakasamayavasena pañho vissajjito. Samaṇo pana maṃ gotamo puna nivattitvā
atk-s0101a0:1202_6: pucchati, idānissāhaṃ cittaṃ paritosetvā vissajjituṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ vā na vā? Sace na
atk-s0101a0:1202_7: sakkhissaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppannāpi me lajjā bhijjissati. Asakkontassa pana na sakkomīti
atk-s0101a0:1202_8: vacane doso natthī”ti puna nivattitvā bhagavatoyeva bhāraṃ karonto “ettakaparamāva
atk-s0101a0:1202_9: maya”ntiādimāha. Tattha ettakaparamāti ettakaṃ sīlapaññāṇanti vacanameva paramaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1202_10: amhākaṃ, te mayaṃ ettakaparamā, ito paraṃ etassa bhāsitassa atthaṃ na jānāmāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1203_0: Athassa bhagavā sīlapaññāya mūlabhūtassa tathāgatassa uppādato pabhuti sīlapaññāṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1203_1: dassetuṃ – “idha brāhmaṇa, tathāgato”tiādimāha. Tassattho sāmaññaphale vuttanayeneva
atk-s0101a0:1203_2: veditabbo, ayaṃ pana viseso, idha tividhampi sīlaṃ – “idampissa hoti sīlasmi”nti
atk-s0101a0:1203_3: evaṃ sīlamicceva niyyātitaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīni cattāri jhānāni atthato paññāsampadā.
atk-s0101a0:1203_4: Evaṃ paññāvasena pana aniyyātetvā vipassanāpaññāya padaṭṭhānabhāvamattena dassetvā
atk-s0101a0:1205_0: 319-322. Svātanāyāti padassa attho ajjatanāyāti ettha vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Tena
atk-s0101a0:1205_1: maṃ sā parisā paribhaveyyāti tena tumhe dūratova disvā āsanā vuṭṭhitakāraṇena maṃ
atk-s0101a0:1205_2: sā parisā – “ayaṃ soṇadaṇḍo pacchimavaye ṭhito mahallako, gotamo pana daharo yuvā
atk-s0101a0:1205_3: nattāpissa nappahoti, so nāma attano nattumattabhāvampi appattassa āsanā vuṭṭhātī”ti
atk-s0101a0:1205_4: paribhaveyya. Āsanā me taṃ bhavaṃ gotamo paccuṭṭhānanti mama agāravena avuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1205_5: nāma natthi, bhoganāsanabhayena pana na vuṭṭhahissāmi, taṃ tumhe hi ceva mayā ca
atk-s0101a0:1205_6: ñātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tasmā āsanā me etaṃ bhavaṃ gotamo paccuṭṭhānaṃ dhāretūti, iminā kira
atk-s0101a0:1205_7: sadiso kuhako dullabho, bhagavati panassa agāravaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā bhoganāsanabhayā
atk-s0101a0:1205_8: kuhanavasena evaṃ vadati. Parapadesupi eseva nayo. Dhammiyā kathāyātiādīsu taṅkhaṇānurūpāya
atk-s0101a0:1205_9: dhammiyā kathāya diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ atthaṃ sandassetvā kusale dhamme samādapetvā
atk-s0101a0:1205_10: gaṇhāpetvā. Tattha naṃ samuttejetvā saussāhaṃ katvā tāya ca saussāhatāya aññehi ca
atk-s0101a0:1205_11: vijjamānaguṇehi sampahaṃsetvā dhammaratanavassaṃ vassitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi. Brāhmaṇo
atk-s0101a0:1205_12: pana attano kuhakatāya evampi bhagavati dhammavassaṃ vassite visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ
atk-s0101a0:1205_13: nāsakkhi. Kevalamassa āyatiṃ nibbānatthāya vāsanābhāgiyāya ca sabbā purimapacchimakathā ahosīti.
atk-s0101a0:1207_0: 323. Evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe… magadhesūti kūṭadantasuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ apubbapadavaṇṇanā. Magadhesūti
atk-s0101a0:1207_1: magadhā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā, tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado rūḷhīsaddena magadhāti
atk-s0101a0:1207_2: vuccati, tasmiṃ magadhesu janapade. Ito paraṃ purimasuttadvaye vuttanayameva. Ambalaṭṭhikā
atk-s0101a0:1207_3: brahmajāle vuttasadisāva. Kūṭadantoti tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmaṃ. Upakkhaṭoti sajjito.
atk-s0101a0:1207_4: Vacchatarasatānīti vacchasatāni. Urabbhāti taruṇameṇḍakā vuccanti. Ete tāva pāḷiyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1207_5: āgatāyeva. Pāḷiyaṃ pana anāgatānampi anekesaṃ migapakkhīnaṃ sattasattasatāni sampiṇḍitānevāti
atk-s0101a0:1207_6: veditabbāni. Sabbasattasatikayāgaṃ kiresa yajitukāmo hoti. Thūṇūpanītānīti bandhitvā
atk-s0101a0:1208: 328. Tividhanti ettha vidhā vuccati ṭhapanā, tiṭṭhapananti attho. Soḷasaparikkhāranti soḷasaparivāraṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1209_0: 330-336. Paṭivasantīti yaññānubhavanatthāya paṭivasanti. Bhūtapubbanti idaṃ bhagavā
atk-s0101a0:1209_1: pathavīgataṃ nidhiṃ uddharitvā purato rāsiṃ karonto viya bhavapaṭicchannaṃ pubbacaritaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1209_2: dassento āha. Mahāvijitoti so kira sāgarapariyantaṃ mahantaṃ pathavīmaṇḍalaṃ vijini,
atk-s0101a0:1209_3: iti mahantaṃ vijitamassāti mahāvijito tveva saṅkhyaṃ agamāsi. Aḍḍhotiādīsu yo koci
atk-s0101a0:1209_4: attano santakena vibhavena aḍḍho hoti, ayaṃ pana na kevalaṃ aḍḍhoyeva, mahaddhano
atk-s0101a0:1209_5: mahatā aparimāṇasaṅkhyena dhanena samannāgato. Pañcakāmaguṇavasena mahantā uḷārā
atk-s0101a0:1209_6: bhogā assāti mahābhogo. Piṇḍapiṇḍavasena ceva suvaṇṇamāsakarajatamāsakādivasena ca
atk-s0101a0:1209_8: samannāgatoti attho. Vittīti tuṭṭhi, vittiyā upakaraṇaṃ vittūpakaraṇaṃ tuṭṭhikāraṇanti
atk-s0101a0:1209_11: dhaññassa ca pahūtatāya pahūtadhanadhañño. Athavā idamassa devasikaṃ paribbayadānaggahaṇādivasena
atk-s0101a0:1210_0: Paripuṇṇakosakoṭṭhāgāroti koso vuccati bhaṇḍāgāraṃ, nidahitvā ṭhapitena dhanena paripuṇṇakoso,
atk-s0101a0:1210_1: dhaññena paripuṇṇakoṭṭhāgāro cāti attho. Athavā catubbidho koso – hatthī, assā, rathā,
atk-s0101a0:1210_2: pattīti. Koṭṭhāgāraṃ tividhaṃ – dhanakoṭṭhāgāraṃ, vatthakoṭṭhāgāraṃ, dhaññakoṭṭhāgāranti,
atk-s0101a0:1210_3: taṃ sabbampi paripuṇṇamassāti paripuṇṇakosakoṭṭhāgāro. Udapādīti uppajji. Ayaṃ kira
atk-s0101a0:1210_4: rājā ekadivasaṃ ratanāvalokanacārikaṃ nāma nikkhanto. So bhaṇḍāgārikaṃ pucchi – “tāta,
atk-s0101a0:1210_5: idaṃ evaṃ bahudhanaṃ kena saṅgharita”nti? Tumhākaṃ pitupitāmahādīhi yāva sattamā
atk-s0101a0:1210_6: kulaparivaṭṭāti. Idaṃ pana dhanaṃ saṅgharitvā te kuhiṃ gatāti? Sabbeva te, deva,
atk-s0101a0:1210_7: maraṇavasaṃ pattāti. Attano dhanaṃ agahetvāva gatā, tātāti? Deva, kiṃ vadetha, dhanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1210_8: nāmetaṃ pahāya gamanīyameva, no ādāya gamanīyanti. Atha rājā nivattitvā sirīgabbhe
atk-s0101a0:1210_9: nisinno – ‘adhigatā kho me’tiādīni cintesi. Tena vuttaṃ – “evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1211_0: 337. Brāhmaṇaṃ āmantetvāti kasmā āmantesi? Ayaṃ kirevaṃ cintesi – “dānaṃ dentena
atk-s0101a0:1211_1: nāma ekena paṇḍitena saddhiṃ mantetvā dātuṃ vaṭṭati, anāmantetvā katakammañhi pacchānutāpaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1211_2: karotī”ti. Tasmā āmantesi. Atha brāhmaṇo cintesi – “ayaṃ rājā mahādānaṃ dātukāmo,
atk-s0101a0:1211_3: janapade cassa bahū corā, te avūpasametvā dānaṃ dentassa khīradadhitaṇḍulādike dānasambhāre
atk-s0101a0:1211_4: āharantānaṃ nippurisāni gehāni corā vilumpissanti janapado corabhayeneva kolāhalo
atk-s0101a0:1211_5: bhavissati, tato rañño dānaṃ na ciraṃ pavattissati, cittampissa ekaggaṃ na bhavissati,
atk-s0101a0:1211_6: handa, naṃ etamatthaṃ saññāpemī”ti tato tamatthaṃ saññāpento “bhoto, kho rañño”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1212_0: 338. Tattha sakaṇṭakoti corakaṇṭakehi sakaṇṭako. Panthaduhanāti panthaduhā, panthaghātakāti
atk-s0101a0:1212_1: attho. Akiccakārī assāti akattabbakārī adhammakārī bhaveyya. Dassukhīlanti corakhīlaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1212_2: Vadhena vāti māraṇena vā koṭṭanena vā. Bandhanenāti addubandhanādinā. Jāniyāti hāniyā;
atk-s0101a0:1212_3: “sataṃ gaṇhatha, sahassaṃ gaṇhathā”ti evaṃ pavattitadaṇḍenāti attho. Garahāyāti pañcasikhamuṇḍakaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1212_4: gomayasiñcanaṃ, gīvāya kudaṇḍakabandhananti evamādīni katvā garahapāpanena. Pabbājanāyāti
atk-s0101a0:1212_5: raṭṭhato nīharaṇena. Samūhanissāmīti sammā hetunā nayena kāraṇena ūhanissāmi. Hatāvasesakāti
atk-s0101a0:1212_6: matāvasesakā. Ussahantīti ussāhaṃ karonti. Anuppadetūti dinne appahonte puna aññampi
atk-s0101a0:1212_7: bījañca bhattañca kasiupakaraṇabhaṇḍañca sabbaṃ detūti attho. Pābhataṃ anuppadetūti
atk-s0101a0:1212_8: sakkhiṃ akatvā paṇṇe anāropetvā mūlacchejjavasena bhaṇḍamūlaṃ detūti attho. Bhaṇḍamūlassa
atk-s0101a0:1215_0: Bhattavetananti devasikaṃ bhattañceva māsikādiparibbayañca tassa tassa kusalakammasūrabhāvānurūpena
atk-s0101a0:1215_1: ṭhānantaragāmanigamādidānena saddhiṃ detūti attho. Sakammapasutāti kasivāṇijjādīsu
atk-s0101a0:1215_2: sakesu kammesu uyyuttā byāvaṭā. Rāsikoti dhanadhaññānaṃ rāsiko. Khemaṭṭhitāti khemena
atk-s0101a0:1215_3: ṭhitā abhayā. Akaṇṭakāti corakaṇṭakarahitā. Mudā modamānāti modā modamānā. Ayameva
atk-s0101a0:1215_4: vā pāṭho, aññamaññaṃ pamuditacittāti adhippāyo. Apārutagharāti corānaṃ abhāvena dvārāni
atk-s0101a0:1215_5: asaṃvaritvā vivaṭadvārāti attho. Etadavocāti janapadassa sabbākārena iddhaphītabhāvaṃ ñatvā etaṃ avoca.
atk-s0101a0:1217_0: 339. Tena hi bhavaṃ rājāti brāhmaṇo kira cintesi – “ayaṃ rājā mahādānaṃ dātuṃ ativiya
atk-s0101a0:1217_1: ussāhajāto. Sace pana attano anuyantā khattiyādayo anāmantetvā dassati. Nāssa te
atk-s0101a0:1217_2: attamanā bhavissanti; yathā dānaṃ te attamanā honti, tathā karissāmī”ti. Tasmā “tena
atk-s0101a0:1217_3: hi bhava”ntiādimāha. Tattha negamāti nigamavāsino. Jānapadāti janapadavāsino. Āmantayatanti
atk-s0101a0:1217_4: āmantetu jānāpetu. Yaṃ mama assāti yaṃ tumhākaṃ anujānanaṃ mama bhaveyya. Amaccāti
atk-s0101a0:1217_5: piyasahāyakā. Pārisajjāti sesā āṇattikārakā. Yajataṃ bhavaṃ rājāti yajatu bhavaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1217_6: te kira – ayaṃ rājā “ahaṃ issaro”ti pasayha dānaṃ adatvā amhe āmantesi, ahonena suṭṭhu
atk-s0101a0:1217_7: kata”nti attamanā evamāhaṃsu. Anāmantite panassa yaññaṭṭhānaṃ dassanāyapi na gaccheyyuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1217_8: Yaññakālo mahārājāti deyyadhammasmiñhi asati mahallakakāle ca evarūpaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ
atk-s0101a0:1217_9: na sakkā, tvaṃ pana mahādhano ceva taruṇo ca, etena te yaññakāloti dassentā vadanti.
atk-s0101a0:1217_10: Anumatipakkhāti anumatiyā pakkhā, anumatidāyakāti attho. Parikkhārā bhavantīti parivārā
atk-s0101a0:1217_11: bhavanti. “Ratho sīlaparikkhāro, jhānakkho cakkavīriyo”ti ettha pana alaṅkāro parikkhāroti vutto.
atk-s0101a0:1219_0: 340. Aṭṭhahaṅgehīti ubhato sujātādīhi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi. Yasasāti āṇāṭhapanasamatthatāya.
atk-s0101a0:1219_1: Saddhoti dānassa phalaṃ atthīti saddahati. Dāyakoti dānasūro. Na saddhāmattakeneva
atk-s0101a0:1219_2: tiṭṭhati, pariccajitumpi sakkotīti attho. Dānapatīti yaṃ dānaṃ deti, tassa pati hutvā
atk-s0101a0:1219_3: deti, na dāso, na sahāyo. Yo hi attanā madhuraṃ bhuñjati, paresaṃ amadhuraṃ deti,
atk-s0101a0:1219_4: so dānasaṅkhātassa deyyadhammassa dāso hutvā deti. Yo yaṃ attanā bhuñjati, tadeva
atk-s0101a0:1219_5: deti, so sahāyo hutvā deti. Yo pana attanā yena kenaci yāpeti, paresaṃ madhuraṃ deti,
atk-s0101a0:1219_6: so pati jeṭṭhako sāmī hutvā deti, ayaṃ tādisoti attho. Samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavaṇibbakayācakānanti
atk-s0101a0:1219_7: ettha samitapāpā samaṇā, bāhitapāpā brāhmaṇā. Kapaṇāti duggatā daliddamanussā. Addhikāti
atk-s0101a0:1219_8: pathāvino. Vaṇibbakāti ye – “iṭṭhaṃ dinnaṃ, kantaṃ, manāpaṃ, kālena anavajjaṃ dinnaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1219_9: dadaṃ cittaṃ pasādeyya, gacchatu bhavaṃ brahmaloka”ntiādinā nayena dānassa vaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1219_10: thomayamānā vicaranti. Yācakāti ye – “pasatamattaṃ detha, sarāvamattaṃ dethā”tiādīni
atk-s0101a0:1219_11: vatvā yācamānā vicaranti. Opānabhūtoti udapānabhūto. Sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇaparibhogo,
atk-s0101a0:1219_12: catumahāpathe khatapokkharaṇī viya hutvāti attho. Sutajātassāti ettha sutameva sutajātaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1219_13: Atītānāgatapaccuppanne atthe cintetunti ettha – “atīte puññassa katattāyeva me ayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1219_14: sampattī”ti, evaṃ cintento atītamatthaṃ cintetuṃ paṭibalo nāma hoti. “Idāni puññaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1219_15: katvāva anāgate sakkā sampattiṃ pāpuṇitu”nti cintento anāgatamatthaṃ cintetuṃ paṭibalo
atk-s0101a0:1219_16: nāma hoti. “Idaṃ puññakammaṃ nāma sappurisānaṃ āciṇṇaṃ, mayhañca bhogāpi saṃvijjanti,
atk-s0101a0:1219_17: dāyakacittampi atthi; handāhaṃ puññāni karomī”ti cintento paccuppannamatthaṃ cintetuṃ
atk-s0101a0:1219_18: paṭibalo nāma hotīti veditabbo. Iti imānīti evaṃ yathā vuttāni etāni. Etehi kira
atk-s0101a0:1219_19: aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa dānaṃ sabbadisāhi mahājano upasaṅkamati. “Ayaṃ dujjāto
atk-s0101a0:1219_20: kittakaṃ kālaṃ dassati, idāni vippaṭisārī hutvā upacchindissatī”ti evamādīni cintetvā
atk-s0101a0:1219_21: na koci upasaṅkamitabbaṃ maññati. Tasmā etāni aṭṭhaṅgāni parikkhārā bhavantīti vuttāni.
atk-s0101a0:1221_1: Imehi catūhīti etehi sujātādīhi. Etesu hi asati – “evaṃ dujjātassa saṃvidhānena pavattadānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1221_2: kittakaṃ kālaṃ pavattissatī”tiādīni vatvā upasaṅkamitāro na honti. Garahitabbābhāvato
atk-s0101a0:1221_3: pana upasaṅkamantiyeva. Tasmā imānipi parikkhārā bhavantīti vuttāni.
atk-s0101a0:1222_0: 342. Tisso vidhā desesīti tīṇi ṭhapanāni desesi. So kira cintesi – “dānaṃ dadamānā
atk-s0101a0:1222_1: nāma tiṇṇaṃ ṭhānānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ calanti handāhaṃ imaṃ rājānaṃ tesu ṭhānesu paṭhamataraññeva
atk-s0101a0:1222_2: niccalaṃ karomī”ti. Tenassa tisso vidhā desesīti. So bhoto raññoti idaṃ karaṇatthe
atk-s0101a0:1222_3: sāmivacanaṃ. Bhotā raññāti vā pāṭho. Vippaṭisāro na karaṇīyoti “bhogānaṃ vigamahetuko
atk-s0101a0:1222_4: pacchānutāpo na kattabbo, pubbacetanā pana acalā patiṭṭhapetabbā, evañhi dānaṃ mahapphalaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1222_5: hotī”ti dasseti. Itaresupi dvīsu ṭhānesu eseva nayo. Muñcacetanāpi hi pacchāsamanussaraṇacetanā
atk-s0101a0:1222_6: ca niccalāva kātabbā. Tathā akarontassa dānaṃ na mahapphalaṃ hoti, nāpi uḷāresu bhogesu
atk-s0101a0:1222_7: cittaṃ namati, mahāroruvaṃ upapannassa seṭṭhigahapatino viya.
atk-s0101a0:1223_0: 343. Dasahākārehīti dasahi kāraṇehi. Tassa kira evaṃ ahosi – sacāyaṃ rājā dussīle
atk-s0101a0:1223_1: disvā – “nassati vata me dānaṃ, yassa me evarūpā dussīlā bhuñjantī”ti sīlavantesupi
atk-s0101a0:1223_2: vippaṭisāraṃ uppādessati, dānaṃ na mahapphalaṃ bhavissati. Vippaṭisāro ca nāma dāyakānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1223_3: paṭiggāhakatova uppajjati, handassa paṭhamameva taṃ vippaṭisāraṃ vinodemīti. Tasmā
atk-s0101a0:1223_4: dasahākārehi upacchijjituṃ yuttaṃ paṭiggāhakesupi vippaṭisāraṃ vinodesīti. Tesaññeva
atk-s0101a0:1223_5: tenāti tesaññeva tena pāpena aniṭṭho vipāko bhavissati, na aññesanti dasseti. Yajataṃ
atk-s0101a0:1223_6: bhavanti detu bhavaṃ. Sajjatanti vissajjatu. Antaranti abbhantaraṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1224_0: 344. Soḷasahi ākārehi cittaṃ sandassesīti idha brāhmaṇo rañño mahādānānumodanaṃ nāma
atk-s0101a0:1224_1: āraddho. Tattha sandassesīti – ‘idaṃ dānaṃ dātā evarūpaṃ sampattiṃ labhatī’ti dassetvā
atk-s0101a0:1224_2: dassetvā kathesi. Samādapesīti tadatthaṃ samādapetvā kathesi. Samuttejesīti vippaṭisāravinodanenassa
atk-s0101a0:1224_3: cittaṃ vodāpesi. Sampahaṃsesīti ‘sundaraṃ te kataṃ, mahārāja, dānaṃ dadamānenā’ti
atk-s0101a0:1224_4: thutiṃ katvā kathesi. Vattā dhammato natthīti dhammena samena kāraṇena vattā natthi.
atk-s0101a0:1225_0: 345. Na rukkhā chijjiṃsu yūpatthāya na dabbhā lūyiṃsu barihisatthāyāti ye yūpanāmake
atk-s0101a0:1225_1: mahāthambhe ussāpetvā – “asukarājā asukāmacco asukabrāhmaṇo evarūpaṃ nāma mahāyāgaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1225_2: yajatī”ti nāmaṃ likhitvā ṭhapenti. Yāni ca dabbhatiṇāni lāyitvā vanamālāsaṅkhepena
atk-s0101a0:1225_3: yaññasālaṃ parikkhipanti, bhūmiyaṃ vā pattharanti, tepi na rukkhā chijjiṃsu, na dabbhā
atk-s0101a0:1225_4: lūyiṃsu. Kiṃ pana gāvo vā ajādayo vā haññissantīti dasseti. Dāsāti antogehadāsādayo.
atk-s0101a0:1225_5: Pessāti ye pubbameva dhanaṃ gahetvā kammaṃ karonti. Kammakarāti ye bhattavetanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1225_6: gahetvā karonti. Daṇḍatajjitā nāma daṇḍayaṭṭhimuggarādīni gahetvā – “kammaṃ karotha
atk-s0101a0:1225_7: karothā”ti evaṃ tajjitā. Bhayatajjitā nāma – sace kammaṃ karosi, kusalaṃ. No ce karosi,
atk-s0101a0:1225_8: chindissāma vā bandhissāma vā māressāma vāti evaṃ bhayena tajjitā. Ete pana na daṇḍatajjitā,
atk-s0101a0:1225_9: na bhayatajjitā, na assumukhā rodamānā parikammāni akaṃsu. Atha kho piyasamudācāreneva
atk-s0101a0:1225_10: samudācariyamānā akaṃsu. Na hi tattha dāsaṃ vā dāsāti, pessaṃ vā pessāti, kammakaraṃ
atk-s0101a0:1225_11: vā kammakarāti ālapanti. Yathānāmavaseneva pana piyasamudācārena ālapitvā itthipurisabalavantadubbalānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1225_12: anurūpameva kammaṃ dassetvā – “idañcidañca karothā”ti vadanti. Tepi attano rucivaseneva
atk-s0101a0:1225_13: karonti. Tena vuttaṃ – “ye icchiṃsu, te akaṃsu; ye na icchiṃsu, na te akaṃsu. Yaṃ

atk-s0101a0:1226_0: 346. Pahūtaṃ sāpateyyaṃ ādāyāti bahuṃ dhanaṃ gahetvā. Te kira cintesuṃ – “ayaṃ rājā

atk-s0101a0:1231_0: Tatridaṃ vatthu – anāthapiṇḍikassa kira ghare pañca niccabhattasatāni dīyiṃsu. Dantamayasalākāni

atk-s0101a0:1244_0: Sattarasānisaṃsā vuttā. Tasmā etaṃ salākabhattato mahapphalatarañca mahānisaṃsatarañcāti
atk-s0101a0:1244_1: veditabbaṃ. Saṅghassa pana pariccattattāva yaññoti vuccati. Idampi sutvā brāhmaṇo
atk-s0101a0:1244_2: cintesi – “dhanapariccāgaṃ katvā vihāradānaṃ nāma dukkaraṃ, attano santakā hi kākaṇikāpi

atk-s0101a0:1244_4: pucchāmī”ti. Tato taṃ pucchanto – “atthi pana bho”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1245_0: 350-351. Tattha yasmā sakiṃ pariccattepi vihāre punappunaṃ chādanakhaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇādivasena
atk-s0101a0:1245_1: kiccaṃ atthiyeva, saraṇaṃ pana ekabhikkhussa vā santike saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā sakiṃ
atk-s0101a0:1245_2: gahitaṃ gahitameva hoti, natthi tassa punappunaṃ kattabbatā, tasmā taṃ vihāradānato
atk-s0101a0:1245_3: appaṭṭhatarañca appasamārambhatarañca hoti. Yasmā ca saraṇagamanaṃ nāma tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1245_4: jīvitapariccāgamayaṃ puññakammaṃ saggasampattiṃ deti, tasmā mahapphalatarañca mahānisaṃsatarañcāti

atk-s0101a0:1246_0: 352. Idaṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo cintesi – “attano jīvitaṃ nāma parassa pariccajituṃ dukkaraṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1246_1: atthi nu kho itopi appaṭṭhataro yañño”ti tato taṃ pucchanto puna “atthi pana, bho
atk-s0101a0:1246_2: gotamā”tiādimāha. Tattha pāṇātipātā veramaṇītiādīsu veramaṇī nāma virati. Sā tividhā
atk-s0101a0:1246_3: hoti – sampattavirati, samādānavirati setughātaviratīti. Tattha yo sikkhāpadāni agahetvāpi
atk-s0101a0:1246_4: kevalaṃ attano jātigottakulāpadesādīni anussaritvā – “na me idaṃ patirūpa”nti pāṇātipātādīni
atk-s0101a0:1246_5: na karoti, sampattavatthuṃ pariharati. Tato ārakā viramati. Tassa sā virati sampattaviratīti veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:1247: “Ajjatagge jīvitahetupi pāṇaṃ na hanāmī”ti vā “pāṇātipātā viramāmī”ti vā “veramaṇiṃ samādiyāmī”ti vā evaṃ sikkhāpadāni gaṇhantassa pana virati samādānaviratīti veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:1248_0: Ariyasāvakānaṃ pana maggasampayuttā virati setughātavirati nāma. Tattha purimā dve
atk-s0101a0:1248_1: viratiyo yaṃ voropanādivasena vītikkamitabbaṃ jīvitindriyādivatthu, taṃ ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1248_2: katvā pavattanti. Pacchimā nibbānārammaṇāva. Ettha ca yo pañca sikkhāpadāni ekato
atk-s0101a0:1248_3: gaṇhati, tassa ekasmiṃ bhinne sabbāni bhinnāni honti. Yo ekekaṃ gaṇhati, so yaṃ vītikkamati,
atk-s0101a0:1248_4: tadeva bhijjati. Setughātaviratiyā pana bhedo nāma natthi, bhavantarepi hi ariyasāvako
atk-s0101a0:1248_5: jīvitahetupi neva pāṇaṃ hanati na suraṃ pivati. Sacepissa surañca khīrañca missetvā
atk-s0101a0:1248_6: mukhe pakkhipanti, khīrameva pavisati, na surā. Yathā kiṃ? Koñcasakuṇānaṃ khīramissake
atk-s0101a0:1248_7: udake khīrameva pavisati? Na udakaṃ. Idaṃ yonisiddhanti ce, idaṃ dhammatāsiddhanti
atk-s0101a0:1248_8: ca veditabbaṃ. Yasmā pana saraṇagamane diṭṭhiujukakaraṇaṃ nāma bhāriyaṃ. Sikkhāpadasamādāne
atk-s0101a0:1248_9: pana viratimattakameva. Tasmā etaṃ yathā vā tathā vā gaṇhantassāpi sādhukaṃ gaṇhantassāpi
atk-s0101a0:1248_10: appaṭṭhatarañca appasamārambhatarañca. Pañcasīlasadisassa pana dānassa abhāvato ettha
atk-s0101a0:1249_0: “Pañcimāni, bhikkhave, dānāni mahādānāni aggaññāni rattaññāni vaṃsaññāni porāṇāni
atk-s0101a0:1249_1: asaṃkiṇṇāni asaṃkiṇṇapubbāni na saṅkiyanti na saṅkiyissanti appaṭikuṭṭhāni samaṇehi
atk-s0101a0:1249_2: brāhmaṇehi viññūhi. Katamāni pañca? Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya
atk-s0101a0:1249_3: pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti. Pāṇātipātā paṭivirato, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako aparimāṇānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1249_4: sattānaṃ abhayaṃ deti, averaṃ deti abyāpajjhaṃ deti. Aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ abhayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1249_5: datvā averaṃ datvā abyāpajjhaṃ datvā aparimāṇassa abhayassa averassa abyāpajjhassa
atk-s0101a0:1249_6: bhāgī hoti. Idaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṃ dānaṃ mahādānaṃ…pe… viññūhīti.
atk-s0101a0:1250_0: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako adinnādānaṃ pahāya…pe… kāmesumicchācāraṃ pahāya…pe…
atk-s0101a0:1250_1: musāvādaṃ pahāya…pe… surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya…pe… imāni kho, bhikkhave,
atk-s0101a0:1251_0: Idañca pana sīlapañcakaṃ – “attasinehañca jīvitasinehañca pariccajitvā rakkhissāmī”ti
atk-s0101a0:1251_1: samādinnatāya yaññoti vuccati. Tattha kiñcāpi pañcasīlato saraṇagamanameva jeṭṭhakaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1251_2: idaṃ pana saraṇagamaneyeva patiṭṭhāya rakkhitasīlavasena mahapphalanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1252_0: 353. Idampi sutvā brāhmaṇo cintesi – “pañcasīlaṃ nāma rakkhituṃ garukaṃ, atthi nu
atk-s0101a0:1252_1: kho aññaṃ kiñci īdisameva hutvā ito appaṭṭhatarañca mahapphalatarañcā”ti. Tato taṃ
atk-s0101a0:1252_2: pucchanto punapi – “atthi pana, bho gotamā”tiādimāha. Athassa bhagavā tividhasīlapāripūriyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1252_3: ṭhitassa paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ yaññānaṃ appaṭṭhatarañca mahapphalatarañca dassetukāmo
atk-s0101a0:1252_4: buddhuppādato paṭṭhāya desanaṃ ārabhanto “idha brāhmaṇā”tiādimāha. Tattha yasmā heṭṭhā
atk-s0101a0:1252_5: vuttehi guṇehi samannāgato paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ, paṭhamajjhānādīsu ṭhito dutiyajjhānādīni
atk-s0101a0:1252_6: nibbattento na kilamati, tasmā tāni appaṭṭhāni appasamārambhāni. Yasmā panettha paṭhamajjhānaṃ

atk-s0101a0:1252_9: saṭṭhi, caturāsīti ca kappasahassāni āyuṃ deti; tasmā mahapphalatarañca mahānisaṃsatarañca.
atk-s0101a0:1252_10: Nīvaraṇādīnaṃ pana paccanīkānaṃ dhammānaṃ pariccattattā taṃ yaññanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1253_0: Vipassanāñāṇampi yasmā catutthajjhānapariyosānesu guṇesu patiṭṭhāya nibbattento na
atk-s0101a0:1253_1: kilamati, tasmā appaṭṭhaṃ appasamārambhaṃ; vipassanāsukhasadisassa pana sukhassa
atk-s0101a0:1253_2: abhāvā mahapphalaṃ. Paccanīkakilesapariccāgato yaññoti. Manomayiddhipi yasmā vipassanāñāṇe
atk-s0101a0:1253_3: patiṭṭhāya nibbattento na kilamati, tasmā appaṭṭhā appasamārambhā; attano sadisarūpanimmānasamatthatāya
atk-s0101a0:1253_4: mahapphalā. Attano paccanīkakilesapariccāgato yañño. Iddhividhañāṇādīnipi yasmā manomayañāṇādīsu
atk-s0101a0:1253_5: patiṭṭhāya nibbattento na kilamati, tasmā appaṭṭhāni appasamārambhāni, attano attano
atk-s0101a0:1253_7: Dibbasotaṃ devamanussānaṃ saddasavanasamatthatāya; cetopariyañāṇaṃ paresaṃ soḷasavidhacittajānanasamatthatāya;

atk-s0101a0:1255_0: 354-358. Evaṃ vutteti evaṃ bhagavatā vutte desanāya pasīditvā saraṇaṃ gantukāmo kūṭadanto
atk-s0101a0:1255_1: brāhmaṇo – ‘etaṃ abhikkantaṃ bho, gotamā’tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ avoca. Upavāyatūti upagantvā
atk-s0101a0:1255_2: sarīradarathaṃ nibbāpento tanusītalo vāto vāyatūti. Idañca pana vatvā brāhmaṇo purisaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1255_3: pesesi – “gaccha, tāta, yaññavāṭaṃ pavisitvā sabbe te pāṇayo bandhanā mocehī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1255_4: So “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā tathā katvā āgantvā “muttā bho, te pāṇayo”ti ārocesi. Yāva
atk-s0101a0:1255_5: brāhmaṇo taṃ pavattiṃ na suṇi, na tāva bhagavā dhammaṃ desesi. Kasmā? “Brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0101a0:1255_6: citte ākulabhāvo atthī”ti. Sutvā panassa “bahū vata me pāṇā mocitā”ti cittacāro vippasīdati.
atk-s0101a0:1255_7: Bhagavā tassa vippasannamanataṃ ñatvā dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi. Taṃ sandhāya – “atha
atk-s0101a0:1255_8: kho bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Puna ‘kallacitta’ntiādi ānupubbikathānubhāvena vikkhambhitanīvaraṇataṃ
atk-s0101a0:1258_0: 359. Evaṃ me sutaṃ – ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyanti mahālisuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ apubbapadavaṇṇanā.
atk-s0101a0:1258_1: Vesāliyanti punappunaṃ visālabhāvūpagamanato vesālīti laddhanāmake nagare. Mahāvaneti
atk-s0101a0:1258_2: bahinagare himavantena saddhiṃ ekābaddhaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ sayaṃ jātavanaṃ atthi, yaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1258_3: mahantabhāveneva mahāvananti vuccati, tasmiṃ mahāvane. Kūṭāgārasālāyanti tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe
atk-s0101a0:1258_4: saṅghārāmaṃ patiṭṭhapesuṃ. Tattha kaṇṇikaṃ yojetvā thambhānaṃ upari kūṭāgārasālāsaṅkhepena
atk-s0101a0:1258_5: devavimānasadisaṃ pāsādaṃ akaṃsu, taṃ upādāya sakalopi saṅghārāmo “kūṭāgārasālā”ti
atk-s0101a0:1258_6: paññāyittha. Bhagavā taṃ vesāliṃ upanissāya tasmiṃ saṅghārāme viharati. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1258_8: Māgadhakāti magadharaṭṭhavāsino. Karaṇīyenāti avassaṃ kattabbakammena. Yañhi akātumpi
atk-s0101a0:1258_9: vaṭṭati, taṃ kiccanti vuccati, yaṃ avassaṃ kātabbameva, taṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāma.
atk-s0101a0:1259_0: 360. Paṭisallīno bhagavāti nānārammaṇacārato paṭikkamma sallīno nilīno, ekībhāvaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1259_1: upagamma ekattārammaṇe jhānaratiṃ anubhavatīti attho. Tatthevāti tasmiññeva vihāre.
atk-s0101a0:1259_2: Ekamantanti tasmā ṭhānā apakkamma tāsu tāsu rukkhacchāyāsu nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1261_0: 361. Oṭṭhaddhoti addhoṭṭhatāya evaṃladdhanāmo. Mahatiyā licchavīparisāyāti purebhattaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1261_1: buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ datvā bhagavato santike uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0101a0:1261_2: gandhamālādīni gāhāpetvā ugghosanāya mahatiṃ licchavirājaparisaṃ sannipātāpetvā tāya
atk-s0101a0:1261_4: licchaviparisāya saddhiṃ upasaṅkami. Akālo kho mahālīti tassa oṭṭhaddhassa mahālīti
atk-s0101a0:1261_5: mūlanāmaṃ, tena mūlanāmamattena naṃ thero mahālīti ālapati. Ekamantaṃ nisīdīti patirūpāsu
atk-s0101a0:1261_6: rukkhacchāyāsu tāya licchaviparisāya saddhiṃ ratanattayassa vaṇṇaṃ kathayanto nisīdi.
atk-s0101a0:1262_0: 362. Sīho samaṇuddesoti āyasmato nāgitassa bhāgineyyo sattavassakāle pabbajitvā sāsane
atk-s0101a0:1262_1: yuttapayutto “sīho”ti evaṃnāmako sāmaṇero, so kira taṃ mahāparisaṃ disvā – “ayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1262_2: parisā mahatī, sakalaṃ vihāraṃ pūretvā nisinnā, addhā bhagavā ajja imissā parisāya
atk-s0101a0:1262_3: mahantena ussāhena dhammaṃ desessati, yaṃnūnāhaṃ upajjhāyassācikkhitvā bhagavato
atk-s0101a0:1262_4: mahāparisāya sannipatitabhāvaṃ ārocāpeyya”nti cintetvā yenāyasmā nāgito tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0101a0:1262_5: Bhante kassapāti theraṃ gottena ālapati. Esā janatāti eso janasamūho.
atk-s0101a0:1263_0: Tvaññeva bhagavato ārocehīti sīho kira bhagavato vissāsiko, ayañhi thero thūlasarīro,
atk-s0101a0:1263_1: tenassa sarīragarutāya uṭṭhānanisajjādīsu ālasiyabhāvo īsakaṃ appahīno viya hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1263_2: Athāyaṃ sāmaṇero bhagavato kālena kālaṃ vattaṃ karoti. Tena naṃ thero “tvampi dasabalassa
atk-s0101a0:1263_3: vissāsiko”ti vatvā gaccha tvaññevārocehīti āha. Vihārapacchāyāyanti vihārachāyāyaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1263_4: kūṭāgāramahāgehacchāyāya pharitokāseti attho. Sā kira kūṭāgārasālā dakkhiṇuttarato
atk-s0101a0:1263_5: dīghā pācīnamukhā, tenassā purato mahatī chāyā patthaṭā hoti, sīho tattha bhagavato āsanaṃ paññapesi.
atk-s0101a0:1264_0: 363. Atha kho bhagavā dvārantarehi ceva vātapānantarehi ca nikkhamitvā vidhāvantāhi
atk-s0101a0:1264_1: vippharantīhi chabbaṇṇāhi buddharasmīhi saṃsūcitanikkhamano valāhakantarato puṇṇacando
atk-s0101a0:1264_2: viya kūṭāgārasālato nikkhamitvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdi. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha
atk-s0101a0:1264_3: kho bhagavā vihārā nikkhamma vihārapacchāyāya paññatte āsane nisīdī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1265_0: 364-365. Purimāni, bhante, divasāni purimatarānīti ettha hiyyo divasaṃ purimaṃ nāma,
atk-s0101a0:1265_1: tato paraṃ purimataraṃ. Tato paṭṭhāya pana sabbāni purimāni ceva purimatarāni ca
atk-s0101a0:1265_2: honti. Yadaggeti mūladivasato paṭṭhāya yaṃ divasaṃ aggaṃ parakoṭiṃ katvā viharāmīti
atk-s0101a0:1265_3: attho, yāva vihāsinti vuttaṃ hoti. Idāni tassa parimāṇaṃ dassento “naciraṃ tīṇi vassānī”ti
atk-s0101a0:1265_4: āha. Atha vā yadaggeti yaṃ divasaṃ aggaṃ katvā naciraṃ tīṇi vassāni viharāmītipi
atk-s0101a0:1265_5: attho. Yaṃ divasaṃ ādiṃ katvā naciraṃ vihāsiṃ tīṇiyeva vassānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Ayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1265_6: kira bhagavato pattacīvaraṃ gaṇhanto tīṇi saṃvaccharāni bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhāsi, taṃ
atk-s0101a0:1265_7: sandhāya evaṃ vadati. Piyarūpānīti piyajātikāni sātajātikāni. Kāmūpasaṃhitānīti kāmassādayuttāni.
atk-s0101a0:1265_8: Rajanīyānīti rāgajanakāni. No ca kho dibbāni saddānīti kasmā sunakkhatto tāni na
atk-s0101a0:1265_9: suṇāti? So kira bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dibbacakkhuparikammaṃ yāci, tassa bhagavā
atk-s0101a0:1265_10: ācikkhi, so yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipanno dibbacakkhuṃ uppādetvā devatānaṃ rūpāni disvā
atk-s0101a0:1265_11: cintesi “imasmiṃ sarīrasaṇṭhāne saddena madhurena bhavitabbaṃ, kathaṃ nu kho naṃ
atk-s0101a0:1265_12: suṇeyya”nti bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dibbasotaparikammaṃ pucchi. Ayañca atīte ekaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1265_13: sīlavantaṃ bhikkhuṃ kaṇṇasakkhaliyaṃ paharitvā badhiramakāsi. Tasmā parikammaṃ karontopi
atk-s0101a0:1265_14: abhabbo dibbasotādhigamāya. Tenassa na bhagavā parikammaṃ kathesi. So ettāvatā bhagavati
atk-s0101a0:1265_15: āghātaṃ bandhitvā cintesi – “addhā samaṇassa gotamassa evaṃ hoti – ‘ahampi khattiyo
atk-s0101a0:1265_16: ayampi khattiyo, sacassa ñāṇaṃ vaḍḍhissati, ayampi sabbaññū bhavissatī’ti usūyāya
atk-s0101a0:1265_17: mayhaṃ na kathesī”ti. So anukkamena gihibhāvaṃ patvā tamatthaṃ mahālilicchavino kathento evamāha.
atk-s0101a0:1266_0: 366-371. Ekaṃsabhāvitoti ekaṃsāya ekakoṭṭhāsāya bhāvito, dibbānaṃ vā rūpānaṃ dassanatthāya
atk-s0101a0:1266_1: dibbānaṃ vā saddānaṃ savanatthāya bhāvitoti attho. Tiriyanti anudisāya. Ubhayaṃsabhāvitoti
atk-s0101a0:1266_2: ubhayaṃsāya ubhayakoṭṭhāsāya bhāvitoti attho. Ayaṃ kho mahāli hetūti ayaṃ dibbānaṃyeva
atk-s0101a0:1266_3: rūpānaṃ dassanāya ekaṃsabhāvito samādhi hetu. Imamatthaṃ sutvā so licchavī cintesi
atk-s0101a0:1266_4: – “idaṃ dibbasotena saddasuṇanaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane uttamatthabhūtaṃ maññe imassa nūna
atk-s0101a0:1266_5: atthāya ete bhikkhū paññāsampi saṭṭhipi vassāni apaṇṇakaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caranti,
atk-s0101a0:1267_0: 372. Tato tamatthaṃ pucchanto “etāsaṃ nūna, bhante”tiādimāha. Samādhibhāvanānanti
atk-s0101a0:1267_1: ettha samādhiyeva samādhibhāvanā, ubhayaṃsabhāvitānaṃ samādhīnanti attho. Atha yasmā
atk-s0101a0:1267_2: sāsanato bāhirā etā samādhibhāvanā, na ajjhattikā. Tasmā tā paṭikkhipitvā yadatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1267_3: bhikkhū brahmacariyaṃ caranti, taṃ dassento bhagavā “na kho mahālī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1269_0: 373. Tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānanti sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bandhanānaṃ. Tāni hi vaṭṭadukkhamaye
atk-s0101a0:1269_1: rathe satte saṃyojenti, tasmā saṃyojanānīti vuccanti. Sotāpanno hotīti maggasotaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1269_2: āpanno hoti. Avinipātadhammoti catūsu apāyesu apatanadhammo. Niyatoti dhammaniyāmena
atk-s0101a0:1269_3: niyato. Sambodhiparāyaṇoti uparimaggattayasaṅkhātā sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ assa, anena
atk-s0101a0:1270_0: Tanuttāti pariyuṭṭhānamandatāya ca kadāci karahaci uppattiyā ca tanubhāvā. Orambhāgiyānanti
atk-s0101a0:1270_1: heṭṭhābhāgiyānaṃ, ye hi baddho upari suddhāvāsabhūmiyaṃ nibbattituṃ na sakkoti. Opapātikoti
atk-s0101a0:1270_2: sesayonipaṭikkhepavacanametaṃ. Tattha parinibbāyīti tasmiṃ uparibhaveyeva parinibbānadhammo.
atk-s0101a0:1270_3: Anāvattidhammoti tato brahmalokā puna paṭisandhivasena anāvattanadhammo. Cetovimuttinti
atk-s0101a0:1270_6: veditabbā. Diṭṭheva dhammeti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve. Sayanti sāmaṃ. Abhiññāti abhijānitvā.
atk-s0101a0:1270_7: Sacchikatvāti paccakkhaṃ katvā. Atha vā abhiññā sacchikatvāti abhiññāya abhivisiṭṭhena
atk-s0101a0:1270_8: ñāṇena sacchikaritvātipi attho. Upasampajjāti patvā paṭilabhitvā. Idaṃ sutvā licchavirājā
atk-s0101a0:1270_9: cintesi – “ayaṃ pana dhammo na sakuṇena viya uppatitvā, nāpi godhāya viya urena gantvā
atk-s0101a0:1270_10: sakkā paṭivijjhituṃ, addhā pana imaṃ paṭivijjhantassa pubbabhāgappaṭipadāya bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1272_0: 374-375. Tato bhagavantaṃ pucchanto “atthi pana bhante”tiādimāha. Aṭṭhaṅgikoti pañcaṅgikaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1272_1: turiyaṃ viya aṭṭhaṅgiko gāmo viya ca aṭṭhaṅgamattoyeva hutvā aṭṭhaṅgiko, na aṅgato
atk-s0101a0:1272_2: añño maggo nāma atthi. Tenevāha – “seyyathidaṃ, sammādiṭṭhi…pe… sammāsamādhī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1272_3: Tattha sammādassanalakkhaṇā sammādiṭṭhi. Sammā abhiniropanalakkhaṇo sammāsaṅkappo.
atk-s0101a0:1272_4: Sammā pariggahaṇalakkhaṇā sammāvācā. Sammā samuṭṭhāpanalakkhaṇo sammākammanto. Sammā
atk-s0101a0:1272_5: vodāpanalakkhaṇo sammāājīvo. Sammā paggahalakkhaṇo sammāvāyāmo. Sammā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇā
atk-s0101a0:1272_6: sammāsati. Sammā samādhānalakkhaṇo sammāsamādhi. Etesu ekekassa tīṇi tīṇi kiccāni
atk-s0101a0:1272_7: honti. Seyyathidaṃ, sammādiṭṭhi tāva aññehipi attano paccanīkakilesehi saddhiṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0101a0:1272_8: pajahati, nirodhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, sampayuttadhamme ca passati tappaṭicchādakamohavidhamanavasena
atk-s0101a0:1272_9: asammohato. Sammāsaṅkappādayopi tatheva micchāsaṅkappādīni pajahanti, nirodhañca
atk-s0101a0:1272_10: ārammaṇaṃ karonti, visesato panettha sammāsaṅkappo sahajātadhamme abhiniropeti. Sammāvācā
atk-s0101a0:1272_11: sammā pariggaṇhati. Sammākammanto sammā samuṭṭhāpeti. Sammāājīvo sammā vodāpeti.
atk-s0101a0:1272_12: Sammāvāyāmo sammā paggaṇhati. Sammāsati sammā upaṭṭhāpeti. Sammāsamādhi sammā padahati.
atk-s0101a0:1273_0: Api cesā sammādiṭṭhi nāma pubbabhāge nānākkhaṇā nānārammaṇā hoti, maggakkhaṇe ekakkhaṇā
atk-s0101a0:1273_1: ekārammaṇā. Kiccato pana “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādīni cattāri nāmāni labhati. Sammāsaṅkappādayopi
atk-s0101a0:1273_2: pubbabhāge nānākkhaṇā nānārammaṇā honti. Maggakkhaṇe ekakkhaṇā ekārammaṇā. Tesu sammāsaṅkappo
atk-s0101a0:1273_3: kiccato “nekkhammasaṅkappo”tiādīni tīṇi nāmāni labhati. Sammā vācādayo tisso viratiyopi
atk-s0101a0:1273_4: honti, cetanādayopi honti, maggakkhaṇe pana viratiyeva. Sammāvāyāmo sammāsatīti idampi
atk-s0101a0:1273_5: dvayaṃ kiccato sammappadhānasatipaṭṭhānavasena cattāri nāmāni labhati. Sammāsamādhi
atk-s0101a0:1274_0: Iti imesu aṭṭhasu dhammesu bhagavatā nibbānādhigamāya paṭipannassa yogino bahukārattā
atk-s0101a0:1274_1: paṭhamaṃ sammādiṭṭhi desitā. Ayañhi “paññāpajjoto paññāsattha”nti ca vuttā. Tasmā
atk-s0101a0:1274_2: etāya pubbabhāge vipassanāñāṇasaṅkhātāya sammādiṭṭhiyā avijjandhakāraṃ vidhamitvā
atk-s0101a0:1274_3: kilesacore ghātento khemena yogāvacaro nibbānaṃ pāpuṇāti. Tena vuttaṃ – “nibbānādhigamāya
atk-s0101a0:1274_4: paṭipannassa yogino bahukārattā paṭhamaṃ sammādiṭṭhi desitā”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1275_0: Sammāsaṅkappo pana tassā bahukāro, tasmā tadanantaraṃ vutto. Yathā hi heraññiko hatthena
atk-s0101a0:1275_1: parivaṭṭetvā parivaṭṭetvā cakkhunā kahāpaṇaṃ olokento – “ayaṃ cheko, ayaṃ kūṭo”ti
atk-s0101a0:1275_2: jānāti. Evaṃ yogāvacaropi pubbabhāge vitakkena vitakketvā vipassanāpaññāya olokayamāno
atk-s0101a0:1275_3: – “ime dhammā kāmāvacarā, ime dhammā rūpāvacarādayo”ti pajānāti. Yathā vā pana purisena
atk-s0101a0:1275_4: koṭiyaṃ gahetvā parivaṭṭetvā parivaṭṭetvā dinnaṃ mahārukkhaṃ tacchako vāsiyā tacchetvā
atk-s0101a0:1275_5: kamme upaneti, evaṃ vitakkena vitakketvā vitakketvā dinne dhamme yogāvacaro paññāya
atk-s0101a0:1275_6: – “ime kāmāvacarā, ime rūpāvacarā”tiādinā nayena paricchinditvā kamme upaneti. Tena
atk-s0101a0:1275_7: vuttaṃ – “sammāsaṅkappo pana tassā bahukāro, tasmā tadanantaraṃ vutto”ti. Svāyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1275_8: yathā sammādiṭṭhiyā evaṃ sammāvācāyapi upakārako. Yathāha – “pubbe kho, visākha,
atk-s0101a0:1275_9: vitakketvā vicāretvā pacchā vācaṃ bhindatī”ti, tasmā tadanantaraṃ sammāvācā vuttā.
atk-s0101a0:1276_0: Yasmā pana – “idañcidañca karissāmā”ti paṭhamaṃ vācāya saṃvidahitvā loke kammante
atk-s0101a0:1276_1: payojenti; tasmā vācā kāyakammassa upakārikāti sammāvācāya anantaraṃ sammākammanto
atk-s0101a0:1276_2: vutto. Catubbidhaṃ pana vacīduccaritaṃ, tividhañca kāyaduccaritaṃ pahāya ubhayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1276_3: sucaritaṃ pūrentasseva yasmā ājīvaṭṭhamakaṃ sīlaṃ pūreti, na itarassa, tasmā tadubhayānantaraṃ
atk-s0101a0:1276_4: sammāājīvo vutto. Evaṃ visuddhājīvena pana “parisuddho me ājīvo”ti ettāvatā ca paritosaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1276_5: katvā suttapamattena viharituṃ na yuttaṃ, atha kho “sabbiriyāpathesu idaṃ vīriyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1276_6: samārabhitabba”nti dassetuṃ tadanantaraṃ sammāvāyāmo vutto. Tato “āraddhavīriyenapi
atk-s0101a0:1276_7: kāyādīsu catūsu vatthūsu sati sūpaṭṭhitā kātabbā”ti dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ sammāsati
atk-s0101a0:1276_8: desitā. Yasmā panevaṃ sūpaṭṭhitā sati samādhissupakārānupakārānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo
atk-s0101a0:1276_9: samannesitvā pahoti ekattārammaṇe cittaṃ samādhātuṃ, tasmā sammāsatiyā anantaraṃ
atk-s0101a0:1276_10: sammāsamādhi desitoti veditabbo. Etesaṃ dhammānaṃ sacchikiriyāyāti etesaṃ sotāpattiphalādīnaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1278_0: 376-377. Ekamidāhanti idaṃ kasmā āraddhaṃ? Ayaṃ kira rājā – “rūpaṃ attā”ti evaṃladdhiko,
atk-s0101a0:1278_1: tenassa desanāya cittaṃ nādhimuccati. Atha bhagavatā tassa laddhiyā āvikaraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1278_2: ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ āharituṃ idamāraddhaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – “ahaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ ghositārāme
atk-s0101a0:1278_3: viharāmi, tatra vasantaṃ maṃ te dve pabbajitā evaṃ pucchiṃsu. Athāhaṃ tesaṃ buddhuppādaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1278_4: dassetvā tantidhammaṃ nāma kathento idamavocaṃ – “āvuso, saddhāsampanno nāma kulaputto
atk-s0101a0:1278_5: evarūpassa satthu sāsane pabbajito, evaṃ tividhaṃ sīlaṃ pūretvā paṭhamajjhānādīni
atk-s0101a0:1278_6: patvā ṭhito ‘taṃ jīva’ntiādīni vadeyya, yuttaṃ nu kho etamassā”ti? Tato tehi “yutta”nti
atk-s0101a0:1278_7: vutte “ahaṃ kho panetaṃ, āvuso, evaṃ jānāmi, evaṃ passāmi, atha ca panāhaṃ na vadāmī”ti
atk-s0101a0:1278_8: taṃ vādaṃ paṭikkhipitvā uttari khīṇāsavaṃ dassetvā “imassa evaṃ vattuṃ na yutta”nti
atk-s0101a0:1278_9: avocaṃ. Te mama vacanaṃ sutvā attamanā ahesunti. Evaṃ vutte sopi attamano ahosi.
atk-s0101a0:1278_10: Tenāha – “idamavoca bhagavā. Attamano oṭṭhaddho licchavī bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1281_0: 378. Evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe… kosambiyanti jāliyasuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ apubbapadavaṇṇanā. Ghositārāmeti
atk-s0101a0:1281_1: ghositena seṭṭhinā kate ārāme. Pubbe kira allakapparaṭṭhaṃ nāma ahosi. Tato kotūhaliko
atk-s0101a0:1281_2: nāma daliddo chātakabhayena saputtadāro avantiraṭṭhaṃ gacchanto puttaṃ vahituṃ asakkonto
atk-s0101a0:1281_3: chaḍḍetvā agamāsi, mātā nivattitvā taṃ gahetvā gatā, te ekaṃ gopālakagāmaṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1281_4: Gopālakena ca tadā bahupāyāso paṭiyatto hoti, te tato pāyāsaṃ labhitvā bhuñjiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1281_5: Atha so puriso balavapāyāsaṃ bhutto jīrāpetuṃ asakkonto rattibhāge kālaṃ katvā tattheva
atk-s0101a0:1281_6: sunakhiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā kukkuro jāto, so gopālakassa piyo ahosi.
atk-s0101a0:1281_7: Gopālako ca paccekabuddhaṃ upaṭṭhahati. Paccekabuddhopi bhattakiccapariyosāne kukkurassa
atk-s0101a0:1281_8: ekekaṃ piṇḍaṃ deti, so paccekabuddhe sinehaṃ uppādetvā gopālakena saddhiṃ paṇṇasālampi
atk-s0101a0:1281_9: gacchati. Gopālake asannihite bhattavelāyaṃ sayameva gantvā kālārocanatthaṃ paṇṇasāladvāre
atk-s0101a0:1281_10: bhussati, antarāmaggepi caṇḍamige disvā bhussitvā palāpeti. So paccekabuddhe mudukena
atk-s0101a0:1281_11: cittena kālaṃkatvā devaloke nibbatti. Tatrassa ghosakadevaputto tveva nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0101a0:1281_12: So devalokato cavitvā kosambiyaṃ ekassa kulassa ghare nibbatti. Taṃ aputtako seṭṭhi
atk-s0101a0:1281_13: tassa mātāpitūnaṃ dhanaṃ datvā puttaṃ katvā aggahesi. Atha attano putte jāte sattakkhattuṃ
atk-s0101a0:1281_14: ghātāpetuṃ upakkami. So puññavantatāya sattasupi ṭhānesu maraṇaṃ appatvā avasāne
atk-s0101a0:1281_15: ekāya seṭṭhidhītāya veyyattiyena laddhajīvito aparabhāge pituaccayena seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1281_16: patvā ghosakaseṭṭhi nāma jāto. Aññepi kosambiyaṃ kukkuṭaseṭṭhi, pāvāriyaseṭṭhīti
atk-s0101a0:1281_17: dve seṭṭhino atthi, iminā saddhiṃ tayo ahesuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1282_0: Tena ca samayena himavantato pañcasatatāpasā sarīrasantappanatthaṃ antarantarākosambiṃ
atk-s0101a0:1282_1: āgacchanti, tesaṃ ete tayo seṭṭhī attano attano uyyānesu paṇṇakuṭiyo katvā upaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1282_2: karonti. Athekadivasaṃ te tāpasā himavantato āgacchantā mahākantāre tasitā kilantā
atk-s0101a0:1282_3: ekaṃ mahantaṃ vaṭarukkhaṃ patvā tattha adhivatthāya devatāya santikā saṅgahaṃ paccāsisantā
atk-s0101a0:1282_4: nisīdiṃsu. Devatā sabbālaṅkāravibhūsitaṃ hatthaṃ pasāretvā tesaṃ pānīyapānakādīni
atk-s0101a0:1282_5: datvā kilamathaṃ paṭivinodesi, ete devatāyānubhāvena vimhitā pucchiṃsu – “kiṃ nu
atk-s0101a0:1282_6: kho, devate, kammaṃ katvā tayā ayaṃ sampatti laddhā”ti? Devatā āha – “loke buddho
atk-s0101a0:1282_7: nāma bhagavā uppanno, so etarahi sāvatthiyaṃ viharati, anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati taṃ
atk-s0101a0:1282_8: upaṭṭhahati. So uposathadivasesu attano bhatakānaṃ pakatibhattavetanameva datvā uposathaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1282_9: kārāpesi. Athāhaṃ ekadivasaṃ majjhanhike pātarāsatthāya āgato kañci bhatakakammaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1282_10: akarontaṃ disvā – ‘ajja manussā kasmā kammaṃ na karontī’ti pucchiṃ. Tassa me tamatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1282_11: ārocesuṃ. Athāhaṃ etadavocaṃ – ‘idāni upaḍḍhadivaso gato, sakkā nu kho upaḍḍhuposathaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1282_12: kātu’nti. Tato seṭṭhissa paṭivedetvā “sakkā kātu”nti āha. Svāhaṃ upaḍḍhadivasaṃ upaḍḍhuposathaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1282_13: samādiyitvā tadaheva kālaṃ katvā imaṃ sampattiṃ paṭilabhi”nti.
atk-s0101a0:1283_0: Atha te tāpasā “buddho kira uppanno”ti sañjātapītipāmojjā tatova sāvatthiṃ gantukāmā
atk-s0101a0:1283_1: hutvāpi – “bahukārā no upaṭṭhākaseṭṭhino tesampi imamatthamārocessāmā”ti kosambiṃ
atk-s0101a0:1283_2: gantvā seṭṭhīhi katasakkārabahumānā “tadaheva mayaṃ gacchāmā”ti āhaṃsu. “Kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0101a0:1283_3: turitāttha, nanu tumhe pubbe cattāro pañca māse vasitvā gacchathā”ti ca vutte taṃ
atk-s0101a0:1283_4: pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. “Tena hi, bhante, saheva gacchāmā”ti ca vutte “gacchāma mayaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1283_5: tumhe saṇikaṃ āgacchathā”ti sāvatthiṃ gantvā bhagavato santike pabbajitvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1283_6: pāpuṇiṃsu. Tepi seṭṭhino pañcasatapañcasatasakaṭaparivārā sāvatthiṃ gantvā dānādīni
atk-s0101a0:1283_7: datvā kosambiṃ āgamanatthāya bhagavantaṃ yācitvā paccāgamma tayo vihāre kāresuṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1283_8: Tesu kukkuṭaseṭṭhinā kato kukkuṭārāmo nāma, pāvāriyaseṭṭhinā kato pāvārikambavanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1283_9: nāma, ghositaseṭṭhinā kato ghositārāmo nāma ahosi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “kosambiyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1284_0: Muṇḍiyoti idaṃ tassa nāmaṃ. Jāliyoti idampi itarassa nāmameva. Yasmā panassa upajjhāyo
atk-s0101a0:1284_1: dārumayena pattena piṇḍāya carati, tasmā dārupattikantevāsīti vuccati. Etadavocunti
atk-s0101a0:1284_2: upārambhādhippāyena vādaṃ āropetukāmā hutvā etadavocuṃ. Iti kira nesaṃ ahosi, sace
atk-s0101a0:1284_3: samaṇo gotamo “taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīra”nti vakkhati, athassa mayaṃ etaṃ vādaṃ āropessāma
atk-s0101a0:1284_4: – “bho gotama, tumhākaṃ laddhiyā idheva satto bhijjati, tena vo vādo ucchedavādo
atk-s0101a0:1284_5: hotī”ti. Sace pana “aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīra”nti vakkhati, athassetaṃ vādaṃ āropessāma
atk-s0101a0:1284_6: “tumhākaṃ vāde rūpaṃ bhijjati, na satto bhijjati. Tena vo vāde satto sassato āpajjatī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1284_7: Atha bhagavā “ime vādāropanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchanti, mama sāsane ime dve ante anupagamma
atk-s0101a0:1284_8: majjhimā paṭipadā atthīti na jānanti, handa nesaṃ pañhaṃ avissajjetvā tassāyeva paṭipadāya
atk-s0101a0:1285_0: 379-380. Tattha kallaṃ nu kho tassetaṃ vacanāyāti tassetaṃ saddhāpabbajitassa tividhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1285_1: sīlaṃ paripūretvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ pattassa yuttaṃ nu kho etaṃ vattunti attho. Taṃ
atk-s0101a0:1285_2: sutvā paribbājakā puthujjano nāma yasmā nibbicikiccho na hoti, tasmā kadāci evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1285_3: vadeyyāti maññamānā – “kallaṃ tassetaṃ vacanāyā”ti āhaṃsu. Atha ca panāhaṃ na vadāmīti
atk-s0101a0:1285_4: ahaṃ etamevaṃ jānāmi, no ca evaṃ vadāmi, atha kho kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā bhāventassa
atk-s0101a0:1285_5: paññābalena uppannaṃ mahaggatacittametanti saññaṃ ṭhapesiṃ. Na kallaṃ tassetanti
atk-s0101a0:1285_6: idaṃ te paribbājakā – “yasmā khīṇāsavo vigatasammoho tiṇṇavicikiccho, tasmā na yuttaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1285_7: tassetaṃ vattu”nti maññamānā vadanti. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0101a0:1288_0: 381. Evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe… uruññāyaṃ viharatīti mahāsīhanādasuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ apubbapadavaṇṇanā.
atk-s0101a0:1288_1: Uruññāyanti uruññāti tassa raṭṭhassapi nagarassapi etadeva nāmaṃ, bhagavā uruññānagaraṃ
atk-s0101a0:1288_2: upanissāya viharati. Kaṇṇakatthale migadāyeti tassa nagarassa avidūre kaṇṇakatthalaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1288_3: nāma eko ramaṇīyo bhūmibhāgo atthi. So migānaṃ abhayatthāya dinnattā “migadāyo”ti
atk-s0101a0:1288_4: vuccati, tasmiṃ kaṇṇakatthale migadāye. Aceloti naggaparibbājako. Kassapoti tassa
atk-s0101a0:1288_5: nāmaṃ. Tapassinti tapanissitakaṃ. Lūkhājīvinti acelakamuttācārādivasena lūkho ājīvo
atk-s0101a0:1288_6: assāti lūkhājīvī, taṃ lūkhājīviṃ. Upakkosatīti upaṇḍeti. Upavadatīti hīḷeti vambheti.
atk-s0101a0:1288_7: Dhammassa ca anudhammaṃ byākarontīti bhotā gotamena vuttakāraṇassa anukāraṇaṃ kathenti.
atk-s0101a0:1288_8: Sahadhammiko vādānuvādoti parehi vuttakāraṇena sakāraṇo hutvā tumhākaṃ vādo vā anuvādo
atk-s0101a0:1288_9: vā viññūhi garahitabbaṃ, kāraṇaṃ koci appamattakopi kiṃ na āgacchati. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1288_10: hoti, “kiṃ sabbākārenapi tava vāde gārayhaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthī”ti. Anabbhakkhātukāmāti
atk-s0101a0:1289_1: tapassī “lūkhena jīvitaṃ kappessāmī”ti tiṇagomayādibhakkhanādīhi nānappakārehi attānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1289_2: kilameti, appapuññatāya ca sukhena jīvitavuttimeva na labhati, so tīṇi duccaritāni
atk-s0101a0:1290_0: Aparo tādisaṃ tapanissitopi puññavā hoti, labhati lābhasakkāraṃ. So “na dāni mayā
atk-s0101a0:1290_1: sadiso atthī”ti attānaṃ ucce ṭhāne sambhāvetvā “bhiyyosomattāya lābhaṃ uppādessāmī”ti
atk-s0101a0:1290_2: anesanavasena tīṇi duccaritāni pūretvā niraye nibbattati. Ime dve sandhāya paṭhamanayo vutto.
atk-s0101a0:1291_0: Aparo tapanissitako lūkhājīvī appapuñño hoti, na labhati sukhena jīvitavuttiṃ. So
atk-s0101a0:1291_1: “mayhaṃ pubbepi akatapuññatāya sukhajīvikā nuppajjati, handadāni puññāni karomī”ti
atk-s0101a0:1292_0: Aparo lūkhājīvī puññavā hoti, labhati sukhena jīvitavuttiṃ. So – “mayhaṃ pubbepi
atk-s0101a0:1292_1: katapuññatāya sukhajīvikā uppajjatī”ti cintetvā anesanaṃ pahāya tīṇi sucaritāni pūretvā
atk-s0101a0:1292_2: sagge nibbattati. Ime dve sandhāya dutiyanayo vutto.
atk-s0101a0:1293_0: Eko pana tapassī appadukkhavihārī hoti bāhirakācārayutto tāpaso vā channaparibbājako
atk-s0101a0:1293_1: vā, appapuññatāya ca manāpe paccaye na labhati. So anesanavasena tīṇi duccaritāni
atk-s0101a0:1293_2: pūretvā attānaṃ sukhe ṭhapetvā niraye nibbattati.
atk-s0101a0:1294_0: Aparo puññavā hoti, so – “na dāni mayā sadiso atthī”ti mānaṃ uppādetvā anesanavasena
atk-s0101a0:1294_1: lābhasakkāraṃ vā uppādento micchādiṭṭhivasena – “sukho imissā paribbājikāya daharāya
atk-s0101a0:1294_2: mudukāya lomasāya samphasso”tiādīni cintetvā kāmesu pātabyataṃ vā āpajjanto tīṇi
atk-s0101a0:1294_3: duccaritāni pūretvā niraye nibbattati. Ime dve sandhāya tatiyanayo vutto.
atk-s0101a0:1295: Aparo pana appadukkhavihārī appapuñño hoti, so – “ahaṃ pubbepi akatapuññatāya sukhena jīvikaṃ na labhāmī”ti tīṇi sucaritāni pūretvā sagge nibbattati.
atk-s0101a0:1296_0: Aparo puññavā hoti, so – “pubbepāhaṃ katapuññatāya sukhaṃ labhāmi, idāni puññāni
atk-s0101a0:1296_1: karissāmī”ti tīṇi sucaritāni pūretvā sagge nibbattati. Ime dve sandhāya catutthanayo
atk-s0101a0:1296_2: vutto. Idaṃ titthiyavasena āgataṃ, sāsanepi pana labbhati.
atk-s0101a0:1297_0: Ekacco hi dhutaṅgasamādānavasena lūkhājīvī hoti, appapuññatāya vā sakalampi gāmaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1297_1: vicaritvā udarapūraṃ na labhati. So – “paccaye uppādessāmī”ti vejjakammādivasena
atk-s0101a0:1297_2: vā anesanaṃ katvā, arahattaṃ vā paṭijānitvā, tīṇi vā kuhanavatthūni paṭisevitvā niraye nibbattati.
atk-s0101a0:1298: Aparo ca tādisova puññavā hoti. So tāya puññasampattiyā mānaṃ janayitvā uppannaṃ lābhaṃ thāvaraṃ kattukāmo anesanavasena tīṇi duccaritāni pūretvā niraye uppajjati.
atk-s0101a0:1299_0: Aparo samādinnadhutaṅgo appapuññova hoti, na labhati sukhena jīvitavuttiṃ. So – “pubbepāhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1299_1: akatapuññatāya kiñci na labhāmi, sace idāni anesanaṃ karissaṃ, āyatimpi dullabhasukho
atk-s0101a0:1299_2: bhavissāmī”ti tīṇi sucaritāni pūretvā arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkonto sagge nibbattati.
atk-s0101a0:1300: Aparo puññavā hoti, so – “pubbepāhaṃ katapuññatāya etarahi sukhito, idānipi puññaṃ karissāmī”ti anesanaṃ pahāya tīṇi sucaritāni pūretvā arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkonto sagge nibbattati.
atk-s0101a0:1301_0: 383. Āgatiñcāti – “asukaṭṭhānato nāma ime āgatā”ti evaṃ āgatiñca. Gatiñcāti idāni
atk-s0101a0:1301_1: gantabbaṭṭhānañca. Cutiñcāti tato cavanañca. Upapattiñcāti tato cutānaṃ puna upapattiñca.
atk-s0101a0:1301_2: Kiṃ sabbaṃ tapaṃ garahissāmīti – “kena kāraṇena garahissāmi, garahitabbameva hi mayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1301_3: garahāma, pasaṃsitabbaṃ pasaṃsāma, na bhaṇḍikaṃ karonto mahārajako viya dhotañca
atk-s0101a0:1301_4: adhotañca ekato karomā”ti dasseti. Idāni tamatthaṃ pakāsento – “santi kassapa eke
atk-s0101a0:1302_0: 384. Yaṃ te ekaccanti pañcavidhaṃ sīlaṃ, tañhi loke na koci “na sādhū”ti vadati.
atk-s0101a0:1302_1: Puna yaṃ te ekaccanti pañcavidhaṃ veraṃ, taṃ na koci “sādhū”ti vadati. Puna yaṃ te
atk-s0101a0:1302_2: ekaccanti pañcadvāre asaṃvaraṃ, te kira – “cakkhu nāma na nirundhitabbaṃ, cakkhunā
atk-s0101a0:1302_3: manāpaṃ rūpaṃ daṭṭhabba”nti vadanti, esa nayo sotādīsu. Puna yaṃ te ekaccanti pañcadvāre saṃvaraṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1303_0: Evaṃ paresaṃ vādena saha attano vādassa samānāsamānataṃ dassetvā idāni attano vādena
atk-s0101a0:1303_1: saha paresaṃ vādassa samānāsamānataṃ dassento “yaṃ maya”ntiādimāha. Tatrāpi pañcasīlādivaseneva attho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:1305_0: 385. Samanuyuñjantanti samanuyuñjantu, ettha ca laddhiṃ pucchanto samanuyuñjati nāma,
atk-s0101a0:1305_1: kāraṇaṃ pucchanto samanugāhati nāma, ubhayaṃ pucchanto samanubhāsati nāma. Satthārā
atk-s0101a0:1305_2: vā satthāranti satthārā vā saddhiṃ satthāraṃ upasaṃharitvā – “kiṃ te satthā te dhamme
atk-s0101a0:1305_3: sabbaso pahāya vattati, udāhu samaṇo gotamo”ti. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0101a0:1306_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ yojetvā dassento – “ye imesaṃ bhavata”ntiādimāha. Tattha akusalā
atk-s0101a0:1306_1: akusalasaṅkhātāti akusalā ceva “akusalā”ti ca saṅkhātā ñātā koṭṭhāsaṃ vā katvā ṭhapitāti
atk-s0101a0:1306_2: attho. Esa nayo sabbapadesu. Api cettha sāvajjāti sadosā. Na alamariyāti niddosaṭṭhena
atk-s0101a0:1307_0: 386-392. Yaṃ viññū samanuyuñjantāti yena viññū amhe ca aññe ca pucchantā evaṃ vadeyyuṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1307_1: taṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati, atthi taṃ kāraṇanti attho. Yaṃ vā pana bhonto pare gaṇācariyāti
atk-s0101a0:1307_2: pare pana bhonto gaṇācariyā yaṃ vā taṃ vā appamattakaṃ pahāya vattantīti attho. Amheva
atk-s0101a0:1307_3: tattha yebhuyyena pasaṃseyyunti idaṃ bhagavā satthārā satthāraṃ samanuyuñjanepi āha
atk-s0101a0:1307_4: – saṅghena saṃghaṃ samanuyuñjanepi. Kasmā? Saṅghapasaṃsāyapi satthuyeva pasaṃsāsiddhito.
atk-s0101a0:1307_5: Pasīdamānāpi hi buddhasampattiyā saṅghe, saṅghasampattiyā ca buddhe pasīdanti, tathā
atk-s0101a0:1307_6: hi bhagavato sarīrasampattiṃ disvā, dhammadesanaṃ vā sutvā bhavanti vattāro – “lābhā
atk-s0101a0:1307_7: vata bho sāvakānaṃ ye evarūpassa satthu santikāvacarā”ti, evaṃ buddhasampattiyā saṅghe
atk-s0101a0:1307_8: pasīdanti. Bhikkhūnaṃ panācāragocaraṃ abhikkamapaṭikkamādīni ca disvā bhavanti vattāro
atk-s0101a0:1307_9: – “santikāvacarānaṃ vata bho sāvakānaṃ ayañca upasamaguṇo satthu kīva rūpo bhavissatī”ti,
atk-s0101a0:1307_10: evaṃ saṅghasampattiyā buddhe pasīdanti. Iti yā satthupasaṃsā, sā saṅghassa. Yā saṅghassa
atk-s0101a0:1307_11: pasaṃsā, sā satthūti saṅghapasaṃsāyapi satthuyeva pasaṃsāsiddhito bhagavā dvīsupi
atk-s0101a0:1307_12: nayesu – “amheva tattha yebhuyyena pasaṃseyyu”nti āha. Samaṇo gotamo ime dhamme anavasesaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1307_13: pahāya vattati, yaṃ vā pana bhonto pare gaṇācariyātiādīsupi panettha ayamadhippāyo
atk-s0101a0:1307_14: – sampattasamādānasetughātavasena hi tisso viratiyo. Tāsu sampattasamādāna viratimattameva
atk-s0101a0:1307_15: aññesaṃ hoti, setughātavirati pana sabbena sabbaṃ natthi. Pañcasu pana tadaṅgavikkhambhanasamucchedapaṭipassaddhinissaraṇappahānesu
atk-s0101a0:1307_17: aññesaṃ hoti. Itarāni tīṇi pahānāni sabbena sabbaṃ natthi. Tathā sīlasaṃvaro, khantisaṃvaro,
atk-s0101a0:1307_18: ñāṇasaṃvaro, satisaṃvaro, vīriyasaṃvaroti pañca saṃvarā, tesu pañcasīlamattameva
atk-s0101a0:1307_19: adhivāsanakhantimattameva ca aññesaṃ hoti, sesaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ natthi.
atk-s0101a0:1308_0: Pañca kho panime uposathuddesā, tesu pañcasīlamattameva aññesaṃ hoti. Pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1308_1: sabbena sabbaṃ natthi. Iti akusalappahāne ca kusalasamādāne ca, tīsu viratīsu, pañcasu
atk-s0101a0:1308_2: pahānesu, pañcasu saṃvaresu, pañcasu uddesesu, – “ahameva ca mayhañca sāvakasaṅgho
atk-s0101a0:1308_3: loke paññāyati, mayā hi sadiso satthā nāma, mayhaṃ sāvakasaṅghena sadiso saṅgho nāma
atk-s0101a0:1310_0: 393. Evaṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā tassa sīhanādassa aviparītabhāvāvabodhanatthaṃ – “atthi,
atk-s0101a0:1310_1: kassapa, maggo”tiādimāha. Tattha maggoti lokuttaramaggo. Paṭipadāti pubbabhāgapaṭipadā.
atk-s0101a0:1310_2: Kālavādītiādīni brahmajāle vaṇṇitāni. Idāni taṃ duvidhaṃ maggañca paṭipadañca ekato
atk-s0101a0:1310_3: katvā dassento – “ayameva ariyo”tiādimāha. Idaṃ pana sutvā acelo cintesi – “samaṇo
atk-s0101a0:1310_4: gotamo mayhaṃyeva maggo ca paṭipadā ca atthi, aññesaṃ natthīti maññati, handassāhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1310_5: amhākampi maggaṃ kathemī”ti. Tato acelakapaṭipadaṃ kathesi. Tenāha – “evaṃ vutte
atk-s0101a0:1310_6: acelo kassapo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca…pe… udakorohanānuyogamanuyutto viharatī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1312_0: 394. Tattha tapopakkamāti tapārambhā, tapakammānīti attho. Sāmaññasaṅkhātāti samaṇakammasaṅkhātā.
atk-s0101a0:1312_1: Brahmaññasaṅkhātāti brāhmaṇakammasaṅkhātā. Acelakoti niccolo, naggoti attho. Muttācāroti
atk-s0101a0:1312_2: visaṭṭhācāro, uccārakammādīsu lokiyakulaputtācārena virahito ṭhitakova uccāraṃ karoti,
atk-s0101a0:1312_3: passāvaṃ karoti, khādati, bhuñjati ca. Hatthāpalekhanoti hatthe piṇḍamhi ṭhite jivhāya
atk-s0101a0:1312_4: hatthaṃ apalikhati, uccāraṃ vā katvā hatthasmiññeva daṇḍakasaññī hutvā hatthena apalikhati.
atk-s0101a0:1312_5: “Bhikkhāgahaṇatthaṃ ehi, bhante”ti vutto na etīti na ehibhaddantiko. “Tena hi tiṭṭha,
atk-s0101a0:1312_6: bhante”ti vuttopi na tiṭṭhatīti natiṭṭhabhaddantiko. Tadubhayampi kira so – “etassa
atk-s0101a0:1312_7: vacanaṃ kataṃ bhavissatī”ti na karoti. Abhihaṭanti puretaraṃ gahetvā āhaṭaṃ bhikkhaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1312_8: uddissakatanti “imaṃ tumhe uddissa kata”nti evaṃ ārocitaṃ bhikkhaṃ. Na nimantananti
atk-s0101a0:1312_9: “asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ vā vīthiṃ vā gāmaṃ vā paviseyyāthā”ti evaṃ nimantitabhikkhampi
atk-s0101a0:1312_10: na sādiyati, na gaṇhati. Na kumbhimukhāti kumbhito uddharitvā diyyamānaṃ bhikkhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1312_11: na gaṇhati. Na kaḷopimukhāti kaḷopīti ukkhali vā pacchi vā, tatopi na gaṇhati. Kasmā?
atk-s0101a0:1312_12: Kumbhikaḷopiyo maṃ nissāya kaṭacchunā pahāraṃ labhantīti. Na eḷakamantaranti ummāraṃ
atk-s0101a0:1312_13: antaraṃ katvā diyyamānaṃ na gaṇhati. Kasmā? “Ayaṃ maṃ nissāya antarakaraṇaṃ labhatī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1313_0: Dvinnanti dvīsu bhuñjamānesu ekasmiṃ uṭṭhāya dente na gaṇhati. Kasmā? “Ekassa kabaḷantarāyo
atk-s0101a0:1313_1: hotī”ti. Na gabbhiniyātiādīsu pana “gabbhiniyā kucchiyaṃ dārako kilamati. Pāyantiyā
atk-s0101a0:1313_2: dārakassa khīrantarāyo hoti, purisantaragatāya ratiantarāyo hotī”ti na gaṇhati. Saṃkittīsūti
atk-s0101a0:1313_3: saṃkittetvā katabhattesu, dubbhikkhasamaye kira acelakasāvakā acelakānaṃ atthāya
atk-s0101a0:1313_4: tato tato taṇḍulādīni samādapetvā bhattaṃ pacanti. Ukkaṭṭho acelako tatopi na paṭiggaṇhati.
atk-s0101a0:1313_5: Na yattha sāti yattha sunakho – “piṇḍaṃ labhissāmī”ti upaṭṭhito hoti, tattha tassa
atk-s0101a0:1313_6: adatvā āhaṭaṃ na gaṇhati. Kasmā? Etassa piṇḍantarāyo hotīti. Saṇḍasaṇḍacārinīti samūhasamūhacārinī,
atk-s0101a0:1313_7: sace hi acelakaṃ disvā – “imassa bhikkhaṃ dassāmā”ti manussā bhattagehaṃ pavisanti,
atk-s0101a0:1313_8: tesu ca pavisantesu kaḷopimukhādīsu nilīnā makkhikā uppatitvā saṇḍasaṇḍā caranti,
atk-s0101a0:1313_9: tato āhaṭaṃ bhikkhaṃ na gaṇhati. Kasmā? Maṃ nissāya makkhikānaṃ gocarantarāyo jātoti.
atk-s0101a0:1314_0: Thusodakanti sabbasassasambhārehi kataṃ sovīrakaṃ. Ettha ca surāpānameva sāvajjaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1314_1: ayaṃ pana sabbesupi sāvajjasaññī. Ekāgārikoti yo ekasmiṃyeva gehe bhikkhaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0101a0:1314_2: nivattati. Ekālopikoti yo ekeneva ālopena yāpeti. Dvāgārikādīsupi eseva nayo. Ekissāpi
atk-s0101a0:1314_3: dattiyāti ekāya dattiyā. Datti nāma ekā khuddakapāti hoti, yattha aggabhikkhaṃ pakkhipitvā
atk-s0101a0:1314_4: ṭhapenti. Ekāhikanti ekadivasantarikaṃ. Addhamāsikanti addhamāsantarikaṃ. Pariyāyabhattabhojananti
atk-s0101a0:1314_5: vārabhattabhojanaṃ, ekāhavārena dvīhavārena sattāhavārena aḍḍhamāsavārenāti evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1315_1: nīvāro nāma araññe sayaṃjātā vīhijāti. Daddulanti cammakārehi cammaṃ likhitvā chaḍḍitakasaṭaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1315_2: Haṭaṃ vuccati silesopi sevālopi. Kaṇanti kuṇḍakaṃ. Ācāmoti bhattaukkhalikāya laggo
atk-s0101a0:1315_3: jhāmakaodano, taṃ chaḍḍitaṭṭhānatova gahetvā khādati, “odanakañjiya”ntipi vadanti.
atk-s0101a0:1316_0: 396. Sāṇānīti sāṇavākacoḷāni. Masāṇānīti missakacoḷāni. Chavadussānīti matasarīrato
atk-s0101a0:1316_1: chaḍḍitavatthāni, erakatiṇādīni vā ganthetvā katanivāsanāni. Paṃsukūlānīti pathaviyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1316_2: chaḍḍitanantakāni. Tirīṭānīti rukkhatacavatthāni. Ajinanti ajinamigacammaṃ. Ajinakkhipanti
atk-s0101a0:1316_3: tadeva majjhe phālitakaṃ. Kusacīranti kusatiṇāni ganthetvā katacīraṃ. Vākacīraphalakacīresupi
atk-s0101a0:1316_4: eseva nayo. Kesakambalanti manussakesehi katakambalaṃ. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0101a0:1317_0: “Seyyathāpi bhikkhave, yāni kānici tantāvutāni vatthāni, kesakambalo tesaṃ paṭikiṭṭho
atk-s0101a0:1317_1: akkhāyati. Kesakambalo, bhikkhave, sīte sīto, uṇhe uṇho appaggho ca dubbaṇṇo ca duggandho dukkhasamphasso”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1318_0: Vāḷakambalanti assavālehi katakambalaṃ. Ulūkapakkhikanti ulūkapakkhāni ganthetvā
atk-s0101a0:1318_2: ukkuṭikova hutvā uppatitvā uppatitvā gacchati. Kaṇṭakāpassayikoti ayakaṇṭake vā pakatikaṇṭake
atk-s0101a0:1318_3: vā bhūmiyaṃ koṭṭetvā tattha cammaṃ attharitvā ṭhānacaṅkamādīni karoti. Seyyanti sayantopi
atk-s0101a0:1318_4: tattheva seyyaṃ kappeti. Phalakaseyyanti rukkhaphalake seyyaṃ. Thaṇḍilaseyyanti thaṇḍile
atk-s0101a0:1318_5: ucce bhūmiṭhāne seyyaṃ. Ekapassayikoti ekapasseneva sayati. Rajojalladharoti sarīraṃ
atk-s0101a0:1318_6: telena makkhitvā rajuṭṭhānaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati, athassa sarīre rajojallaṃ laggati, taṃ
atk-s0101a0:1318_7: dhāreti. Yathāsanthatikoti laddhaṃ āsanaṃ akopetvā yadeva labhati, tattheva nisīdanasīlo.
atk-s0101a0:1318_8: Vekaṭikoti vikaṭakhādanasīlo. Vikaṭanti gūthaṃ vuccati. Apānakoti paṭikkhittasītudakapāno.
atk-s0101a0:1318_9: Sāyaṃ tatiyamassāti sāyatatiyakaṃ. Pāto, majjhanhike, sāyanti divasassa tikkhattuṃ
atk-s0101a0:1320_0: 397. Atha bhagavā sīlasampadādīhi vinā tesaṃ tapopakkamānaṃ niratthakataṃ dassento
atk-s0101a0:1320_1: – “acelako cepi kassapa hotī”tiādimāha. Tattha ārakā vāti dūreyeva. Averanti dosaveravirahitaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1321_0: 398. Dukkaraṃ, bho gotamāti idaṃ kassapo “mayaṃ pubbe ettakamattaṃ sāmaññañca brahmaññañcāti
atk-s0101a0:1321_1: vicarāma, tumhe pana aññaṃyeva sāmaññañca brahmaññañca vadathā”ti dīpento āha. Pakati
atk-s0101a0:1321_2: kho esāti pakatikathā esā. Imāya ca, kassapa, mattāyāti “kassapa yadi iminā pamāṇena
atk-s0101a0:1321_3: evaṃ parittakena paṭipattikkamena sāmaññaṃ vā brahmaññaṃ vā dukkaraṃ sudukkaraṃ nāma
atk-s0101a0:1321_4: abhavissa, tato netaṃ abhavissa kallaṃ vacanāya dukkaraṃ sāmañña”nti ayamettha padasambandhena
atk-s0101a0:1321_5: saddhiṃ attho. Etena nayena sabbattha padasambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a0:1322_0: 399. Dujjānoti idampi so “mayaṃ pubbe ettakena samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā hotīti vicarāma,
atk-s0101a0:1322_1: tumhe pana aññathā vadathā”ti idaṃ sandhāyāha. Athassa bhagavā taṃ pakativādaṃ paṭikkhipitvā
atk-s0101a0:1322_2: sabhāvatova dujjānabhāvaṃ āvikaronto punapi – “pakati kho”tiādimāha. Tatrāpi vuttanayeneva
atk-s0101a0:1324_0: 400-401. Katamā pana sā, bho gotamāti kasmā pucchati. Ayaṃ kira paṇḍito bhagavato
atk-s0101a0:1324_1: kathentasseva kathaṃ uggahesi, atha attano paṭipattiyā niratthakataṃ viditvā samaṇo
atk-s0101a0:1324_2: gotamo – “tassa ‘cāyaṃ sīlasampadā, cittasampadā, paññāsampadā abhāvitā hoti asacchikatā,
atk-s0101a0:1324_3: atha kho so ārakāva sāmaññā’tiādimāha. Handa dāni naṃ tā sampattiyo pucchāmī”ti sīlasampadādivijānanatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1324_4: pucchati. Athassa bhagavā buddhuppādaṃ dassetvā tantidhammaṃ kathento tā sampattiyo
atk-s0101a0:1324_5: dassetuṃ – “idha kassapā”tiādimāha. Imāya ca kassapa sīlasampadāyāti idaṃ arahattaphalameva
atk-s0101a0:1324_6: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Arahattaphalapariyosānañhi bhagavato sāsanaṃ. Tasmā arahattaphalasampayuttāhi
atk-s0101a0:1324_7: sīlacittapaññāsampadāhi aññā uttaritarā vā paṇītatarā vā sīlādisampadā natthīti āha.
atk-s0101a0:1326_0: 402. Evañca pana vatvā idāni anuttaraṃ mahāsīhanādaṃ nadanto – “santi kassapa eke
atk-s0101a0:1326_1: samaṇabrāhmaṇā”tiādimāha. Tattha ariyanti nirupakkilesaṃ paramavisuddhaṃ. Paramanti
atk-s0101a0:1326_2: uttamaṃ, pañcasīlāni hiādiṃ katvā yāva pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlā sīlameva, lokuttaramaggaphalasampayuttaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1326_3: pana paramasīlaṃ nāma. Nāhaṃ tatthāti tattha sīlepi paramasīlepi ahaṃ attano samasamaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1326_4: mama sīlasamena sīlena mayā samaṃ puggalaṃ na passāmīti attho. Ahameva tattha bhiyyoti
atk-s0101a0:1326_5: ahameva tasmiṃ sīle uttamo. Katamasmiṃ? Yadidaṃ adhisīlanti yaṃ etaṃ uttamaṃ sīlanti
atk-s0101a0:1326_6: attho. Iti imaṃ paṭhamaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadati.
atk-s0101a0:1327_0: Tapojigucchavādāti ye tapojigucchaṃ vadanti. Tattha tapatīti tapo, kilesasantāpakavīriyassetaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1327_1: nāmaṃ, tadeva te kilese jigucchatīti jigucchā. Ariyā paramāti ettha niddosattā ariyā,
atk-s0101a0:1327_3: maggaphalasampayuttā paramā nāma. Adhijegucchanti idha jigucchabhāvo jegucchaṃ, uttamaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1327_4: jegucchaṃ adhijegucchaṃ, tasmā yadidaṃ adhijegucchaṃ, tattha ahameva bhiyyoti evamettha
atk-s0101a0:1327_5: attho daṭṭhabbo. Paññādhikārepi kammassakatāpaññā ca vipassanāpaññā ca paññā nāma,
atk-s0101a0:1327_6: maggaphalasampayuttā paramā paññā nāma. Adhipaññanti ettha liṅgavipallāso veditabbo,
atk-s0101a0:1327_7: ayaṃ panetthattho – yāyaṃ adhipaññā nāma ahameva tattha bhiyyoti vimuttādhikāre tadaṅgavikkhambhanavimuttiyo
atk-s0101a0:1327_8: vimutti nāma, samucchedapaṭipassaddhinissaraṇavimuttiyo pana paramā vimuttīti veditabbā.
atk-s0101a0:1327_9: Idhāpi ca yadidaṃ adhivimuttīti yā ayaṃ adhivimutti, ahameva tattha bhiyyoti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1328: 403. Suññāgāreti suññe ghare, ekakova nisīditvāti adhippāyo. Parisāsu cāti aṭṭhasu parisāsu. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0101a0:1329: “Cattārimāni, sāriputta, tathāgatassa vesārajjāni. Yehi vesārajjehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti, parisāsu sīhanādaṃ nadatī”ti suttaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1330_0: Pañhañca naṃ pucchantīti paṇḍitā devamanussā naṃ pañhaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā pucchanti.
atk-s0101a0:1330_1: Byākarotīti taṅkhaṇaññeva vissajjesi. Cittaṃ ārādhetīti pañhāvissajjanena mahājanassa
atk-s0101a0:1330_2: cittaṃ paritosetiyeva. No ca kho sotabbaṃ maññantīti cittaṃ ārādhetvā kathentassapissa
atk-s0101a0:1330_3: vacanaṃ pare sotabbaṃ na maññantīti, evañca vadeyyunti attho. Sotabbañcassa maññantīti
atk-s0101a0:1330_4: devāpi manussāpi mahanteneva ussāhena sotabbaṃ maññanti. Pasīdantīti supasannā kallacittā
atk-s0101a0:1330_5: muducittā honti. Pasannākāraṃ karontīti na muddhappasannāva honti, paṇītāni cīvarādīni
atk-s0101a0:1330_6: veḷuvanavihārādayo ca mahāvihāre pariccajantā pasannākāraṃ karonti. Tathattāyāti
atk-s0101a0:1330_7: yaṃ so dhammaṃ deseti tathā bhāvāya, dhammānudhammapaṭipattipūraṇatthāya paṭipajjantīti
atk-s0101a0:1330_8: attho. Tathattāya ca paṭipajjantīti tathabhāvāya paṭipajjanti, tassa hi bhagavato
atk-s0101a0:1330_9: dhammaṃ sutvā keci saraṇesu keci pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhahanti, apare nikkhamitvā
