atk-s0101a0:1330_10: pabbajanti. Paṭipannā ca ārādhentīti tañca pana paṭipadaṃ paṭipannā pūretuṃ sakkonti,
atk-s0101a0:1330_11: sabbākārena pana pūrenti, paṭipattipūraṇena tassa bhoto gotamassa cittaṃ ārādhentīti vattabbā.
atk-s0101a0:1331_0: Imasmiṃ panokāse ṭhatvā sīhanādā samodhānetabbā. Ekaccaṃ tapassiṃ niraye nibbattaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1331_1: passāmīti hi bhagavato eko sīhanādo. Aparaṃ sagge nibbattaṃ passāmīti eko. Akusaladhammappahāne
atk-s0101a0:1331_2: ahameva seṭṭhoti eko. Kusaladhammasamādānepi ahameva seṭṭhoti eko. Akusaladhammappahāne
atk-s0101a0:1331_3: mayhameva sāvakasaṅgho seṭṭhoti eko. Kusaladhammasamādānepi mayhaṃyeva sāvakasaṅgho
atk-s0101a0:1331_4: seṭṭhoti eko. Sīlena mayhaṃ sadiso natthīti eko. Vīriyena mayhaṃ sadiso natthīti
atk-s0101a0:1331_5: eko. Paññāya…pe… vimuttiyā…pe… sīhanādaṃ nadanto parisamajjhe nisīditvā nadāmīti
atk-s0101a0:1331_6: eko. Visārado hutvā nadāmīti eko. Pañhaṃ maṃ pucchantīti eko. Pañhaṃ puṭṭho vissajjemīti
atk-s0101a0:1331_7: eko. Vissajjanena parassa cittaṃ ārādhemīti eko. Sutvā sotabbaṃ maññantīti eko. Sutvā
atk-s0101a0:1331_8: me pasīdantīti eko. Pasannākāraṃ karontīti eko. Yaṃ paṭipattiṃ desemi, tathattāya
atk-s0101a0:1331_9: paṭipajjantīti eko. Paṭipannā ca maṃ ārādhentīti eko. Iti purimānaṃ dasannaṃ ekekassa
atk-s0101a0:1331_10: – “parisāsu ca nadatī”ti ādayo dasa dasa parivārā. Evaṃ te dasa purimānaṃ dasannaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1331_11: parivāravasena sataṃ purimā ca dasāti dasādhikaṃ sīhanādasataṃ hoti. Ito aññasmiṃ
atk-s0101a0:1331_12: pana sutte ettakā sīhanādā dullabhā, tenidaṃ suttaṃ mahāsīhanādanti vuccati. Iti
atk-s0101a0:1331_13: bhagavā “sīhanādaṃ kho samaṇo gotamo nadati, tañca kho suññāgāre nadatī”ti evaṃ vādānu
atk-s0101a0:1331_14: vādaṃ paṭisedhetvā idāni parisati naditapubbaṃ sīhanādaṃ dassento “ekamidāha”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1333_0: 404. Tattha tatra maṃ aññataro tapabrahmacārīti tatra rājagahe gijjhakūṭe pabbate
atk-s0101a0:1333_1: viharantaṃ maṃ aññataro tapabrahmacārī nigrodho nāma paribbājako. Adhijeguccheti
atk-s0101a0:1333_2: vīriyena pāpajigucchanādhikāre pañhaṃ pucchi. Idaṃ yaṃ taṃ bhagavā gijjhakūṭe mahāvihāre
atk-s0101a0:1333_3: nisinno udumbarikāya deviyā uyyāne nisinnassa nigrodhassa ca paribbājakassa sandhānassa
atk-s0101a0:1333_4: ca upāsakassa dibbāya sotadhātuyā kathāsallāpaṃ sutvā ākāsenāgantvā tesaṃ santike
atk-s0101a0:1333_5: paññatte āsane nisīditvā nigrodhena adhijegucche puṭṭhapañhaṃ vissajjesi, taṃ sandhāya
atk-s0101a0:1333_6: vuttaṃ. Paraṃ viya mattāyāti paramāya mattāya, atimahanteneva pamāṇenāti attho. Ko
atk-s0101a0:1333_7: hi, bhanteti ṭhapetvā andhabālaṃ diṭṭhigatikaṃ añño paṇḍitajātiko “ko nāma bhagavato
atk-s0101a0:1333_8: dhammaṃ sutvā na attamano assā”ti vadati. Labheyyāhanti idaṃ so – “ciraṃ vata me
atk-s0101a0:1333_9: aniyyānikapakkhe yojetvā attā kilamito, ‘sukkhanadītīre nhāyissāmī’ti samparivattentena
atk-s0101a0:1333_10: viya thuse koṭṭentena viya na koci attho nipphādito. Handāhaṃ attānaṃ yoge yojessāmī”ti
atk-s0101a0:1333_11: cintetvā āha. Atha bhagavā yo anena khandhake titthiyaparivāso paññatto, yo aññatitthiyapubbo
atk-s0101a0:1333_12: sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhito – “ahaṃ bhante, itthannāmo aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye
atk-s0101a0:1333_13: ākaṅkhāmi upasampadaṃ, svāhaṃ, bhante, saṃghaṃ cattāro māse parivāsaṃ yācāmī”tiādinā
atk-s0101a0:1333_14: nayena samādiyitvā parivasati, taṃ sandhāya – “yo kho, kassapa, aññatitthiyapubbo”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1334_0: 405. Tattha pabbajjanti vacanasiliṭṭhatāvaseneva vuttaṃ, aparivasitvāyeva hi pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1334_1: labhati. Upasampadatthikena pana nātikālena gāmappavesanādīni aṭṭha vattāni pūrentena
atk-s0101a0:1334_2: parivasitabbaṃ. Āraddhacittāti aṭṭhavattapūraṇena tuṭṭhacittā, ayamettha saṅkhepattho.
atk-s0101a0:1334_3: Vitthārato panesa titthiyaparivāso samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pabbajjakhandhakavaṇṇanāya
atk-s0101a0:1334_4: vuttanayena veditabbo. Api ca metthāti api ca me ettha. Puggalavemattatā viditāti
atk-s0101a0:1334_5: puggalanānattaṃ viditaṃ. “Ayaṃ puggalo parivāsāraho, ayaṃ na parivāsāraho”ti idaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1334_6: mayhaṃ pākaṭanti dasseti. Tato kassapo cintesi – “aho acchariyaṃ buddhasāsanaṃ, yattha
atk-s0101a0:1334_7: evaṃ ghaṃsitvā koṭṭetvā yuttameva gaṇhanti, ayuttaṃ chaḍḍentī”ti, tato suṭṭhutaraṃ
atk-s0101a0:1335_0: Atha kho bhagavā tassa tibbacchandataṃ viditvā – “na kassapo parivāsaṃ arahatī”ti
atk-s0101a0:1335_1: aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi – “gaccha bhikkhu kassapaṃ nhāpetvā pabbājetvā ānehī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1335_2: So tathā katvā taṃ pabbājetvā bhagavato santikaṃ āgamāsi. Bhagavā taṃ gaṇamajjhe
atk-s0101a0:1335_3: nisīdāpetvā upasampādesi. Tena vuttaṃ – “alattha kho acelo kassapo bhagavato santike
atk-s0101a0:1335_4: pabbajjaṃ, alattha upasampada”nti. Acirūpasampannoti upasampanno hutvā nacirameva.
atk-s0101a0:1335_5: Vūpakaṭṭhoti vatthukāmakilesakāmehi kāyena ceva cittena ca vūpakaṭṭho. Appamattoti
atk-s0101a0:1335_6: kammaṭṭhāne satiṃ avijahanto. Ātāpīti kāyikacetasikasaṅkhātena vīriyātāpena ātāpī.
atk-s0101a0:1335_7: Pahitattoti kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya pesitacitto vissaṭṭhaattabhāvo. Yassatthāyāti
atk-s0101a0:1335_8: yassa atthāya. Kulaputtāti ācārakulaputtā. Sammadevāti hetunāva kāraṇeneva. Tadanuttaranti
atk-s0101a0:1335_9: taṃ anuttaraṃ. Brahmacariyapariyosānanti maggabrahmacariyassa pariyosānabhūtaṃ arahattaphalaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1335_10: Tassa hi atthāya kulaputtā pabbajanti. Diṭṭheva dhammeti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve. Sayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1335_11: abhiññā sacchikatvāti attanāyeva paññāya paccakkhaṃ katvā, aparappaccayaṃ katvāti
atk-s0101a0:1335_12: attho. Upasampajja vihāsīti pāpuṇitvā sampādetvā vihāsi, evaṃ viharanto ca khīṇā
atk-s0101a0:1336_0: Evamassa paccavekkhaṇabhūmiṃ dassetvā arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpetuṃ “aññataro
atk-s0101a0:1336_1: kho panāyasmā kassapo arahataṃ ahosī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha aññataroti eko. Arahatanti
atk-s0101a0:1336_2: arahantānaṃ, bhagavato sāvakānaṃ arahantānaṃ abbhantaro ahosīti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0101a0:1336_3: Yaṃ yaṃ pana antarantarā na vuttaṃ, taṃ taṃ tattha tattha vuttattā pākaṭamevāti.
atk-s0101a0:1339_0: 406. Evaṃ me suttaṃ…pe… sāvatthiyanti poṭṭhapādasuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ apubbapadavaṇṇanā.
atk-s0101a0:1339_1: Sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmeti sāvatthiṃ upanissāya yo jetassa
atk-s0101a0:1339_2: kumārassa vane anāthapiṇḍikena gahapatinā ārāmo kārito, tattha viharati. Poṭṭhapādo
atk-s0101a0:1339_3: paribbājakoti nāmena poṭṭhapādo nāma channaparibbājako. So kira gihikāle brāhmaṇamahāsālo
atk-s0101a0:1339_4: kāmesuādīnavaṃ disvā cattālīsakoṭiparimāṇaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā titthiyānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1339_5: gaṇācariyo jāto. Samayaṃ pavadanti etthāti samayappavādako, tasmiṃ kira ṭhāne caṅkītārukkhapokkharasātippabhutayo
atk-s0101a0:1339_6: brāhmaṇā nigaṇṭhaacelakaparibbājakādayo ca pabbajitā sannipatitvā attano attano samayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1339_7: vadanti kathenti dīpenti, tasmā so ārāmo samayappavādakoti vuccati. Sveva ca tindukācīrasaṅkhātāya
atk-s0101a0:1339_8: timbarūrukkhapantiyā parikkhittattā tindukācīro. Yasmā panettha paṭhamaṃ ekāva sālā
atk-s0101a0:1339_9: ahosi, pacchā mahāpuññaṃ paribbājakaṃ nissāya bahū sālā katā. Tasmā tameva ekaṃ sālaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1339_10: upādāya laddhanāmavasena ekasālakoti vuccati. Mallikāya pana pasenadirañño deviyā
atk-s0101a0:1339_11: uyyānabhūto so pupphaphalasampanno ārāmoti katvā mallikāya ārāmoti saṅkhyaṃ gato.
atk-s0101a0:1339_12: Tasmiṃ samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake mallikāya ārāme.
atk-s0101a0:1340_0: Paṭivasatīti nivāsaphāsutāya vasati. Athekadivasaṃ bhagavā paccūsasamaye sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1340_1: pattharitvā lokaṃ pariggaṇhanto ñāṇajālassa antogataṃ paribbājakaṃ disvā – “ayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1340_2: poṭṭhapādo mayhaṃ ñāṇajāle paññāyati, kinnu kho bhavissatī”ti upaparikkhanto addasa
atk-s0101a0:1340_3: – “ahaṃ ajja tattha gamissāmi, atha maṃ poṭṭhapādo nirodhañca nirodhavuṭṭhānañca
atk-s0101a0:1340_4: pucchissati, tassāhaṃ sabbabuddhānaṃ ñāṇena saṃsanditvā tadubhayaṃ kathessāmi, atha
atk-s0101a0:1340_5: so katipāhaccayena cittaṃ hatthisāriputtaṃ gahetvā mama santikaṃ āgamissati, tesamahaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1340_6: dhammaṃ desessāmi, desanāvasāne poṭṭhapādo maṃ saraṇaṃ gamissati, citto hatthisāriputto
atk-s0101a0:1340_7: mama santike pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti. Tato pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1340_8: katvā surattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā vijjulatāsadisaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā yugandharapabbataṃ
atk-s0101a0:1340_9: parikkhipitvā ṭhitamahāmeghaṃ viya meghavaṇṇaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ ekaṃsavaragataṃ katvā paccagghaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1340_10: selamayapattaṃ vāmaaṃsakūṭe laggetvā sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pavisissāmīti sīho viya himavantapādā
atk-s0101a0:1340_11: vihārā nikkhami. Imamatthaṃ sandhāya – “atha kho bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1341_0: 407. Etadahosīti nagaradvārasamīpaṃ gantvā attano rucivasena sūriyaṃ oloketvā atippagabhāvameva
atk-s0101a0:1341_1: disvā etaṃ ahosi. Yaṃnūnāhanti saṃsayaparidīpano viya nipāto, buddhānañca saṃsayo
atk-s0101a0:1341_2: nāma natthi – “idaṃ karissāma, idaṃ na karissāma, imassa dhammaṃ desessāma, imassa
atk-s0101a0:1341_3: na desessāmā”ti evaṃ parivitakkapubbabhāgo panesa sabbabuddhānaṃ labbhati. Tenāha
atk-s0101a0:1342_0: 408. Unnādiniyāti uccaṃ nadamānāya, evaṃ nadamānāya cassā uddhaṃ gamanavasena ucco,
atk-s0101a0:1342_1: disāsu patthaṭavasena mahā saddoti uccāsaddamahāsaddāya, tesañhi paribbājakānaṃ pātova
atk-s0101a0:1342_2: vuṭṭhāya kattabbaṃ nāma cetiyavattaṃ vā bodhivattaṃ vā ācariyupajjhāyavattaṃ vā yoniso
atk-s0101a0:1342_3: manasikāro vā natthi. Tena te pātova vuṭṭhāya bālātape nisinnā – “imassa hattho sobhano,
atk-s0101a0:1342_4: imassa pādo”ti evaṃ aññamaññassa hatthapādādīni vā ārabbha, itthipurisadārakadārikādīnaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1342_5: vaṇṇe vā, aññaṃ vā kāmassādabhavassādādivatthuṃ ārabbha kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā anupubbena
atk-s0101a0:1342_6: rājakathādianekavidhaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ kathenti. Tena vuttaṃ – “unnādiniyā uccāsaddamahāsaddāya
atk-s0101a0:1343_0: Tato poṭṭhapādo paribbājako te paribbājake oloketvā – “ime paribbājakā ativiya aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1343_1: agāravā, mayañca samaṇassa gotamassa pātubhāvato paṭṭhāya sūriyuggamane khajjopanakūpamā
atk-s0101a0:1343_2: jātā, lābhasakkāropi no parihīno. Sace panimaṃ ṭhānaṃ samaṇo gotamo vā gotamassa
atk-s0101a0:1343_3: sāvako vā gihī upaṭṭhāko vā tassa āgaccheyya, ativiya lajjanīyaṃ bhavissati, parisadoso
atk-s0101a0:1343_4: kho pana parisajeṭṭhakasseva upari ārohatī”ti itocito ca vilokento bhagavantaṃ addasa.
atk-s0101a0:1343_5: Tena vuttaṃ – “addasā kho poṭṭhapādo paribbājako…pe… tuṇhī ahesu”nti.
atk-s0101a0:1344_0: 409. Tattha saṇṭhapesīti sikkhāpesi, vajjamassā paṭicchādesi. Yathā susaṇṭhitā hoti,
atk-s0101a0:1344_1: tathā naṃ ṭhapesi. Yathā nāma parisamajjhaṃ pavisanto puriso vajjapaṭicchādanatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1344_2: nivāsanaṃ saṇṭhapeti, pārupanaṃ saṇṭhapeti, rajokiṇṇaṭṭhānaṃ puñchati; evamassā vajjapaṭicchādanatthaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1344_3: – “appasaddā bhonto”ti sikkhāpento yathā susaṇṭhitā hoti, tathā naṃ ṭhapesīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1344_4: Appasaddakāmoti appasaddaṃ icchati, eko nisīdati, eko tiṭṭhati, na gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya
atk-s0101a0:1344_5: yāpeti. Upasaṅkamitabbaṃ maññeyyāti idhāgantabbaṃ maññeyya. Kasmā panesa bhagavato
atk-s0101a0:1344_6: upasaṅkamanaṃ paccāsīsatīti? Attano vuddhiṃ patthayamāno. Paribbājakā kira buddhesu
atk-s0101a0:1344_7: vā buddhasāvakesu vā attano santikaṃ āgatesu – “ajja amhākaṃ santikaṃ samaṇo gotamo
atk-s0101a0:1344_8: āgato, sāriputto āgato, na kho pana te yassa vā tassa vā santikaṃ gacchanti, passatha
atk-s0101a0:1344_9: amhākaṃ uttamabhāva”nti attano upaṭṭhākānaṃ santike attānaṃ ukkhipanti, ucce ṭhāne
atk-s0101a0:1344_10: ṭhapenti, bhagavatopi upaṭṭhāke gaṇhituṃ vāyamanti. Te kira bhagavato upaṭṭhāke disvā
atk-s0101a0:1344_11: evaṃ vadanti – “tumhākaṃ satthā bhavaṃ gotamopi gotamasāvakāpi amhākaṃ santikaṃ āgacchanti,
atk-s0101a0:1344_12: mayaṃ aññamaññaṃ samaggā. Tumhe pana amhe akkhīhipi passituṃ na icchatha, sāmīcikammaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1344_13: na karotha, kiṃ vo amhehi aparaddha”nti. Athekacce manussā – “buddhāpi etesaṃ santikaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1344_14: gacchanti kiṃ amhāka”nti tato paṭṭhāya te disvā nappamajjanti. Tuṇhī ahesunti poṭṭhapādaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1345_0: 410. Svāgataṃ, bhanteti suṭṭhu āgamanaṃ, bhante, bhagavato; bhagavati hi no āgate
atk-s0101a0:1345_1: ānando hoti, gate sokoti dīpeti. Cirassaṃ kho, bhanteti kasmā āha? Kiṃ bhagavā pubbepi
atk-s0101a0:1345_2: tattha gatapubboti, na gatapubbo. Manussānaṃ pana – “kuhiṃ gacchantā, kuto āgatattha,
atk-s0101a0:1345_3: kiṃ maggamūḷhattha, cirassaṃ āgatatthā”ti evamādayo piyasamudācārā honti, tasmā evamāha.
atk-s0101a0:1345_4: Evañca pana vatvā na mānathaddho hutvā nisīdi, uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavato paccuggamanamakāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1345_5: Bhagavantañhi upagataṃ disvā āsanena animantento vā apacitiṃ akaronto vā dullabho.
atk-s0101a0:1345_6: Kasmā? Uccākulīnatāya. Ayampi paribbājako attano nisinnāsanaṃ papphoṭetvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1345_7: āsanena nimantento – “nisīdatu, bhante, bhagavā idamāsanaṃ paññatta”nti āha. Antarākathā
atk-s0101a0:1345_8: vippakatāti nisinnānaṃ vo ādito paṭṭhāya yāva mamāgamanaṃ, etasmiṃ antare kā nāma
atk-s0101a0:1345_9: kathā vippakatā, mamāgamanapaccayā katamā kathā pariyantaṃ na gatā, vadatha, yāva
atk-s0101a0:1345_10: naṃ pariyantaṃ netvā demīti sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavāresi. Atha paribbājako – “niratthakakathā
atk-s0101a0:1345_11: esā nissārā vaṭṭasannissitā, na tumhākaṃ purato vattabbataṃ arahatī”ti dīpento “tiṭṭhatesā, bhante”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1347_0: 411. Tiṭṭhatesā, bhanteti sace bhagavā sotukāmo bhavissati, pacchāpesā kathā na dullabhā
atk-s0101a0:1347_1: bhavissati, amhākaṃ panimāya kathāya attho natthi. Bhagavato panāgamanaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0101a0:1347_2: mayaṃ aññadeva sukāraṇaṃ pucchāmāti dīpeti. Tato taṃ pucchanto – “purimāni, bhante”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1347_3: Tattha kotūhalasālāyanti kotūhalasālā nāma paccekasālā natthi. Yattha pana nānātitthiyā
atk-s0101a0:1347_4: samaṇabrāhmaṇā nānāvidhaṃ kathaṃ pavattenti, sā bahūnaṃ – “ayaṃ kiṃ vadati, ayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1347_5: kiṃ vadatī”ti kotūhaluppattiṭṭhānato kotūhalasālāti vuccati. Abhisaññānirodheti ettha
atk-s0101a0:1347_6: abhīti upasaggamattaṃ. Saññānirodheti cittanirodhe, khaṇikanirodhe kathā uppannāti
atk-s0101a0:1347_7: attho. Idaṃ pana tassā uppattikāraṇaṃ. Yadā kira bhagavā jātakaṃ vā katheti, sikkhāpadaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1347_8: vā paññapeti tadā sakalajambudīpe bhagavato kittighoso pattharati, titthiyā taṃ sutvā
atk-s0101a0:1347_9: – “bhavaṃ kira gotamo pubbacariyaṃ kathesi, mayaṃ kiṃ na sakkoma tādisaṃ kiñci kathetu”nti
atk-s0101a0:1347_10: bhagavato paṭibhāgakiriyaṃ karontā ekaṃ bhavantarasamayaṃ kathenti – “bhavaṃ gotamo
atk-s0101a0:1347_11: sikkhāpadaṃ paññapesi, mayaṃ kiṃ na sakkoma paññapetu”nti attano sāvakānaṃ kiñcideva
atk-s0101a0:1347_12: sikkhāpadaṃ paññapenti. Tadā pana bhagavā aṭṭhavidhaparisamajjhe nisīditvā nirodhakathaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1347_13: kathesi. Titthiyā taṃ sutvā – “bhavaṃ kira gotamo nirodhaṃ nāma kathesi, mayampi
atk-s0101a0:1347_14: taṃ kathessāmā”ti sannipatitvā kathayiṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ – “abhisaññānirodhe kathā udapādī”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1348_0: Tatrekacceti tesu ekacce. Purimo cettha yvāyaṃ bāhire titthāyatane pabbajito cittappavattiyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1348_1: dosaṃ disvā acittakabhāvo santoti samāpattiṃ bhāvetvā ito cuto pañca kappasatāni
atk-s0101a0:1348_2: asaññībhave ṭhatvā puna idha uppajjati. Tassa saññuppāde ca nirodhe ca hetuṃ apassanto
atk-s0101a0:1349_0: Dutiyo naṃ nisedhetvā migasiṅgatāpasassa asaññakabhāvaṃ gahetvā – “upetipi apetipī”ti
atk-s0101a0:1349_1: āha. Migasiṅgatāpaso kira attantapo ghoratapo paramadhitindriyo ahosi. Tassa sīlatejena
atk-s0101a0:1349_2: sakkavimānaṃ uṇhaṃ ahosi. Sakko devarājā “sakkaṭṭhānaṃ nu kho tāpaso patthetī”ti
atk-s0101a0:1349_3: alambusaṃ nāma devakaññaṃ – ‘tāpasassa tapaṃ bhinditvā ehī’ti pesesi. Sā tattha gatā.
atk-s0101a0:1349_4: Tāpaso paṭhamadivase taṃ disvāva palāyitvā paṇṇasālaṃ pāvisi. Dutiyadivase kāmacchandanīvaraṇena
atk-s0101a0:1349_5: bhaggo taṃ hatthe aggahesi, so tena dibbaphassena phuṭṭho visaññī hutvā tiṇṇaṃ saṃvaccharānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1349_6: accayena saññaṃ paṭilabhi. Taṃ so diṭṭhigatiko – “tiṇṇaṃ saṃvaccharānaṃ accayena
atk-s0101a0:1350_0: Tatiyo naṃ nisedhetvā āthabbaṇapayogaṃ sandhāya “upakaḍḍhantipi apakaḍḍhantipī”ti
atk-s0101a0:1350_1: āha. Āthabbaṇikā kira āthabbaṇaṃ payojetvā sattaṃ sīsacchinnaṃ viya hatthacchinnaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1350_2: viya mataṃ viya ca katvā dassenti. Tassa puna pākatikabhāvaṃ disvā so diṭṭhigatiko
atk-s0101a0:1351_0: Catuttho naṃ nisedhetvā yakkhadāsīnaṃ madaniddaṃ sandhāya “santi hi bho devatā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1351_1: Yakkhadāsiyo kira sabbarattiṃ devatūpahāraṃ kurumānā naccitvā gāyitvā aruṇodaye ekaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1351_2: surāpātiṃ pivitvā parivattitvā supitvā divā vuṭṭhahanti. Taṃ disvā so diṭṭhigatiko
atk-s0101a0:1351_3: – “suttakāle nirodhaṃ samāpannā, pabuddhakāle nirodhā vuṭṭhitā”ti maññamāno evamāha.
atk-s0101a0:1352_0: Ayaṃ pana poṭṭhapādo paribbājako paṇḍitajātiko. Tenassa taṃ kathaṃ sutvā vippaṭisāro
atk-s0101a0:1352_1: uppajji. “Imesaṃ kathā eḷamūgakathā viya cattāro hi nirodhe ete paññapenti, iminā
atk-s0101a0:1352_2: ca nirodhena nāma ekena bhavitabbaṃ, na bahunā. Tenāpi ekena aññeneva bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1352_3: so pana aññena ñātuṃ na sakkā aññatra sabbaññunā. Sace bhagavā idha abhavissa ‘ayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1352_4: nirodho ayaṃ na nirodho’ti dīpasahassaṃ viya ujjāletvā ajjameva pākaṭaṃ akarissā”ti
atk-s0101a0:1352_5: dasabalaññeva anussari. Tasmā “tassa mayhaṃ bhante”tiādimāha. Tattha aho nūnāti anussaraṇatthe
atk-s0101a0:1352_6: nipātadvayaṃ, tena tassa bhagavantaṃ anussarantassa etadahosi “aho nūna bhagavā aho
atk-s0101a0:1352_7: nūna sugato”ti. Yo imesanti yo etesaṃ nirodhadhammānaṃ sukusalo nipuṇo cheko, so
atk-s0101a0:1352_8: bhagavā aho nūna katheyya, sugato aho nūna katheyyāti ayamettha adhippāyo. Pakataññūti
atk-s0101a0:1352_9: ciṇṇavasitāya pakatiṃ sabhāvaṃ jānātīti pakataññū. Kathaṃ nu khoti idaṃ paribbājako
atk-s0101a0:1352_10: “mayaṃ bhagavā na jānāma, tumhe jānātha, kathetha no”ti āyācanto vadati. Atha bhagavā
atk-s0101a0:1354_0: 412. Tattha tatrāti tesu samaṇabrāhmaṇesu. Āditova tesaṃ aparaddhanti tesaṃ ādimhiyeva
atk-s0101a0:1354_1: viraddhaṃ, gharamajjheyeva pakkhalitāti dīpeti. Sahetū sappaccayāti ettha hetupi
atk-s0101a0:1354_2: paccayopi kāraṇasseva nāmaṃ, sakāraṇāti attho. Taṃ pana kāraṇaṃ dassento “sikkhā
atk-s0101a0:1354_3: ekā”ti āha. Tattha sikkhā ekā saññā uppajjantīti sikkhāya ekaccā saññā jāyantīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1355_0: 413. Kā ca sikkhāti bhagavā avocāti katamā ca sā sikkhāti bhagavā vitthāretukamyatāpucchāvasena
atk-s0101a0:1355_1: avoca. Atha yasmā adhisīlasikkhā adhicittasikkhā adhipaññāsikkhāti tisso sikkhā honti.
atk-s0101a0:1355_2: Tasmā tā dassento bhagavā saññāya sahetukaṃ uppādanirodhaṃ dīpetuṃ buddhuppādato
atk-s0101a0:1355_3: pabhuti tantidhammaṃ ṭhapento “idha poṭṭhapāda, tathāgato loke”tiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0101a0:1355_4: adhisīlasikkhā adhicittasikkhāti dve eva sikkhā sarūpena āgatā, tatiyā pana “ayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1355_5: dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti kho poṭṭhapāda mayā ekaṃsiko dhammo desito”ti ettha
atk-s0101a0:1355_6: sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappavasena pariyāpannattā āgatāti veditabbā. Kāmasaññāti pañcakāmaguṇikarāgopi
atk-s0101a0:1355_7: asamuppannakāmacāropi. Tattha pañcakāmaguṇikarāgo anāgāmimaggena samugghātaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0101a0:1355_8: asamuppannakāmacāro pana imasmiṃ ṭhāne vaṭṭati. Tasmā tassa yā purimā kāmasaññāti
atk-s0101a0:1355_9: tassa paṭhamajjhānasamaṅgino yā pubbe uppannapubbāya kāmasaññāya sadisattā purimā
atk-s0101a0:1355_10: kāmasaññāti vucceyya, sā nirujjhati, anuppannāva nuppajjatīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1356_0: Vivekajapītisukhasukhumasaccasaññīyeva tasmiṃ samaye hotīti tasmiṃ paṭhamajjhānasamaye
atk-s0101a0:1356_1: vivekajapītisukhasaṅkhātā sukhumasaññā saccā hoti, bhūtā hotīti attho. Atha vā kāmacchandādioḷārikaṅgappahānavasena
atk-s0101a0:1356_2: sukhumā ca sā bhūtatāya saccā ca saññāti sukhumasaccasaññā, vivekajehi pītisukhehi
atk-s0101a0:1356_3: sampayuttā sukhumasaccasaññāti vivekajapītisukhasukhumasaccasaññā sā assa atthīti
atk-s0101a0:1356_4: vivekajapītisukhasukhumasaccasaññīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Esa nayo sabbattha.
atk-s0101a0:1356_5: Evampi sikkhāti ettha yasmā paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjanto adhiṭṭhahanto, vuṭṭhahanto
atk-s0101a0:1356_6: ca sikkhati, tasmā taṃ evaṃ sikkhitabbato sikkhāti vuccati. Tenapi sikkhāsaṅkhātena
atk-s0101a0:1356_7: paṭhamajjhānena evaṃ ekā vivekajapītisukhasukhumasaccasaññā uppajjati. Evaṃ ekā kāmasaññā
atk-s0101a0:1356_8: nirujjhatīti attho. Ayaṃ sikkhāti bhagavā avocāti ayaṃ paṭhamajjhānasaṅkhātā ekā
atk-s0101a0:1356_9: sikkhāti, bhagavā āha. Etenupāyena sabbattha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0101a0:1357_0: Yasmā pana aṭṭhamasamāpattiyā aṅgato sammasanaṃ buddhānaṃyeva hoti, sāvakesu sāriputtasadisānampi
atk-s0101a0:1357_1: natthi, kalāpato sammasanaṃyeva pana sāvakānaṃ hoti, idañca “saññā saññā”ti, evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1357_2: aṅgato sammasanaṃ uddhaṭaṃ. Tasmā ākiñcaññāyatanaparamaṃyeva saññaṃ dassetvā puna
atk-s0101a0:1357_3: tadeva saññagganti dassetuṃ “yato kho poṭṭhapāda…pe… saññaggaṃ phusatī”ti āha.
atk-s0101a0:1358_0: 414. Tattha yato kho poṭṭhapāda bhikkhūti yo nāma poṭṭhapāda bhikkhu. Idha sakasaññī
atk-s0101a0:1358_1: hotīti idha sāsane sakasaññī hoti, ayameva vā pāṭho, attano paṭhamajjhānasaññāya
atk-s0101a0:1358_2: saññavā hotīti attho. So tato amutra tato amutrāti so bhikkhu tato paṭhamajjhānato
atk-s0101a0:1358_3: amutra dutiyajjhāne, tatopi amutra tatiyajjhāneti evaṃ tāya tāya jhānasaññāya sakasaññī
atk-s0101a0:1358_4: sakasaññī hutvā anupubbena saññaggaṃ phusati. Saññagganti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ vuccati.
atk-s0101a0:1358_5: Kasmā? Lokiyānaṃ kiccakārakasamāpattīnaṃ aggattā. Ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiyañhi ṭhatvā
atk-s0101a0:1358_6: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanampi nirodhampi samāpajjanti. Iti sā lokiyānaṃ kiccakārakasamāpattīnaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1358_7: aggattā saññagganti vuccati, taṃ phusati pāpuṇātīti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1359_0: Idāni abhisaññānirodhaṃ dassetuṃ “tassa saññagge ṭhitassā”tiādimāha. Tattha ceteyyaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1359_1: abhisaṅkhareyyanti padadvaye ca jhānaṃ samāpajjanto ceteti nāma, punappunaṃ kappetīti
atk-s0101a0:1359_2: attho. Uparisamāpattiatthāya nikantiṃ kurumāno abhisaṅkharoti nāma. Imā ca me saññā
atk-s0101a0:1359_3: nirujjheyyunti imā ākiñcaññāyatanasaññā nirujjheyyuṃ. Aññā ca oḷārikāti aññā ca oḷārikā
atk-s0101a0:1359_4: bhavaṅgasaññā uppajjeyyuṃ. So na ceva ceteti na abhisaṅkharotīti ettha kāmaṃ cesa
atk-s0101a0:1359_5: cetentova na ceteti, abhisaṅkharontova nābhisaṅkharoti. Imassa bhikkhuno ākiñcaññāyatanato
atk-s0101a0:1359_6: vuṭṭhāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā “ekaṃ dve cittavāre ṭhassāmī”ti ābhogasamannāhāro
atk-s0101a0:1359_7: natthi. Uparinirodhasamāpattatthāya eva pana ābhogasamannāhāro atthi, svāyamattho
atk-s0101a0:1360_0: Pitugharamajjhena kira gantvā pacchābhāge puttassa gharaṃ hoti, tato paṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1360_1: ādāya āsanasālaṃ āgataṃ daharaṃ thero – “manāpo piṇḍapāto kuto ābhato”ti pucchi.
atk-s0101a0:1360_2: So “asukassa gharato”ti laddhagharameva ācikkhi. Yena panassa pitugharamajjhena gatopi
atk-s0101a0:1360_3: āgatopi tattha ābhogopi natthi. Tattha āsanasālā viya ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti daṭṭhabbā,
atk-s0101a0:1360_4: pitugehaṃ viya nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpatti, puttagehaṃ viya nirodhasamāpatti,
atk-s0101a0:1360_5: āsanasālāya ṭhatvā pitugharaṃ amanasikaritvā puttagharācikkhaṇaṃ viya ākiñcaññāyatanato
atk-s0101a0:1360_6: vuṭṭhāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā “ekaṃ dve cittavāre ṭhassāmī”ti pitugharaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1360_7: amanasikaritvāva uparinirodhasamāpattatthāya manasikāro, evamesa cetentova na ceteti,
atk-s0101a0:1360_8: abhisaṅkharontova nābhisaṅkharoti. Tā ceva saññāti tā jhānasaññā nirujjhanti. Aññā
atk-s0101a0:1360_9: cāti aññā ca oḷārikā bhavaṅgasaññā nuppajjanti. So nirodhaṃ phusatīti so evaṃ paṭipanno
atk-s0101a0:1361_1: nirodhapadena antarikaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Anupaṭipāṭiyā sampajānasaññānirodhasamāpattīti
atk-s0101a0:1361_2: ayaṃ panetthattho. Tatrāpi sampajānasaññānirodhasamāpattīti sampajānantassa ante
atk-s0101a0:1361_3: saññā nirodhasamāpatti sampajānantassa vā paṇḍitassa bhikkhuno saññānirodhasamāpattīti ayaṃ visesattho.
atk-s0101a0:1362: Idāni idha ṭhatvā nirodhasamāpattikathā kathetabbā. Sā panesā sabbākārena visuddhimagge paññābhāvanānisaṃsādhikāre kathitā, tasmā tattha kathitatova gahetabbā.
atk-s0101a0:1363_0: Evaṃ bhagavā poṭṭhapādassa paribbājakassa nirodhakathaṃ kathetvā – atha naṃ tādisāya
atk-s0101a0:1363_1: kathāya aññattha abhāvaṃ paṭijānāpetuṃ “taṃ kiṃ maññasī”tiādimāha. Paribbājakopi
atk-s0101a0:1363_2: “bhagavā ajja tumhākaṃ kathaṃ ṭhapetvā na mayā evarūpā kathā sutapubbā”ti paṭijānanto,
atk-s0101a0:1363_3: “no hetaṃ bhante”ti vatvā puna sakkaccaṃ bhagavato kathāya uggahitabhāvaṃ dassento
atk-s0101a0:1363_4: “evaṃ kho ahaṃ bhante”tiādimāha. Athassa bhagavā “suuggahitaṃ tayā”ti anujānanto
atk-s0101a0:1364_0: 415. Atha paribbājako “bhagavatā ‘ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ saññagga’nti vuttaṃ. Etadeva nu
atk-s0101a0:1364_1: kho saññaggaṃ, udāhu avasesasamāpattīsupi saññaggaṃ atthī”ti cintetvā tamatthaṃ pucchanto
atk-s0101a0:1364_2: “ekaññeva nu kho”tiādimāha. Bhagavāpissa vissajjesi. Tattha puthūpīti bahūnipi. Yathā
atk-s0101a0:1364_3: yathā kho, poṭṭhapāda, nirodhaṃ phusatīti pathavīkasiṇādīsu yena yena kasiṇena, paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1364_4: vā yena yena jhānena. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – sace hi pathavīkasiṇena karaṇabhūtena pathavīkasiṇasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0101a0:1364_5: ekavāraṃ samāpajjanto purimasaññānirodhaṃ phusati ekaṃ saññaggaṃ, atha dve vāre,
atk-s0101a0:1364_6: tayo vāre, vārasataṃ, vārasahassaṃ, vārasatasahassaṃ vā samāpajjanto purimasaññānirodhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1364_7: phusati, satasahassaṃ, saññaggāni. Esa nayo sesakasiṇesu. Jhānesupi sace paṭhamajjhānena
atk-s0101a0:1364_8: karaṇabhūtena ekavāraṃ purimasaññānirodhaṃ phusati ekaṃ saññaggaṃ. Atha dve vāre,
atk-s0101a0:1364_9: tayo vāre, vārasataṃ, vārasahassaṃ, vārasatasahassaṃ vā purimasaññānirodhaṃ phusati,
atk-s0101a0:1364_10: satasahassaṃ saññaggāni. Esa nayo sesajjhānasamāpattīsupi. Iti ekavāraṃ samāpajjanavasena
atk-s0101a0:1364_11: vā sabbampi sañjānanalakkhaṇena saṅgahetvā vā ekaṃ saññaggaṃ hoti, aparāparaṃ samāpajjanavasena bahūni.
atk-s0101a0:1365_0: 416. Saññā nu kho, bhanteti bhante nirodhasamāpajjanakassa bhikkhuno “saññā nu kho
atk-s0101a0:1365_1: paṭhamaṃ uppajjatī”ti pucchati. Tassa bhagavā “saññā kho, poṭṭhapādā”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0101a0:1365_2: Tattha saññāti jhānasaññā. Ñāṇanti vipassanāñāṇaṃ. Aparo nayo, saññāti vipassanā
atk-s0101a0:1365_3: saññā. Ñāṇanti maggañāṇaṃ. Aparo nayo, saññāti maggasaññā. Ñāṇanti phalañāṇaṃ. Tipiṭakamahāsivatthero panāha –
atk-s0101a0:1366_0: Kiṃ ime bhikkhū bhaṇanti, poṭṭhapādo heṭṭhā bhagavantaṃ nirodhaṃ pucchi. Idāni nirodhā
atk-s0101a0:1366_1: vuṭṭhānaṃ pucchanto “bhagavā nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa kiṃ paṭhamaṃ arahattaphalasaññā
atk-s0101a0:1366_2: uppajjati, udāhu paccavekkhaṇañāṇa”nti vadati. Athassa bhagavā yasmā phalasaññā paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1366_3: uppajjati, pacchā paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. Tasmā “saññā kho poṭṭhapādā”ti āha. Tattha
atk-s0101a0:1366_4: saññuppādāti arahattaphalasaññāya uppādā, pacchā “idaṃ arahattaphala”nti evaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇuppādo
atk-s0101a0:1366_5: hoti. Idappaccayā kira meti phalasamādhisaññāpaccayā kira mayhaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ uppannanti.
atk-s0101a0:1368_0: 417. Idāni paribbājako yathā nāma gāmasūkaro gandhodakena nhāpetvā gandhehi anulimpitvā
atk-s0101a0:1368_1: mālādāmaṃ piḷandhitvā sirisayane āropitopi sukhaṃ na vindati, vegena gūthaṭṭhānameva
atk-s0101a0:1368_2: gantvā sukhaṃ vindati. Evameva bhagavatā saṇhasukhumatilakkhaṇabbhāhatāya desanāya
atk-s0101a0:1368_3: nhāpitavilittamaṇḍitopi nirodhakathāsirisayanaṃ āropitopi tattha sukhaṃ na vindanto
atk-s0101a0:1368_4: gūthaṭṭhānasadisaṃ attano laddhiṃ gahetvā tameva pucchanto “saññā nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0101a0:1368_5: purisassa attā”tiādimāha. Athassānumatiṃ gahetvā byākātukāmo bhagavā – “kaṃ pana
atk-s0101a0:1368_6: tva”ntiādimāha. Tato so “arūpī attā”ti evaṃ laddhiko samānopi “bhagavā desanāya sukusalo,
atk-s0101a0:1368_7: so me āditova laddhiṃ mā viddhaṃsetū”ti cintetvā attano laddhiṃ pariharanto “oḷārikaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1368_8: kho”tiādimāha. Athassa bhagavā tattha dosaṃ dassento “oḷāriko ca hi te”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1368_9: Tattha evaṃ santanti evaṃ sante. Bhummatthe hi etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Evaṃ santaṃ attānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1368_10: paccāgacchato tavāti ayaṃ vā ettha attho. Catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ ekuppādekanirodhattā
atk-s0101a0:1368_11: kiñcāpi yā saññā uppajjati, sāva nirujjhati. Aparāparaṃ upādāya pana “aññā ca saññā
atk-s0101a0:1368_12: uppajjanti, aññā ca saññā nirujjhantī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1369_0: 418-420. Idāni aññaṃ laddhiṃ dassento – “manomayaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhante”tiādiṃ vatvā
atk-s0101a0:1369_1: tatrāpi dose dinne yathā nāma ummattako yāvassa saññā nappatiṭṭhāti, tāva aññaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0101a0:1369_2: aññaṃ vissajjeti, saññāpatiṭṭhānakāle pana vattabbameva vadati, evameva aññaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0101a0:1369_3: aññaṃ vissajjetvā idāni attano laddhiṃyeva vadanto “arūpī kho”tiādimāha. Tatrāpi
atk-s0101a0:1369_4: yasmā so saññāya uppādanirodhaṃ icchati, attānaṃ pana sassataṃ maññati. Tasmā tathevassa
atk-s0101a0:1369_5: dosaṃ dassento bhagavā “evaṃ santampī”tiādimāha. Tato paribbājako micchādassanena
atk-s0101a0:1369_6: abhibhūtattā bhagavatā vuccamānampi taṃ nānattaṃ ajānanto “sakkā panetaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0101a0:1369_7: mayā”tiādimāha. Athassa bhagavā yasmā so saññāya uppādanirodhaṃ passantopi saññāmayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1370_0: Tatthāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – tava aññā diṭṭhi, aññā khanti, aññā ruci, aññathāyeva te
atk-s0101a0:1370_1: dassanaṃ pavattaṃ, aññadeva ca te khamati ceva ruccati ca, aññatra ca te āyogo, aññissāyeva
atk-s0101a0:1370_2: paṭipattiyā yuttapayuttatā, aññattha ca te ācariyakaṃ, aññasmiṃ titthāyatane ācariyabhāvo.
atk-s0101a0:1370_3: Tena tayā evaṃ aññadiṭṭhikena aññakhantikena aññarucikena aññatrāyogena aññatrācariyakena
atk-s0101a0:1370_4: dujjānaṃ etanti. Atha paribbājako – “saññā vā purisassa attā hotu, aññā vā saññā,
atk-s0101a0:1370_5: taṃ sassatādi bhāvamassa pucchissa”nti puna “kiṃ pana bhante”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1371_0: Tattha lokoti attānaṃ sandhāya vadati. Na hetaṃ poṭṭhapāda atthasañhitanti poṭṭhapāda
atk-s0101a0:1371_1: etaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ na idhalokaparalokaatthanissitaṃ, na attatthaparatthanissitaṃ. Na
atk-s0101a0:1371_3: sāsanabrahmacariyakassa na ādimattaṃ, adhisīlasikkhāmattampi na hoti. Na nibbidāyāti
atk-s0101a0:1371_4: saṃsāravaṭṭe nibbindanatthāya na saṃvattati. Na virāgāyāti vaṭṭavirāgatthāya na saṃvattati.
atk-s0101a0:1371_5: Na nirodhāyāti vaṭṭassa nirodhakaraṇatthāya na saṃvattati. Na upasamāyāti vaṭṭassa
atk-s0101a0:1371_6: vūpasamanatthāya na saṃvattati. Na abhiññāyāti vaṭṭābhijānanāya paccakkhakiriyāya
atk-s0101a0:1371_7: na saṃvattati. Na sambodhāyāti vaṭṭasambujjhanatthāya na saṃvattati. Na nibbānāyāti
atk-s0101a0:1372_0: Idaṃ dukkhantiādīsu taṇhaṃ ṭhapetvā tebhūmakā pañcakkhandhā dukkhanti, tasseva dukkhassa
atk-s0101a0:1372_1: pabhāvanato sappaccayā taṇhā dukkhasamudayoti. Ubhinnaṃ appavatti dukkhanirodhoti,
atk-s0101a0:1372_2: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti mayā byākatanti attho. Evañca
atk-s0101a0:1372_3: pana vatvā bhagavā “imassa paribbājakassa maggapātubhāvo vā phalasacchikiriyā vā
atk-s0101a0:1372_4: natthi, mayhañca bhikkhācāravelā”ti cintetvā tuṇhī ahosi. Paribbājakopi taṃ ākāraṃ
atk-s0101a0:1373_1: phuṭṭhaṃ akaṃsu, upari vijjhiṃsūti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhūtanti sabhāvato vijjamānaṃ. Tacchaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1373_2: tathanti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Dhammaṭṭhitatanti navalokuttaradhammesu ṭhitasabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1373_4: nāma natthi. Tasmā sā edisā hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1375_0: 422. Citto ca hatthisāriputtoti so kira sāvatthiyaṃ hatthiācariyassa putto bhagavato
atk-s0101a0:1375_1: santike pabbajitvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā sukhumesu atthantaresu kusalo ahosi, pubbe
atk-s0101a0:1375_2: katapāpakammavasena pana sattavāre vibbhamitvā gihi jāto. Kassapasammāsambuddhassa
atk-s0101a0:1375_3: kira sāsane dve sahāyakā ahesuṃ, aññamaññaṃ samaggā ekatova sajjhāyanti. Tesu eko
atk-s0101a0:1375_4: anabhirato gihibhāve cittaṃ uppādetvā itarassa ārocesi. So gihibhāve ādīnavaṃ pabbajjāya
atk-s0101a0:1375_5: ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā taṃ ovadi. So taṃ sutvā abhiramitvā punekadivasaṃ tādise citte
atk-s0101a0:1375_6: uppanne taṃ etadavoca “mayhaṃ āvuso evarūpaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati – ‘imāhaṃ pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0101a0:1375_7: tuyhaṃ dassāmī’ti”. So pattacīvaralobhena tassa gihibhāve ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā pabbajjāya
atk-s0101a0:1375_8: ādīnavaṃ kathesi. Athassa taṃ sutvāva gihibhāvato cittaṃ virajjitvā pabbajjāyameva
atk-s0101a0:1375_9: abhirami. Evamesa tadā sīlavantassa bhikkhuno gihibhāve ānisaṃsakathāya kathitattā
atk-s0101a0:1375_10: idāni cha vāre vibbhamitvā sattame vāre pabbajito. Mahāmoggallānassa, mahākoṭṭhikattherassa
atk-s0101a0:1375_11: ca abhidhammakathaṃ kathentānaṃ antarantarā kathaṃ opāteti. Atha naṃ mahākoṭṭhikatthero
atk-s0101a0:1375_12: apasādeti. So mahāsāvakassa kathite patiṭṭhātuṃ asakkonto vibbhamitvā gihi jāto.
atk-s0101a0:1375_13: Poṭṭhapādassa panāyaṃ gihisahāyako hoti. Tasmā vibbhamitvā dvīhatīhaccayena poṭṭhapādassa
atk-s0101a0:1375_14: santikaṃ gato. Atha naṃ so disvā “samma kiṃ tayā kataṃ, evarūpassa nāma satthu sāsanā
atk-s0101a0:1375_15: apasakkantosi, ehi pabbajituṃ idāni te vaṭṭatī”ti taṃ gahetvā bhagavato santikaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1375_16: agamāsi. Tena vuttaṃ “citto ca hatthisāriputto poṭṭhapādo ca paribbājako”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1376_0: 423. Andhāti paññācakkhuno natthitāya andhā, tasseva abhāvena acakkhukā. Tvaṃyeva
atk-s0101a0:1376_1: nesaṃ eko cakkhumāti subhāsitadubbhāsitajānanabhāvamattena paññācakkhunā cakkhumā.
atk-s0101a0:1376_2: Ekaṃsikāti ekakoṭṭhāsā. Paññattāti ṭhapitā. Anekaṃsikāti na ekakoṭṭhāsā ekeneva koṭṭhāsena
atk-s0101a0:1376_3: sassatāti vā asassatāti vā na vuttāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1378_0: 424-425. Santi poṭṭhapādāti idaṃ bhagavā kasmā ārabhi? Bāhirakehi paññāpitaniṭṭhāya
atk-s0101a0:1378_1: aniyyānikabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Sabbe hi titthiyā yathā bhagavā amataṃ nibbānaṃ, evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1378_2: attano attano samaye lokathupikādivasena niṭṭhaṃ paññapenti, sā ca na niyyānikā.
atk-s0101a0:1378_3: Yathā paññattā hutvā na niyyāti na gacchati, aññadatthu paṇḍitehi paṭikkhittā nivattati,
atk-s0101a0:1378_4: taṃ dassetuṃ bhagavā evamāha. Tattha ekantasukhaṃ lokaṃ jānaṃ passanti puratthimāya
atk-s0101a0:1378_5: disāya ekantasukho loko pacchimādīnaṃ vā aññatarāyāti evaṃ jānantā evaṃ passantā
atk-s0101a0:1378_6: viharatha. Diṭṭhapubbāni kho tasmiṃ loke manussānaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānādīnīti. Appāṭihīrakatanti
atk-s0101a0:1379: 426-427. Janapadakalyāṇīti janapade aññāhi itthīhi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānavilāsākappādīhi asadisā.
atk-s0101a0:1381_0: 428. Evaṃ bhagavā paresaṃ niṭṭhāya aniyyānikattaṃ dassetvā attano niṭṭhāya niyyānikabhāvaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1381_1: dassetuṃ “tayo kho me poṭṭhapādā”tiādimāha. Tattha attapaṭilābhoti attabhāvapaṭilābho,
atk-s0101a0:1381_2: ettha ca bhagavā tīhi attabhāvapaṭilābhehi tayo bhave dassesi. Oḷārikattabhāvapaṭilābhena
atk-s0101a0:1381_3: avīcito paṭṭhāya paranimmitavasavattipariyosānaṃ kāmabhavaṃ dassesi. Manomayaattabhāvapaṭilābhena
atk-s0101a0:1381_6: arūpabhavaṃ dassesi. Saṃkilesikā dhammā nāma dvādasa akusalacittuppādā. Vodāniyā
atk-s0101a0:1382_1: Pāmujjanti taruṇapīti. Pītīti balavatuṭṭhi. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yaṃ avocumha “sayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1382_2: abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihiratī”ti, tattha tassa evaṃ viharato taṃ pāmojjañceva
atk-s0101a0:1382_3: bhavissati, pīti ca nāmakāyapassaddhi ca sati ca sūpaṭṭhitā uttamañāṇañca sukho ca
atk-s0101a0:1382_4: vihāro. Sabbavihāresu ca ayameva vihāro “sukho”ti vattuṃ yutto “upasanto paramamadhuro”ti.
atk-s0101a0:1382_5: Tattha paṭhamajjhāne pāmojjādayo chapi dhammā labbhanti, dutiyajjhāne dubbalapītisaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1382_6: pāmojjaṃ nivattati, sesā pañca labbhanti. Tatiye pīti nivattati, sesā cattāro labbhanti.
atk-s0101a0:1382_7: Tathā catutthe. Imesu catūsu jhānesu sampasādanasutte suddhavipassanā pādakajjhānameva
atk-s0101a0:1382_8: kathitaṃ. Pāsādikasutte catūhi maggehi saddhiṃ vipassanā kathitā. Dasuttarasutte
atk-s0101a0:1382_9: catutthajjhānikaphalasamāpatti kathitā. Imasmiṃ poṭṭhapādasutte pāmojjaṃ pītivevacanameva
atk-s0101a0:1383_0: 432-437. Ayaṃ vā soti ettha vā saddo vibhāvanattho hoti. Ayaṃ soti evaṃ vibhāvetvā
atk-s0101a0:1383_1: pakāsetvā byākareyyāma. Yathāpare “ekantasukhaṃ attānaṃ sañjānāthā”ti puṭṭhā “no”ti
atk-s0101a0:1383_2: vadanti, na evaṃ vadāmāti attho. Sappāṭihīrakatanti sappāṭiharaṇaṃ, niyyānikanti
atk-s0101a0:1383_3: attho. Mogho hotīti tuccho hoti, natthi so tasmiṃ samayeti adhippāyo. Sacco hotīti
atk-s0101a0:1383_4: bhūto hoti, sveva tasmiṃ samaye sacco hotīti attho. Ettha panāyaṃ citto attano asabbaññutāya
atk-s0101a0:1383_5: tayo attapaṭilābhe kathetvā attapaṭilābho nāma paññattimattaṃ etanti uddharituṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0101a0:1383_6: attapaṭilābho tveva niyyātesi. Athassa bhagavā rūpādayo cettha dhammā, attapaṭilābhoti
atk-s0101a0:1383_7: pana nāmamattametaṃ, tesu tesu rūpādīsu sati evarūpā vohārā hontīti dassetukāmo tasseva
atk-s0101a0:1383_8: kathaṃ gahetvā nāmapaññattivasena niyyātanatthaṃ “yasmiṃ citta samaye”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1384_0: 438. Evañca pana vatvā paṭipucchitvā vinayanatthaṃ puna “sace taṃ, citta, evaṃ puccheyyu”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1384_1: Tattha yo me ahosi atīto attapaṭilābho, sveva me attapaṭilābho, tasmiṃ samaye sacco
atk-s0101a0:1384_2: ahosi, mogho anāgato mogho paccuppannoti ettha tāva imamatthaṃ dasseti – yasmā ye
atk-s0101a0:1384_3: te atītā dhammā, te etarahi natthi, ahesunti pana saṅkhyaṃ gatā, tasmā sopi me attapaṭilābho
atk-s0101a0:1384_4: tasmiṃyeva samaye sacco ahosi. Anāgatapaccuppannānaṃ pana dhammānaṃ tadā abhāvā tasmiṃ
atk-s0101a0:1384_5: samaye “mogho anāgato, mogho paccuppanno”ti, evaṃ atthato nāmamattameva attapaṭilābhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1385_0: 439-443. Atha bhagavā tassa byākaraṇena saddhiṃ attano byākaraṇaṃ saṃsandituṃ “evameva
atk-s0101a0:1385_1: kho cittā”tiādīni vatvā puna opammato tamatthaṃ sādhento “seyyathāpi citta gavā khīra”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1385_2: Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho, yathā gavā khīraṃ, khīrādīhi ca dadhiādīni bhavanti, tattha
atk-s0101a0:1385_3: yasmiṃ samaye khīraṃ hoti, na tasmiṃ samaye dadhīti vā navanītādīsu vā aññataranti
atk-s0101a0:1385_4: saṅkhyaṃ niruttiṃ nāmaṃ vohāraṃ gacchati. Kasmā? Ye dhamme upādāya dadhītiādi vohārā
atk-s0101a0:1385_5: honti, tesaṃ abhāvā. Atha kho khīraṃ tveva tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Kasmā?
atk-s0101a0:1385_6: Ye dhamme upādāya khīranti saṅkhyā nirutti nāmaṃ vohāro hoti, tesaṃ bhāvāti. Esa
atk-s0101a0:1385_7: nayo sabbattha. Imā kho cittāti oḷāriko attapaṭilābho iti ca manomayo attapaṭilābho
atk-s0101a0:1385_8: iti ca arūpo attapaṭilābho iti ca imā kho citta lokasamaññā loke samaññāmattakāni
atk-s0101a0:1385_9: samanujānanamattakāni etāni. Tathā lokaniruttimattakāni vacanapathamattakāni vohāramattakāni
atk-s0101a0:1385_10: nāmapaṇṇattimattakāni etānīti. Evaṃ bhagavā heṭṭhā tayo attapaṭilābhe kathetvā idāni
atk-s0101a0:1385_11: sabbametaṃ vohāramattakanti vadati. Kasmā? Yasmā paramatthato satto nāma natthi,
atk-s0101a0:1386_0: Buddhānaṃ pana dve kathā sammutikathā ca paramatthakathā ca. Tattha “satto poso devo
atk-s0101a0:1386_1: brahmā”tiādikā “sammutikathā” nāma. “Aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā khandhā dhātuyo āyatanāni
atk-s0101a0:1386_2: satipaṭṭhānā sammappadhānā”tiādikā paramatthakathā nāma. Tattha yo sammutidesanāya
atk-s0101a0:1386_3: “satto”ti vā “poso”ti vā “devo”ti vā “brahmā”ti vā vutte vijānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ
atk-s0101a0:1386_4: niyyātuṃ arahattajayaggāhaṃ gahetuṃ sakkoti, tassa bhagavā āditova “satto”ti vā “poso”ti
atk-s0101a0:1386_5: vā “devo”ti vā “brahmā”ti vā katheti, yo paramatthadesanāya “anicca”nti vā “dukkha”nti
atk-s0101a0:1386_6: vātiādīsu aññataraṃ sutvā vijānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ niyyātuṃ arahattajayaggāhaṃ gahetuṃ
atk-s0101a0:1386_7: sakkoti, tassa “anicca”nti vā “dukkha”nti vātiādīsu aññatarameva katheti. Tathā sammutikathāya
atk-s0101a0:1386_8: bujjhanakasattassāpi na paṭhamaṃ paramatthakathaṃ katheti. Sammutikathāya pana bodhetvā
atk-s0101a0:1386_9: pacchā paramatthakathaṃ katheti. Paramatthakathāya bujjhanakasattassāpi na paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1386_10: sammutikathaṃ katheti. Paramatthakathāya pana bodhetvā pacchā sammutikathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0101a0:1386_11: Pakatiyā pana paṭhamameva paramatthakathaṃ kathentassa desanā lūkhākārā hoti, tasmā
atk-s0101a0:1386_12: buddhā paṭhamaṃ sammutikathaṃ kathetvā pacchā paramatthakathaṃ kathenti. Sammutikathaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1386_13: kathentāpi saccameva sabhāvameva amusāva kathenti. Paramatthakathaṃ kathentāpi saccameva
atk-s0101a0:1387: Duve saccāni akkhāsi, sambuddho vadataṃ varo;
atk-s0101a0:1391_0: Yāhi tathāgato voharati aparāmasanti yāhi lokasamaññāhi lokaniruttīhi tathāgato taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiparāmāsānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1391_1: abhāvā aparāmasanto voharatīti desanaṃ vinivaṭṭetvā arahattanikūṭena niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0101a0:1394_0: 444. Evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe… sāvatthiyanti subhasuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ anuttānapadavaṇṇanā. Aciraparinibbute
atk-s0101a0:1394_1: bhagavatīti aciraṃ parinibbute bhagavati, parinibbānato uddhaṃ māsamatte kāle. Nidānavaṇṇanāyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1394_2: vuttanayeneva bhagavato pattacīvaraṃ ādāya āgantvā khīravirecanaṃ pivitvā vihāre
atk-s0101a0:1394_3: nisinnadivasaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Todeyyaputtoti todeyyabrāhmaṇassa putto, so kira
atk-s0101a0:1394_4: sāvatthiyā avidūre tudigāmo nāma atthi, tassa adhipatittā todeyyoti saṅkhyaṃ gato.
atk-s0101a0:1394_5: Mahaddhano pana hoti pañcacattālīsakoṭivibhavo, paramamaccharī – “dadato bhogānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1394_6: aparikkhayo nāma natthī”ti cintetvā kassaci kiñci na deti, puttampi āha –
atk-s0101a0:1397_0: Evaṃ adānameva sikkhāpetvā kāyassa bhedā tasmiṃyeva ghare sunakho hutvā nibbatto.
atk-s0101a0:1397_1: Subho taṃ sunakhaṃ ativiya piyāyati. Attano bhuñjanakabhattaṃyeva bhojeti, ukkhipitvā
atk-s0101a0:1397_2: varasayane sayāpeti. Atha bhagavā ekadivasaṃ nikkhante māṇave taṃ gharaṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0101a0:1397_3: pāvisi. Sunakho bhagavantaṃ disvā bhukkāraṃ karonto bhagavato samīpaṃ gato. Tato
atk-s0101a0:1397_4: naṃ bhagavā avoca “todeyya tvaṃ pubbepi maṃ ‘bho, bho’ti paribhavitvā sunakho jāto,
atk-s0101a0:1397_5: idānipi bhukkāraṃ katvā avīciṃ gamissasī”ti. Sunakho taṃ kathaṃ sutvā vippaṭisārī
atk-s0101a0:1397_6: hutvā uddhanantare chārikāya nipanno, manussā naṃ ukkhipitvā sayane sayāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1398_0: Subho āgantvā “kenāyaṃ sunakho sayanā oropito”ti āha. Manussā “na kenacī”ti vatvā
atk-s0101a0:1398_1: taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. Māṇavo sutvā “mama pitā brahmaloke nibbatto, samaṇo pana gotamo
atk-s0101a0:1398_2: me pitaraṃ sunakhaṃ karoti yaṃ kiñci esa mukhārūḷhaṃ bhāsatī”ti kujjhitvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1398_3: musāvādena codetukāmo vihāraṃ gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ pucchi. Bhagavā tassa tatheva vatvā
atk-s0101a0:1398_4: avisaṃvādanatthaṃ āha – “atthi pana te, māṇava, pitarā na akkhātaṃ dhana”nti. Atthi,
atk-s0101a0:1398_5: bho gotama, satasahassagghanikā suvaṇṇamālā, satasahassagghanikā suvaṇṇapādukā, satasahassagghanikā
atk-s0101a0:1398_6: suvaṇṇapāti, satasahassañca kahāpaṇanti. Gaccha taṃ sunakhaṃ appodakaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1398_7: bhojetvā sayanaṃ āropetvā īsakaṃ niddaṃ okkantakāle puccha, sabbaṃ te ācikkhissati,
atk-s0101a0:1398_8: atha naṃ jāneyyāsi – “pitā me eso”ti. So tathā akāsi. Sunakho sabbaṃ ācikkhi, tadā
atk-s0101a0:1398_9: naṃ – “pitā me”ti ñatvā bhagavati pasannacitto gantvā bhagavantaṃcuddasa pañhe pucchitvā
atk-s0101a0:1398_10: vissajjanapariyosāne bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gato, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “subho māṇavo
atk-s0101a0:1398_11: todeyyaputto”ti. Sāvatthiyaṃ paṭivasatīti attano bhogagāmato āgantvā vasati.
atk-s0101a0:1399_0: 445-446. Aññataraṃ māṇavakaṃ āmantesīti satthari parinibbute “ānandatthero kirassa
atk-s0101a0:1399_1: pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā āgato, mahājano taṃ dassanatthāya upasaṅkamatī”ti sutvā “vihāraṃ
atk-s0101a0:1399_2: kho pana gantvā mahājanamajjhe na sakkā sukhena paṭisanthāraṃ vā kātuṃ, dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1399_3: vā sotuṃ gehaṃ āgataṃyeva naṃ disvā sukhena paṭisanthāraṃ karissāmi, ekā ca me kaṅkhā
atk-s0101a0:1399_4: atthi, tampi naṃ pucchissāmī”ti cintetvā aññataraṃ māṇavakaṃ āmantesi. Appābādhantiādīsu
atk-s0101a0:1399_5: ābādhoti visabhāgavedanā vuccati, yā ekadese uppajjitvā cattāro iriyāpathe ayapaṭṭena
atk-s0101a0:1399_6: ābandhitvā viya gaṇhati, tassā abhāvaṃ pucchāti vadati. Appātaṅkoti kicchajīvitakaro
atk-s0101a0:1399_7: rogo vuccati, tassāpi abhāvaṃ pucchāti vadati. Gilānasseva ca uṭṭhānaṃ nāma garukaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1399_8: hoti, kāye balaṃ na hoti, tasmā niggelaññabhāvañca balañca pucchāti vadati. Phāsuvihāranti
atk-s0101a0:1399_9: gamanaṭhānanisajjasayanesu catūsu iriyāpathesu sukhavihāraṃ pucchāti vadati. Athassa
atk-s0101a0:1400_0: 447. Kālañca samayañca upādāyāti kālañca samayañca paññāya gahetvā upadhāretvāti
atk-s0101a0:1400_1: attho. Sace amhākaṃ sve gamanakālo bhavissati, kāye balamattā ceva pharissati, gamanapaccayā
atk-s0101a0:1400_2: ca añño aphāsuvihāro na bhavissati, athetaṃ kālañca gamanakāraṇasamavāyasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1400_3: samayañca upadhāretvā – “api eva nāma sve āgaccheyyāmā”ti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a0:1401_0: 448. Cetakena bhikkhunāti cetiraṭṭhe jātattā cetakoti evaṃ laddhanāmena. Sammodanīyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1401_1: kathaṃ sāraṇīyanti bho, ānanda, dasabalassa ko nāma ābādho ahosi, kiṃ bhagavā paribhuñji.
atk-s0101a0:1401_2: Api ca satthu parinibbānena tumhākaṃ soko udapādi, satthā nāma na kevalaṃ tumhākaṃyeva
atk-s0101a0:1401_3: parinibbuto, sadevakassa lokassa mahājāni, ko dāni añño maraṇā muccissati, yatra
atk-s0101a0:1401_4: so sadevakassa lokassa aggapuggalo parinibbuto, idāni kaṃ aññaṃ disvā maccurājā lajjissatīti
atk-s0101a0:1401_5: evamādinā nayena maraṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā therassa
atk-s0101a0:1401_6: hiyyo pītabhesajjānurūpaṃ āhāraṃ datvā bhattakiccāvasāne ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0101a0:1402_0: Upaṭṭhāko santikāvacaroti upaṭṭhāko hutvā santikāvacaro, na randhagavesī. Na vīmaṃsanādhippāyo.
atk-s0101a0:1402_1: Samīpacārīti idaṃ purimapadasseva vevacanaṃ. Yesaṃ so bhavaṃ gotamoti kasmā pucchati?
atk-s0101a0:1402_2: Tassa kira evaṃ ahosi “yesu dhammesu bhavaṃ gotamo imaṃ lokaṃ patiṭṭhapesi, te tassa
atk-s0101a0:1402_3: accayena naṭṭhā nu kho, dharanti nu kho, sace dharanti, ānando jānissati, handa naṃ
atk-s0101a0:1403_0: 449. Athassa thero tīṇi piṭakāni tīhi khandhehi saṅgahetvā dassento “tiṇṇaṃ kho”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1403_1: Māṇavo saṅkhittena kathitaṃ asallakkhento – “vitthārato pucchissāmī”ti cintetvā “katamesaṃ tiṇṇa”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1405_0: 450-453. Tato therena “ariyassa sīlakkhandhassā”ti tesu dassitesu puna “katamo pana
atk-s0101a0:1405_1: so, bho ānanda, ariyo sīlakkhandho”ti ekekaṃ pucchi. Theropissa buddhuppādaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0101a0:1405_2: tantidhammaṃ desento anukkamena bhagavatā vuttanayeneva sabbaṃ vissajjesi. Tattha
atk-s0101a0:1405_3: atthi cevettha uttarikaraṇīyanti ettha bhagavato sāsane na sīlameva sāro, kevalañhetaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1405_4: patiṭṭhāmattameva hoti. Ito uttari pana aññampi kattabbaṃ atthi yevāti dassesi. Ito
atk-s0101a0:1407_0: 454. Kathañca, māṇava, bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvāro hotīti idamāyasmā ānando “katamo
atk-s0101a0:1407_1: pana so, bho ānanda, ariyo samādhikkhandho”ti evaṃ samādhikkhandhaṃ puṭṭhopi ye te
atk-s0101a0:1407_2: “sīlasampanno indriyesu guttadvāro satisampajaññena samannāgato santuṭṭho”ti evaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1407_3: sīlānantaraṃ indriyasaṃvarādayo sīlasamādhīnaṃ antare ubhinnampi upakārakadhammā
atk-s0101a0:1407_4: uddiṭṭhā, te niddisitvā samādhikkhandhaṃ dassetukāmo ārabhi. Ettha ca rūpajjhānāneva
atk-s0101a0:1407_5: āgatāni, na arūpajjhānāni, ānetvā pana dīpetabbāni. Catutthajjhānena hi asaṅgahitā
atk-s0101a0:1408_0: 471-480. Atthi cevettha uttarikaraṇīyanti ettha bhagavato sāsane na cittekaggatāmattakeneva
atk-s0101a0:1408_1: pariyosānappatti nāma atthi, itopi uttari pana aññaṃ kattabbaṃ atthi yevāti dasseti.
atk-s0101a0:1408_2: Natthi cevettha uttarikaraṇīyanti ettha bhagavato sāsane ito uttari kātabbaṃ nāma
atk-s0101a0:1408_3: natthiyeva, arahattapariyosānañhi bhagavato sāsananti dasseti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0101a0:1411_0: 481. Evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe… nāḷandāyanti kevaṭṭasuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ apubbapadavaṇṇanā. Pāvārikambavaneti
atk-s0101a0:1411_1: pāvārikassa ambavane. Kevaṭṭoti idaṃ tassa gahapatiputtassa nāmaṃ. So kira cattālīsakoṭidhano
atk-s0101a0:1411_2: gahapatimahāsālo ativiya saddho pasanno ahosi. So saddhādhikattāyeva “sace eko bhikkhu
atk-s0101a0:1411_3: aḍḍhamāsantarena vā māsantarena vā saṃvaccharena vā ākāse uppatitvā vividhāni pāṭihāriyāni
atk-s0101a0:1411_4: dasseyya, sabbo jano ativiya pasīdeyya. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ yācitvā pāṭihāriyakaraṇatthāya
atk-s0101a0:1411_5: ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ anujānāpeyya”nti cintetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha.
atk-s0101a0:1412_0: Tattha iddhāti samiddhā phītāti nānābhaṇḍaussannatāya vuddhippattā. Ākiṇṇamanussāti
atk-s0101a0:1412_1: aṃsakūṭena aṃsakūṭaṃ paharitvā viya vicarantehi manussehi ākiṇṇā. Samādisatūti āṇāpetu
atk-s0101a0:1412_2: ṭhānantare ṭhapetu. Uttarimanussadhammāti uttarimanussānaṃ dhammato, dasakusalasaṅkhātato
atk-s0101a0:1412_3: vā manussadhammato uttari. Bhiyyosomattāyāti pakatiyāpi pajjalitapadīpo telasnehaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1412_4: labhitvā viya atirekappamāṇena abhippasīdissati. Na kho ahanti bhagavā rājagahaseṭṭhivatthusmiṃ
atk-s0101a0:1413_0: 482. Na dhaṃsemīti na guṇavināsanena dhaṃsemi, sīlabhedaṃ pāpetvā anupubbena uccaṭṭhānato
atk-s0101a0:1413_1: otārento nīcaṭṭhāne na ṭhapemi, atha kho ahaṃ buddhasāsanassa vuddhiṃ paccāsīsanto
atk-s0101a0:1413_2: kathemīti dasseti. Tatiyampi khoti yāvatatiyaṃ buddhānaṃ kathaṃ paṭibāhitvā kathetuṃ
atk-s0101a0:1413_3: visahanto nāma natthi. Ayaṃ pana bhagavatā saddhiṃ vissāsiko vissāsaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vallabho
atk-s0101a0:1415_0: 483-484. Atha bhagavā ayaṃ upāsako mayi paṭibāhantepi punappunaṃ yācatiyeva. “Handassa
atk-s0101a0:1415_1: pāṭihāriyakaraṇe ādīnavaṃ dassemī”ti cintetvā “tīṇi kho”tiādimāha. Tattha amāhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1415_2: bhikkhunti amuṃ ahaṃ bhikkhuṃ. Gandhārīti gandhārena nāma isinā katā, gandhāraraṭṭhe
atk-s0101a0:1415_3: vā uppannā vijjā. Tattha kira bahū isayo vasiṃsu, tesu ekena katā vijjāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0101a0:1415_4: Aṭṭīyāmīti aṭṭo pīḷito viya homi. Harāyāmīti lajjāmi. Jigucchāmīti gūthaṃ disvā viya jigucchaṃ uppādemi.
atk-s0101a0:1417_0: 485. Parasattānanti aññesaṃ sattānaṃ. Dutiyaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Ādisatīti katheti.
atk-s0101a0:1417_1: Cetasikanti somanassadomanassaṃ adhippetaṃ. Evampi te manoti evaṃ tava mano somanassito
atk-s0101a0:1417_2: vā domanassito vā kāmavitakkādisampayutto vā. Dutiyaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Itipi te
atk-s0101a0:1417_3: cittanti iti tava cittaṃ, idañcidañca atthaṃ cintayamānaṃ pavattatīti attho. Maṇikā
atk-s0101a0:1417_4: nāma vijjāti cintāmaṇīti evaṃ laddhanāmā loke ekā vijjā atthi. Tāya paresaṃ cittaṃ jānātīti dīpeti.
atk-s0101a0:1419_0: 486. Evaṃ vitakkethāti nekkhammavitakkādayo evaṃ pavattentā vitakketha. Mā evaṃ vitakkayitthāti
atk-s0101a0:1419_1: evaṃ kāmavitakkādayo pavattentā mā vitakkayittha. Evaṃ manasi karothāti evaṃ aniccasaññameva,
atk-s0101a0:1419_2: dukkhasaññādīsu vā aññataraṃ manasi karotha. Mā evanti “nicca”ntiādinā nayena mā
atk-s0101a0:1419_3: manasi karittha. Idanti idaṃ pañcakāmaguṇikarāgaṃ pajahatha. Idaṃ upasampajjāti idaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1419_4: catumaggaphalappabhedaṃ lokuttaradhammameva upasampajja pāpuṇitvā nipphādetvā viharatha.
atk-s0101a0:1419_5: Iti bhagavā iddhividhaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyanti dasseti, parassa cittaṃ ñatvā kathanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1419_6: ādesanāpāṭihāriyanti. Sāvakānañca buddhānañca satataṃ dhammadesanā anusāsanīpāṭihāriyanti.
atk-s0101a0:1420_0: Tattha iddhipāṭihāriyena anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṃ mahāmoggallānassa āciṇṇaṃ, ādesanāpāṭihāriyena
atk-s0101a0:1420_1: anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṃ dhammasenāpatissa. Devadatte saṃghaṃ bhinditvā pañca bhikkhusatāni
atk-s0101a0:1420_2: gahetvā gayāsīse buddhalīḷāya tesaṃ dhammaṃ desante hi bhagavatā pesitesu dvīsu aggasāvakesu
atk-s0101a0:1420_3: dhammasenāpati tesaṃ cittācāraṃ ñatvā dhammaṃ desesi, therassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0101a0:1420_4: pañcasatā bhikkhū sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Atha nesaṃ mahāmoggallāno vikubbanaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1420_5: dassetvā dassetvā dhammaṃ desesi, taṃ sutvā sabbe arahattaphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Atha
atk-s0101a0:1420_6: dvepi mahānāgā pañca bhikkhusatāni gahetvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā veḷuvanamevāgamiṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1420_7: Anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṃ pana buddhānaṃ satataṃ dhammadesanā, tesu iddhipāṭihāriyaādesanāpāṭihāriyāni
atk-s0101a0:1420_8: saupārambhāni sadosāni, addhānaṃ na tiṭṭhanti, addhānaṃ atiṭṭhanato na niyyanti.
atk-s0101a0:1420_9: Anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṃ anupārambhaṃ niddosaṃ, addhānaṃ tiṭṭhati, addhānaṃ tiṭṭhanato
atk-s0101a0:1420_10: niyyāti. Tasmā bhagavā iddhipāṭihāriyañca ādesanāpāṭihāriyañca garahati, anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṃyeva pasaṃsati.
atk-s0101a0:1422_0: 487. Bhūtapubbanti idaṃ kasmā bhagavatā āraddhaṃ. Iddhipāṭihāriyaādesanāpāṭihāriyānaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1422_2: Api ca sabbabuddhānaṃ mahābhūtapariyesako nāmeko bhikkhu hotiyeva. Yo mahābhūte pariyesanto
atk-s0101a0:1422_3: yāva brahmalokā vicaritvā vissajjetāraṃ alabhitvā āgamma buddhameva pucchitvā nikkaṅkho
atk-s0101a0:1422_4: hoti. Tasmā buddhānaṃ mahantabhāvappakāsanatthaṃ, idañca kāraṇaṃ paṭicchannaṃ, atha
atk-s0101a0:1423_0: Tattha kattha nu khoti kismiṃ ṭhāne kiṃ āgamma kiṃ pattassa te anavasesā appavattivasena
atk-s0101a0:1423_1: nirujjhanti. Mahābhūtakathā panesā sabbākārena visuddhimagge vuttā, tasmā sā tatova gahetabbā.
atk-s0101a0:1424_0: 488. Devayāniyo maggoti pāṭiyekko devalokagamanamaggo nāma natthi, iddhividhañāṇasseva
atk-s0101a0:1424_1: panetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tena hesa yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vattento devalokaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1424_2: yāti. Tasmā “taṃ devayāniyo maggo”ti vuttaṃ. Yena cātumahārājikāti samīpe ṭhitampi
atk-s0101a0:1424_3: bhagavantaṃ apucchitvā dhammatāya codito devatā mahānubhāvāti maññamāno upasaṅkami.
atk-s0101a0:1424_4: Mayampi kho, bhikkhu, na jānāmāti buddhavisaye pañhaṃ pucchitā devatā na jānanti,
atk-s0101a0:1424_5: tenevamāhaṃsu. Atha kho so bhikkhu “mama imaṃ pañhaṃ na kathetuṃ na labbhā, sīghaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1424_6: kathethā”ti tā devatā ajjhottharati, punappunaṃ pucchati, tā “ajjhottharati no ayaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1424_7: bhikkhu, handa naṃ hatthato mocessāmā”ti cintetvā “atthi kho bhikkhu cattāro mahārājāno”tiādimāhaṃsu.
atk-s0101a0:1424_8: Tattha abhikkantatarāti atikkamma kantatarā. Paṇītatarāti vaṇṇayasaissariyādīhi uttamatarā
atk-s0101a0:1425_0: 491-493. Ayaṃ pana viseso – sakko kira devarājā cintesi “ayaṃ pañho buddhavisayo,
atk-s0101a0:1425_1: na sakkā aññena vissajjituṃ, ayañca bhikkhu aggiṃ pahāya khajjopanakaṃ dhamanto viya,
atk-s0101a0:1425_2: bheriṃ pahāya udaraṃ vādento viya ca, loke aggapuggalaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ pahāya devatā
atk-s0101a0:1425_3: pucchanto vicarati, pesemi naṃ satthusantika”nti. Tato punadeva so cintesi “sudūrampi
atk-s0101a0:1425_4: gantvā satthu santikeva nikkaṅkho bhavissati. Atthi ceva puggalo nāmesa, thokaṃ tāva
atk-s0101a0:1425_5: āhiṇḍanto kilamatu pacchā jānissatī”ti. Tato taṃ “ahampi kho”tiādimāha. Brahmayāniyopi
atk-s0101a0:1425_6: devayāniyasadisova. Devayāniyamaggoti vā brahmayāniyamaggoti vā dhammasetūti vā ekacittakkhaṇikaappanāti
atk-s0101a0:1425_7: vā sanniṭṭhānikacetanāti vā mahaggatacittanti vā abhiññāñāṇanti vā sabbametaṃ iddhividhañāṇasseva nāmaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1426_0: 494. Pubbanimittanti āgamanapubbabhāge nimittaṃ sūriyassa udayato aruṇuggaṃ viya.
atk-s0101a0:1426_1: Tasmā idāneva brahmā āgamissati, evaṃ mayaṃ jānāmāti dīpayiṃsu. Pāturahosīti pākaṭo
atk-s0101a0:1426_2: ahosi. Atha kho so brahmā tena bhikkhunā puṭṭho attano avisayabhāvaṃ ñatvā sacāhaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1426_3: “na jānāmī”ti vakkhāmi, ime maṃ paribhavissanti, atha jānanto viya yaṃ kiñci kathessāmi,
atk-s0101a0:1426_4: ayaṃ me bhikkhu veyyākaraṇena anāraddhacitto vādaṃ āropessati. “Ahamasmi bhikkhu
atk-s0101a0:1426_5: brahmā”tiādīni pana me bhaṇantassa na koci vacanaṃ saddahissati. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ vikkhepaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1426_6: katvā imaṃ bhikkhuṃ satthusantikaṃyeva peseyyanti cintetvā “ahamasmi bhikkhu brahmā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1427: 495-496. Ekamantaṃ apanetvāti kasmā evamakāsi? Kuhakattā. Bahiddhā pariyeṭṭhinti telatthiko vālikaṃ nippīḷiyamāno viya yāva brahmalokā bahiddhā pariyesanaṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0101a0:1428_0: 497. Sakuṇanti kākaṃ vā kulalaṃ vā. Na kho eso, bhikkhu, pañho evaṃ pucchitabboti
atk-s0101a0:1428_1: idaṃ bhagavā yasmā padesenesa pañho pucchitabbo, ayañca kho bhikkhu anupādinnakepi
atk-s0101a0:1428_2: gahetvā nippadesato pucchati, tasmā paṭisedheti. Āciṇṇaṃ kiretaṃ buddhānaṃ, pucchāmūḷhassa
atk-s0101a0:1428_3: janassa pucchāya dosaṃ dassetvā pucchaṃ sikkhāpetvā pucchāvissajjanaṃ. Kasmā? Pucchituṃ
atk-s0101a0:1428_4: ajānitvā paripucchanto duviññāpayo hoti. Pañhaṃ sikkhāpento pana “kattha āpo cā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1429_0: 498. Tattha na gādhatīti na patiṭṭhāti, ime cattāro mahābhūtā kiṃ āgamma appatiṭṭhā
atk-s0101a0:1429_1: bhavantīti attho. Upādinnaṃyeva sandhāya pucchati. Dīghañca rassañcāti saṇṭhānavasena
atk-s0101a0:1429_2: upādārūpaṃ vuttaṃ. Aṇuṃ thūlanti khuddakaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā, imināpi upādārūpe vaṇṇamattameva
atk-s0101a0:1429_3: kathitaṃ. Subhāsubhanti subhañca asubhañca upādārūpameva kathitaṃ. Kiṃ pana upādārūpaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1429_4: subhanti asubhanti atthi? Natthi. Iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇaṃ paneva kathitaṃ. Nāmañca rūpañcāti
atk-s0101a0:1429_5: nāmañca dīghādibhedaṃ rūpañca. Uparujjhatīti nirujjhati, kiṃ āgamma asesametaṃ nappavattatīti.
atk-s0101a0:1430: Evaṃ pucchitabbaṃ siyāti pucchaṃ dassetvā idāni vissajjanaṃ dassento tatra veyyākaraṇaṃ bhavatīti vatvā – “viññāṇa”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1431_0: 499. Tattha viññātabbanti viññāṇaṃ nibbānassetaṃ nāmaṃ, tadetaṃ nidassanābhāvato
atk-s0101a0:1431_1: anidassanaṃ. Uppādanto vā vayanto vā ṭhitassa aññathattanto vā etassa natthīti anantaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1431_2: Pabhanti panetaṃ kira titthassa nāmaṃ, tañhi papanti etthāti papaṃ, pakārassa pana
atk-s0101a0:1431_3: bhakāro kato. Sabbato pabhamassāti sabbatopabhaṃ. Nibbānassa kira yathā mahāsamuddassa
atk-s0101a0:1431_4: yato yato otaritukāmā honti, taṃ tadeva titthaṃ, atitthaṃ nāma natthi. Evameva aṭṭhatiṃsāya
atk-s0101a0:1431_5: kammaṭṭhānesu yena yena mukhena nibbānaṃ otaritukāmā honti, taṃ tadeva titthaṃ, nibbānassa

atk-s0101a0:1466_3: dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā”ti ettha ānisaṃsaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho. “Antaṃ antaguṇaṃ kayirā
atk-s0101a0:1466_4: mālāguṇe bahū”ti ca ettha bandhanaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho. Idhāpi eseva adhippeto. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1466_6: sotaviññeyyādīsupi attho veditabbo. Iṭṭhāti pariyiṭṭhā vā hontu, mā vā, iṭṭhārammaṇabhūtāti
atk-s0101a0:1466_7: attho. Kantāti kāmanīyā. Manāpāti manavaḍḍhanakā. Piyarūpāti piyajātikā. Kāmūpasañhitāti
atk-s0101a0:1466_8: ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjamānena kāmena upasañhitā. Rajanīyāti rañjanīyā, rāguppattikāraṇabhūtāti attho.
atk-s0101a0:1467_0: Gadhitāti gedhena abhibhūtā hutvā. Mucchitāti mucchākārappattāya adhimattakāya taṇhāya
atk-s0101a0:1467_1: abhibhūtā. Ajjhopannāti adhiopannā ogāḷhā “idaṃ sāra”nti pariniṭṭhānappattā hutvā.
atk-s0101a0:1467_2: Anādīnavadassāvinoti ādīnavaṃ apassantā. Anissaraṇapaññāti idamettha nissaraṇanti,
atk-s0101a0:1468: 548. Āvaraṇātiādīsu āvarantīti āvaraṇā. Nivārentīti nīvaraṇā. Onandhantīti onāhanā. Pariyonandhantīti pariyonāhanā. Kāmacchandādīnaṃ vitthārakathā visuddhimaggato gahetabbā.
atk-s0101a0:1469_0: 549-550. Āvutā nivutā onaddhā pariyonaddhāti padāni āvaraṇādīnaṃ vasena vuttāni.
atk-s0101a0:1469_1: Sapariggahoti itthipariggahena sapariggahoti pucchati. Apariggaho bho gotamātiādīsupi
atk-s0101a0:1469_2: kāmacchandassa abhāvato itthipariggahena apariggaho. Byāpādassa abhāvato kenaci saddhiṃ
atk-s0101a0:1469_3: veracittena avero. Thinamiddhassa abhāvato cittagelaññasaṅkhātena byāpajjena abyāpajjo.
atk-s0101a0:1469_5: Vicikicchāya abhāvato cittaṃ vase vatteti. Yathā ca brāhmaṇā cittagatikā hontīti,
atk-s0101a0:1469_6: cittassa vasena vattanti, na tādisoti vasavattī.
atk-s0101a0:1470_0: 552. Idha kho panāti idha brahmalokamagge. Āsīditvāti amaggameva “maggo”ti upagantvā.
atk-s0101a0:1470_1: Saṃsīdantīti “samatala”nti saññāya paṅkaṃ otiṇṇā viya anuppavisanti. Saṃsīditvā visāraṃ
atk-s0101a0:1470_2: pāpuṇantīti evaṃ paṅke viya saṃsīditvā visāraṃ aṅgamaṅgasaṃbhañjanaṃ pāpuṇanti. Sukkhataraṃ
atk-s0101a0:1470_3: maññe tarantīti marīcikāya vañcetvā “kākapeyyā nadī”ti saññāya “tarissāmā”ti hatthehi
atk-s0101a0:1470_4: ca pādehi ca vāyamamānā sukkhataraṇaṃ maññe taranti. Tasmā yathā hatthapādādīnaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1470_5: saṃbhañjanaṃ paribhañjanaṃ, evaṃ apāyesu saṃbhañjanaṃ paribhañjanaṃ pāpuṇanti. Idheva
atk-s0101a0:1470_6: ca sukhaṃ vā sātaṃ vā na labhanti. Tasmā idaṃ tevijjānaṃ brāhmaṇānanti tasmā idaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1470_7: brahmasahabyatāya maggadīpakaṃ tevijjakaṃ pāvacanaṃ tevijjānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ. Tevijjāiriṇanti
atk-s0101a0:1470_8: tevijjāaraññaṃ iriṇanti hi agāmakaṃ mahāaraññaṃ vuccati. Tevijjāvivananti pupphaphalehi
atk-s0101a0:1470_9: aparibhogarukkhehi sañchannaṃ nirudakaṃ araññaṃ. Yattha maggato ukkamitvā parivattitumpi
atk-s0101a0:1470_10: na sakkā honti, taṃ sandhāyāha “tevijjāvivanantipi vuccatī”ti. Tevijjābyasananti
atk-s0101a0:1470_11: tevijjānaṃ pañcavidhabyasanasadisametaṃ. Yathā hi ñātirogabhoga diṭṭhi sīlabyasanappattassa
atk-s0101a0:1470_12: sukhaṃ nāma natthi, evaṃ tevijjānaṃ tevijjakaṃ pāvacanaṃ āgamma sukhaṃ nāma natthīti dasseti.
atk-s0101a0:1471_0: 554. Jātasaṃvaḍḍhoti jāto ca vaḍḍhito ca, yo hi kevalaṃ tattha jātova hoti, aññattha
atk-s0101a0:1471_1: vaḍḍhito, tassa samantā gāmamaggā na sabbaso paccakkhā honti, tasmā jātasaṃvaḍḍhoti
atk-s0101a0:1471_2: āha. Jātasaṃvaḍḍhopi yo ciranikkhanto, tassa na sabbaso paccakkhā honti. Tasmā “tāvadeva
atk-s0101a0:1471_3: avasaṭa”nti āha, taṅkhaṇameva nikkhantanti attho. Dandhāyitattanti ayaṃ nu kho maggo,
atk-s0101a0:1471_4: ayaṃ na nukhoti kaṅkhāvasena cirāyitattaṃ. Vitthāyitattanti yathā sukhumaṃ atthajātaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1471_5: sahasā pucchitassa kassaci sarīraṃ thaddhabhāvaṃ gaṇhāti, evaṃ thaddhabhāvaggahaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a0:1471_6: Na tvevāti iminā sabbaññutaññāṇassa appaṭihatabhāvaṃ dasseti. Tassa hi purisassa
atk-s0101a0:1471_7: mārāvaṭṭanādivasena siyā ñāṇassa paṭighāto. Tena so dandhāyeyya vā vitthāyeyya vā.
atk-s0101a0:1471_8: Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pana appaṭihataṃ, na sakkā tassa kenaci antarāyo kātunti dīpeti.
atk-s0101a0:1472_0: 555. Ullumpatu bhavaṃ gotamoti uddharatu bhavaṃ gotamo. Brāhmaṇiṃ pajanti brāhmaṇadārakaṃ,
atk-s0101a0:1472_1: bhavaṃ gotamo mama brāhmaṇaputtaṃ apāyamaggato uddharitvā brahmalokamagge patiṭṭhapetūti
atk-s0101a0:1472_2: attho. Athassa bhagavā buddhuppādaṃ dassetvā saddhiṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya mettāvihārādibrahmalokagāmimaggaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1472_3: desetukāmo “tena hi vāseṭṭhā”tiādimāha. Tattha “idha tathāgato”tiādi sāmaññaphale
atk-s0101a0:1472_4: vitthāritaṃ. Mettāsahagatenātiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge brahmavihārakammaṭṭhānakathāyaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1472_5: vuttaṃ. Seyyathāpi vāseṭṭha balavā saṅkhadhamotiādi pana idha apubbaṃ. Tattha balavāti
atk-s0101a0:1472_6: balasampanno. Saṅkhadhamoti saṅkhadhamako. Appakasirenāti akicchena adukkhena. Dubbalo
atk-s0101a0:1472_7: hi saṅkhadhamo saṅkhaṃ dhamantopi na sakkoti catasso disā sarena viññāpetuṃ, nāssa
atk-s0101a0:1472_8: saṅkhasaddo sabbato pharati. Balavato pana vipphāriko hoti, tasmā “balavā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a0:1472_9: Mettāya cetovimuttiyāti ettha mettāti vutte upacāropi appanāpi vaṭṭati, “cettovimuttī”ti
atk-s0101a0:1472_10: vutte pana appanāva vaṭṭati. Yaṃ pamāṇakataṃ kammanti pamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma kāmāvacaraṃ
atk-s0101a0:1472_11: vuccati. Appamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma rūpārūpāvacaraṃ. Tañhi pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā odissakaanodissakadisāpharaṇavasena
atk-s0101a0:1472_12: vaḍḍhetvā katattā appamāṇakatanti vuccati. Na taṃ tatrāvasissati na taṃ tatrāvatiṭṭhatīti
atk-s0101a0:1472_13: taṃ kāmāvacarakammaṃ tasmiṃ rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakamme na ohīyati, na tiṭṭhati. Kiṃ
atk-s0101a0:1472_14: vuttaṃ hoti – taṃ kāmāvacarakammaṃ tassa rūpārūpāvacarakammassa antarā laggituṃ vā
atk-s0101a0:1472_15: ṭhātuṃ vā rūpārūpāvacarakammaṃ pharitvā pariyādiyitvā attano okāsaṃ gahetvā patiṭṭhātuṃ
atk-s0101a0:1472_16: na sakkoti. Atha kho rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakammameva kāmāvacaraṃ mahogho viya parittaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1472_17: udakaṃ pharitvā pariyādiyitvā attano okāsaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhati. Tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā
atk-s0101a0:1472_18: sayameva brahmasahabyataṃ upanetīti. Evaṃvihārīti evaṃ mettādivihārī.
atk-s0101a0:1473_0: 559. Ete mayaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamanti idaṃ tesaṃ dutiyaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ. Paṭhamameva
atk-s0101a0:1473_1: hete majjhimapaṇṇāsake vāseṭṭhasuttaṃ sutvā saraṇaṃ gatā, imaṃ pana tevijjasuttaṃ
atk-s0101a0:1473_2: sutvā dutiyampi saraṇaṃ gatā. Katipāhaccayena pabbajitvā aggaññasutte upasampadañceva
